40001001	Alha phi machina a manyaapwiiya awe Yesu Kuristo o iyari ya Adaudi o iyari ya Aburahimu.
40001002	Aburahimu ni Naisaka ni Nayakhobo ni Nayuda ni achihimaya,
40001003	Nayuda nkaayara Nafarisi ni Nazera anumwanaya yaari Atamari. Nafarisi ahaayara Nahezironi, Nahezironi nkaayara Narami,
40001004	Narami nkaayara Naaminaadabu, Naaminadabu nkaayara Nanashoni, Nanashoni nkaayara Nasalmoni.
40001005	Nasalmoni nkaayara Naboazi, anumwanaya aari Narahabu, Naboazi ni Naruthu yaari manyanaangoro a Naobedi athumwanaya Nayese,
40001006	Naobedi nkaayara Nayese, Nayese nkaayara Amwene Adaudi. Adaudi nkaayara Naselemani (anumwanaya Naselemani aari Nabethsheba, mahanu a Nauriya).
40001007	Naselemani nkaayara Narehoboamu, Narehoboamu nkaayara Naabiya, Naabiya nkaayara Naasafu,
40001008	Naasafu nkaayara Nayehoshafati, Nayehoshafati nkaayara Nayoramu, Nayoramu nkaayara Nauziya,
40001009	Nauziya nkaayara Nayothamu, Nayothamu nkaayara Naahazi, Naahazi nkaayara Nahezekiya,
40001010	Nahezekiya nkaayara Namanase, Namanase nkaayara Naamoni, Naamoni nkaayara Nayosiya,
40001011	Nayosiya nkaayara Nayekoniya ni achihimaya. Yeyo yaari ikatema Ayahudi vaari aya upottani Ubabeli.
40001012	Ikatema Ayahudi vaarwehiye aya upottani Ubabeli, Nayekoniya nkaayara Nashaltieli, Nashaltieli nkaayara Nazerubabeli,
40001013	Nazerubabeli nkaayara Naabihudi, Naabihudi nkaayara Naeliakimu, Naeliakimu nkaayara Naazori,
40001014	Naazori nkaayara Nasadoki, Nasadoki nkaayara Naakimu, Naakimu nkaayara Naeliudi
40001015	Naeliudi nkaayara Naeliazeri, Naeliazeri nkaayara Amathani, Amathani nkaayara Nayakhobo,
40001016	Nayakhobo nkaayara Nayusufu owannyaya Amariamu anumwanawe Yesu neehaniya Kuristo.
40001017	Paahi etu, iyari chaari khumi ni ncheshe toka wa Aburahimu mpaka wa Adaudi, ni iyari khumi ni ncheshe toka wa Adaudi mpaka Ayahudi vaakushiye aya upottani Ubabeli ni iyari khumi ni ncheshe toka ukushiya ipotta mpaka vaayarelhe awe Kuristo.
40001018	Paahi etu, cho phi chiichammo chenre aya wo uyaria Yesu Kuristo. Amariamu anumwanawe aari anavekiye ni Nayusufu, nansho uhinaya ukhalhiya vamoka thoko nlhopwana ni ahanu awe, Amariamu ahoonia wiira aari veruttuni wo woorihiya ni Iphumu ya Nlhuku.
40001019	Nansho ukhalhawaya Nayusufu owannyaya ayo, aari attu o nrima woombone, khaathananne woolhiha muru Amariamu vaattuni. Paahi etu aholhakelha waahiya wo nivitho, wo uhichuwania ni attu.
40001020	Vaari aya oopuwelhaka nenno nlhove nno etu, Nnepa wo wiirimu wa Athithi wahaakhuruwelha ntorani weeraka, “Inyu Nayusufu, mwaana a Adaudi, nhoove waakusha Amariamu akhalhe ahanu inyu, ukhalhawaya iweyi aya iyo iri wo worihiya ni Iphumu ya Nlhuku.
40001021	Anowa wiittukulha mwaana mwanlhopwana, ni inyu mmweeke mwaamwihana nchina nawe Yesu, ukhalhawaya yoyo phi nolhoha woopolha attu ukhuma mu uwonyani mwaya.”
40001022	Paahi alha onkhaye alha yaakhumelhenlhe nitimire nlhove ni Athithi naahimiye ni anamilhohi wiira,
40001023	“Mwalhi hinaatameriya nowa urupalha irukulhu ni unnyara mwaana mwanlhopwana nchina nawe nowa wiihaniya Imanueli.” Maana aya, “Nlhuku ri vamoka ni hii.”
40001024	Nayusufu vonkwilhe aya nkhoveni ahopanga thoko Nnepa wo wiirimu wa Athithi chenre aya wo ulhehera. Nkaakusha ni waakhalhana ahanu aya.
40001025	Nansho khawaarupiye vamoka mpaka vannyanre aya mwaana mwanlhopwana. Ni ayo nkayammaha nchina nawe Yesu.
40002001	Yesu aayarelhe iwani yo Ubethelehemu ilhapo yo Uyudea mahuku Naherode vaari aya amwene. Avireke mahuku, achuwelhi o ittotwa ukhuma unosha nchuwa yahowa Uyerusalemu
40002002	nkayaakoha, “Mwaana nowa ukhalha mwene a Ayahudi yariye vayi? Ukhalhawaya nihoona ittotwa awe vaakhumelhenlhe aya unosha nchuwa, ni hii nihowa unthimichani.”
40002003	Amwene Naherode yeeweke yayo malhove ayo, ahokelhiya nipampa chinene, vamoka ni attu onkhaye o Uyerusalemu.
40002004	Nkeehanacha Opochera ishaani Olhupalhe onkhaye vamoka ni attu owiittuchiha Malhehero a ashinna Musa nkaakoha, “Kuristo nohalha uyaria vayi?”
40002005	Ni ayo nkayaakhulha, “Ubethelehemu ilhapo yo Uyudea. Phi chiichammo anamilhohi chaalhempe aya,
40002006	‘Inyu attu o Ubethelehemu ilhapo yo Uyudea, Inyuva kanhiwe akani variyari wo iwani cho uchuwania cho Uyudea, Ukhalhawaya uwaninyu nowa ukhuma nholhelhi Nolhoha waaholhelha attu aka o Uisraeli.’ ”
40002007	Vavawo Naherode nkayeehana untemerani achuwelhi o ittotwa yaakohe wiira yoonelhe yaakhani.
40002008	Yamalheke nkaaruma arwee Ubethelehemu yeeraka. “Nrweeke mwakoherere ikekhia yo malhove o mwaana uyo, mwamwoonaka, nkiwiihereke nttenga ni mii kirwee kanthimiche.”
40002009	Baada yo wiiwa malhove a Naherode, nkayaarwaa. Vaari aya mphironi nkayoona ittotwa ilhe yaaholhelhaka ikhumaka unosha nchuwa.
40002010	Vonne aya nkayaatelhiya chinene ni iyo nkayaaholhelha mpaka vaari awe mwaana.
40002011	Nkayaakelhacha mpaani, nkayaamwona mwaana uyo vamoka ni Amariamu anumwane, nkayaakhoroma unthimicha. Nkayaathaphulha mirupa chaya ni ukumiha izawadi, idhahabu ni ubani ni manemane ummaha mwaana.
40002012	Nkayaahokolhia umawannyaya aviraka iphiro chikina, ukhalhawaya Nlhuku ahaamuka ntorani wiira ahihokolhelhe tho u Naherode.
40002013	Alheto alhe athameke, nnepa wo wiirimu wa Athithi nkawaakhumelhelha Nayusufu ntorani ni weerelha, “Naherode anothanana umwiiva mwaana uyo. Munkweke etu munkushe mwaana vamoka ni anumwanawe ntawelheke Umisri. Mwakhalheke wowo mpaka vanohalha aka uhimeriani.”
40002014	Paahi etu Nayusufu nkayonkwa nkayankusha mwaana vamoka ni anumwanawe nkayaathama ni uhiyu nkayaarwaa Umisri.
40002015	Nkayaakhalha wowo mpaka Naherode vaakhwilhe aya. Nenno nlhove nno naapangia nitimire nlhove ni Athithi wo iphiro yo anamilhohi neera, “Kahomwiihana mwaamwanaka ukhuma Umisri.”
40002016	Naherode yachuwelheke wiira achuwelhi o ttotwa alhe ahaathepiacha, ahorushiya chinene. Nkaalhehera wiira ashaana ashilhopwana onkhaye o iwani yo Ubethelehemu ni iwani cho waatamana, o malhipa o iyaakha pilhi ukhuruwa vathi yeevakachiye. Aapangilhe chiicho uttwaraana ni mahuku veewilhe aya yoyo mwaha uyo ukhuma wa achuwelhi o ttotwa alhe.
40002017	Phi chiichammo chenre aya wo utimira malhove yaahimiye wo iphiro ya anamilhohi Nayeremiya.
40002018	“Nlhove niheewania Uraama. Ikutto yulhupalhe. Araheli yonlhelhaka achishaana aya, Akhotaka umalhihiya, Ukhalhawaya khaawo tho.”
40002019	Naherode yarimeelheke, nnepa wo wiirimu wa Athithi wahaakhumelhelha Nayusufu ntorani Umisri
40002020	nkaweerelha, “Munkweke, munkusheke mwaana vamoka ni anumwanawe nhokolhieke tho ilhapo yo Uisraeli, ukhalhawaya alhe yaathanana ukumi wa mwaana uyo ahokhwa.”
40002021	Paahi etu Nayusufu ahonkwa, nkankusha mwaana vamoka ni anumwanawe nkayaahokolhia wi ilhapo yo Uisraeli.
40002022	Nansho Nayusufu yeeweke wiira Akelao mwaana a Naherode aari phi mwene o Uyudea nipuro ni athumwanawe, ahoova uhokolhia wowo. Ni ayo ahovahiya malhove makina ntorani o uchiichihiya, nkaarwa Ugalilaya.
40002023	Nkaathamelha iwani yo Unazareti. Phenre aya wo utimira malhove yahimiye ni anamilhohi wiira “Nowa wiihaniya Nnazarayo.”
40003001	Yayo mahuku ayo Nayohana Obatiiza ahokumelhelha uthako wo Uyudea, nkaachokholha wettuchiha attu.
40003002	Yaari yeeraka, “Nkhoromeke ni uhiya uwonya winyu, ukhalhawaya Imwene yo wiirimu ihaatameria!”
40003003	Nayohana phi alhe aahimiye ni anamilhohi ashinna Isaya venre aya, “Ntu nookhuwelha muuthakoni, ‘Nkooroshe iphiro ya Athithi, Mwookolhe iphiro chaya cho uvira!’ ”
40003004	Nayohana ayo yaawara ikuwo chaatottiye wo mapururu o ingamiya, ni nchako nnyununi mwaya, cholhia chaya chaari nashombe ni urawo wo umwiini.
40003005	Attu ukhuma Uyerusalemu ni ilhapo yonkhaye yo Uyudea, ni ilhapo cho nchereshere mwoolhoko wo Uyorodani ahowa uwiiwelhelhani.
40003006	Nkayaakhoroma ni uhimiacha uwonya waya, nkaabatiizacha mmwoolhokoni Uyorodani.
40003007	Nayohana yooneke Amafarisayo ni Amasadukayo enchi awaachaka athananaka ubatiiziya nkeerelha, “Inyu iyari yo inwaa nhimeriye ni apani wiira nttawe ntwarusho Nlhuku unowiiha awe?
40003008	Mwooniheke etu wo mitheko wiira nhorukunuwa ni uhiya uwonya.
40003009	Nhaanyihere wiira nihanaa athumwanihu, Aburahimu ukhalhawaya kinouhimeriani wiira Nlhuku noworia uthathusha alha malhuku alha nkaakhalha ashaana a Aburahimu!
40003010	Ipacho iri tayari ukakha mwiri vamithithaarini, kila mwiri uhinemma rata unookakhiya ni urihelhiya vamooroni.
40003011	mii kinobatiizani wo maashi wooniha wiira nhokhoroma, nansho nowa vatulhi waka nowa uubatiizani wo Iphumu ya Nlhuku ni mooro. Akhalhaka muulhupahe ukipwaha mii, kihiphwanelhiyaka inakhalhaka ukusha iratu chawe.
40003012	Yoyo novarelha mmononi ithelho yo uveerelha cholhia, wiira akhungure cholhia chawe, athokorerie ingaano nnikhupini, ni upaha iphepuwa vamooroni vahintiphiaa.”
40003013	Yeyo ikatema iyo Yesu nkaawa akhumaka Ugalilaya, nkaawa u Nayohana umwolhokoni Uyorodani ni uyo abatiiziye ni Nayohana.
40003014	Nansho Nayohana aholhikacha unkhotelha eeraka, “Mii phi nophwanelhiya ubatiiziya ni inyuva, chani woonaka nnowa uwannyaka mii!”
40003015	Nansho Yesu nkeera, “Nhiye chikhalhe chiicho wo naanano va, ukhalhawaya wo yeyo iphiro iyo ninoopanga chittu chinothanana awe Nlhuku chonkhaye.” Vavawo Nayohana nkayaarumelhelha.
40003016	Yesu amalheke ubatiiziya, ahokhuma mmaashini. Irimu nkayaahulhiaa, nkamwoona Iphumu ya Nlhuku akhuruwaka thoko kaulha ni unkorweelha vachulhu vawe.
40003017	Nlhove ukhuma wiirimu nkaneera, “Ulha phi mwaamwanaka kinonttuna aka, hokichivelha.”
40004001	Yamalheke, Iphumu ya Nlhuku ahonholhelha Yesu mpaka uthakoni alhikachye ni Nakare.
40004002	Nkaattuka wo mahuku makhumi ncheshe uthana ni uhiyu wo uhilhia, nkaawolhiya ithalha.
40004003	Paahi etu Nthepi nkanrwelha nkeera, “Wakhalhaka uwe phi mwaana a Nlhuku, wiireke etu alha malhuku alha athathuwe ukhalha mikatte.”
40004004	Nansho Yesu nkaakhulha, “Iholhepiya, ‘Ntu khanolhama wo nkatte vekha, nansho wo nlhove ninohimiya ni Nlhuku.’ ”
40004005	Nakare nkankusha mpaka Uyerusalemu, Iwani Itakatifu, nkaamwemesha vachulhu ishanja yo Inupa ya Nlhuku,
40004006	nkeera, “Wakhalhaka uwe phi mwaana a Nlhuku uthupheke mpaka vathi ukhalhawaya iholhepiya wiira. ‘Nlhuku nowaalhehera minepa cho wiirimu awe chiwe wo nlhatu winyu, Okusheni mmathathani mwaya, Nhiwe mwaakwakwathuwa mmalhukuni.’ ”
40004007	Yesu nkaakhulha nkeera, “Iholhepiya tho wiira, ‘Nhaalhikache Athithi, Nlhuku inyu.’ ”
40004008	Yamalheke Nakare nkankusha vachulhu mwaako wo urekama, nkaamwoniha imwene chonkhaye cho velhaponi va ni urera waya wonkhaye.
40004009	Nkeera, “Chii chonkhaye chi kinowuvaha wakikhoromelhaka ni ukithimicha.”
40004010	Vavawo Yesu nkaakhulha, “Uthame vaa uwe Nakare! Iholhepiya, ‘Mwaathimicheke Athithi, Nlhuku inyu vekha aya ni uvara mitheko chaya!’ ”
40004011	Paahi Nakare nkanhiya Yesu, ni minepa cho wiirimu nkachaawa ni unkavihera.
40004012	Yesu eeweke wiira Nayohana ahottukiya, ahohokolhia Ugalilaya.
40004013	Nansho kaakhanlhe Unazareti, nkaarwaa Ukapenaumu, ilhapo iri vachereshere nttiya no Ugalilaya, mmwinanoni mwo Uzabuloni ni Unaftali.
40004014	Phi chiicho chenre aya wo utimira nlhove naahimiye ni anamilhohi ashinna Isaya venre aya,
40004015	“Ilhapo yo Uzabuloni ni ilhapo yo Unaftali, Iphiro yo unttiyani, ukhopelhelhe Uyorodani, Ugalilaya, ilhapo ya attu ahinchuwenlhe Nlhuku!
40004016	Attu anokhalha mwiipiphini Anowa woona nthuko mulhupalhe. Wa attu anokhalha nhina ilhapo yo irungu yo nookhwa Nthuko unowa waamwalhelha.”
40004017	Toka yeyo ikatema iyo Yesu nkaachokholha wiittuchiha eeraka “Nkhoromeke nhiyeke uwonya winyu, ukhalhawaya Imwene yo wiirimu ihaatameria!”
40004018	Yesu vaari awe eetaka vachereshere nttiya no Ugalilaya, ahoona attu o uvara ihopa elhi, Nasimoni eehaniya Peturo ni ahima aya Naandorea, ariaka ihopa ni nttavi munttiyani.
40004019	Yesu nkeerelha, “Nkittware, ni mii kinowittuchihani woopolha attu.”
40004020	Nkayaahiyacha ittavi chaya ni unttwara.
40004021	Arweeke miholho nkoona attu akina elhi, Nayakhobo ashaana a Nazebedayo ni nhima aya Yohana. Yayo yaari nkalhavani vamoka ni athumwanaya Nazebedayo ayo alhokihachaka ittavi chaya. Yesu nkeehanacha,
40004022	ni ayo nkayaahiyera ikalhava iyo athumwanaya, nkayanttwara.
40004023	Yesu aari eetakachaka ni wiittuchiha mu inupa cho unlhapelha Nlhuku ilhapo yonkhaye yo Ugalilaya ahimiachaka Malhove Orera anohimia Imwene yo wiirimu, ni waalhamiha attu kila mareta yaarina aya.
40004024	Mwaha wawe nkawaawanelha ilhapo chonkhaye cho Usiriya, nkaawiiheriya attu aawereiya, yaari ni mareta ni alhe aahuvihachiya, attu aakelhiye ni mashoka o unanara, ichilhichilhi ni attu o remara ni Yesu nkaalhamihacha onkhaye.
40004025	Milhoko cha attu chinchi nkachanttwara ukhuma Ugalilaya, Udekapoli, Uyerusalemu, Uyudea ni ukhopelhelhe mwoolhoko wo Uyorodani.
40005001	Yesu ooneke milhoko cha owiittucha awe, nkaawelha vamwaakoni, nkaakhalha. Owiittucha awe nkayaawacha,
40005002	ni uyo nkaapatakulha malhaku awe nkaachokholha weettuchiha.
40005003	“Ahoreeriya attu o nrima unohuvelha uchuwelha nlhove na Nlhuku Ukhalhawaya Imwene ya Nlhuku phi yawaya!”
40005004	“Ahoreeriya attu anonlha, Ukhalhawaya anomaalhihiya.”
40005005	“Ahoreeriya attu arii ni nrima wo wiitimarikha, Ukhalhawaya phi nohalha uhiyeriya ilhapo!”
40005006	“Ahoreeriya attu ammolhiya ithalha ni nttona no upanga chittu chinothanana awe Nlhuku, Ukhalhawaya anowa uwonihiya!”
40005007	“Ahoreeriya attu o ikiriri, Ukhalhawaya Nlhuku nowa waahiyerera milhatu chaya!”
40005008	“Ahoreeriya attu o nrima worera, Ukhalhawaya anowa umwoona Nlhuku!”
40005009	“Ahoreeriya attu aneewananiha attu, Ukhalhawaya anowa wiihaniya ashaana a Nlhuku!”
40005010	“Ahoreeriya attu anohuvihiya wo nlhatu wo upanga chittu chinothanana awe Nlhuku, Ukhalhawaya Imwene yo wiirimu phi yawaya!”
40005011	“Nhoreeriya inyu mwaattiva, attu oruwanakani ni uthurulhani ni uwotheriani wo kila iphiro yo unanara wo nlhatu no ukirumelhelha mii.
40005012	Nteelhiyeke ni uttapelhelha ukhalhawaya uttuviya winyu uhenchiva wiirimu. Phi chiichammo chaathurulhachiye aya anamilhohi yaari nhinaaya inyu.”
40005013	“Mwaattiva phi maakha a attu onkhaye. Nansho maakha athuwaka anohalha uchivihani? Khanolhoka tho, yaahikhalhe urihiya vattayani ni unyikalhiya ni attu.
40005014	“Mwaattiva phi nthuko wo velhaponi. Iwani ithekiye vachulhu mwaako khineevitha.
40005015	Khaawo ntu noparihelha ikhandiri ni ukhunelha ndebe. Nansho ikhandiri inothomeiya vachulhu ikiango, yaamwalhelheke onkhaye ari mpaani.
40005016	Chiichammo etu, nthuko inyu unothananiya umwalhieke mwaattuni, attu oone meetelho inyu oombone, wiira aavahe nthimicho Athumwaninyu ari wiirimu.”
40005017	“Nhaanyihere wiira kiwiilhe uchiichiha Malhehero a ashinna Musa ni ikano cha anamilhohi. Akiwiilhe uchiichiha, nansho uhimiechesha.
40005018	Kinouhimeriani we ikekhiaye wiira mpaka irimu ni ilhapo vanohalha aya uvira, khiiwo inakhalhaka inukuta imoka ama vakittu vakani chinene nhina Malhehero a ashinna Musa, vanohalha uwukulhiya mpaka onkhaye vanohalha aya uphiyelha.
40005019	Paahi etu, ntu riyoothe nolhoha uhiya nlheheriyo nimoka nikani upwaha onkhaye, ni weettuchiha attu akina apange chiicho, yoyo nowa waalhakelhiya mwankani nhina Imwene yo wiirimu. Nansho nolhoha uvara ni weettuchiha attu akina yoyo nookhalha mulhupalhe mu Imwene yo wiirimu.
40005020	Paahi kinouhimeriani, ikekhia inyu yaahipwaheke ulhoka wa Amafarisayo, ni attu owiittuchiha Malhehero khannowa mwaakelha mena nhina Imwene yo wiirimu.”
40005021	Nhomalha wiiwa wiira attu o khalhayi yeerelhiye, “Nhiive, nolhoha wiiva nohukumulhiya.”
40005022	Nansho mii vano kinouhimeriani wiira, ntu riyoothe nonthunanelha mmuchi awe yoyo arweehiye umilhatuni ahukumulhiye. Ntu nolhoha umwiirelha munnawe, Khannolhoka inyu! Yoyo arweehiyeke umilhatuni wulhupalhe, ni uyo hechatameriha umooroni Ujehannamu.
40005023	Mwarweehaka isadaka umadhubahuni uno muupuwelhaka wiira nhima inyu rii ni nlhove ni inyu,
40005024	nhiyeke isadaka inyu umadhubahuni nhokolhieke thoko mwamwiwanane nhima inyu, vavawo mmweeke tho ni ukumiha ishaani inyu.
40005025	Mmwiiwananeke ntu muntekenlhe inyu nhinaphiya umilhatuni. Mwaphiyaka wowo nhineewanana nowa uuhelhani mmathathani mwa attu o uhukumulha, ni ayo anowaavaha manyaasikari anaattuka attu, mwattukiye.
40005026	Kinouhimeriani wo ikekhiaye, wowo khannokhuma mpaka nholhiva nchurukhu wo umalhihera nlhatu winyu.
40005027	“Nheewa wiira attu yeerelhiye ‘Nhilhuve!’
40005028	Nansho mii kinouhimeriani, ntu nommweha nthiyana wonthanana, honlhuvana munrimani mwawe.
40005029	Paahi etu niitho ninyu no wiimonono nottekihakani, nkhulheke ni urihelha uwo shoro! Nambaya chinene uhikhalha ni itturi imoka mwiiruttuni mwinyu, iruttu yonkhaye ihiwe yaarihiya umooroni.
40005030	Ni moono inyu wo wiimonono wo uttekihakani, ntupulheke ni urihelha utayi! Nambaya mpoterihe itturi imoka mwiiruttuni mwinyu, iruttu inyu ihiwe yaatikhelhiya yonkhaye umooroni Ujehannamu.
40005031	“Tho, yaheeriya wiira, ‘ntu naahiya ahanu awe, aavaheke italaka yo umwalhaana.’
40005032	Nansho mii kinouhimeriani wiira ntu aahiyaka ahanu awe ni waavaha italaka yo umwalhaana vahirii nlhatu no ulhavalhava, haalhavalhaviha, ni ntu nottuna waathelha ni uyo holhavalhava.
40005033	“Tho nheewa wiira attu o khalhayi yeerelhiye ‘Nhilhiyalhe ulhupelha winyu, nansho ntimiriheke naapo ninyu wa Athithi.’
40005034	Nansho mii kinowirelhani nna, nhilhupelhe irimu, ukhalhawaya phi ihiche ya Nlhuku,
40005035	mena wo ilhapo, ukhalhawaya phi nipuro chineesha aya mieto chaya, mena wo Uyerusalemu, ukhalhawaya phi iwani ya Amwene olhupalhe.
40005036	Nhilhupelhe wo muru inyu, ukhalhawaya khannoria uthathusha ikharari inyu imoka ukhalha ipwii ama yooripa.
40005037	Mweeraka ‘Eiyo’ ikhalheke ‘Eiyo!’ Mweeraka ‘Kachihena’ ikhalheke ‘Kachihena.’ Ittu iriyoothe yo upwaha yayo inokhuma wa Nakare.
40005038	“Nheewa yeeriye wiira ‘Niitho wo niitho ni niino wo niino.’
40005039	Nansho mii kinouhimeriani wiira nhinhokolhoshere ntu no upangelhani cho uhilhoka. Ntu riyoothe o watakani nrama no wilhopwana, munrukunushelheke nikina no wiimushi nno.
40005040	Ni ntu riyoothe o urwehakani uhukumulhiyani athananaka uuthurulhani mwinjiro winyu, munhiyereke awieke ni nikoti ninyu.
40005041	Ni ntu okhanyererihakani wiira munkushere nsigo awe nkwaha wo imaili imoka, munrwaaneke imaili pilhi.
40005042	Ntu noovekelhani ittu mummaheke, nowaashimani ittu mmwaashimeke.
40005043	“Nheewa wiira yeeriye, ‘Munttuneke mmuchi inyu ni waavenga amalhaponi inyu.’
40005044	Nansho mii kinolhelhani wiira mwaattuneke amalhaponi inyu ni waalhapelhelha attu anowomolhani mwaattiva,

40006001	“Mwiichinanelheke nhiwe mwaapanga chittu chinothanana awe Nlhuku vaattuni, mwoonachiye ni attu. Mwapangaka chiicho vaattuni, khiiwo inohalha inyu uttuvelhiya ni Athumwaninyu o wiirimu.

40006016	“Vanottuka inyu, nhoonihe ichuku wiitho thoko anafiki chineera aya. Yayo anokhunyanyihacha wiitho yoonachiye ni attu wiira ahottuka. Kinouhimeriani wo ikekhiaye wiira, yayo ahomalha uttuviya.

40006021	Ukhalhawaya vari nhakhu inyu ni nrima inyu phi nohalha aya ukhalha vavawo.

40006024	“Khaawo ntu nokhalha ipotta yo uvara ntheko wa attu elhi ukhalhawaya nohalha unttuna mmoka ni unvenga nkina, nokhalha o ukhulhuvelhiya wa ntu mmoka, ni uhikulhuvelhiya wa ntu nkina uyo. Khannoria ukavihera mitheko cha Athithi Nlhuku ni nhakhu vamoka.

40006026	Mwooneke ashinuni, khanaalha imbeyu, khanokhungura mena khanoshunga nnikhupini, nansho Athithi o wiirimu anowaalhiha. Chani mwaattiva kanhiwena o ulhoka waapwaha ashaanuni?

40007001	“Nhaahukumulhe attu akina nhiwe ni inyu mwaahukumulhiya ni Nlhuku,

40007011	Ata nhookhalharu attu o unanara mirima, nhochuwelha waavaha achishaana inyu chittu choombone. Malhehero Athumwanihu o wiirimu anoopanga uthepa vavawo anowaavaha chittu choombone attu anaavekelha.

40008001	Yesu akhuruweke umwaakoni milhoko chinchi cha attu chahonttwara.

40009016	“Ikuwo yo khalhayi kinotottelhiya imbaati ikumi, ukhalhawaya yeyo imbaati iyo inototokora ikuwo yo khalhayi iyo ni wuncherera vathanlhe vawo.
40009017	Mena ntumpa wo wulhuvalha khunohelhiya idivai yoochasha. Yakhalhaka chiicho mwaapu unophwiaa ni idivai nkayaarihiaa. Nansho attu anhelha idivai yoochasha nhina mitumpa chikumi, ni chopilhi ntumpa ni idivai chinoolhama chonkhaye.”

40009020	Opani amoka, aari awereiyaka ireta yo ukhuma iphome, nchorochoro iyaakha khumi ni pilhi, ahonttwara Yesu vatulhi vawe, nkaavara ikuwo awe.

40009029	Vavawo Yesu nkaakwakwanya miitho, nkeera “Ikhalheke thoko nrima inyu chinothanana aya!”
40009030	Miitho aya nkayaapatakuwa. Yesu nkaamukacha wo uchacha eeraka, “Nhinhimerie ntu riyoothe ulha mwaha ulha.”
40009031	Nansho yathamacheke nkayaavira awanelhihaka mwaha wo Yesu ilhapo yonkhaye.
40009032	Attu vaarwacha aya umawannyaya, attu akina nkayanrwehelha Yesu ntu mmoka o uhulhumacha attukiye ni nshoka no unanara.
40009033	Wo uhipicha mashoka ayo yomolhachiyeke, ntu o uhulhumacha uyo nkaachokholha wulhumacha tho. Nlhoko wa attu nkawoomiya uwanoni nkayeera “Khaninapacha woona mwaha thoko yolha mu Israeli mu!”
40009034	Nansho Amafarisayo nkayaahalha yiiraka, “Noomolha mashoka wo ikuru yo nholhelhi o mashoka o unanara.”
40009035	Yesu aheetakachera iwani chonkhaye ni ittoko chaya ettuchihaka mu inupa chaya cho unlhapelha Nlhuku. Aari ettuchihaka Malhove Orera o Imwene ya Nlhuku, ni ulhamiha mareta onkhaye ni uhuperia wo kila iphiro.
40009036	Paahi ooneke attu milhoko wo milhoko, ahoonelha ikiriri ukhalhawaya yaari anoocheelhe chinene achariyaka ni nipampa thoko ikhondoro chihiri ni nshunga.
40009037	Vavawo nkeerelha owiittucha awe, “Nlhaalha uri mwinchi, nansho anamitheko ari vakani.

40010001	Yesu aheehana owiittucha awe khumi ni elhi, nkhaavaha ikuru yo woomolha mashoka o unanara ni waalhamiha attu ikwerere ni mareta onkhaye.

40010011	“Vanophiya inyu vawani ama ittoko iriyoothe, mwamwaavieke mommo ntu nottuna upocherani, mwakhalheke vavawo mpaka vanohalha inyu uthama vawo.

40010023	“Mwavengiyaka iwani imoka, nttawelheke iwani ikina. Ikekhia kinouhimeriani kannomalhiha nkwaha inyu iwani chonkhaye cho Uisraeli Mwaana a Ntu hinaphiya.

40010026	“Wo chiichammo etu nhoove attu. Ittu ikhunelhiye inowa yaapatakulhiya, ni ittu ivithiye inowa uhumbukulhiya.
40010027	Chinouhimeriakani mwaattiva mwiipiphini, nhimiacheke voonene, nlhove niiwilhe inyu naapiyaka mmweeke mwaahimiacha nneemenlhe vanchaarani.

40010035	Kiwiihilhe umwalhaana ntu ni athumwanawe, mwalhi ni anumwanawe, mmokohi ni ahokohi awe,
40010036	amalhaponi inyu anowa ukhalha phi attu o mmanupani mwinyu.
40010037	“Ntu naattuna athumwanawe ama anumwanawe chinene ukhiphwaha mii, yoyo khamphwanelhiya ukhalha owiittucha aka, ni ntu naattuna achishaana awe ashilhophwana ni ashithiyana chinene ukiphwaha mii yoyo khaphwanelhiye ukhalha owiittucha aka.

40010040	“Ntu riyoothe no upocherani mwaattiva nokipochera mii, ni uyo nokipochera mii naapochera akirumilhe.
40010041	Ntu nompochera namilhohi a Nlhuku wo nlhatu no ukhalha namilhohi a Nlhuku, nowa upochera nttuvo no namilhohi. Ni ntu riyoothe nompochera ntu o nrima woombone wo nlhatu wo urera nrima, nowa upatta nttuvo no utawara.

40011001	Yesu amalheke waalhehera owiittucha awe khumi ni elhi malhehero, ahothama vavawo nkaarwa uwiittuchihani ni uhimiacha Malhove Orera iwani cho vakhiviru.

40012043	“Nshoka no unanara vanoomolhiya aya mwiiruttuni mwa ntu, ninoovira naarukureriacha muuthakoni naaviaka vakittu vo wiittuwa. Naahooneke,
40012044	vavawo phi neera aya, ‘Kinohokolhiaa unupani waka.’ Kuhokolhiaka ni uphwanya inupa mwaari, inakwechiye ni urerihiya.
40012045	Phi norwaa aya ni waakusha mashoka makina saba o uhilhoka upwaha uyo, nkayaawacha ni ukhalha mwiiruttuni mwa ntu uyo. Vanomalha aya, ukumi wa ntu uyo vano unokhalha wo unanara upwaha khalhayi. Phi chiicho chinohalha aya ukhalha wa attu o uhilhoka a alha mahuku alha.”
40012046	Yesu aari olhumachaka ni nlhoko wa attu ikatema anumwane ni ashilhoko awe vaawilhe aya. Nkayeemelhacha vathe, athananaka umulhumana.
40012047	Paahi ntu mmoka nkaamwirelha, “Nkoonani, anumwaninyu ni ashihima inyu arii vathe vawo, anothanana uwoonani.”
40012048	Nansho Yesu nkaakhulha, “Anumwanaka phi apani? Ashilhoko aka phi apani?”
40012049	Amalheke nkaathonya owiittucha awe, nkeera, “Mwooneke alha va! Alha phi manyaanumwanaka ni ashilhoko aka!
40012050	Ukhalhawaya ntu riyoothe nopanga chinothanana aya Athithi ari wiirimu, yoyo phi nhima aka ni mwanrokoraka ni phi anumwanaka.”
40013001	Nenno nihuku, Yesu ahothama yeyo inupa iyo, nkaarwa ni ukhalha vachereshere nttiya.
40013002	Milhoko cha attu chanrukurenrie chaari chinchi mpaka nkaawelha nkalhavani, nkaakhalha. Attu nkayeemelha vachengweni, vachereshere nttiya.
40013003	Yesu nkaahimiacha chittu chinchi wo ulhikaanihacha. “Ahaawo ntu aarweelhe uumwaalhani nakhuwo.
40013004	Vaalha awe imbeyu mmatani, chahaawo chaamonre mphironi, ashanuni nkayaalhia.
40013005	Chikina nkachaamora vamalhukuni vahirii ittaya yinchi. Nkaachamelha wo uhipicha ukhalhawaya ittaya yaari vakani.
40013006	Nansho nchuwa vaapharenlhe aya nkachaavia, ukhalhawaya mithithaari chaya khachethipenlhe, chahonyalha.
40013007	Imbeyu chikina chaakorenlhe vamiiwani, nkachonnuwa nkachaatiyelhelhiya.
40013008	Nansho imbeyu chikina chaamorenlhe vachaayirani, nkachaamelha rata, nkachemma, chikina inuku imia imoka, chikina makhumi sita ni chikina makhumi mararu.
40013009	Rii ni maaru eeweke!”
40013010	Nkayaawa Owiittucha awe, nkayankoha, “Nlhatu waani no wulhumana attu wo malhikaaniho?”
40013011	Yesu nkaakhulha, “Mwaattiva nhovaheriya uchuwelha chittu chivithiye cho Umwene wo wiirimu, nansho ayo khavaheriye.
40013012	Ukhalhawaya ntu rina ittu nowunchereriya, ni ukhalhana chinchi, nansho ntu hirina ittu, ata ikani irinawe iyo ni iyo inookushiya.
40013013	Nlhatu nowulhumacha wo malhikaaniho niri wiira, anooweha nansho khaanona, anowiwelhelha nansho khaneewa, mena khanochuwelha.
40013014	Nihotimira vano nlhove ni anamilhohi ashinna Isaya, ‘Wo ikekhiaye alha attu alha wiiwa anowiiwa, nansho khanochuwelha inohimiya, Uweha anoweha, nansho khanoona,
40013015	Ukhalhawaya irusho chaya chihophupuwalha, Ahotiyelha maaru aya, Ni utiyelhelha miitho aya. Ihikaari chiicho miitho aya yaanoona, Ni manyaru aya yaaneewa, Mirima chaya chanchuwelha, Ni ayo anokirukunuwelha mii, neera Nlhuku, Ni mii kaanalhamiha.’
40013016	“Nansho nhoreeriya mwaatti! Ukhalhawaya miitho inyu anowoona ni maaru inyu anowiiwa.
40013017	Ikekhia kinouhimeriani wiira, anamilhohi enchi ni attu enchi o nrima woombone yahothanana woona alha anoona inyu alha, ahoone, ni wiiwa alha nneewa inyu alha, ahiiwe.
40013018	“Paahi mwiiweke, ni wiittucha malhikaaniho o ntu o waalha imbeyu.
40013019	Attu ariyoothe aneewa nlhove no Imwene ya Nlhuku nansho ahichuwelhaka, ari thoko imbeyu chaamorenlhe vaphironi. Nakare nowa ni uthesha imbeyu chaalhiye munrimani mwaya.
40013020	Imbeyu chaamonre vanagagani chinokhalha thoko attu vaneewa aya nttenga anopochera uno ateelhiyaka munrimani.
40013021	Nansho nttenga khunolhokelha munrimani mwaya ukhalhawaya khachinkhalha ni mithithaari nhina mwaya. Uhuvihiya vanowa aya wo nlhatu no nttenga nno, anookhwa nrima wo uhipicha.
40013022	Imbeyu chaamonre vamiiwani chineemelhelha attu aneewa nttenga, nansho nipampa naacharaka ni nikakata no velhaponi nivaravaraka nttenga uyo, ni ayo khaneemma maphepu.
40013023	Ni imbeyu chaalhiye vachaayirani chinene chineemelhelha attu aneewa nttenga ni uchuwelha chihimiye, khwimmaka rata maphepu, mmoka imia, nkina makhumi sita ni nkina makhumi mararu.”
40013024	Yesu nkaahimiachera nlhikaaniho nikina eeraka, “Umwene wo wiirimu uri thoko ntu aanlhe imbeyu choombone mmatani mwawe.
40013025	Uhiyu attu anarumpe, mmalhaponi nkaawa, nkaaphateelha mahichi mmeelheni nkaarwa.
40013026	Minyepu vonnuwa aya ni meelhe aphiyaka vanothaphuruwa aya, mahichi ni ayo phi nothaphuruwa aya.
40013027	Akarumiya o mwanene imata nkaawa ni umwiirelha mwanene imata, ‘Munna, kwaani khamwaanlhe imbeyu choombone umatani ulhe, vano mahichi alhe ankhuma vayi?’
40013028	Anene imata phi naakhulha aya, ‘Amalhaponi phi phateelhe yayo mahichi ayo.’ Ni anamitheko ayo khunkohaka mwanene imata ‘Nnoona chani vano etu, nirweeke ngati naphelhacheke mahichi ayo?’
40013029	Mwanene imata khwaakulhaka tho. ‘Mena, nhirwee, ukhalhawaya mwarwaaka, nnokoophelha mahichi ni meelhe vamoka.
40013030	Nhiyeke chonkhaye chunnuweke rata mpaka nlhaalha vanohalha aya waaya. Vavawo kinowa koohimierani wiira nrweeke mwaphelhacheke thoko mahichi ayo, mwattukacheke matita matita, ni upaha vamooroni. Mwamalhaka mwakhwacheke meelhe ayo ni uthokoreria nnikhupini.’ ”
40013031	Yesu nkaalhamulhelha nlhikaaniho nikina, “Imwene yo Wiirimu iri thoko choo. Ntu ahaalha imbeyu yo iharadali umatani wawe.
40013032	Imbeyu inene iyo iri yooyeva upwaha imbeyu chikina chonkhaye, nansho vanonnuwa aya unokhalha mwiri mulhupalhe chinene upwaha miri chikina. Khukhalhaka mwiri unothekiya iphuuru cha ashinuni o wiirimu mmarittani mwaya.”
40013033	Yesu nkaahimeria nlhikaaniho nikhwawe tho, “Imwene yo wiirimu iri thoko opani anowiaa ihengedure vakani ni uthuwaniha ni iphepa madebe melhi ni ntikha, nkayaarurummwa yonkhaye.”
40013034	Yesu ahaahimiachera attu yayo onkhaye ayo wo ulhikaanihacha, khoolhumanche nlhove wo uhikhalha ni malhikaaniho.
40013035	Eera chiicho wo utimiriha chaahimiye ni anamilhohi wiira, “Kinowulhumacha wo ulhikaaniha vanohalha aka wolhumana, Kinoowa kaapatakulha malhove ahinapacha aya wiiwa toka wuupiya ilhapo.”
40013036	Yesu vaathamme awe ni ukelha mpaani, owiittucha awe nkayaawa ni umwiirelha, “Nkanihimerieni maana o nlhikaaniho no mahichi amenlhe umatani, phi ishiyani.”
40013037	Yesu nkaakhulha, “Ntu aanlhe imbeyu choombone phi Mwaana a Ntu,
40013038	imata phi ilhapo ilha, imbeyu choombone phi attu o Imwene, mahichi phi attu a Nakare,
40013039	ni amalhaponi anlhe mahichi phi Nakare. Nlhaalha phi umalha wo ilhapo, ni attu o khungura phi minepa o wiirimu.
40013040	Chenre aya wo uphelhiya mahichi ni upahiya vamooroni, phi nohalha aya ukhalha nihuku no umalha ilhapo,
40013041	Mwaana a Ntu nowa waaruma minepa o wiirimu awe avire aakhungura attu ukhuma Umweneni wawe, alhe onkhaye aattekihilhe attu ni ayo o uwonya,
40013042	ni waariha umooroni, unohalha aya wunlha ni ushilha miino.
40013043	Vavawo attu o rera nrima anowa waaria thoko nchuwa wi Umweneni wa Athithi. Mwiiweke, nri ni maaru!”
40013044	“Umwene wo wiirimu uri thoko, ntu novitulha nhakhu waavithiye umatani. Nkaawuhelha, nkaahokolhia uwani nateelhiye urwaa uuthumihani kila ittu irinawe, ni uhokolhia urwaa uwoopolhani imata iyo.”
40013045	“Tho, Umwene wo wiirimu uri thoko ntu naavia ilulu yo nhakhu,
40013046	vanovitulha awe imoka yorera chinene, khurwaaka uuthumihani kila ittu irinawe, ni woopolha ilulu iyo.”
40013047	“Tho, Umwene wo wiirimu uri thoko attu o wiiva ihopa anriaa nttavi munttiyani ni uvara ihopa yo kila nikosho.
40013048	Nttavi vanchara aya, khupurulhaka ni ukhalha nipuro vachereshere nttiya, athanlhe ihopa. Choombone chiyo kuhelhiyaka mmakayani, nansho cho uhilhokalhoka chiyo khurihiyaka.
40013049	Inohalha ukhalha thoko chommo nihuku noomalhelha ilhapo, minepa o wiirimu anowa aavira aakhunguraka attu o uhilhoka mwa attu o nrima woombone
40013050	ni waariha umooroni, unohalha aya wunlha ni ushilha miino.”
40013051	Yesu nkaakoha, “Chani nhochuwelha ulha mwaha ulha?” Nkayaakhulha, “Eiyo nihochuwelha.”
40013052	Paahi etu nkeera, “Kila ntu owiittuchiha Malhehero neettucha ukhuma Imwene yo wiirimu nokhalha thoko ntu ri ni inupa nokumiha chittu cho naanano ni chittu cho khalhayi ukhuma munhakhuni mwawe.”
40013053	Yesu amalhiheke uhimia yayo malhikaaniho ayo, nkaathama vavawo
40013054	nkaahokolhia uwannyawe. Nkeettuchiha mu inupa cho unlhapelha Nlhuku, ni attu amwiiwa nkaashangacha. Nkayaakohanacha eeraka. “Ana yolha pantte vayi chechilha irusho chilha? Ni wooria upanga cho ushangiha chi?
40013055	Ana yolha kahiwe phi ulhe mwaana a ntu nokoorosha milhako ni ihiche ulhe? Amariamu kahiwe phi anumwanawe, ni achihimawe kahiwe Nayakhobo ni Nayusufu ni Nasimoni ni Nayuda?
40013056	Ashirokorawe onkhaye kahiwe phi alha anokhalha ni hii alha vaa?”

40014001	Yeyo ikatema iyo Naherode amwene, o Ugalilaya yaheewa mwaha wa Yesu.
40014002	Nkayeerelha anamitheko aya eeraka, “Ulha ntu ulha phi Nayohana Obatiiza, hohihimmwa ukhuma nnookhwani, phi nlhatu no woona ikuru yo ushangiha inopanga ntheko mwiiruttuni mwawe.”
40014003	Naherode phi alhehenre wiira Nayohana avariye ni uttukiya mittondoro ni urweehiya ujeerani, wo nlhatu ni Naherodiya, mahanu a Nafilipo, ahima aya.
40014004	Nlhatu waari Nayohana waamuka Naherode wiira, “Khavanorera inyu waathelha Naherodiya ahanu a ahima inyu!”
40014005	Naherode nkayaathanana weeva Nayohana, nansho yaari oovaka attu ukhalhawaya yaari achuwelhaka wiira Nayohana aari anamilhohi.
40014006	Nihuku no wuupuwelhiya uyaria waya Naherode, mwalhi mwaana a Naherodiya aheena machoma rata vaalhetoni. Naherode nkayaateelhiya,
40014007	ata nkayanlhupelha eeraka, “Kinouvaha ittu iriyoothe inottuna awo uvekelha!”

40014009	Amwene Naherode nkayaakelhiya ihuzuni, nansho wo naapo naalhupenlhe aya vaattuni, nkayaalhehera wiira avahiye.
40014010	Paahi nkayanruma ntu arwee ujerani aahithe Nayohana.
40014011	Muru nkawaawiihiya mphacheni, nkaavahiya mwalhi ulhe, ni uyo nkaarwehelha anumwanawe.
40014012	Owiittucha a Nayohana nkayaawa, nkayaakusha iruttu iyo, urwaa uwavithani, nkayaarwaa unhimeriani Yesu.
40014013	Yesu eeweke mwaha u Nayohana, nkaathama vavawo vakittu vawo nkayaawelhacha nkalhavani, nkaarwa vakittu vo wiivitha yeekha awe. Attu yeeweke, nkayaathama mmawannyaya nkayanttwara wo mieto.
40014014	Yesu akhuruweke nkalhavani, nkoona nlhoko mulhupalhe wa attu, nrima awe nkawaakelhiya ikiriri, nkaalhamiha areta mareta aya.
40014015	Vaari aya uchechilho, owiittucha awe nkayanrweelha ni umwiirelha, “Uheelha vano, ni va vakittu va vauthakoni. Paahi etu mwaalheheke attu wiira athamache ahokolhieke mmawani athumeke yolhia.”
40014016	Yesu nkaakhulha, “Khavanooria waahiya chiicho, mwaavaheke yolhia mwaattiva!”
40014017	Ayo nkayamwaakhulha, “Khanirina yolhia, nirina mikatte mithanu ni ihopa pilhi.”
40014018	Yesu nkeera, “Nkiwiihereke vaa.”
40014019	Nkaalhehera attu akhalhe vathi mmanyashini, nkaakusha mikatte mithanu chilhe ni ihopa pilhi chilhe, nkaaweha wiirimu, nkalhapelhelha ibarakha, nkaamianihacha nkaavaha owiittucha awe yaakawelhe attu.
40014020	Attu onkhaye nkayaalhia ni uwona. Yamalheke owiittucha nkayaakusha mikatte chaahanlhe, nkayaachariha makaya khumi ni melhi.
40014021	Attu yaalhilhie yaari manyaalhopwana maelufu nthanu, wo uhaalhakelha manyaathiyana ni ashaana.
40014022	Yesu nkaakhanyereriha owiittucha awe awelhe nkalhavani aaholhelhe ukhopelhelhe nttiya, mwanene vaahiya awe ni waalheha attu.
40014023	Amalheke waalheha attu, ahothama nkaawelha umwaakoni ulhapelhani. Yesu aari wowo yeekha awe mpaka uchechilho,
40014024	yeyo ikatema iyo ikalhava ilhe yaari inaphiilhe variyari nttiya, nansho yaari ithemwihiyaka ni iphioo yaawuka yaakakhaka.
40014025	Mapikoosha, Yesu nkaawa wa owiittucha awe eetaka vachulhu maashi.

40014028	Napeturo nkayaamwakhulha eeraka, “Thithi, akhalhaka phi inyuva we ikekhiaye, mwiireke etu ni mii keete vachulhu maashi kiwe varii inyu.”
40014029	Yesu nkeera, “Mmweeke.” Paahi Napeturo nkayaakhuruwa nkalhavani, nkayeeta vachulhu maashi, arwaaka vaari awe Yesu.
40014030	Nansho yooneke iphioo iwukaka, nkayoova, nkayaachokholha utitimira akhuwelhaka, “Thithi, nkoopolhe!”
40014031	Yesu nkaavara moono nkeerelha, “Nrima wani mwankani nrina inyu! Woonaka nnowoova?”
40014032	Yamalheke o yelhi nkayaawelha nkalhavani, ni iphioo nkayaatondova.
40014033	Owiittucha onkhaye yaari nkalhavani nkayanthimicha, eeraka, we ikekhiaye inyuva phi Mwaana a Nlhuku.
40014034	Nkayaalhapuwa nttiya nkayaaphiya Ugenesareti,

40015001	Amafarisayo akina ni owiittuchiha Malhehero yahonttwara Yesu ukhuma Uyerusalemu uwa unkohani,
40015002	“Nlhatu waani owiittucha inyu khantuna meettuchiho nipochenre ihu wa ashulhupalhe? Khanonyawa mathatha rata thoko chinolheheriya aya ahinaya ulhia yolhia!”
40015003	Yesu nkaakhulha, “Wo nlhatu waani mwaatti khannottwara malheheriyo a Nlhuku, nansho nttwaraka meettuchiho inyu mwaashinene?
40015004	Nlhuku heera wiira, ‘Mwaathimicheke athumwaninyu ni anumwaninyu, ni ntu riyoothe naaruwana athumwanawe ama anumwanawe, yoyo nambaya eeviye.’
40015005	Nansho mwaattiva nnettuchiha wiira ntu akhalhanaka ittu yo waavaha athumwanawe ama anumwanawe, nansho eeraka, ‘Ilha ittu ilha kihommaha isadaka Nlhuku,’
40015006	paahi, ahaalhohe tho athumwanawe! Chiichammo etu phi hinolhoha inyu malheheriyo a Nlhuku, nlhatu no uttwara meettuchiho inyu mwaanene.

40015015	Napeturo nkayeera, “Nkanilhamulhelheni nenno nlhikaaniho nno.”

40015024	Yesu nkaakhulha, “Kirumiye wa attu o inupa yo Israeli vekha aya, apotenre thoko ikhondoro chihiri ni nshunga.”

40015031	Nlhoko wa attu nkawoomiya uwanoni chinene yooneke attu ohulhumacha yuulhumachaka, oremara alhamaka, oheeta yeetaka ni attu o hoona yoonaka, attu nkayanthimicha Nlhuku o Uisraeli.

40015034	Yesu nkaakoha, “Nrina mikatte nchani?” Nkayaamwakhulha, “Chiri mikatte saba ni achihopa vakani.”
40015035	Paahi, Yesu nkaalhehera wiira attu akhalhihiye vathi.
40015036	Nkaawiaa mikatte chilhe ni achihopa alhe, nkanthimicha Nlhuku, nkaamianihacha, nkaavaha owiittucha, ni ayo nkayaakawelha attu.
40015037	Attu onkhaye nkayaalhia, nkayaawonacha. Yamalheke owiittucha nkayaakusha mahalha aahanlhe, nkayaachariha makaya saba.
40015038	Attu yaalhilhie yaari manyaalhopwana maelufu ncheshe, wo uhaalhakelha manyopani ni ashaana.
40015039	Paahi Yesu nkaalheha attu, nkaathama nkaawelha nkalhavani, nkaarwa ilhapo yo Umagadani.
40016001	Amafarisayo akina ni Amasadukayo nkayanrwelha Yesu, athananaka unlhikacha. Nkayanlhepelha oonihe cho ushangiha cho wiirimu.
40016002	Nansho Yesu nkaakhulha, “Vaneelha aya nchuwa mwaattiva nneera, ‘Uheelha rata, ukhalhawaya irimu ihokhwilha.’
40016003	Vanosha nchuwa nneera, ‘Ipulha inoorupa lhelho, nlhatu no ukhwiilha irimu ni ipiphi.’ Nnohukumulha mahuku wo uweha irimu, nansho nkelhiyaka nipampa wo uhichuwelha ithikineha cha alha mahuku.
40016004	Mwinre chani mwaatti o uhilhoka attu a alha mahuku o ulhuva va! Nnovekelha woona ithikineha? Ithikineha nnohalha inyu uvahiya phi i Nayona.” Paahi etu nkayaathamacha ni uhokolhia umawannyaya.
40016005	Owiittucha vaalhapuwilhe aya nthelha wo nayelhi wo nttiya, yaari analhiyanlhe ukusha mikatte.
40016006	Yesu nkeerelha, “Nhiitialhe, mwiichinanelheke ni ihengedure ya Amafarisayo ni ya Amasadukayo.”
40016007	Nansho nkayaahalha akohanachaka ashineneru, “Ana, neera chiicho wo nlhatu no uhikusha mikatte?”
40016008	Yesu ahochuwelha ittu yaanyihera aya, nkeera, “Inyu attu nrii ni nrima mwankani! Chani woonaka nnarerihelha mwaha wo ulhiyalha ukusha mikatte?
40016009	Chani khannachuwelha? Khannoopuwelha vaamianihilhe aka mikatte nthanu ni waalhiha attu maelufu nthanu? Makaya nchani yaacharihilhe inyu mahalhahalha o mikatte yaahalhenlhe?
40016010	Chani khannopuwelha mwaha wo mikatte saba chaakawelhiye aya attu maelufu ncheshe chilhe, chani mwaarokontte makaya nchani o mahalhahalha?
40016011	Chani khannopuwelha wiira akahimmie ittu inaacha mikatte? Mwiichinanelheke meettuchiho o uhilhoka a Amafarisayo ni Amasadukayo!”
40016012	Vavawo owiittucha nkayaachuwelha wiira eerelha wiira eechinanelhe kuhii ni ihengedure yo ururumulha mikatte, nansho ni meettuchiho o uhilhoka a Amafarisayo ni Amasadukayo.
40016013	Yesu nkaarwa ilhapo cho Ukaisariya Filipi, waakohilhe awe owiittucha awe, “Attu aneera Mwaana a Ntu phi mpani?”
40016014	Nkayaamwaakulha, “Akina aneera Nayohana Obatiiza, akina aneera Naeliya, akina Nayeremiya ama namilhohi nkina.”
40016015	Yesu nkaakoha, “Ni mwaattiva chani, nneera mii phi mpani?”
40016016	Nasimoni Peturo nkayaakulha, “Inyuva phi Kuristo Moopolhi, Mwaana a Nlhuku rii nkumi.”
40016017	Yesu nkeera, “Nhoreeriya inyuva Nasimoni ashaana a Bariyona. Ukhalhawaya iruttu ni iphome khachipatakunlhe uwaninyu nna nlhove nna, yaahikalhe Athumwanaka arii wiirimu.
40016018	Ni mii kinouhimeriani, inyuva Napeturo, inyuva phi mwalha, ni vachulhu ulha mwalha ulha kinootheka nlhoko wa attu anrumelhenlhe Kuristo, mena machiri o unaminepa khanowa ooriaka uphomolha.
40016019	Kinowuvahani mittukulho cho Umwene wo wiirimu, chinohalha inyu uttuka velhaponi va chinoottukiya chiicho wiirimu, chinohalha inyu uttukulha velhaponi va, chinoottukulhiya chiicho wiirimu.”
40016020	Yesu amalheke wulhumacha, nkaachiichiha owiittucha wiira ahinhimiachere ntu riyoothe wiira aari phi Kuristo Moopolhi.
40016021	Uchokholhelha vavawo, Yesu nkaachokholha uhimiacha mwaari wo owiittucha awe wiira, “Ihokiphwanelha wiira kirwee Uyerusalemu kahuvihachiye chinene ni ashulhupalhe ni Opochera ishaani olhupalhe ni attu owiittuchiha Malhehero. Kinowiiviya, nansho nihuku no neraru kinowa kaahihimmwa.”
40016022	Vavawo Napeturo nkayankusha Yesu vachereshere, nkayaamwamuka, “Nlhuku khanooria wiira chiicho Thithi! Khavanooria!”
40016023	Nansho Yesu nkaarukunuwa, nkeerelha Napeturo, “Uthame va uwe Nakare! Inyuva phi itiyelhelho uwannyaka, ukhalhawaya irusho chinyu khachinokhuma wa Nlhuku, chinokhuma wa ntuni.”
40016024	Yamalheke, Yesu nkaahimeria owiittucha awe, “Ntu riyoothe nothanana ukittwara mii, eeruneke mwanene, akusheke nsalaaba awe, akittwareke.
40016025	Ukhalhawaya, ntu nothanana woopolha ukumi awe mwanene, nowa upoteriha, nansho noriha ukumi awe wo nlhatu waka nowa upatta.
40016026	Chani, ntu nolhoha upuha ittu yaani apattaka mpuha wonkhaye wo velhaponi va ni uno apoteriha ukumi awe? Khiiwo mena! Khiiwo nolhoha awe ukumiha wiira apatte ukumi awe tho.
40016027	Ukhalhawaya, Mwaana a Ntu nolhoha uwa ni nthimicho wa Athumwanawe vamoka ni minepa cho wiirimu chawe, vavawo phi nohalha awe unlhiva kila ntu inomphwanelha wo ulhikaana ni mitheko chawe.
40016028	Wo ikekhiaye kinouhimeriani wiira, ahawo akina va khanonlhawiha nookhwa ahinaya umwoona Mwaana a Ntu awaaka ni Umwene awe.”
40017001	Yavireke mahuku sita, Yesu nkaakusha Napeturo ni Nayakhobo ni Nayohana nhima aya, nkaarwana vekha ayaru vachulhu mwaako wo urekama.
40017002	Vammweha aya, Yesu nkaarukunuwa ikhove, ikhove awe nkayaapharelha thoko nchuwa ni ikuwo chawe nkachaateelha ttuuu.
40017003	Owiittucha araru ayo nkayoona ashinna Musa ni Naeliya yaarerihaka ni Yesu.
40017004	Vavawo Napeturo nkaamwiirelha Yesu, “Thithi, ihorera hii ukhalha vaa! Mwathananaka kinookorosha mahema mararu, nimoka nawinyu, nimoka ni ashinna Musa nimoka ni Naeliya.”
40017005	Vaari awe olhumachaka chiicho, nihute nooteelha nkanaakhuneelha, ni nlhove nkaneewaniaa nnihuteni niiraka, “Ulha phi Mwaamwanaka kinonttuna aka, nookitelhiha nrima, mmwiiwelhelheke yoyo!”
40017006	Owiittucha yeeweke chiicho nkayaawulhuwa makukhu, nkayoova chinene.
40017007	Yesu nkaarwelha, nkaavaracha. Nkeera, “Mwemelheke, nhoove!”
40017008	Vaawenhe aya uchulhu khayamwoonne ntu nkina, ahikhalhe Yesu vekha awe.
40017009	Paahi, vaakhuruwa aya umwaakoni, Yesu nkaamuka nkeerelha wiira, “Nhinhimiachere ntu ritoothe ulha mwaha upatakulhelhiye inyu ulha mpaka nihuku no uhihimmwa Mwaana a Ntu.”
40017010	Yamalheke owiittucha nkayankoha Yesu, “Chani woonaka owiittuchiha Malhehero a ashinna Musa aneera wiira Naeliya phi nohalha uholhelha uwa?”
40017011	Yesu nkaakhulha eeraka, “Wo ikekhiaye, Naeliya phi nohalha uholhelha uwa, uweeshani tayari chittu chonkhaye.
40017012	Nansho kinouhimeriani wiira, Naeliya ahomalha uwa nansho attu khayaachuwenlhe, nkayaapangelha chaathananne aya. Mwaana a Ntu ni uyo noowa aahuvihiya chiichammo mmathathani mwaya.”
40017013	Paahi etu owiittucha nkayaachuwelha wiira aari aahimeriaka mwaha unaacha Nayohana Obatiiza.
40017014	Vaahokolhelhe aya wa attu, ntu mmoka nkaawa wa Yesu, nkankhoromelha,
40017015	nkeera, “Thithi, mmwonelhe ikiriri mwaamwanaka! Nreta ichilhichilhi, noohuva chinene. Ikatema chinchi noowulhuwelha vamooroni ama mmaashini.
40017016	Kahommwiiha wa owiittucha inyu, nansho khayonrie unlhamiha.”
40017017	Yesu nkaakhulha, “Mwaattiva attu o iyari ihiri ni nrima, ipotenre! Kinohalha ukhalha ni inyu mpaka iyaakhani? Kuuvilhelhekeni mpaka iyaakhani? Mummwiiheke mmirawo inyu uyo vaa.”
40017018	Paahi Yesu nkaachachera nshoka nno, nkanankhuma mwaana uyo, yeyo isaa nkaalhama.
40017019	Owiittucha nkayaawacha wa Yesu nkayankoha wo ntemera wiira, “Ana chani woonaka hii khanoonrie woomolha nshoka nne?”
40017020	Yesu nkaakhulha eeraka, “Wo ikekhiaye kinouhimeriani wiira, mwakhalhaka ni nrima inakhalhaka vakani thoko imbeyu yo iharadali, nnowooria wiirelha ulha mwaako ulha, ‘Nthame vaa nrwee uwo!’ Ni uyo unoorwaa. Nnowooria upanga ittu iriyoothe!”
40017021	“Mwoochenlhe wo nlhatu no ulhipa mirima chinyu. Nansho nshoka thoko nenno ninothamihiya wo iphiro yo unlhepelha Nlhuku uttuka ulhia.”
40017022	Vaari awe akhalhaka ni owiittucha awe onkhaye Ugalilaya, Yesu aheerelhacha, “Mwaana a Ntu haatameria vo uhelhiya mmathathani mwa attu
40017023	anohalha umwiiva, nansho nihuku no neraru nowa aahihimushiya muukumini.” Owiittucha awe nkayaakelhiya ihuzuni chinene.
40017024	Yesu ni owiittucha awe vaaphilhe aya Ukapenaumu, attu o ulhiviha ikhodi yo Inupa ya Nlhuku nkayaawa u Napeturo ni waakoha, “Owiittuchiha inyu anoolhiva ikhodi yo inupa ya Nlhuku?”
40017025	Napeturo nkayaakhulha, “Eiyo, anoolhiva.” Napeturo vaakenlhe aya mpaani, Yesu nkaaholhelha wulhumacha eeraka, “Nasimoni, nnoopuwelha chani? Apani amphwanelhiya ulhiva ikhodi wa mamwene o velhaponi va? Anenchi ama alheto?”
40017026	Napeturo nkayaakhulha eeraka, “Alheto phi nophwanelhiya.” Yesu nkaakhulha, “Aye, anenchi khanlhivihiya.
40017027	Nansho wo wiira nihaahuvihe munrimani, nrweeke etu unttiyani mwariheke indoana mmenjeke, mwakusheke ihopa inohalha inyu uvara iyo, mwapatakulheke iyano aya nnokoophwanya nchurukhu unthosha ulhiva ikhodi yawaka ni yawinyu. Mwaavaheke wiira ninoolhiva ikhodi yo inupa ya Nlhuku.”
40018001	Yeyo ikatema iyo owiittucha nkayaawa wa Yesu, nkayankoha, “Phi mpani ri mulhupalhe chinene mu Imwene yo wiirimu?”
40018002	Yesu nkaamwiihana mwanhima, nkaamwemesha variyari aya,
40018003	nkeera, “Kinouhimeriani ikekhiaye, mwaahirukunuweke ni ukhalha thoko achihima, khannowa mwaakelha wi Imwene yo wiirimu mena.
40018004	Mulhupalhe nhina Imwene yo wiirimu, ri phi ntu neetimarikha thoko ulha mwanhima ulha.
40018005	Ntu riyoothe nompochera mwanhima thoko ulha wo nchina naka, nokipochera mii.”
40018006	“Ntu riyoothe nohalha unttekiha mmoka aya alha ashinkani anokirumelhelha alha, irii mbaya yoyo ntu uyo attukelhelhiye nshilho nulhupalhe nshikoni ni utitimerihiya ubaharini wo wiisha chinene.
40018007	Ihothapana ilhapo wo nlhatu no ulhikachiya unaawulhusha attu mu uwonyani! Ulhikachiya thoko chiicho unoowa waakhumelhelha, nansho ahothapana attu anohalha upanga chiicho!
40018008	“Yakhalhaka moono inyu ama mweto inyu uhoottekihakani, ntupulheke ni urihelha uwo shoro! Iri mbaya inyuva ukelha mu ukumini wo uhikhalha ni moono ama mweto, kuliko urihiya umooroni uhintiphia mahuku o uhimalha nnari ni miono miilhi ni mieto chinyu miilhi.
40018009	Ni niitho ninyu noottekihakani, nkhulheke nrihelheke utayi. Iri nambaya wo inyuva ukelha mu ukumini nnari ni niitho nimoka, kuliko utikhelhiya vamooroni Ujehannamu nnari ni miitho melhi.”
40018010	“Mwiishungeke! Nhimpangelhe niphiondho mmoka aya ashinkani alha. Kinouhimeriani wiira minepa chaya cho wiirimu chiri muulhokelhani wo mahuku onkhaye wa Athumwanaka o wiirimu.”
40018011	“Ukhalhawaya Mwaana a Ntu wiilhe woopolha attu apotenre.
40018012	Nnoona chani, ntu akhalhaka ni ikhondoro imia imoka, yapoteraka imoka, nopangani? Noohiya chilhe makhumi tisa ni tisa umwaakoni, nkaarwa uuthothani ikhondoro imoka ipotenre.
40018013	Vanoona awe, we ikekhiaye vavawo phi nottapelhelha awe wo nlhatu no ikhondoro imoka iyo, ipwahaka chikhwawe makhumi tisa ni tisa chaahanlhe chiyo.
40018014	Phi chiichammo, Athumwanihu o wiirimu vahinotuna aya inakhalhaka mmoka aya alha ashinkani alha apotere.”
40018015	“Yakhalhaka munninyu hoottekelhani, nrweeke mwamwaamukeke. Nansho mwamwaamukeke nnari elhi vekha inyu. Owiiwaakani, nhompatta nhima inyu.
40018016	Nansho aahiwelhelheke, munkusheke ntu mmoka ama attu elhi mwaarwaneke, akhalhe phi attu o uhimiechesha nenno nlhove nno, thoko chinohimiya ni Malhove Matakatifu, attu elhi ama araru.
40018017	Aahiwelhelheke yayo attu ayo, nhimiacheke wa attu anrumelhenlhe Kuristo. Aahiwelhelheke nlhoko wa attu anrumelhenlhe Kuristo, ooniyeke etu thoko attu ahinchuwenlhe Nlhuku ama attu anolhiviha ikhodi.”
40018018	“Vavawo, kinouhimeriani wo ikekhiaye mwaatti wiira, chinohalha inyu uttuka velhaponi va, chinoottukiya chiicho wiirimu, ni chittu chinohalha inyu uttukulha velhaponi va, chinoottukulhiya chiicho wiirimu.
40018019	Tho kinouhimeriani wo ikekhiaye wiira, attu o irusho cho uchuwelha mu nlhokoni mwinyu yeewananaka velhaponi va nlhove niriyoothe no ulhepelha, Athumwanaka o wiirimu anoupangelhani nenno nlhove nno.
40018020	Ukhalhawaya variwoothe wanthukumana aya attu elhi au araru wo nchina naka, mii kirii vavawo vamoka ni ayo.”
40018021	Napeturo nkayanttwara Yesu, nkankoha, “Eti Thithi, nhimaaka akittekelhaka, kinlhevelheke vachani? mikwaha saba?”
40018022	Yesu nkaamwakhulha, “Akineera vathanu ni velhi, nansho makhumi saba ni saba.
40018023	Ukhalhawaya Umwene wo wiirimu unolhikaana ni mwene mmoka aalhakenlhe uwehaweha maalhakelho a anamitheko aari nhina mamulaka awe.
40018024	Vaachokhonlhe awe, nkaawiheriya ntu mmoka aari ni nlhatu wo nchurukhu ishilingi maelufu khumi.
40018025	Yoyo ntu uyo khaarina ittu iriyoothe yo ulhiva nlhatu awe, paahi eti anene ntheko ayo nkayaalhehera wiira athumihiye ipotta, ahanu awe, achishaana awe ni chittu chonkhaye chirinawe, alhive nlhatu.
40018026	Paahi yoyo karumiya uyo nkaakhoroma wa mwanene nhakhu uyo, nkeera, ‘Nkilhite, ni mii kinoulhivani nlhatu winyu!’
40018027	Mwanene ntheko uyo nkayaamwonelha ikiriri namitheko uyo, nkanhiyerera nlhatu wonkhaye, nkanhiya arweeke.”
40018028	“Nansho namitheko uyo mwanene nkaathama, nkamphwanya mmoka a anamitheko akhunanawe aari ni nlhatu wo nchurukhu ishilingi imia imoka. Nkammara, nkaamwama ishiko eeraka, ‘Nkilhive nlhatu aka!’
40018029	Karumiya nkhunanawe nkaakhoroma, nkammenda eeraka, ‘Nkilhite ni mii kinowulhivani.’
40018030	Nansho uyo khaattunne, nkanttuka ujeerani mpaka vaalhinve awe nlhatu.”
40018031	“Paahi, anamitheko ashikhunanawe yooneke yayo yahochukulha chinene, nkayaarwaa uwaahimeriani amwene mwaha wonkhaye ukhumelhenlhe.
40018032	Vavawo anene ntheko nkayaamwiihana yoyo karumiya uyo, nkaamwirelha, ‘Uwe karumiya o uhilhoka chinene! Wahokilhepelha, ni mii nkakoohiyerera nlhatu wonkhaye.
40018033	Nhothananiya umonelha ikiriri karumiya nkhunaninyu thoko mii chowonenlhe akani ikiriri.’”
40018034	“Amwene nkayaarushiya chinene, nkantikhelha ujerani atwarushiye mpaka vanohalha awe ulhiva nlhatu wonkhaye.”
40018035	“Ni Athumwanaka arii wiirimu, anoupangelhani chiichammo yakhalhaka kila mmoka inyu khanohiyerera uwonya wa nhima awe wo nrima awe wonkhaye.”
40019001	Yesu amalheke wulhumacha yayo malhove ayo, ahothama Ugalilaya, nkaarwa Uyudea, ukhopelhelhe mwoolhoko wo Uyorodani.
40019002	Attu enchi nkayanttwara, ni uyo nkaalhamiha wowo mareta aya.
40019003	Amafarisayo akina nkayanttwara, nkayankoha wo unlhikacha, “Eti, inorera nlhopwana waahiya ahanu awe wo nlhatu uriyoothe?”
40019004	Yesu nkaakhulha, “Chani, khannashoma Malhove Matakatifu alhepiye wiira Nlhuku voopilhe awe ilhapo ahomuupa nlhopwana ni nthiyana?
40019005	Nlhuku nkeera, ‘Wo yoyo nlhatu uyo etu nlhopwana nowaahiya athumwanawe ni anumwanawe, ni ulhutaana ni ahanu awe ni ukhalha iruttu imoka?’
40019006	Wo chiichammo etu, yayo kahena attu elhi tho, nansho iruttu imoka. Paahi, chilhutanihiye ni Nlhuku, ntu himwalhaanihe.”
40019007	Amafarisayo nkayankoha yeeraka, “Nlhatu waani etu, ashinna Musa unilhehera wiira nthiyana avahiyeke italaka ni uhiiya?”
40019008	Yesu nkaakhulha, “Ashinna Musa ovahilheni nlhove no waahiya manyaahanu inyu wo nlhatu no ulhipa mirima winyu. Nansho khachaakhanlhe chiicho voopiye aya ilhapo.
40019009	Paahi kinouhimeriani wiira, nlhopwana riyoothe nohalha waamwalhaana ahanu awe yaahikalhe wo nlhatu wo ulhavalhava, ni uyo nolhavalhava aathelhaka athiyana akina.”
40019010	Owiittucha awe nkayaamwirelha, “Yakhalhaka mwaha wa nlhopwana ni nthiyana phiri aya chiicho, nambaya etu ukhalha wo uhithelha.”
40019011	Yesu nkeerelha, “Kaahiwe attu onkhaye anooria upochera meettuchiho thoko alha, yaahikalhe attu areeriye ni Nlhuku.
40019012	Ukhalhawaya chihawo milhatu chikina chinaapanga alhopwana ahithelhe, ukhalhawaya akina aayarelhe chiicho toka munthunkwani mwa anumwanaya, akina wo nlhatu nopangiya chiicho ni attu, ni attu akina athananne anene uhithelha wo nlhatu no Umwene wo wiirimu. Nolhoha wooria urumelhelha nna nlhove nna, akhalheke chiicho.”
40019013	Yamalheke attu nkayammwiihera Yesu ashaana ashinkani awe eeshera miono ni waalhapelhelha, nansho owiittucha nkayaachiichihacha.
40019014	Yesu nkeera, “Mwaahiyeke ashaana awe uwannyaka, mena nhaachiichihe, ukhalhawaya Imwene yo wiirimu iri ya attu arii thoko alha ashaana alha.”
40019015	Paahi nkeesheracha miono, amalheke nkaathama vavawo.
40019016	Ntu mmoka nkaawa wa Yesu, nkankoha, “Owiittuchiha, kipangeke ittu yaani yoombone ni mii kipatte ukumi wo uhimalha?”
40019017	Yesu nkaamwiirelha, “Woonaka nnokikoherera ittu yaani iri yorera? Orera ri mmoka tu. Mwathananaka ukelha mu ukumini, mmarechesheke malheheriyo.”
40019018	Yoyo ntu uyo nkaakoha, “Malheheriyo ani?” Yesu nkeera, “Nhiive, Nhilhavelhave, Nhiiye, nhoothache,
40019019	mwaathimicheke athumwaninyu ni anumwaninyu, ni waattuna amwaatamana inyu thoko chineettuna inyu mwaanene.”
40019020	Mmirawo uyo nkaamwirelha Yesu, “Yayo onkhaye ayo kihovarechesha, kipangeke ittu yaani vano yo uthepa vavawo?”
40019021	Yesu nkaamwirelha, “Mwathananaka ulhikaanelhiya nrweeke mwathumiheke nhakhu inyu wonkhaye, ni nchurukhu uyo mwaakawelheke attu ashikini, ni inyu nnowiicheshera nhakhu wiirimu, mwamalhihaka nkittwareke.”
40019022	Yoyo mmirawo uyo eeweke chiicho, nkaathama narushiye, ukhalhawaya aari ntu o nhakhu chinene.
40019023	Vavawo Yesu nkaahimeria owiittucha awe wiira, “Ikekhiaye kinouhimeriani, inowa urikarika chinene wo ntu o nhakhu ukelha wi Imwene yo wiirimu.
40019024	Kinouhimeriani tho, iri vo urikarika chinene wo ntu o nhakhu ukhelha Imwene ya Nlhuku, upwaha ingamiya uperetta niitho no ntotto no utottelha ikuwo.”
40019025	Owiittucha yeeweke chiicho nkayoomiya uwanoni chinene, nkayankoha Yesu, “Phi mpani etu, nohalha ulhama?”
40019026	Yesu nkaaweha, nkeera, “Vaattuni khavanooria nansho kuhiwe wa Nlhuku, ukhalhawaya wa Nlhuku chonkhaye chinowooriacha.”
40019027	Yamalheke Napeturo nkayeera, “Ni hii nihohiya chonkhaye nihoottwarani inyuva, ninohalha upattani etu?”
40019028	Yesu nkaahimeria wiira, “Kinouhimeriani ikekhiaye, Mwaana a Ntu vanohalha awe ukhalhelha ihiche awe yo nthimicho wi Ilhapo yo Naanano, mwaattiva khumi ni elhi nkittwarilhe, nnoowa mwaakhalha mu imwene yo utawara, mwaahukumulhaka makosho khumi ni melhi o Uisraeli.
40019029	Ni kila ntu hiilhe inupa ama aahilhe ashihima awe, ama ashirokorawe, ama athumwanawe, ama anumwanawe, ama ashaana awe, ama imata chawe, wo nlhatu no nchina naka, nowa upochera wo mamia ni upwaha, ni upatta ukumi wo uhimalha.
40019030	Nansho attu enchi anoholhelha vano anowa ukhalha o umalhelha, ni attu ari utulhi anowa ukhalha o uholhelha.
40020001	“Umwene wo wiirimu unolhikaana ni ntu aari ni imata yo zabibu, aalhawenlhe wichishuru waavaha attu ntheko umatani wawe.
40020002	Nkeewanana waalhiva thoko chaari aya chilhiviyaka, nchurukhu idinari imoka wo nihuku, nkaarweha u imata awe yo zabibu.
40020003	Vaari aya saa tatu wichishu, nkaarwa weehanani attu akina, nkoona attu ahirina ntheko aneemenlhe wo uhikhalha ni ntheko vanopangiya maronda,
40020004	nkeerelhacha, ‘Nrweeke ni inyu mwaattiva mwavareke ntheko imata yo zabibu, ni mii kinoulhivani iri ye ikekhiaye.’
40020005	Paahi nkayaarwaa. Saa sita uthana ni saa tisa nkeera chiicho.
40020006	Ata vaari aya saa khumi ni moja uchechilho, nkaarwa tho, nkaaphwanya attu akina anemelhanche vasokoni vawo. ‘Paahi nkaakoha, woonaka nhowemelhacha vaa uthana wonkhaye ulha wo uhikhalha ntheko?’
40020007	Nkayamwaakulha, ‘Khaawo ntu nivanhe ntheko.’ Ni uyo nkeerelhacha nrwaacheke ni inyu mwaattiva mwavare ntheko imata yo zabibu.”
40020008	“Weelhekeru, mwanene imata yo zabibu nkanlhehera ntu noshunga nhakhu awe, ‘Mweehane attu ammara ntheko umatani ayo, mwaalhiveke malhivo aya, mpacheraka waalhiva attu awilhee katashi, ni wamalhihera o upacha alhe.’
40020009	Attu yaachokhonlhe ntheko saa khumi ni moja nkayaalhiviya nchurukhu idinari imoka kila mmoka.
40020010	Attu o upacha yaweeke, aari yaanyiheraka wiira anohalha ulhiviya waapwaha akina, nansho ata ni ayo yaavahiye kila mmoka idinari imoka.
40020011	Nkayaakhelha nchurukhu aya, ni unchukulhachera mwanene ntheko.
40020012	Nkayeera, ‘Attu avahiye ntheko katashi apannge ntheko wo isaa imoka tu, woonaka nnilhivilhe thoko yayo uno hii ninavilhenlhe ntheko woorika uthana wonkhaye niviaka nchuwa!’

40023001	Amalheke Yesu nkaahimeria nlhoko wa attu ni owiittucha awe,

40023004	Anoottuka misigo cho ulhemelha ni waathatha attu mmakhathani, nansho ashinene ahittunaka wookolha inakhalhaka nikokho wiira akushe chechiyo misigo chiyo.
40023005	Yayo anopanga mitheko chaya chonkhaye wiira yooniye ni attu. Anowara itepe chilhepiye Malhehero a ashinna Musa mmiononi ni ukhanulha miono cho miinjiro chaya.
40023006	Anothananacha ukhalha mapuro o urera mwaattuni ni ihiche cho nthimicho mu inupa cho unlhapelha Nlhuku.

40023009	Mena nhimwiihane ntu riyoothe velhaponi va, ‘Thithi’ ukhalhawaya athumwaninyu ari amoka tu, arii wiirimu.
40023010	Mena nhiihaniye ‘Aholhelhi,’ ukhalhawaya nholhelhi inyu ri mmoka tu, phi Kuristo Moopolhi.
40023011	Rii mulhupalhe munlhokoni mwinyu yoyo akhalheke phi karumiya inyu.
40023012	Neewelhiha nookurushiya, neekurusha noowelhihiya.”
40023013	“Nhothapana inyu owiittuchiha Malhehero a ashinna Musa ni inyu Amafarisayo! Mwa anafiki inyu! Nnootiyelhelha nlhako wo umwene wo wiirimu vamiithoni va attu. Mwaashinene nhikelhaka mpaani, mena khannaahulhelha attu anthanana ukelha.
40023014	Nhothapana inyu owiittuchiha Malhehero a ashinna Musa ni Amafarisayo! Nneepanga o urera nrima! Nnoonelha anankhwelhi ni wi chootheriha ukhalha attu o nrima woombone wo ulhapelha wo malhove menchi. Wo yoyo nlhatu uyo etu nnoowa mwaatwarushiya wo uweria.”
40023015	“Nhothapana inyu mwaatti o nkutiro wa owiittuchiha Malhehero a ashinna Musa ni Amafarisayo! Mwa anafiki! Nneetakacha ubaharini ni velhaponi mumpatte ntu o uttwara meettuchiho inyu. Vanompatta inyu, nnonttekiha velhi wiira atikhelhiye vamooroni Ujehannamu, o uhiyakani mwaashinene.”
40023016	“Nhothapana inyu aholhelhi ohoona! Mwaattiva nneera eti ntu alhupelhaka Inupa ya Nlhuku, naapo nawe khani ittu, nansho alhupelhaka wo idhahabu iri Nnupani mwa Nlhuku, naapo nno ninommara.
40023017	Mwaattiva ohoona o uphupuwalha! Ittuni iri yoombone chinene, idhahabu ama Inupa ya Nlhuku inohapiha idhahabu iyo?
40023018	Tho nneettuchiha wiira, ‘Ntu alhupelhaka wo madhubahu, khava ittu, nansho alhupelhaka wo izawadi yeeshiye vamadhubahuni, nenno naapo nno ninommara.’
40023019	Mwaattiva ohoona va! Ittu yaani iri yoombone chinene, izawadi ama madhubahu anohapiha izawadi ithimichiye iyo?
40023020	Ntu nolhupelha vamadhubahuni holhupelha wo madhubahu ayo, ni wo ittu chonkhaye cheeshiye vachulhu waya,
40023021	ni ntu alhupelhaka wo ulhupelha Inupa ya Nlhuku, holhupelha wo yeyo Inupa ya Nlhuku iyo, ni wa Nlhuku, nokhalha nhina mwaya,
40023022	ni ntu alhupelhaka irimu, holhupelha varii ihiche yo Umwene ya Nlhuku ni wa Nlhuku nokhalha vachulhu waya.”
40023023	“Nhothapana, inyu owiittuchiha Malhehero a ashinna Musa ni Amafarisayo! Mwa anafiki! Nnaalhiviha attu isadaka yo nifungu no khumi, ata yo mathaakhuru o nihiriri noonukhelha, manjano ni ijira, uno nhiyaka chittu cho uchuwania cho Malhehero a ashinna Musa, ikiriri ni upisha nrima ni ukhulhuvelhiya. Kinouhimeriani wiira alha phi ayo mwaathananiye inyu uvarelhelha chinene, nhilhiyalhaka makina ayo.
40023024	Aholhelhi ohoona! Nnothamiha iphepelhe iri nhina cho uwuriya, nansho mmiriaka ingamiya!”
40023025	“Nhothapana inyu owiittuchiha Malhehero a ashinna Musa ni Amafarisayo va! Mwa anafiki! Nnohapiha ikahi ni inyipo wo vathe, nansho nnohiya nhina chinananre chittu cho nanrokotolhe ni chittu chipante inyu wo uhichooria winyu, wo waathurulha attu ni ilhema.
40023026	Afarisayo ohoona inyu! Nhapiheke ikahi nhina thoko ni vathe vawo vanoorera chiicho.”
40023027	“Nhothapana inyu owiittuchiha Malhehero a ashinna Musa ni Amafarisayo! Mwa anafiki! Nri thoko mahiye ahikiye ishwaakara wo vathe yooniaka orera, nansho nhina anachanre makhuva a attu akhwilhe ni kila ittu iri yo unanara.
40023028	Wo vathe mwaattiva nnoonia ni attu thoko attu o nrima woombone, nansho nhina anafiki ni o nrima wo uhilhoka.”
40023029	“Nhothapana mwaatti owiittuchiha Malhehero a ashinna Musa ni Amafarisayo! Mwa anafiki va! Nnothekelha mahiye a anamilhohi ni ushiringa mahiye a attu orera nrima.
40023030	Mwiiraka wiira yakaari mwahokhalha yeyo ikatema ya ashulhupalhe ihu iyo, khamwaakaviha chittu chenre aya, weevakacha anamilhohi.
40023031	Chiichammo etu, nnowiihimiechesha wiira mwaattiva mwaashinene phi ashaana a attu yeevilhe anamilhohi.
40023032	Haya etu, mmalhihereke ntheko waachokholhiye ni ashulhupalhe inyu!
40023033	Inyu nri inwaa ni iyari yo inwaa! Nnoorieke chani ushemba ihukumu yo mooro wo Ujehannamu?
40023034	Phi nlhatu etu, mii kinouwiherani mwaattiva anamilhohi ni attu o irusho ni owiittuchiha, mmwaaka mweevaka ni waakhomelhelhacha akina aya, ni waatakacha ikopo mu inupa chinyu cho unlhapelha Nlhuku ni waavia avia kila iwani.
40023035	“Paahi etu, utwarushiya wo nlhatu no weeva attu o rera nrima vahirii nlhatu, unowupatani wo nlhatu no iphome aya. Eiyo, toka urihia wo iphome i Nahabilu ahaattenke, mpaka ya Nazakariya, mwaana a Abarakiya, mweevilhe inyu iriyari yo madhubahu u Inupa ya Nlhuku.
40023036	Wo ikekhiaye kinouhimeriani tho wiira, utwarushiya waya alha attu o niiviho alha unoowa waawulhuwelhaka attu a alha mahuku alha!
40023037	“Uyerusalemu! Uyerusalemu! Nneeva anamilhohi nnaata malhuku akarumiya arumiye ni Nlhuku uwaninyu! Vachani kilhikanche aka waathukumaniha ashaana inyu uwannyaka, thoko nankutu chinaathukumaniha awe achishaana awe mmapuphani mwawe, nansho khamwaattunne.
40023038	Haya etu, Inupa inyu ya Nlhuku inoohiiya mathalha.
40023039	Kinouhimeriani uchokholha nna va wiira, khannokoona tho, mpaka ikatema vanohalha inyu wiira ‘Avahiye ibarakha uyo nowa wo nchina ni Athithi uyo.’ ”
40024001	Yesu ahokhuma Inupa ya Nlhuku, owiittucha awe vaawilhe aya nkayaamoniha manupa o Inupa ya Nlhuku.
40024002	Yesu nkeerelha, “Eiyo, nnowoona alha manupa onkhaye alha! Ikekhia kinouhimeriani, khaninhalha ata nlhuku nimoka ninohalha uhalha vaa vachulhu nikina, kila nlhuku ninowa uwulhushiya vathi.”
40024003	Yesu vaari awe nakhanlhe vachulhu Mwaako wo Mizeituni, owiittucha yahonttwara untemerani, nkayaamwirelha, “Nnihimerie yoyo mwaha uyo unohalha ukhumelhelha iyaakhani? Ni ithikineha chani chinohalha ukhumelhelha unichuwelhiha uwa winyu ni umalha wo ilhapo?”
40024004	Yesu nkaakhulha, “Mwiishungeke nhiwe mwaathepiachiya ni ntu.
40024005	Ukhalhawaya attu enchi anowa aakhumelhelha eeraka kila mmoka wiira phi Kuristo ni ayo anoowa yaapoteriha attu enchi.
40024006	Nnoowa mweewa mwaha ikhoto ni itetesi cho ikhoto, nansho nhihuvihachiye. Ukhalhawaya yayo ahothananiya ukhumelhelha, nansho umalha unene uhinaaya.
40024007	Nikosho nimoka inoowa yaatakana ni nikosho nikina, umwene mmoka unowa waatakana ni umwene nkina. Ikuruna ni utetemelha wo ilhapo unoowa waakhumelhelha vawo ni valhe.
40024008	Yayo onkhaye ayo ari thoko nkuri wo uweria wo wiittukulha mwaana.”
40024009	“Yamalhaka nnoowa mwaavariya mwapangelhiye ichimwa ni wiiviya. Makosho onkhaye anoowa aarushiya wo nlhatu wo nchina naka.
40024010	Attu enchi anoowa aahiya mirima chaya, anoowa aathumihana ni uvengana ashineneru.
40024011	Anoowa aakhumelhelha anamilhohi o woothacha enchi anohalha waapoteriha attu enchi.
40024012	Uhilhoka wa attu unoowa wunchereria, ni uttunana wa attu unowa uwolha.
40024013	Nansho ntu riyoothe noohalha uvilhelha mpaka umalhelha yoyo phi nohalha woopolhiya.
40024014	Nansho umalhelha uhinaya uphiya, alha Malhove Orera o Umwene wa Nlhuku alha, anoowa aahimiachiya ilhapo yonkhaye wo uhimiechesha wo attu onkhaye, vavawo umalhelha wo makosho phi nohalha aya uwa.”
40024015	“Nnoowa mwoona ‘Nrusho no utanganya’ naahimiye ni anamilhohi Nadanieli ninemenlhe vamapuroni vatakatifu, noshoma achuwelheke maana aya!
40024016	Vavawo, arii Uyudea attawelheke umiakoni.
40024017	Ntu rii vanchaarani hikhuruwe vathi uukushani ittu mpaani mwawe.
40024018	Ntu rii umatani hihokolhie uwani ukusha ikuwo awe.
40024019	Ahothapana manyopani anohalha ukhalha ve iruttuni ni manyopani anaamwiha yayo mahuku ayo!
40024020	Munlhapelheke Nlhuku wiira uttawa winyu uhiwe nlhaalha wo uririya ama Nihuku no Wiittuwa!
40024021	Ukhalhawaya uhuva wo yeyo ikatema iyo unolhoha ukhalha wulhupalhe uhinapacha woonia toka woopiya ilhapo mpaka lhelho nna. Mena kunowa waakhumelhelha tho.
40024022	Nansho Nlhuku homalha uwukulha yayo mahuku ayo, ahakaawukulhiye, khaawo ntu riyoothe akoopolhiye. Nansho wo nlhatu ni attu athanlhiye etu, Nlhuku noowa aawukulha yayo mahuku ayo.”
40024023	“Paahi etu, ntu owirelhakani yayo mahuku ayo, ‘Kuristo rii vaa’ ama ‘rii valhe,’ nhinrumelhelhe.
40024024	Ukhalhawaya anoowa aakhumelhelha ashi kuristo o woothacha ni anamilhohi o woothacha, anoowa upanga cho ushangiha chulhupalhe ni woopiha cho waarimelhiha ata attu athanlhiye ni Nlhuku, yooriachaka.
40024025	Mwiiwelhelheke etu, mii kinowaamukani mahuku ahinaya uphiya.”
40024026	“Paahi etu yowiirelhakani, ‘Mummweheke, rii uthakoni!’ Nhirumelhelhe, ama yeeraka ‘Mmweheke, eevinthe vaa!’ Nhirumelhelhe mena.
40024027	Ukhalhawaya Mwaana a Ntu nohalha uwa thoko chineera aya wo uverunya vanomwalhelha aya unosha nchuwa mpaka uneelha nchuwa.”
40024028	“Vari ntembo, phi vakittu vanothukumana marepo.”
40024029	“Wamalhakaru uhuva wo yayo mahuku ayo, nchuwa ninohelhiya ipiphi, mweeri khunowa waapharelha, ittotwa chinoomora wiirimu, ni machiri o wiirimu anoowa aatikhinyiya.
40024030	Ithikineha yo Mwaana a Ntu inoowa woonia wiirimu, ni makosho onkhaye o velhaponi anoowa aachukulhacha vanohalha aya umwoona Mwaana a Ntu awaaka vachulhu mahute o wiirimu wo ikuru ni nthimicho mulhupalhe.
40024031	Nrombe nulhupalhe no mapalhapata ninowa uruma, ni uyo noowa waaruma minepa o wiirimu awe avire mithelha micheshe cho iphioo, ni waathukumaniha attu athanlhiye ukhuma mithelha chonkhaye ncheshe cho ilhapo.”
40024032	“Mwiiittucheke etu malhikaaniho o mwiri wo nkhuyu. Maritta vanophuwa aya mathaakhuru, vavawo phi nochuwelha inyu wiira, ilhimwe ihaatameria.
40024033	Chiichammo etu, mwaattiva vanohalha inyu woona alha onkhaye alha apangiaka, mmweeke mwaachuwelha wiira ikatema ihaaya, wa ayo ukhumelhelha.
40024034	Wo ikekhiaye muupuwelheke wiira ulha mwaha wonkhaye ulha, unohalha ukhumelhelha ilha iyari ilha ihinavira.
40024035	Irimu ni ilhapo chinoovira, nansho malhove aka khanovira mena.”
40024036	“Khaawo ntu chuwenlhe, nihuku mena ikatema, inolhoha uwa yaakhani, anakhalhaka minepa o wiirimu, mena Mwaana. Athithi vekha aya phi chuwenlhe.
40024037	Uwa wa Mwaana a Ntu unohalha ukhalha thoko chenre aya ikatema ya Anuhu.
40024038	Mahuku igarika ihinaphiya, attu yaari alhiaka ni uwuria, athelhaka ni uthelhiya, mpaka nihuku Anuhu vaakenlhe aya ikalhava yuulhupalhe, isafina,
40024039	attu khayaachuwenlhe irini mpaka maashi o igarika vaawilhe aya, nkayaakusha onkhaye. Chiicho phi nohalha aya ukhalha nihuku Mwaana a Ntu vanolhoha awe uwa.
40024040	Yeyo ikatema iyo attu elhi anowa ukhalha umatani, mmoka noochishiya, ni nkina noohiya.
40024041	Manyopani elhi anowa ushilha vamoka, mmoka nowa ukushiya, nkina nowa uhiiya.”
40024042	“Paahi etu nshiheke, ukhalhawaya khanchuwenlhe nihuku no uhokolhia Athithi inyu.
40024043	Mwanene inupa akaachuwenlhe nihuku noowa attu owiiya, nchuwelheke wiira anshelhelhiha, mena kaahiya inupa awe iphomolhiye.
40024044	Wo chiichammo etu, ni inyu mwaatti nkalheke tayari, ukhalhawaya Mwaana a Ntu nolhoha uwa ikatema ihinaanyihera inyu.”
40024045	“Phi mpani etu, rii karumiya o ukhulhuvelhiya, o irusho? Ri ntu novahiya ntheko ni anene ntheko, wo weemelhelha akhunanawe ni waavaha cholhia ikatema yaayaka.
40024046	Horeeriya yoyo karumiya nohalha uphwanyiya ni mwanene ntheko apangaka ntheko awe rata vanohokolhia aya uwani!
40024047	Kinouhimeriani wo ikekhiaye wiira, mwanene ntheko uyo nommaha yoyo karumiya uyo ntheko wo weemelhelha nhakhu awe wonkhaye.
40024048	Nansho akhalhaka karumiya o uhikhulhuvelhiya, nowiichirelha munrimani mwawe wiira, anene ntheko kanohokolhia phiyaru,
40024049	nkaachokholha waatakacha anamitheko akhunanawe, nkaalhia cholhia chiyo vekha awe ni uwuria vamoka ni attu o uhapalhiya.
40024050	Nansho mwanene ntheko noohokolhia nihuku nihinoweherera awe ni isaa ihichuwenlhe awe.
40024051	Phi vavawo mwanene ntheko, vanowa awe untwarusha, ni umweesha nlhoko mmoka ni anafiki. Wowo phi nohalha aya ukhalha ikutto ni ushilha miino.”
40025001	“Yeyo ikatema iyo, Umwene wo wiirimu unowa ulhikaana ni mialhi khumi yaakunshe ikhandiri chaya, nkayaarwaa u wekamelhani abwana arusi.
40025002	Athanu aya yaari o uhikhalha ni irusho ni athanu yaari o irusho.
40025003	Athanu o uhikhalha ni irusho ayo yaakunshe akhandiri aya wo uhikusha makhura a akhiba,
40025004	nansho o irusho ayo yahokusha makhura a akhiba nchuupani vamoka ni ikhandiri chaya.
40025005	Abwana arusi nkaacherewa uwa, imialhi alhe onkhaye nkayaarupacha ikhove.”
40025006	“Uhiyu iriyari nkaneewiya nlhove nikhuwelhaka wiira, ‘Haya abwana arusi ahowa! Nrwee mweekamelhe!’
40025007	Vavawo imialhi onkhaye nkayonkwacha, nkayaaparihelha ikhandiri chaya.
40025008	Imialhi o uhikhalha ni irusho ayo nkayerelha imialhi o irusho alhe, ‘Nnivaheke makhura inyu vakani, ukhalhawaya ikhandiri chihu chihotiphiaa.’
40025009	Nansho o irusho alhe nkayaakhulha, ‘Khanthosha ari vakani, mbaya nrweeke unothumihiya aya mwathumeke mwaashinene!’
40025010	Paahi, imialhi o uhikhalha ni irusho alhe nkayaarwaa uuthumani makhura, vaarwaa aya, abwana arusi nkayaawa. Imialhi yaari tayari alhe, nkayaakelha mpaani vamoka ni ayo, inupa ya arusi, nkhora nkawaatteiya.”
40025011	“Vahipinche imialhi akina ayo nkayaahokolhia, nkayeehana, ‘Pwiiya, abwana arusi, pwiiya abwana arusi! Nnihulhelhe!’”
40025012	“Nansho abwana arusi ayo nkayaakhulha, ‘Kinouhimeriani ikekhiaye, akuuchuwenlheni mwaattiva.’ ”
40025013	Yamalheke Yesu nkeera, “Nshelhelhiheke etu, ukhalhawaya khanchuwenlhe nihuku mena ikatema.”
40025014	“Yeyo ikatema iyo Umwene wo wiirimu unowa ukhalha thoko ntu mmoka aathananne urwaa nkwaha wo utayi, nkeehana anamitheko awe, nkaaruma ntheko wo weemelhelha nhakhu awe.
40025015	Nkammaha kila mmoka ntheko wo ulhikaana chinooria awe, mmoka nhakhu ichipande cho italanta nthanu ni nkina italanta pilhi ni nkina italanta imoka thoko chooria awe. Amalheke nkaarwa.
40025016	Karumiya aavahiye nhakhu italanta nthanu nkaapanga maronda nkaapatta italanta chikina nthanu.
40025017	Ni chiichammo ntu aavahiye nhakhu italanta pilhi nkaapatta italanta chikina pilhi.
40025018	Nansho ntu aavahiye italanta imoka nkaarwa uuthipelhani vathi, nkaavitha nhakhu wa mwanene uyo.”
40025019	“Yavireke mahuku menchi, mwanene ntheko ulhe nkaahokolhia, nkaachokholha waalhakelha nhakhu awe.
40025020	Karumiya aavahiye nhakhu italanta nthanu nkaawa ni italanta nthanu chikina. Nkeera, ‘Pwiiya mwaakivanhe italanta nthanu. Mwooneke etu, kihopatta italanta nthanu chikina.’
40025021	Mwanene ntheko nkeera, ‘Morera, anamitheko oombone ni o ukhulhuvelhiya! Nhokhulhuvelhiya wo nhakhu vakani, vano etu kinouhiyerani ntheko mulhupalhe. Mmweeke etu niwe naapuha vamoka ni mii!’ ”
40025022	“Karumiya aavahiye nhakhu italanta pilhi nkaawa, nkaakumiha italanta pilhi chikina chaayarinhe awe nkeera, ‘Pwiiya mwaakivanhe italanta pilhi. Mwooneke etu italanta chikina chipantte aka.’
40025023	Mwanene ntheko nkaamwirelha, ‘Morera, anamitheko oombone ni o ukhulhuvelhiya. Nhokhalha o ukhulhuvelhiya wo nhakhu vakani, vano kinouhiyerani ntheko mulhupalhe. Mmweeke etu, mmwe mwaapuha vamoka ni mii.’ ”
40025024	“Nansho namitheko aavahiye italanta imoka nkayaawa, nkeera, ‘Pwiiya, kihochuwelha wiira inyuva nri attu orikarika, inyuva nnokhungura vahaanlhe inyu, ni ukukhulhulha vahaamwanche inyu.
40025025	Kahoova, nkakaavitha nhakhu inyu vathi. Mmwieke etu nhakhu inyu!’ ”
40025026	“Mwanene ntheko nkaamwirelha, ‘Uweva uri karumiya o uhilhoka ni uhuva! Uhochuwelha wiira mii kinokhungura vakittu vahaanlhe aka, ni ukukhulhulha vahimwanche aka.
40025027	Paahi etu, mwaaphwanelhiye weesha nchurukhu aka unoshungiya nchurukhu, ni mii kaanopatta nchurukhu aka ni ifaida aya!
40025028	Vano etu munthurulheke nchurukhu uyo, nkusheke nrweeke mwammaheke ulhe rina italanta khumi ulhe.
40025029	Ukhalhawaya, ntu ri ni ittu noovahiya ni wunchereriya. Nansho ntu hirina ittu, hata ikani irinawe iyo inookushiya.
40025030	Nansho ulha karumiya o uhikhulhuvelhiya ulha, akakhelhiyeke vathe wiipiphini uwo! Wowo phi unohalha ukhalha ikutto ni ushilha miino.’ ”
40025031	“Ikatema Mwaana a Ntu vanohalha awe uwa nari Mwene vamoka ni minepa o wiirimu atakatifu onkhaye, vavawo nowa aakhalha vahicheni vawe vo nthimicho,
40025032	ni attu o makosho onkhaye anowa uthukumana vari awe, ni uyo nowa waanyulhacha attu milhoko miilhi, thoko nshunga vanaanyulhacha awe ikhondoro ni ipuri. Ikhondoro mpatta mmoka wo wiimonono ni ipuri mpatta wo wiimushi.
40025033	Noowa weesha attu anrumelhenlhe wiimonono wawe ni attu akina ahinrumelhenlhe wiimushi wawe.”
40025034	“Yamalhaka Amwene anowa weerelha alhe arii mpatta wawe wo wiimonono, ‘Mmweeke mwaattiva nvahiye ibarakha ni Athithi! Mmweeke mwaapochera umwene mwesheriye inyu toka voopiye aya ilhapo.
40025035	Ulhalhawaya kahowolhiya ithalha ni inyu nkamwaakivaha yolhia, kahowolhiya nttona ni inyu mwaattiva mwahokivaha maashi, kaari nlheto ni mwaattiva nkamwaakipochera,
40025036	akawanre, nkamwaakiwariha, kaari ki nreta ni inyu nkamwaawa uukonani, kaari muuttukiyani ni inyu mwaattiva nkamwaawa ukishukuriani.’ ”
40025037	“Vavawo, attu orera nrima anowa waakhulha Amwene, ‘Thithi, yaakhani nowonneni nnawolhiye ithalha ni hii nkanoovahani yolhia, ama nnari ni nttona ni hii nkanowurihani maashi?
40025038	Ni yaakhani mwaari inyu alheto ni hii nkanoopocherani, ama mwaari wo uhikhalha ni ikuwo ni hii nkanoowarihani?
40025039	Ama yaakhani nowonneni nnari areta ama nnattukiye ni hii nkanaawa uwoonani?’
40025040	Amwene anoowa waakhulha, ‘Ikekhia kinouhimeriani, kila ittu champangenlhe inyu mmoka aya ashilhoko aka akani aakirumelhenlhe alha, mwaakipangenlhe mii!’ ”
40025041	“Amalhaka anowa weerelha attu arii mpatta waya wo wiimushi, ‘Nthamache vari aka inyu mwaatti nlhaviye ni Nlhuku va! Nrwaacheke uri mooro wo hitiphiaa mahuku o uhimalha wesheriye Nakare ni minepa chawe!
40025042	Ukhalhawaya kahowolhiya ithalha ni mwaattiva khamwakivanhe yolhia ni kaari ni nttona mwaattiva khamwakivanhe maashi.
40025043	Kaari nlheto mwaattiva khamwakipochenre ni kaari nreta ni ntu o ttukiye mwaattiva khamwaawilhe uukiwehani.’ ”
40025044	“Vavawo attu ayo anowa ukoha, ‘Thithi, yaakhani nowonilhe inyu nnawolhiye ithalha ama nttona, nnari nlheto ama wo uhikhalha ni ikuwo, nnari areta, ni hii khanokavihenreni?’
40025045	Amwene anowa waakhulha, ‘Kinouhimeriani ikekhia, kila vaakhonte inyu umpangelha ittu yoombone mmoka aya alha ashinkani alha, mwaakhonte ukipangelha mii.’
40025046	Paahi, alha attu alha anowa urweehiya urii ntwarusho no uhimalha, nansho attu orera nrima alhe anowa urweehiya urii ukumi wo uhimalha.”
40026001	Yesu amalhiheke wiittuchiha yayo meettuchiho onkhaye ayo, nkaahimeria owiittucha awe,
40026002	“Nhochuwelha wiira mahuku melhi anowa, phi nihuku no Pasaka, ni Mwaana a Ntu nookumihiya akhomelhelhiye munsalaabani.”
40026003	Yeyo ikatema iyo opochera ishaani olhupalhe ni ashulhupalhe ahokumaana vamoka upuwani u Nakayafa, opochera ishaani olhupalhe,
40026004	nkayeewanana miruku cho unhelha Yesu mmachirini wo umwoonelha, amwiive.
40026005	Nansho ewananne wiira, “Nihipange nenna nlhove nna ikatema yo Pasaka, ihiwe ikhumelhelhaka injoove mwaattuni.”
40026006	Yesu vaari awe Ubethaniya, uwani u Nasimoni, ntu o makutulha,
40026007	opani amoka aawelhe ichupa yo malhuku o alabasta yo makhura o unukhelha o nchurukhu mwinchi, nkayaawa wa Yesu vamezani vaakhalha awe ulhia yolhia. Nkaamminelha makhura ayo mmuruni.
40026008	Owiittucha awe nkoona yeyo nkayaarushiya. Nkayaakoha, “Yeeshiyani urihakacha alha makhura alha?
40026009	Makhura thoko alha anthumihiya wo nchurukhu mwinchi, ni nchurukhu uyo waanooria uvahiya attu amashikini.”
40026010	Yesu ahochuwelha chaanyihera aya, nkaahimeria, “Woonaka nnowahuviha alha opani alha? Yayo ahokipangelha ittu yoombone.
40026011	Attu ahirina ittu ari mahuku onkhaye vamoka ni inyu, nansho mii akinkhalha vamoka ni inyu mahuku onkhaye.
40026012	Alha opani alha ahokimiinelha makhura o unukhelha wo weesha iruttu aka tayari wo nihuku no uvithiya waka.
40026013	Vano etu, kinouhimeriani ikekhiaye wiira, vakittu variwoothe velhaponi va vanohalha uhimiachiya alha Malhove Orera alha, mwaha upangilhe aya alha opani alha, unowa uhimiachiya wo wuupuwelhiya waya.”
40026014	Yamalheke Nayuda Isikariote, mmoka aya owiittucha khumi ni elhi, nkarwa wa attu opochera ishaani olhupalhe,
40026015	nkeerelha, “Nnohalha ukivaha ittu yaani kanthumihaka Yesu uwaninyu?” Nkayaamwalhakelha nchurukhu makhobilhi makhumi mararu.
40026016	Ni toka yeyo ikatema iyo Nayuda nkaavia nipesha no unthumiha Yesu wa attu opochera isadaka.
40026017	Nihuku naaholhelha nihuku no Pasaka, nihuku no mikatte cho uhihelhiya ihengedure, owiittucha yahonttwara Yesu nkayankoha, “Nnothanana nooterekhelhekeni vayi yolhia yo Pasaka?”
40026018	Yesu nkaakhulha, “Nrweeke wa ntu mmoka urii iwani mwanhimerieke, ‘Owiittuchiha aneera, ikatema aka ihophiya, mii ni owiittucha aka ninowa unlhelhia Pasaka uwaninyu.’ ”
40026019	Owiittucha nkayeera thoko Yesu chaalhehenre awe nkayaakoorosha yolhia yo Pasaka.
40026020	Uchechilho, Yesu nkaakhalha vamezani vamoka ni owiittucha awe khumi ni elhi,
40026021	Vaari aya alhiaka, Yesu nkeera, “Kinouhimeriani ikekhia wiira, mmoka inyu nookithumiha.”
40026022	Owiittucha nkayaachukulha chinene, nkayankohacha mmoka mmoka, “Thithi! Chani phi mii?”
40026023	Yesu nkaakhulha, “Ntu nopapha nkatte vamoka ni mii nnyiponi phi yoyo nohalha ukithumiha.
40026024	Mwaana a Ntu noorwaa unkelha awe thoko Malhove Matakatifu chinohimia aya, nansho hothapana ntu ulhe nolhoha unthumiha Mwaana a Ntu! Ikaari mbaya wa yoyo ntu uyo ahikaayarelhe!”
40026025	Nayuda, aari phi ayo yaathanana unthumiha, nkayankoha, “Owiittuchiha! Chani, phi mii?” Yesu nkaakhulha, “Inyuva mwaanene nheeromolha.”
40026026	Vaari aya alhiachaka, Yesu nkaakusha nkatte, nkaalhapelhelha wa Nlhuku, nkaamia, nkaavahacha owiittucha awe eeraka, “Mmwieke nlhieke, ilha phi iruttu aka.”
40026027	Amalhiheke nkaathesha ikikombe yo idivai, nkanthimicha Nlhuku, nkaavahacha eeraka, “Mmwurieke onkhaye,
40026028	ilha phi iphome aka inotimiriha malhehano a Nlhuku, iphome aka inrihiaa wo nlhatu ni attu enchi wo uhiyereriya uwonya waya.
40026029	Kinouhimeriani, akinowuria tho idivai yo zabibu mpaka nihuku vanohalha aka uwuria idivai yo naanano vamoka ninyu mu Umweneni wa Athumwanaka.”
40026030	Vaamanlhe aya wiipa ichipo, nkayaathama, nkayaarwaa waari Mwako wo Mizeituni.

40026032	Nansho baada yo uhihimmwa, kinouholhelhani Ugalilaya.”
40026033	Napeturo nkaamwirelha Yesu, “Akinowa koohiyani, ata attu onkhaye anattawaka.”

40026036	Yamalheke Yesu nkaarwa vamoka ni owiittucha awe waari imata yeehaniya Gethsemane, nkeerelha wiira, “Nkhalheke vaa ni mii kirwee vaholho vawo kalhapelhe.”

40026041	Nshelhelhiheke ni ulhapelha nhiwe mwaakelha muulhikachiyani. Nrima uhottuna nansho iruttu inoohuperia.”

40026043	Nkaarwelha tho, nkaaphwanyacha anarupilhe, ukhalhawaya miitho aya aari anachanre ikhove.

40026046	Munkweke etu, nirweeke. Ntu nokithumiha uyo ulha vaa howa!”
40026047	Yesu aari olhumachaka ikatema Nayuda, owiittucha mmoka aya khumi ni elhi alhe vaawilhe aya. Vamoka ni ayo nkayaawa attu enchi arii ni maphanga ni indonga yaarumiye ni attu opochera ishaani olhupalhe ni ashulhupalhe.

40026056	Nansho alha onkhaye alha apangelhe wiira Malhove Matakatifu aalhempe aya anamilhohi atimire.” Yamalheke, owiittucha awe nkayanhiya nkayaattawacha.

40027001	Washeeke waya attu opochera ishaani olhupalhe ni ashulhupalhe yahopanga miruku cho umwiiva Yesu.
