40027003	Vavawo Nayuda, anthuminhe Yesu vonne aya wiira Yesu homalha uhukumulhiya, nkaachukulha munrimani, nkaarwa waahokolhoshera opochera ishaani olhupalhe ni ashulhupalhe makhobilhi makhumi mararu o nchurukhu.

40027015	Napilato ahokhalhana malhemalhelho ikatema yo Pasaka unhiyerera ntu ttukiye mmoka aathananiye ni attu.

40027019	Napilato vaari aya anakhanlhe vachulhu ihiche yo waahukumulhelha attu, ahanu aya nkayaarwehelha nttenga wiira, “Nhikhalhe ni nlhove niriyoothe ni uyo ntu orera nrima hittenke uyo, ukhalhawaya lhelho uhiyu kihothemwihiya chinene ntorani wo nlhatu nawe.”

40027021	Nansho Napilato nkaakoha, “Phi mpani wa alha attu elhi alha nnothanana inyu kinhiyerere?” Attu nkayaakulha, “Ninonthanana Baraba!”
40027022	Napilato nkayaakoha tho, “Vano, kimwiiriheke ittu yaani Yesu neehaniya Kuristo ulha?” Attu onkhaye nkayeera “Akhomelhelhiye vansalaabani!”
40027023	Napilato nkayaathepa ukoha, “Wo nlhatu waani? Panngeni yo uhilhoka?” Attu nkayaathepa ukhuwelha, “Akhomelhelhiye vansalaabani!”
40027024	Paahi, Napilato yachuwelheke wiira khavanshichira tho, ni attu yaari achokholhaka uhelha injoove, nkayaawia maashi nkaanyawa mathatha aya vaattuni, nkayeera, “Mii akirina nlhatu vachulhulhu iphome awe ulha ntu ulha! Nlhatu winyu mwaashinene!”
40027025	Attu onkhaye nkayeera, “Iphome awe inihokolheelheke vachulhu wihu ni achishaana ihu!”
40027026	Vavawo Napilato nkayanhulhelha Baraba ukhuma waattukiye awe, nkaamwata Yesu ikopo ni waavaha Yesu akhomelhelhiye.
40027027	Yamalheke manyaasikari a Napilato nkayanrweeha Yesu mpaani, ni attu onkhaye nkayancharaanelha.
40027028	Nkayanrulha ikuwo chawe, nkayammwariha ikanzu yokhwilha.
40027029	Yamalheke nkayaativa mphumburu wo miiwa, nkayammwariha mmuruni, nkayammariha nthalhe moono wo wiimonono. Nkayaakhoroma vaari awe, nkayampangelha mattepwa yiiraka, “Moyoo Amwene a Ayahudi!”
40027030	Nkayanshuwelha ishenye, nkayaakusha nthalhe ulhe, nkayaamwatelha mmuruni.

40027034	Nkayammaha idivai yaathakanihiye ni ittu yo uhapalha, nansho Yesu alhawiheke khaawunrie.

40027040	“Inyuva! Ngati mweera nnowooria uphomolha Inupa ya Nlhuku ni utheka tho wo mahuku mararu! Mwiichoopolheke etu mwanene mwakhalhaka inyuva phi Mwaana a Nlhuku! Paahi, nkhuruweke vansalaabani vawo!”
40027041	Wo yeyo iphiro iyo opochera ishaani olhupalhe vamoka ni attu owiittuchiha Malhehero a ashinna Musa ni ashulhupalhe yahonnyoholhacha yeeraka,
40027042	“Ahoopolha akina, nansho wiiyopolha khanooria wiiyopolha mwanene! Kahiwe phi yoyo Mwene a Ayahudi? Paahi, ooriaka wiikurusha vansalaabani, hii ninonrumelhelha!
40027043	Ahonrumelhelha Nlhuku ni wiira eti yoyo phi Mwaana a Nlhuku, paahi, Nlhuku amwopolheke yakhalhaka nonttuna.”

40027047	Nansho attu yeemenlhe vavawo yeeweke chiicho nkayeera, “Neehana Naeliya.”
40027048	Mmoka aya nkaattimakacha, nkaakusha ndodoki, nkaanelhiha nsiikini, nkeesha munthalheni, nkammaha awurie.

40027050	Paahi, Yesu nkaakhuwelha tho, nkaahiya nrima.
40027051	Vavawo nipaziya nulhupalhe no u Inupa ya Nlhuku nkanaahuwa ipaande pilhi, ukhuma nchulhu mpaka vathi. Ilhapo nkayaatetemelha, mialha nkachaphwiaa,
40027052	mahiye nkayaapatakuwa ni iruttu cha atakatifu enchi yaakhwilhe, nkachaahihimmwa.

40027054	Paahi, olhupalhe a manyaasikari ni manyaasikari yaariwo, anlhitelhelhaka Yesu yooneke ntetemelho no ilhapo ni attu aakhumelhenlhe, nkayoova chinene, nkayeera, “Ikekhiaye yolha ntu ulha aari Mwaana a Nlhuku.”
40027055	Vavawo vakittu vawo yahawo manyopani enchi awehaka wo utayi. Yayo phi alhe yanttwarilhe Yesu ukhuma Ugalilaya ankavihaka ntheko.
40027056	Mommo munlhokoni mwaya mmo yahaawo Amariamu Magidalena, Amariamu anumwanaya Nayakhobo ni Nayusufu, vamoka ni ahanu a Nazebedayo.
40027057	Uchechilho, nkaawa ntu mmoka o nhakhu nnenchi o Uarimathaya, eehaniya Nayusufu. Ni ayo chiicho aari owiittucha a Yesu.
40027058	Nkayaarwelha Napilato, nkayaalhepelha wiira avahiye iruttu ya Yesu. Paahi, Napilato nkayaalhehera wiira avahiye.
40027059	Nayusufu ahokusha iruttu ilhe, nkaavilhikelhelha isaanda yorera yo hariri,
40027060	nkayaavitha mu nihiye no naanano naahemme aya vamwalhani. Amalheke nkaapirikisha nlhuku nulhupalhe utiya vanlhakoni, nkaarwa uwani.

40027064	Wo chiichammo etu nlheehereke wiira nihiye nilhitelhelhiye mpaka nihuku no neraru, owiittucha awe ahiwe eiyaka iruttu awe, ni werelha attu wiira hohihimmwa. Woothacha wo umalhihera uwo unowa unanara upwaha wo upacha ulhe.”
40027065	Napilato nkeerelha, “Haya etu, nrweeke mwakhalhelheke nihiye nno thoko chinoona inyu.”
40027066	Paahi, nkayaarwaa ulhitelhelhani nihiye, nkayaashiringa vachulhu nlhuku nne ni waahiya vavawo manyaasikari o lhitelhelha.
40028001	Navireke Nihuku no Wiittuwa, mapikoosha o nihuku no jumaapili, Amariamu Magidalena ni Amariamu akina yahorwaa uwehani nihiye nne.
40028002	Wo uhipicha nkawaakhumelhelha utetemelha wo ilhapo wo machiri, nnepa wo wiirimu wa Athithi wahokuruwa ukhuma wiirimu, nkawaapikirisha nlhuku ni ukhalhelha.

41004018	Attu akina anokhalha thoko imbeyu chaamonre vamiiwani. Yalha phi alhe aneewa nttenga,
41004019	nansho nipampa no velhaponi va, no nhakhu, ni nikakata ninoothemwiha nlhove nipochenre aya, ni wuumiha wiira nikhalhe wo uhimma.
41004020	Nansho akhwawe ayo anokhalha thoko imbeyu chaamonre vachaayirani, aneewa nttenga, khupocheraka, ni uyariha imbeyu makhumi mararu, akina makhumi sita akina imia imoka.”
41004021	Yesu nkaathepa tho wulhumacha, “Chani hawo ntu noparihelha ikhandiri awe ni uwiiha mpaani ni ukhunelha ittutu ama neesha nkhwikwichiri? Mena! Anothomia vachulhu ikiango.
41004022	Ittu iriyoothe ivithiye inowa uhumbukulhiya, ama ittu ikhuneelhiye inowa yaapatakulhiya.
41004023	Ri ni maaru, eewechesheke!”
41004024	Nkaahimia tho, “Mwiiwelhelheke mwaha uneewa inyu! Maphimelho anaaphimelha inyu attu, phi chiichammo chinohalha inyu uphimelhiya ni Nlhuku, munchereriyaka chinene.
41004025	Ntu rina ittu nowunchereriya, ni ayo ahirina ittu anothurulhiya, ata ikani irinawe iyo inookushiya.”
41004026	Yesu nkaathepa uhimia wiira, “Imwene ya Nlhuku iri thoko cho. Ntu nowaalha imbeyu vattayani.
41004027	Uhiyu arupaka, uthana akhalhaka miitho, nnyepu wunnuwaka. Ni uyo hichuwelhaka ittu.
41004028	Ittaya ineneru phi nonnuwiha nnyepu ni uyariha, ichokholhaka ukhumelha vathe, ituva, ni ikatema yaphiyaka wiima.
41004029	Chakhomaalhaka, phi nochokholha awe ntu uthikilhacha ni imboopo awe, ukhalhawaya nlhaalha uhaaya.”
41004030	Yesu nkeera, “Nilhikaaniheke ni ishiyani Imwene ya Nlhuku? Nulhumacheke nlhikaaniho naani?
41004031	Irii thoko cho. Ntu nookusha imbeyu ikaani chinene yo haradali iri imbeyu ikani chinene velhaponi, khwaalhaka vathi.
41004032	Nansho yaalhiyaka inoomelha ni wunnuwa ukhalha mwiri mulhupalhe upwaha miri chonkhaye. Umelhaka iphata chulhupalhe chinokorelha ashinuni o wiirimu ni utheka iphuuru munttuuchini mwaya.”
41004033	Yesu aheettuchiha nlhove nawe wo malhikaaniho thoko yayo, aahimeriaka attu chooria aya wiiwelhelha.
41004034	Kholhumanche nlhove wo uhilhikaaniha, ihikhalhe vaari awe vekha ni owiittucha awe, wowo ahaalhamulhelha malhikaaniho ayo.
41004035	Uchechilho nenno nihuku nno, nkaahimeriacha owiittucha awe wiira, “Nngwe nilhapuwe nirwee ukhopelhelhe nttiya.”
41004036	Paahi nkayaahiyacha attu ayo, nkayaawelha nkalhavani, owiittucha nkayanttwara, nkayaathama. Ikalhava chikina nkachaattwara.
41004037	Wo uhipicha nkawaawuka iphioo yo machiri, maashi achokholhaka uthemwathemwa athemwihaka ikalhava, ni maashi nkayaakelha nkalhavani.
41004038	Yesu aari narumpe utulhi ikalhava. Owiittucha awe nkayammusha eeraka, “Owiittuchiha, khannona wiira niri ntatakoni?”
41004039	Yesu nkoonkwa ni uchachera iphioo iyo, nkeera, “Mmaalhe! Ntondove!” Iphioo nkayaamaalha nkawakhalha shiriri.
41004040	Yamalheke, Yesu nkeerelha owiittucha awe, “Chani woonaka mwaatti nrima inyu mwankani? Mwoovani?”
41004041	Nansho yaari yoovaka chinene eerelhanaka ashineneru, “Phi ntu ani yolha? Mpaka iphioo chinomwiiwelhelha!”
41005001	Yesu ni owiittucha awe nkayaaphiya ukhopelhelhe nttiya no Ugalilaya, ilhapo yo Ugerasi.
41005002	Vavawo vaakhuruwa aya nkalhavani vawo, nkayankumaana ntu aakhuma umahiyeni. Yoyo aari ni mashoka o unanara,
41005003	iyaakha chonkhaye aari akhalhaka umahiyeni, woochelhiyaka ummara mena unttuka mittondoro,
41005004	wo mahuku onkhaye aari attukiyaka mittondoro mmietoni ni ipingu mmiononi mwoothe, nansho akwatulhachaka mittondoro ni ipingu chiyo. Aari ni machiri ahinooria uvariya ni ntu.
41005005	Uhiyu ni uthana woothe aari eetakachaka mmahiyeni ni mmiakoni, akhuwelhachaka ni wiikhavakacha ni malhuku.
41005006	Vaamwonne awe Yesu utayi awaaka, ahontimakelha, ni unkhoromelha,
41005007	akhuwelhaka, “Yesu, Mwaana a Nlhuku mulhupalhe! Urinani ni mii? Wo nchina na Nlhuku, kinoulhepelha ukihiye ukihitwarushe!”
41005008	Olhumacha chiicho ukhalhawaya Yesu ari eeraka, “Nshoka no unanara, unhiye ulha ntu ulha!”
41005009	Yesu nkankoha, “Nchina ninyu apani?” Ntu uyo nkaakhulha, “Nchina naka ‘Nlhoko’ hii niri enchi!”
41005010	Nkaathepaka ulhepelha ahoomolhelhiye vathe wo yeyo ilhapo iyo.
41005011	Vavawo vakittu vaari vahuwiyaka ikulhuwe chinchi chilhihiyaka vamwaakoni.
41005012	Paahi mashoka o unanara ayo nkayanlhepelha Yesu wiira “Nnirweeheke etu ukulhuweni, naakelheke.”
41005013	Yesu nkaarumelhelha, ni mashoka o unanara ayo nkayankhuma ntu ulhe arwaaka ukulhuweni. Ikulhuwe chiyo chaari chiphiyaka maelufu melhi. Nkachaattawa chikhuruwaka uhito mpaka munttiyani waatitiminre mmaashini.
41005014	Attu yaahuwa ikulhuwe ayo, nkayaattawacha awanelhihaka mwaha uyo mmawani ni mmamatani mwoothe. Attu nkayaawa onecheshe ikhumelhenlhe,
41005015	vaaphilhe aya wa Yesu, nkayaamwona ntu o mashoka o unanara ulhe. Aari nakhanlhe ni Yesu, nawanre ikuwo ni irusho chawe mmuruni, onkhaye nkayoovacha.
41005016	Attu yoonne nkayaahimiachera akhunanaya yoyo mwaha uyo wa ntu aari ni mashoka o unanara ni ikulhuwe chilhe.
41005017	Nkayanlhepelha Yesu wiira athame yeyo ilhapo aya iyo.
41005018	Yesu vaawelha awe nkalhavani, ntu anlhaminhe awe ikwerere yo mashoka o unanara ulhe ni uyo nkaalhepellha wiira, “Ni mii nkittukaneke.”
41005019	Nansho Yesu nkaankhotelha. Nkamwirelha, “Nhokolhieke uwani mwaahimiachereke amuchi inyu Athithi chinre aya wo uwonelhani ikiriri ni mitheko chiupangenlheni aya.”
41005020	Paahi etu ntu uyo nkaarwa Udekapoli, ahimiachaka chipangelhiye awe ni Yesu. Ni kila ntu eewa nkaashanga chinene.
41005021	Yesu nkaalhapuwa ukhopelhelhe nttiya. Wowo attu enchi nkayaawa umwiiwelhelhani.
41005022	Nkaawa ntu eehaniya Yairo, mmoka aya emelhelha inupa yo unlhapelha Nlhuku, awaaka ni ukhoroma vamietoni wa Yesu
41005023	anlhepelhaka wiira, “Mwaamwanaka nnati ri muukhwani. Chonte nngwe mwa mweeshere miono, alhame akhalhe nkumi!”
41005024	Yesu nkaarwa vamoka ni ayo wowo. Attu enchi nkayanttwara ananrukurenrie uno ni uno.
41005025	Mmoka a attu anttwara yaari opani aawereia ireta yo ukhuma iphome, nchorochoro wo iyaakha khumi ni pilhi,
41005026	akhalhaka anavinre wa anamirete enchi. Wo mahuku menchi yaari muuhuvani, amalhihaka nhakhu waya wonkhaye mmireteni athepaka uhuva.
41005027	Nkeewa mwaha wa Yesu, ni ayo nkayaawa apephenyaka vatulhi vawe,
41005028	echerelhaka munrimani wiira, “Kavarakaru tu ikuwo chawe, kinoolhama.”
41005029	Nkammara mwiinjiro wawe iphome nkayatondova vavawo vavawo, eechonaka wiira aholhama ikwerere aya iyo.
41005030	Yeyo ikatema iyo Yesu nkaachuwelha wiira machiri ahonkhuma, ntu holhamihiya, nkaarukunuwa ni ukoha, “Mpani vanre mwiinjiro aka?”
41005031	Owiittucha awe nkayaamwaakulha, “Uno nnoonaka chinre aya wo uchara attu, nnokohani wiira mpani vanre mwiinjiro winyu?”
41005032	Nansho Yesu nkaathepa umwaavia wo miitho ntu avanre mwiinjiro wawe.
41005033	Wo uchuwelha wiira ahochuwelhiya, opani ayo nkaawa wiichonihani, athukumelhaka, nkaakhoroma, ni uhimiacha ikekhia yonkhaye.
41005034	Yesu nkaamwiirelha, “Mwaamwanaka, nrima ao uhoolhamiha. Urweeke wo mpuha, uhiwereiye tho yeyo ikwerere iyo.”
41005035	Yesu vaari awe arerihaka nenno nlhove nno, nkaawa karumiya aya Nayairo, yayo o weemelhelha inupa yo unlhapelha Nlhuku ayo ni uhimia wiira, “Mwalhi inyu uyo hokhwa. Vano veeshiyani etu uthepa waahuvihacha Owiittuchiha?”
41005036	Yesu khaalhonhe nenno nlhove nno, nkoolhumacha, eerelhaka o weemelhelha inupa yo unlhapelha Nlhuku ayo, “Pishakani nrima, nrumelhelheke. Mwalhi inyu nookhalha nkumi tho.”
41005037	Nkaachiichihacha attu unttwara, yaahikhalhe Napeturo ni Nayakhobo ni ahima aya Nayohana vekha.
41005038	Nkayaaphiyacha uwani wa o weemelhelha inupa yo unlhapelha Nlhuku ayo, nkayaaphwanya ikutto yulhupalhe attu onlhachaka.
41005039	Nkaakelha mpaani ni waakoha, “Mwaatti woonaka nnookhuwelha, nnonlhani? Mwalhi ulha khanakhwa, howiraka urupa!”
41005040	Attu nkayanthiacha, nkeerelha attu onkhaye akhume vathe, aahalhanaka manyanaangoro ni owiittucha awe araru, nkaarwa vaathalhalhiye awe mwalhi uyo.
41005041	Nkanthesha ni umwiirelha, “Talitha khumi.” Ulhamulhiya waya, “Mwalhi nkonkwa.”
41005042	Mwalhi nkeemelha ni uchokholha weeta. Aari nnati o iyaakha khumi ni miilhi. Vaapangia aya chechiyo attu aahanlhe anoomiye uwanoni.
41005043	Nansho Yesu nkaamuka wiira ahihimiache wa ntu, nkeerelha, “Mwalhi uyo avahiye yolhia.”
41006001	Yesu nkaathama wowo, nkahokolhia uwannyawe, attwariyaka ni owiittucha awe.
41006002	Nihuku no Wiittuwa nkaachokholha wiittuchiha wi inupa yo unlhapelha Nlhuku. Attu enchi aari mwommo, veewelhenlhe aya nkayaashangacha ni wiikoha, “Yolha pantte vayi chechilha irusho chilha? Apani anvanhee ikuru yo upanga cho ushangiha chi?
41006003	Ama! Ulha kahiwe phi yolhe nokooroshacha milhako ni ihiche ulhe, mwaana a Amariamu, munnaya ashi Yakhobo ni Nayose ni Nayuda ni Nasimoni? Ashirokorawe kahiwena phi alha ninaakhalhana ihu alha?” Paahi etu nkayankhota.

41006005	Yesu khaapannge cho ushangiha vavawo, ihikalhe yo weeshera miono areta vakani nkaalhamiha.
41006006	Nkaashanga chinene, ukhalhawaya attu khayaari ni nrima. Yesu nkaavira eetakachaka iwani cho vakhiviru, eetuchihaka attu Malhove Orera.

41006008	nkaalhehera wiira, “Vanorwaa inyu nhikushe ittu iriyoothe, nhiwie nrupa mena mashurupu mena nchurukhu vachiroroni, ihikalhe ikopo mmathathani.
41006009	Mmwareke ikwakwata mmietoni, nansho nhikushe mwiinjiro wo nayelhi.”

41006014	Paahi amwene Naherode o Ugalilaya nkayeewa mwaha wonkhaye, ukhalhawaya nchina na Yesu naari niwanelhaka ilhapo yonkhaye. Nkawaakhalha attu akina eera wiira, “Nayohana Obatiiza ahohihimmwa! Phi ayo ari ni ikuru cho upangacha cho ushangiha chi.”
41006015	Ni attu akina eera, “Alha phi Naeliya.” Akhwawe nkayeera, “Ulha phi namilhohi, rii thoko mmoka a anamilhohi o khalhayi.”
41006016	Nansho Naherode veewilhe aya ni ayo nkayeera, “Yalha phi Nayohana Obatiiza, kaahinthe aka alhe! Nansho vano ahohihimmwa!”
41006017	Ukhalhawaya Naherode phi alhehenre uvariya u Nayohana, ni waattuka ujeerani. Naherode enre chiicho wo nlhatu ni Naherodiya, aathenlhe aya, achuwelhaka wiira yaari ahanu a Nafilipo ahima aya Naherode ayo.
41006018	Nayohana ahaamuka Naherode wiira “Vavawo khampannge ittu yo urera ukelha manupa wa ahima inyu!”
41006019	Chiichammo etu, Naherodiya ahorushiya chinene athananaka weeva Nayohana nansho wo uhoria oovaka Naherode.
41006020	Naherode aari oovaka Nayohana, ukhalhawaya ahochuwelha wiira aari ntu ntakatifu, ntu o nrima woombone, paahi etu nkeenanelha. Nkaachivelhiya weewelhelha, nansho uno achukulhaka munrimani wo malhove aahimeriya aya.
41006021	Nkanaawa nihuku Naherodiya vaapantte aya nipesha. Naari nihuku no wuupuwelhiya uyaria u Naherode, vaalhatulhiye aya attu uwa uttapelhelhani. Yaalhatulhiye attu yaavara mitheko chulhupalhe, ni aholhelhi o Ugalilaya.
41006022	Mwaamwanaya Naherodiya mwalhi, ahowa wiina vavawo, nkaatelhiha Naherode vamoka ni alheto aya onkhaye. Wo uteelhiya chinene, Amwene Naherode nkaamwirelha mwalhi uyo, “Unothanana kuuttuveke ishiyani? Uvekelheke ittu iriyoothe unothanana awo kinouvaha.”
41006023	Nkayaalhupelha ni umwiirelha mwalhi uyo, “Kinoulhupelha wiira kinouvaha ittu iriyoothe unovekelha awo, inakhalhaka unvekelha umeelhiya inusu yo imwene aka!”
41006024	Mwalhi uyo nkaarwa wa anumwanawe ni waakoha “Kavekelhekeni?” Nkaamwakhulha, “Muru u Nayohana Obatiiza.”
41006025	Nkaahokolhia wo waakuviaa wa Amwene ni uvekelha, “Kinothanana nkivahe naanano va muru u Nayohana Obatiiza mphacheni!”
41006026	Amwene nkayaakelhiya ihuzuni chinene, nansho wo nlhatu wo ulhupelha waalhupenlhe aya, ni alheto yaakhalhanche vakaraamuni alhe, khayonrie unkhotelha.

41006032	Nkayaawelhacha nkalhavani nkaarwa vakittu vo wiivitha.

41006037	Nansho Yesu nkaakhulha eeraka, “Mwaavaheke yolhia mwaattiva.” Owiittucha ayo nkayaakoha, “Nnothana wiira nirweeke nathumeke yolhia cho idinari imia pilhi?”
41006038	Yesu nkaakohacha, “Nrina mikatte nchani? Nkarwaani mwaweheke.” Vaawenhe aya nkayaakhulha, “Chiri mikatte nthanu ni ihopa pilhi.”
41006039	Yesu nkaalhehera owiittucha awe tho wiira aanyulhacheke attu onkhaye ni waakhalhiha vathi vamanyashini.
41006040	Attu nkaakhalhihiya mmapuroni, va imia imoka, akina mapuro a attu makhumi nthanu.
41006041	Yesu nkaakusha mikatte nthanu ni ihopa pilhi chiyo, nkaaweha miitho wiirimu ni unlhapelhelha Nlhuku. Nkaamianihacha ni waavaha owiittucha awe wiira yaakawelhacheke attu. Ni ihopa pilhi chiyo nkeera chiicho.
41006042	Attu onkhaye nkayaalhia ni uwona.
41006043	Paahi owiittucha nkayaarokottacha mahalhahalha o mikatte ni ihopa alhe, nkaakushacha ni uchariha makaya khumi ni melhi.

41006046	Vaamanlhe awe waalheha attu nkaawelha umwaakoni ulhapelhani.
41006047	Vaari aya uchechilho, ikalhava yaari variyari nttiya, ni Yesu aari vekha awe hinalhapuwa.
41006048	Nkoona wiira owiittucha awe yaari athemwihiyaka ni iphioo, paahi vaatameria aya mapikoosha nkaawa, eetaka vachulhu maashi. Aari aatameriaka waaphwanya,
41006049	vaamwona aya eetaka vachulhu maashi, nkayaanyihera wiira aari “Nshoka!” Nkayaakhuwelhacha.
41006050	Onkhaye yaari yoovaka chinene vaamwonne aya. Yesu nkoolhumacha eeraka, “Nvareke nrima! Phi mii Nhoove!”
41006051	Nkaawelha nkalhavani, iphioo nkayaamaalha. Owiittucha ayo aari anoomiye uwanoni,
41006052	ukhalhawaya aari bado ahinachuwelhacha mwaha wo mikatte nthanu waalhiha attu maelufu nthanu. Mirima chaya chaari chihinachuwelha.
41006053	Nkayaalhapuwa nttiya ni uphiya ilhapo yo Ugenesareti, veemenshe aya ikalhava.
41006054	Attu nkayanchuwelha Yesu vaakhuruwa awe nkalhavani.
41006055	Nkayaarwaa ilhapo yonkhaye iyo, kila eewa wiira howa, nkaawiha areta aari mmalhilhini ni waarweha wowo.
41006056	Nkaaviravira mmamatani ni mmawani mwonkhaye aalhamihaka attu aathalhelhiye mmapuwani mwaavira awe, akina anlhepelhaka inakhalhaka ammare ikuwo chawe, ni ayo ammanre onkhaye aholhama.
41007001	Amafarisayo akina ni owiittuchiha Malhehero yaakhumme Uyerusalemu nkayaathukumana wa Yesu.
41007002	Nkayoona wiira owiittucha awe aalhia wo uhinyawa mathatha thoko cheera aya Amafarisayo wo weetuchiha attu.
41007003	Ukhalhawaya Amafarisayo, ni Ayahudi onkhaye yaari avaraka ikano yeetuchihiye ni ashulhupalhe aya, yo uhilhia mpaka anyaweke mathatha rata thoko,
41007004	mena khayoria ulhia ittu ithumiye unopangiya maronda wo uhihapihiya kaye. Ni vavawo yaari attwaraka ikano chikina chaahiye ni manyaapwiiya aya cho uhapiha ikahi ni chittu cho uterekelha chikooroshiye wo ishaba.
41007005	Paahi etu Amafarisayo ni owiittuchiha Malhehero a ashinna Musa nkayankoha Yesu wiira, “Veeshiyani owiittucha inyu khanottwara ikano cha ashulhupalhe, ni ulhia wo uhinyawa mathatha rata thoko chaalheheriye?”
41007006	Yesu nkaakhulha, “Mwa anafiki inyu, ashinna Isaya ahoolhumacha rata thoko chilhepilhe aya wiira, ‘Nlhuku hohimia, anokithimicha wo malhove aya, Nansho mirima chaya chiri utayi ni mii.
41007007	Ukithimicha waya khunlhoka, Ukhalhawaya aneetuchiha malheheriyo o mwaattuniru, Thoko aneetuchiha malhehero a Nlhuku!’ ”
41007008	“Mwaatti nhohiya malhehero a Nlhuku ni uvara ikano cha attu.”
41007009	Yesu nkaathepa wiira, “Mwaatti nhanaa irusho chinene cho urukunusha malheheriyo a Nlhuku ni uttwara meettuchiho inyu mwaashinene.
41007010	Ukhalhawaya ashinna Musa aheera wiira ‘Mwaathimicheke athumwaninyu ni anumwaninyu, ni ntu riyoothe naaruwana athumwanawe ama anumwanawe yoyo nambaya eeviye.’
41007011	Nansho mwaattiva nneetuchiha wiira yakhalhaka ntu hanaa ittu yo waavaha athumwanawe ama anumwanawe uno ehanaka yeyo ikorobani, maana aya izawadi ya Nlhuku,
41007012	yeyo khinolholka tho uvahiya athumwanawe ama anumwanawe.
41007013	Chiichammo etu, phi norukunusha inyu nlhove na Nlhuku wo chittu chinchi thoko chii nnopangacha inyu chi.”
41007014	Yesu nkeehanacha milhoko cha attu eerelhaka, “Nkakiiwelhelheni mwaattiva, ni uchuwelha.
41007015	Khiiwo ittu inonkelha ntu mwiiruttuni mwawe inonnanariha. Nansho ittu inokhuma munrimani phi no nnanariha ntu.
41007016	Ri ni maaru, eeweeke!”

41010030	nowa ulhiviya imara imia ikatema yo naanano ilha. Mamia menchi upwaha inupa, manyaarokorawe ni manyaonnawe ni anumwanawe ni ashaana ni imata ni uhuva, ikatema inowa nowa upochera ukumi wo uhimalha.
41010031	Nansho attu anoholhelha vano anowa ukhalha utulhi, ni ayo ari vatulhi vano anowa uholhelha.”
41010032	Yesu ni owiittucha awe yaari munkwahani arwaaka Uyerusalemu. Yesu mwanene aari naholhenlhe, owiittucha awe yaari yoovaka, vamoka ni attu onkhaye aattukanne aya yaari yoovaka. Yesu nkaawiacha tho untemerani uchereshere khumi ni elhi alhe, uwaahimeriani mwaha wo chittu chinohalha unkhumelhelha.
41010033	Yesu nkeerelhacha, “Mwiiwelhelheke mwaatti, nna vano ninokelha Uyerusalemu ni uwo Mwaana a Ntu nokoohelhiya mmathathani mwa attu opochera ishaani olhupalhe ni owiittuchiha Malhehero, ni ayo anowa unhukumulha wiira eeviye arweehiyaka wa attu ahiri Ayahudi,
41010034	anohalha untikulhacha ni unshuwelha ishenye ni umwaata ikopo ni umwiiva, nansho nihuku no neraru noohihimmwa.”
41010035	Nayakhobo ni Nayohana ashaana a Nazebedayo yahonrwelha Yesu ni umwiirelha, “Owiittuchiha, ninolhepelha nnipangelhe ittu ninothanana ihu.”

41010038	Yesu nkaahimia “Kinoona wiira mwaattiva khanchuwenlhe ittu inolhepelha inyu. Nnoworia mwaattiva uwureria ikikombe kinohalha aka uwureria mii? Ama nnoworia ubatiiziya ubatiizo kinohalha aka ubatiiziya mii?”
41010039	Nkayaamwaakhulha, “Eiyo ninoworia.” Yesu nkaahimia wiira, “Eiyo nnoworiaa uwureria ikikombe inohalha aka uwureria ni ubatiiziya thoko kinohalha aka ubatiiziya mii.
41010040	Nansho mwaha wa apani akhalhe wiimonono ama wiimushi, yoyo khuri mmathathani mwaka. Nlhuku phi nohalha waavaha yayo mapuro ayo attu athanlhiye.”
41010041	Owiittucha akina khumi alhe veewilhe aya, nkayaarushiya nkayaathunalhelha Nayakhobo ni Nayohana.
41010042	Yesu nkeehanacha onkhaye ni waahimeria wiira, “Nhochuwelha wiira attu anaatawara attu ahiri Ayahudi wo machiri ni aholhelhi aya ahanaa ikuru wa attu anaatawara aya.
41010043	Nansho uwaninyu mwaattiva ihikhalhe chiicho, namitheko nothanana ukhalha mulhupalhe inyu yoyo apachereke thoko ukhalha namitheko a ashikhunanawe.

41010045	Ukhalhawaya Mwaana a Ntu khaawilhe awe aapangelhiya mitheko, aawiilhe ukavihera ni ukumiha ukumi awe woopolha attu enchi.”
41010046	Nkayaaphiya Uyeriko, ni vavawo Yesu vaathama awe vamoka ni owiittucha awe ni nlhoko wa attu uttwaraka, ntu mmoka ohoona aakhalha avekelhaka, mwaana a Natimayo ehaniya Batimayo aari nakhanlhe vachereshere iphiro.

41010049	Yesu nkeemelha ni wiira, “Nkamwiihaneni.” Nkeehaniya eerelhiyaka, “Uvareke nrima! Wunkweke, howiihana.”
41010050	Nkaariha mwiinjiro awe nkaaathupulhuwa ni urwaa wa Yesu.
41010051	Yesu nkankoha, “Unothanana kuupangelheke ittu yaani?” Batimayo nkaakhulha, “Owiittuchiha kinolhepelha wiira koone.”
41010052	Yesu nkaamwirelha, “Urweeke, nrima ao uhoolhamiha.” Yeyo ikatema nkaalhama ni uweha nkanttwara Yesu mwaavira awe.
41011001	Vaatameria aya Uyerusalemu, ahophiya iwani cho Ubetifage ni Ubethaniya, nkayaarwaacha waatamana Mwaako wo Mizeituni. Vavawo Yesu nkaaruma owiittucha awe elhi uholhelha
41011002	aalheheraka wiira, “Rwaakani yeyo iwani iri uholho iyo. Wowo nnokomphwanya mwaaphuta nattukelhelhiye hineetihiya ni ntu. Mwanthaphulheke ni ummwiiha vaa.
41011003	Ntu riyoothe okohakani ‘nlhatu waani’ mwaakhulheke wiira, ‘Athithi phi nonthanana, anonhokolhosha chitema.’ ”
41011004	Nkayaarwaa ni umphwanya mwaaphuta nattukelhelhiye vanlhakoni. Vanthaphulha aya
41011005	ashinene nkayaakohacha, “Chani woonaka nnothaphulha mwaaphuta uyo?”
41011006	Ni ayo nkayaakhulha eeraka thoko cheetuchihiye aya ni Yesu, ashinene ayo, nkayaahiyera.
41011007	Nkayanrwehelha Yesu mwaaphuta uyo, nkayaathalhacha ikuwo chaya vanthanani uno Yesu akhalhaka vachulhu vawo.
41011008	Attu enchi, nkayaathalhacha ikuwo mphironi akina athalhaka maphumbulhu o miri yaatupunlhanche aya mmamatani ni waathalhacha mphironi mwaavira awe.
41011009	Attu aaholhenlhe ni alhe aattwara utulhi nkayaakhuwelha eeraka, “Hosana, atotopelhiye uyo nowa wo nchina na Athithi uyo!
41011010	Uvahiye ibarakha umwene unowehereriya wa athumwanihu Amwene Adaudi, Atotopelhiye Nlhuku wiirimu!”
41011011	Yesu nkaaphiya Uyerusalemu, nkaarwa mpaka Inupa ya Nlhuku, nkaawehaweha chittu chonkhaye. Nansho ukhalhawaya waheelha, nkaarwa Ubethaniya vamoka ni owiittucha awe khumi ni elhi.
41011012	Nihuku no nayelhi, vaakhuma aya Ubethaniya, Yesu aari nawolhiye ithalha.
41011013	Nkoona utayi mwiri wo ntini unaphuwilhe, nkaachushera awehe yakhalhaka uhemma arukulhe ittini alhie. Nansho aphiyeke khoonne ittu ahikhalhe mathaakhururu, ukhalhawaya waari uhinemma.
41011014	Yesu nkaalhava mwiri wo ntiini uyo eeraka, “Khaawo ntu nohalha ulhia ittini chinyu tho mahuku onkhaye!” Owiittucha awe nkayeewa voolhumacha awe.
41011015	Vaaphilhe aya Uyerusalemu, Yesu nkaarwa u Inupa ya Nlhuku yulhupalhe, nkoomolhelha vathe attu onkhaye yaathumiha chittu ni ayo yaathuma. Nkaapitingushacha imeza cha attu yaakakanihana nchurukhu, ni ihiche cha attu othumiha ikhunda,
41011016	ahinhiyereraka ntu riyoothe ukusha ittu u Inupa ya Nlhuku mmo.
41011017	Yamalhekeru, nkaachokholha weettuchiha attu, “Malhove Matakatifu aneera, Nlhuku hohimia wiira, ‘Inupa aka inowa wiihaniya inupa yo ulhapelha ya attu o makosho onkhaye.’ Nansho mwaattiva nhorukunusha ni upanga nikhuku no attu o uvara makhuche!”
41011018	Opochera ishaani olhupalhe ni owiittuchiha Malhehero veewilhe aya, nkayaachokholhacha waavia iphiro yo umwiivelha Yesu. Nansho yaari amwoovaka, ukhalhawaya milhoko chonkhaye cha attu chaahanlhe muushangani wo meettuchiho awe.
41011019	Uchechilho, Yesu ni owiittucha awe nkayaathamacha vawani vawo.
41011020	Wichishuru, vaari aya aviraka mphironi, nkayoona mwiri wo ntiini. Waari unoomilhe uchulhu mpaka vanteponi.
41011021	Napeturo nkayoopuwelha ni umwiirelha Yesu, “Owiittuchiha mwooneke! Mwiri wo ntiini waalhanve inyu ulhe uhooma!”
41011022	Yesu nkaakhulha eeraka, “Mpisheke nrima, munkhulhuvelheke Nlhuku.
41011023	Kinouhimeriani wo ikekhiaye wiira ntu erelhaka ulha mwaako ulha uthame waatitiminre ubaharini, wo nrima wo uhiri ni nipampa, wiira inowooria, inowooriacha.
41011024	Paahi etu kinouhimeriani wiira, vanolhapelha inyu ni uvekelha chittu chiri choothe, nrumelhelheke wiira nnoopochera, ni inyu nnoovahiya.
41011025	Vaneemelha inyu ulhapelha, nchokholheke thoko uhiyerera milhatu cha attu ottekenlheni ni Athumwaninyu ari wiirimu anouhiyererani milhatu chinyu.
41011026	Nansho mwaahahiyerereke akina milhatu chaya, Athumwaninyu o wiirimu khanouhiyererani ni inyu uwonya winyu.”
41011027	Nkayaawa tho Uyerusalemu. Yesu veetakacha awe Inupa ya Nlhuku, opochera ishaani olhupalhe ni owiittuchiha Malhehero ni ashulhupalhe nkayanrwelha
41011028	nkayankoha yeeraka, “Nrina ikuru yaani yo upanga chilha chinopanga inyu chilha? Apani ovanheni ikuru yo upangacha?”
41011029	Yesu nkaakhulha eeraka, “Kinoukohani ittu imoka, mwakaakhulhaka, kinouhimeriani kinopanga chi wo ikuru yaani.
41011030	Nkihimerieke, ikuru yaapanga aya Nayohana, yo waabatiiza attu, yaakhumme uyi, yaakhumme wa Nlhuku wiirimu ama wa attu?”
41011031	Nkayaachokholha ukohanacha ashineneru, “Nimwaakhulheke chani? Neeraka wiira ‘yaakhumme wa Nlhuku wiirimu’ noonikoha woonaka mwaattiva khamwaarumelhelha Nayohana ayo?
41011032	Ni vavawo wo ikekhiaye neeraka, ‘Yaakhumme wa attuni.’ ” Nkayoova attu, ukhalhawaya attu onkhaye aachuwelha wiira Nayohana aari anamilhohi.
41011033	Paahi etu nkayaamwaakhulha Yesu wiira, “Hii khanichuwenlhe.” Yesu nkeera, “Ni mii akinouhimeriani kinopanga chi wo ikuru yo ukhuma uuyi.”
41012001	Paahi etu Yesu nkoolhumana wo malhikaaniho, “Ahaawo ntu aalhimme imata yo zabibu, nkaarukureriha ukucho, nkaathipa nlhikiti no waamelha izabibu ni ishanja yo ulhitelhelha imata. Nkaashimiha imata awe iyo anamalhima, nkaarwa nkwaha wo utayi.
41012002	Nlhaalha wo utokotta izabibu waayilhe aya, nkanruma karumiya arwee apochere mahalha.
41012003	Anamalhima alhe nkayammara karumiya uyo, nkayaamwata, nkayanhokolhosha mathatharu.
41012004	Nkanruma tho karumiya nkina, anamalhima nkayaamwata mmuruni ni umpangelhacha chittu cho wulhiha muru.
41012005	Anene imata nkayanruma karumiya nkina, nkeeviya, ni akina enchi yaarumiye aapangelhiya thoko chiicho, akina waatiya ni wiivakachiya akina.
41012006	Ntu mmoka aari hinarumiya aari mwaamwanaya onnyara anttuna aya chinene. Nkanruma ni uyo eecherelhaka wiira, ‘Kinoona wiira anokonlhoha mwaamwanaka kinonttuna aka ulha.’
41012007	Nansho yamwooneke, anamalhima nkayaahimerianacha ashineneru, ‘Ulha vano phi mwaamwanaya anene imata. Nngwe nimwive, ni nhakhu ulha ukhalheke wawihu!’
41012008	Paahi etu nkayammara ni umwiiva ni unrihelha uchereshere ukucho wo imata yo zabibu.”
41012009	Yesu nkaakoha, “Vano mwanene imata yo zabibu ulhe nohalha wiira chani? Nowa weeva anamalhima onkhaye ni waashimiha imata awe iyo attu akina.
41012010	Nhoshoma Malhove Matakatifu wiira, ‘Nlhuku nikhotiye ni atheki wiira khaninlhoka, nihothathuwa ukhalha vano no nsingi no vakhoonani.
41012011	Athithi anene phi pannge, chi chinooshangihani chi!’ ”
41012012	Aholhelhi a Ayahudi nkayaalhikacha ummara Yesu, ukhalhawaya yaari achuwelhaka wiira nenno nlhikaaniho nno naari naachaka. Nansho nkayoova attu. Nkayanhiya arwee.
41012013	Amafarisayo akina ni attu o nlhoko wa Naherode nkayaarumiya urwaa unriaa Yesu wo unkoha chookohiya.
41012014	Nkayaawa ni unkoha, “Owiittuchiha, nihochuwelha wiira inyu nri mu uhimiani ikeekhene, wo uhimwoova ntu. Khannonlhoha ntu chinre awe, nansho chineetuchiha inyu chiri cho ikekhia ya Nlhuku. Nnihimerieke etu, chani vahorera waalhiva Nakaisari ikhodi? Naalhiveke ama nihaalhive?”
41012015	Nansho Yesu ahochuwelha yoyo unafiki uyo nkaakhulha eeraka, “Veeshiyani ukiriaa? Kivahekeni etu nikobilhi nno koone.”
41012016	Nkayammaha nikhobilhi nimoka, ni uyo nkaakoha, “Ilha ikhove ilha, ni nna nchina nna niri na apani?” Nkayaakhulhacha wiira, “Chi Nakaisari.”
41012017	Yesu nkaahimia tho wiira, “Mwaalhiveke Nakaisari iri ya Nakaisari ni ummaha Nlhuku iri ya Nlhuku.” Nkayaanshanga Yesu.
41012018	Attu akina munkutirani mwa Amasadukayo, aavanyiha wiira khuuwo uhihimmwa, nkayaawacha wa Yesu unkohani, nkayeera,
41012019	“Owiittuchiha, ashinna Musa aholhepa anihimeriaka wiira, ‘Ntu arimeelhaka aahiyaka amwarawe ahinayara, ahima awe anowooria ukelha manupa ni waayarelha ashaana arimeelhe ayo.’
41012020	Yakhalhaka yaari ashilhoko saba, olhupalhe ayo ahothelha nkaakhwa wo uhaahiya ashaana.
41012021	O nayelhi ayo ni ayo chiicho, nkaakhwa wo uhaahiya ashaana. Ni o neraru chiicho,
41012022	ni akina aahalhenlhe ayo, onkhaye saba akelhaka manupa ni ukhwa wo uhahiya ashaana. Wo umalhihera, athiyana ayo nkayaakhwa.
41012023	Vano etu, nihuku no uhihimushiya attu akhwilhe nno, mpani nohalha ukhalha phi owannyaya athiyana alhe? Ukhalhawaya onkhaye saba ahaathelha.”
41012024	Yesu nkaakhulha eeraka wiira, “Nhowonya mwaattiva ayi! Nchuwelhaka wo nlhatu wani? Ukhalhawaya khanchuwenlhe Malhove Matakatifu ama machiri a Nlhuku.
41012025	Ukhalhawaya attu akhwilhe vanohalha aya uhihimushiya khanowa aathelha ama uthelhiya, onohalha ukhalha thoko minepa o wiirimu.
41012026	Vano vavawo, wo uhihimmwa attu mwaattiva khannaye ushoma Malhove Matakatifu a ashinna Musa nlhako unhimiacha mwaha wo ithuphi yaapharelha mooro? Iholhepiya vavawo, Nlhuku aheerelha ashinna Musa wiira, ‘Mii phi Nlhuku a Aburahimu ni Naisaka ni Nayakhobo.’
41012027	Paahi ri Nlhuku a attu akumi, kahiwe akhwilhe. Mwaattiva onkhaye nhopotera chinene!”
41012028	Owiittuchiha Malhehero amoka aari vavawo eewelhelhaka. Nkoona wiira Yesu ahaakhulha Asadukayo ayo nlhove noolhoka, ni uyo nkaawa ankohaka Yesu eeraka, “Nlheheriyo naani niri nulhupalhe upwaha nikina?”
41012029	Yesu nkaakhulha, “Nooholhelha phi nna, ‘Nkeewani inyu Naisraeli! Apwiiya Nlhuku phi Nlhuku Athithi ari vekha!
41012030	Mwaattune Athithi Nlhuku inyu wo nrima inyu wonkhaye ni wo nnepa winyu wonkhaye ni wo irusho chinyu chonkhaye ni wo machiri inyu onkhaye.’
41012031	No nayelhi phi nna, ‘Mwaattuneke amwaatamana inyu thoko chineettuna inyu mwaanene.’ Khaawo malheheriyo makina ari molhupalhe tho upwaha alha melhi alha.”
41012032	Owiittuchiha Malhehero ulhe, nkeera, “Nhomanya, Owiittuchiha! Nhohimia ikeekhene wiira Apwiiya Nlhuku phi yayo ari vekha, khaawo nkina olhupalhe ahikhalhe yayo.
41012033	Ni kila ntu hothananiya waattuna wo nrima wawe wonkhaye ni wo irusho chawe chonkhaye ni wo machiri awe onkhaye, ni waattuna amwaatamana aya thoko chineettuna aya ashinene, ilhokaka upwaha wo ukumiha isadaka cha ashinama ni isadaka chikina wa Nlhuku.”
41012034	Yesu nkoona wiira yayo owiittuchiha ayo ahaakhulha rata, nkaahimeria wiira, “Khanrii utayi ni Imwene ya Nlhuku.” Wo umalhihera vavawo, khaawo tho ntu ankohakonhe Yesu chookohiya chikina.
41012035	Yesu vaari awe eetuchihaka Inupa ya Nlhuku, nkaakoha, “Woonaka owiittuchiha Malhehero anohimiechesha wiira Kuristo Moopolhi nohalha ukhalha mwaana a Adaudi?
41012036	Adaudi anene wo uholhelhiya ni Iphumu ya Nlhuku aheera, ‘Athithi ahaahimeria Athithi, Nkakhalhani wiimonono waka Mpaka nihuku vanohalha aka waathalha amalhaponi inyu wuuthi inyaa chinyu wiira mwaanyikalhelhe.’
41012037	“Adaudi anene anehana yayo ‘Athithi.’ Chommo nlhatu wani Kuristo Moopolhi ukhalha mwaana a Adaudi?” Attu enchi aari amwiwelhelhaka Yesu ateelhiyaka nrima.
41012038	Yesu veettuchiha awe nkeera, nkaahimia tho eeraka, “Mwiichinanelheke ni Owiittuchiha Malhehero anoviravira anawerenlhe miinjiro cho utalhiva achivelhiyaka ukohachiya wo nthimicho vakittu vanopangachiya maronda,
41012039	ateelhiyaka ukhalha mapuro o miholho, mmanupani mwo unlhapelha Nlhuku ni vakittu vanokumaana aya attu.
41012040	Anowaathurulhacha anankhwelhi chittu mmanupani mwaya, eepangaka attu o ulhapelha wo uhoochaa. Nihuku ni uhukumulhiya anowa utwarushiya wo uweria chinene!”
41012041	Yesu aari nakhanlhe vachereshere iphache yo uhelhiya isadaka wi Inupa ya Nlhuku, nkoona attu cheera aya wo ukumiha isadaka chaya. Attu o nhakhu enchi aakumiha nchurukhu mwinchi.
41012042	Paahi vavawo nkaawa anankhwelhi amoka ahirina ittu, nkaakumiha isenti pilhi.
41012043	Yesu nkeehanacha owiittucha awe ni uwerelha, “Kinouhimeriani wo ikekhiaye wiira, alha anankhwelhi ashikini alha ahohelha mphacheni isadaka yinchi waapwaha attu onkhaye akumihilhe mu.
41012044	Ukhalhawaya attu akhwawe ayo akuminhe chithempe munhakhuni mwaya, nansho alha apwiyawe ashikini alha, akuminhe chonkhaye chaakhulhuvelha aya ulhama.”
41013001	Yesu vaakhuma awe Inupa ya Nlhuku, owiittucha mmoka nkeera, “Owiittuchiha! Nkoonani inupa chi ni malhuku athekelhiye chinre aya worera chiyo!”
41013002	Yesu nkaamwakhulha, eeraka, “Nnowoona chi inupa chulhupalhe chi? Khaniwo nlhuku ninottuna uhalha vaa, kila ittu inowa uphomolhiya.”
41013003	Yesu aari nakanlhe vachulhu Mwaako wo Mizeituni, miitho anari awehaka Inupa ya Nlhuku, Napeturo ni Nayakhobo ni Nayohana ni Naandorea nkayaawacha unkoha wo ntemera.
41013004	“Nkanihimerieni yoyo mwaha uyo unohalha ukhalha iyaakhani? Ni ithikineha chani chinohalha unichuwelhiha wiira uhaatameria?”
41013005	Yesu nkaahimiachera eeraka, “Mwiishungeke nhiwe mwaathepiachiya ni ntu.
41013006	Anoowa attu enchi aromolhachaka nchina naka eepangaka, Phi mii! Aapoterihaka attu enchi.
41013007	Vanottuna inyu wiiwa mwaha wo ikhoto chinaatakaniya vakhiviru ni cho utayi nhithemwe. Chonkhaye chiyo chinowa upangia, nansho ihikhalhaka umalha wo ilhapo.
41013008	Makosho anowa waatakana, imwene ni imwene ikina. Ilhapo inowa utikhinyachiya mwonkhaye, attu akelhiyaka ni ikuruna yo woopiha. Chonkhaye chiyo chinowa uholhelha thoko chinera aya nkuri vanoyariaa awe mwaana.
41013009	“Nansho mwaattiva nthepeke ukhalha mwiishungaka. Ukhalhawaya nnoowa mwaavariya ni urweehiya umilhatuni. Nnowa waatakachiya mu inupa cho unlhapelha Nlhuku, nnowa weemeshiya wa attu o utawara ni wo mamwene wo nlhatu waka ni uhimiechesha Malhove Orera.
41013010	Nansho umalha uhinaaya, Malhove Orera anowa wiittuchihiya wa makosho onkhaye.
41013011	Ni vawo vanottuna inyu uvariya ni urweehiya umilhatuni vawo, nhiwe mwoova wiira nnottuna wulhumachani, mmweeke mwolhumacha iriyoothe ivahiye inyu. Ukhalhawaya malhove ayo khanowa ukhalha awinyu, anottuna wuulhumachiya ni Iphumu ya Nlhuku.
41013012	Attu anowa waathumiha achihimaya eeviye, manyanaangoro anowa waathumiha achishaana aya. Ashaana ni ayo anowa waathumiha manyanaangoro ni uweeva.
41013013	Attu onkhaye anowa uuvengani wo nlhatu waka. Nansho nohalha uvilhelha wo uhoochaa nowa woopolhiya.
41013014	“Nnowa woona ‘Nrusho no utanganya’ ninemenlhe vamapuroni vatakatifu.” Noshoma achuwelheke chinohimiya! “Vavawo arii Uyudea attawelheke umiakoni.
41013015	Ntu ri vachulhu nchaara no inupa awe, hikhuruwe vathi uukushani ittu.
41013016	Ntu ri umatani hihokolhie uwani uukushani ikuwo awe.
41013017	Ahothapana manyopani ari ni iweyi ni alhe anaamwiha ashaana yayo mahuku ayo!
41013018	Munlhapelheke Nlhuku wiira yayo mahuku ayo ahiwe nlhaalha wo uririya!
41013019	Ukhalhawaya uhuva waya unowa uweria chinene vahinapacha woonia toka Nlhuku voopilhe awe ilhapo mpaka nna. Mena khanowa upangia tho.
41013020	Nansho Athithi ahokuwukulha yayo mahuku ayo, ihikaari chiicho, khaawo ntu akoopolhiye. Ilha inottuna upangia wo woonelha ikiriri attu athanlhiye, phi chiichammo etu mahuku ayo ahowukulhiya.
41013021	“Ni vavawo awaakaru ntu eeraka, ‘Mwooneke, Kuristo ri va!’ Ama ‘Mwooneke rii valhe!’ Nhinrumelhelhe.
41013022	Ukhalhawaya ashi kuristo o woothacha ni anamilhohi o woothacha enchi anowa woonia. Anowa upanga cho ushangiha ni ithikineha chinchi wo waapoteriha ata attu athanlhiye ni Nlhuku, yooriaaka.
41013023	Nhiittialhe! Kihouhimeriani chi chittu chonkhaye chi mahuku ahinaya uphiya.
41013024	“Paahi etu, umalha wo yayo mahuku o uhuva ayo, nchuwa ninowa uhelhiya ipiphi, ni mweeri khunowa waapharelha.
41013025	Ittotwa chinowa umora ni machiri o wiirimu anowa utikhinyia.
41013026	Vavawo Mwaana a Ntu nowa woonia, awaaka mmahuteni wo ikuru ni nthimicho.

41016012	Katashi miholho, Yesu nkaakhumelhelha owiittucha elhi awe ooniaka wo ikhove ikina vaari aya akelhaka iwani cho mmamatani.
41016013	Nkayaahokolhia ni waahimeria akhunanaya, nansho ni ayo khayaarumelhenlhe.
41016014	Kaanyuma Yesu nkaakhumelhelha owiittucha awe khumi ni mmoka vaalhia aya yolhia. Nkaachacheracha chinene wo nlhatu no ulhipa mirima, ukhalhawaya aari ahirumelhelhaka malhove a attu ankumanne vaahihimmwe awe.
41016015	Paahi nkeerelha onkhaye wiira, “Nrweeke velhaponi vonkhaye mwahimiacheke Malhove Orera wa attu onkhaye.

41016017	Attu anohalha urumelhelha ayo anovaahiya ikuru yo upangacha ithikineha, wo nchina naka anowa woomolha mashoka o unanara, ni wulhumacha nulhumo nilheto,
41016018	avaraka inwaa, ama awuriaka ittu iriyoothe yo uhapalha, khinowa yaahapalha. Anoweeshera areta miono ni ureta uyo unowaahiya, anoolhama.”
41016019	Paahi etu, Athithi Yesu vaamalhinhe aya wulhumacha ni owiittucha aya ayo, ahokushiya wiirimu, ukhanlhe aya wiimonono wa Nlhuku.
41016020	Owiittucha aya nkayaarwaacha ahimiachaka Malhove Orera ilhapo chonkhaye, Athithi nkaatamana vamoka aavahaka ikuru wo mitheko chonkhaye wo ukhomaalhiha malhove aarwaa vamoka ni mitheko cho ushangiha chaapangiya.
42001001	Munna nnottuniya Nateofilo, Attu enchi aholhepa rata mwaha waapangeelhe variyari ihu.
42001002	Aalhempe thoko chenre ihu wo weewa attu yoonechenshe ni anamitheko o nenno nlhove nno toka machokholhelho aya.
42001003	Paahi etu, Munna Nateofilo, ukhalhawaya kihowehaweha wo ikekhiaye chittu chonkhaye rata chene toka khalhayi, kihoona vahorera etu ulhepa wo nlhatu winyu,
42001004	ni inyu nchuwelhe mwaanene ikeekhene yiituchihiye inyu.
42001005	Naherode vaari aya amwene o Uyudea, ahawo anamilhohi eehaniya Azakariya, o nlhoko wa opochera ishaani eehaniya Naabiya. Ahanu aya Azakariya eehaniya Naelisabeti, o nihimo na anamilhohi Naharuni.
42001006	Onkhaye elhi ayo aari attu aapanga chittu cho ikekhiaye mmiholho wa Nlhuku, attwaraka iphiro cho malhehero ni ikano cha Athithi wo uhikhalha ni nlhatu wo ukhuwachiya.
42001007	Nansho yaari ahirina ashaana ukhalhawaya Naelisabeti yaari o uhiyara, ni ayo onkhaye ayo aari anoolhuvanlhe chinene.

42001009	Yaari vaathanlhiye aya thoko chaari aya chipangiyaka ni opochera ishaani, urwaa uutusherani ubani umadhubahuni. Paahi etu nkayaarwaa u Inupa ya Athithi.
42001010	Attu akina yaari vathe awehereraka anlhapelhaka Nlhuku ubani vaatusheriya aya.

42001014	Kihochuwelha wiira nnowa mwaateelhiya chinene, ni attu enchi akina anowa uteelhiya chiicho vanohalha awe uyaria!

42001020	Nansho ukhalhawaya khanrumelhenlhe nttenga aka, unowa utimira waayaka. Wo yoyo nlhatu uyo etu, nnottukiya malhaku inyu, nnookhalha chiicho wo uhulhumacha mpaka nihuku vanohalha aya utimira malheheriyo aka alha.”
42001021	Yeyo ikatema iyo attu yaari yaawehereraka Azakariya uno ashangaka chani woonaka ahothepa ulhokelha chinene u Inupa ya Nlhuku mmo.
42001022	Vaakhumme aya vathe, khooria wulhumacha, paahi attu nkayaachuwelha wiira ahoona ithikineha vaari aya u Inupa ya Nlhuku. Yaari athoonyaka wo mathatha.

42002013	Wo uhipicha nlhoko mulhupalhe wo minepa o wiirimu nkawaawa vamoka ni nnepa ulhe, chiipaka ichipo cho untotopelha Nlhuku.

42002016	Paahi etu nkayaakuviacha ni waaphwanya Amariamu ni Nayusufu ni umwoona mwaana naathalhelhiye nhiilhini.

42002021	Yavireke mahuku nane, vaayilhe aya ikatema yo wiinelhiya unyawo mwaana, nkaavahiya nchina nawe Yesu, nchina naakumihiye ni nnepa wo wiirimu hinaya urupalhiya.

42002031	nkoronshe inyu wooniye ni attu inyu onkhaye,

42002035	chiicho wuupuwelha wa attu enchi unowa uchuwania. Ni inyu mwaanene nnowa ukelhiya ihuzuni yo uweria thoko uphanga wo wiithia, inoohomani munrimani.”
42002036	Ahokhalha anamilhohi anankhwelhi o wulhuvalha, eehaniya Ana abiti Fanueli o nikosho ni Naasheri. Aakhanlhe ni owannyaya iyaakha saba tu.
42002037	Aari o wulhuvalha, aaphiya iyaakha makhumi nane ni ncheshe, ni mahuku onkhaye yaari alhokelhaka wi Inupa ya Nlhuku uthana ni uhiyu, anthimichaka Nlhuku, attukaka ni unlhapelha.

42002044	yaari aanyiheraka wiira aari munkwahani mmo, paahi etu nkayeeta nkwaha wo nihuku phi yaachokhonlhe aya umwaavia mwaashilhoko aya ni manyampwana aya.

42002048	Manyanaangoro nkayoomiya uwanoni vaamwonne aya, ni anumwanawe nkayeera, “Mwaamwanaka, nlhatu waani wo upanga chiicho? Athumwana ni mii naari nuwaaviaka ninashannge.”
42002049	Nkaakhulha, “Mwaakavierani? Khamwaachuwenlhe wiira ihokiphwanelha ukhalha nnupani mwa Athithi?”

42002051	Paahi etu Yesu nkahokolhia Unazareti vamoka ni manyanaangoro awe, nkeewelhelha ni wiitimarikha. Anumwanawe nkayaashunga mwaha wonkhaye uyo munrimani mwaya.
42002052	Yesu nkonnuwa nchusha ni ukhalha o irusho, athepaka uttuniya ni Nlhuku vamoka ni attu.
42003001	Iyaakha yo khumi ni nthanu yo utawara wa Nakaisari Natiberiyo, Apontio Pilato phi aari aatawara ilhapo yo Uyudea, Naherode aari atawaraka Ugalilaya ni ahima aya Nafilipo yaari atawaraka ilhapo cho Uturea ni Utrikoni. Alusaniya aatawara Uabileni,
42003002	Ashinna Anasi ni Nakayafa phi yaari Opochera Ishaani Olhupalhe. Yayo mahuku ayo Nlhove na Nlhuku nkanaakhuruwelha Nayohana mwaana a Azakariya uthakoni.
42003003	Paahi etu Nayohana nkayaarwaa ilhapo chonkhaye chaatamana mwoolhoko wo Uyorodani, eettuchihaka wiira, “Nkhoromeke ni uhiya uwonya winyu mbatiiziyeke, Nlhuku nouhiyererani uwonya winyu.”
42003004	Phi lhepiye aya nkitabuni mwa anamilhohi ashinna Isaya wiira, “Ntu mmoka nookhuwelha muthakoni, ‘Nkooroshe iphiro yo uvira Apwiiya, mwookolhe mitalha chinohalha aya uvira!
42003005	Kila nlhikiti ninoowuhelhiya, kila mwalha ni mwaako unoolhokihiya. Iphiro cho uhookwaa chinowookolhiya, ni mitalha chinananre chinoorerihiya.
42003006	Attu onkhaye anomwona Nlhuku opolhaka attu!’ ”
42003007	Paahi etu, milhoko cha attu enchi nkayaawa u Nayohana uubatiiziyani. Nayohana nkayakoha, “Inyu iyari yo inwaa va, nhimeriye ni apani wiira nttawe ntwarusho Nlhuku unowiiha awe?
42003008	Mpangeke etu mitheko cho wooniha etu wiira nhokhoroma ni uhiya uwonya winyu. Nhichokholhe vano etu wiira Aburahimu phi athumwaninyu. Kinouhimeriani wiira Nlhuku noworia uthathusha alha malhuku alha ukhalha ashaana a Aburahimu!
42003009	Ipacho iri tayari ukakha mwiri vamithithaarini, miri chonkhaye chihinemma rata chinookakhiya ni urihelhiya vamooroni.”
42003010	Attu nkayaakoha, “Niireke chani etu?”
42003011	Nayohana nkayaakhulha, “Ntu ri ni ikuwo pilhi ammaheke imoka ntu hirina, ni ntu rini yolhia ankawelheke nkhunanawe hirina.”
42003012	Attu yaalhiviha ikhodi nkayaawa uubatiiziyani, nkayaakoha Nayohana, “Owiittuchiha, ni hii niireke chani etu?”
42003013	Nayohana nkayaakhulha yeeraka, “Nhinlhivihe ntu upwaha chilheheriye inyu waalhiviha attu.”
42003014	Manyaasikaari akina ni ayo nkayaakoha, “Ni hii chiicho, niireke chani?” Ni ayo nkayaakhulha, nkayeera, “Nhinthurulhe ntu nchurukhu awe ama umwootheria choomwotheria. Nthoshiyeke nchurukhu unolhiviya inyu uyo.”
42003015	Attu nkaayaakhulhuvelha ittu, nkayaahalha oopuwelhaka munrimani wiira Nayohana ayo aari phi Kuristo Moopolhi aathanlhiye ni Nlhuku.
42003016	Paahi etu Nayohana nkayeera, “Mii kinoubatiizani ni maashi, nansho ntu mmoka noowa ri mulhupalhe ukipwaha mii kihinooriaka inakhalhaka uthapulha miripwe cho iratu chawe. Yoyo noowa uubatiizani wo Iphumu ya Nlhuku ni mooro.
42003017	Yoyo hanaa ithelho mmoononi yo ukhungurelha cholhia, akwechaka ipuwa awe yo weepettelha ni uthokoreria ingaano nnikhupini, ni upaha iphepuwa vamooroni vahintiphiaa.”
42003018	Paahi etu, vamoka ni meettuchiho o Malhove Orera makina menchi, Nayohana ahaakurumicha attu urukunusha makhalhelho aya.
42003019	Nansho Nayohana yahaachacheracha Amwene Naherode nlhatu no waathelha Naherodiya, aari ahanu a ahima aya ni mwaha wo uhilhoka mwinchi waapanga aya.
42003020	Paahi etu Naherode nkayaathepiha uwonya waya, nkayaavara Nayohana ni waattuka ujeerani.
42003021	Attu onkhaye vaamanlhe aya ubatiiziya, Yesu ni uyo ahobatiiziya. Vaari awe anlhapelhaka Nlhuku, irimu nkachaahulhia,
42003022	ni Iphumu ya Nlhuku aari ni iruttu thoko kaulha nkawankorwelha. Ni nlhove nkaneewiya ukhuma wiirimu niiraka, “Uwe phi Mwaamwanaka kinonttuna aka. Uhokichivelha.”
42003023	Yesu vaachokhonlhe awe ntheko mwaattuni, aari ni iyaakha makhumi mararu. Attu yaari amwaanyiheraka wiira aari mwaana a Nayusufu mwaana a Naheli,
42003024	mwaana a Namaatati, mwaana a Lawi, mwaana a Nameliki, mwaana a Nayanai, mwaana a Nayusufu
42003025	mwaana a Namatatiya, mwaana a ashinna Amosi, mwaana a Nanahumu, mwaana a Naesili, mwaana a Nanagai
42003026	mwaana a Namaathi, mwaana a Namatatiya, mwaana a Nasemeini, mwaana a Nayoseki, mwaana a Nayoda
42003027	mwaana a Nayoanani, mwaana a Nareesa, mwaana a Nazerubabeli, mwaana a Nashaltieli, mwaana a Naneeri
42003028	mwaana a Nameliki, mwaana a Naadi, mwaana a Nakosamu, mwaana a Naelimadamu, mwaana a Nanaeri
42003029	mwaana a Nayoshua, mwaana a Naelieza, mwaana a Nayorimu, mwaana a Namaatati, mwaana a Nalawi,
42003030	mwaana a Nasimeoni, mwaana a Nayuda, mwaana a Nayusufu, mwaana a Nayonamu, mwaana a Naeliakimu
42003031	mwaana a Namelea, mwaana a Namena, mwaana a Namatata, mwaana a Nanathani, mwaana a Adaudi
42003032	mwaana a Nayese, mwaana a Naobedi, mwaana a Naboazi, mwaana a Nasalmoni, mwaana a Nanashoni
42003033	mwaana a Naaminaadabu, mwaana a Naadimini, mwaana a Naarni, mwaana a Nahezironi, mwaana a Nafarisi, mwaana a Nayuda

42003035	mwaana a Naserugi, mwaana a Nareu, mwaana a Napelegi, mwaana a Naeberi, mwaana a Nashela

42004001	Yesu nkaahokolhia Uyorodani nachanre Iphumu ya Nlhuku, nkaaholhelhiya ni Iphumu mpaka uthakoni,
42004002	waalhikachiye awe ni Nakare wo mahuku makhumi ncheshe. Mahuku onkhaye ayo ahottuka wo uhilhia ittu, paahi etu avireke yayo mahuku ayo nkaawolhiya ithalha.
42004003	Nakare nkaamwirelha, “Wakhalhaka uwe phi Mwaana a Nlhuku, ulheehereke etu wiira alha malhuku alha athathuwe nkatte.”
42004004	Nansho Yesu nkaakhulha, “Malhove Matakatifu aneera, ‘Ntu khanlhama wo ulhia nkatte vekha.’ ”
42004005	Nakare nkankusha tho mpaka vachulhu ni umwooniha imwene chonkhaye cho velhaponi va.
42004006	Nakare nkeera, “Kinouvaha ikuru wo chilha imwene chonkhaye chi ni urera waya. Chonkhaye chi chiri mmathathani mwaka, kathananaka ummaha ntu kinowooria.
42004007	Mwakikhoromelhaka ni ukithimicha, chonkhaye chi chinookhalha chawinyu.”
42004008	Yesu nkaakhulha, “iholhepiya, ‘Mwaathimicheke Athithi, Nlhuku inyu vekha aya ni uvara mitheko chaya!’ ”
42004009	Nakare nkanrweeha mpaka Uyerusalemu vachulhu ishanja yo Inupa ya Nlhuku, nkeera, “Wakhalhaka uwe phi Mwaana a Nlhuku, paahi etu uthupeke mpaka vathi.
42004010	Ukhalhawaya Malhove Matakatifu aneera, ‘Nlhuku noolhehera minepa chawe chiwe chuwopolheni.’
42004011	Ni vawo tho aneera wiira, ‘Anoukushani mmathathani mwaya nhiwe mwaarakalha mmalhukuni.’ ”
42004012	Nansho Yesu nkaakhulha, “Iholhepiya, ‘Nhinlhikache Nlhuku, Athithi inyu.’ ”
42004013	Nakare amalheke unlhikacha Yesu wo kila iphiro, nkanhiya mpaka ikatema inothananiya.
42004014	Paahi Yesu ahohokolhia Ugalilaya, ni ikuru yo Iphumu ya Nlhuku yaari vamoka ni uyo. Mwaha unomwaacha nkawaawanelha mwiilhaponi mwonkhaye.
42004015	Nkeettuchiha mu inupa chaya cho unlhapelha Nlhuku, nkaatotopelhiya ni attu onkhaye.
42004016	Paahi etu Yesu nkaarwa Unazareti, iwani yonnuwenlhe awe, ni Nihuku no Wiittuwa nkaarwa u inupa yo unlhapelha Nlhuku thoko chaalhemalhenlhe awe. Nkeemelha ushoma Malhove Matakatifu
42004017	nkaavahiya nrapalha naalhepiye Malhove Matakatifu ni anamilhohi ashinna Isaya wiira ashome. Nkaapatakulha ni ushoma vakittu valhepiye wiira,
42004018	“Iphumu ya Athithi uri vamoka ni mii, ukhalhawaya ahokihika makhura wiira kaahimerie Malhove Orera amashikini. Ahokiruma kihimiache uhiyereriya attu attukiye ni woonihiya tho attu ahinoona, ni woopolha attu anohuvihiya
42004019	ni uhimiacha wiira ikatema ihaaya Athithi vanohalha aya woopolha attu aya.”
42004020	Yesu nkaavilhika ikitabu ni uhokolhosha wa namitheko aashunga, nkaakhalha vathi. Attu onkhaye wi inupa yo unlhapelha Nlhuku mmo nkayammweha wo miitho melhi paranda,
42004021	venre awe, “Alha Malhove Matakatifu alha ahotimira lhelho, thoko chinre inyu wo wiiwa kishomaka.”
42004022	Attu onkhaye nkayaachivelhiya, nkayaashangacha wiiwa malhove o nnema aahimiacha awe. Nkayaakohanacha yeeraka, “Ana ulha kahiwena mwaana a Nayusufu ulha?”
42004023	Nkeerelha wiira, “Kihochuwelha wiira nnookiirelha nlhikaaniho no wiira, ‘Namirete, wiilhamiheke umwanene.’ Ni ukiirelha tho kipangache chittu mwiiwilhe inyu kipangachaka Ukapenaumu.”
42004024	“Kinouhimeriani wo ikekhiaye tho wiira, anamilhohi khanolhohiya uwannyaya.
42004025	“Nansho nkakiiweni, wo ikekhiaye, wahokhalha anankhwelhi enchi mwiilhaponi mu Israeli mwonkhaye mu ikatema i Naeliya, irimu vaattukiye aya, ni ipulha khayarumpe iyaakha taaru ni nusu ni ikuruna nkayaawanelha ilhapo yonkhaye.
42004026	Ni Naeliya khayaarumiye wa anankhwelhi ariyoothe ahikhalhe anankhwelhi yaakhalha Userepta umwiinanoni ni ilhapo yo Usidoni.
42004027	Tho, yahaawo attu enchi yaawereiya makutulha mwiilhaponi mu Israeli Naelisha vaari aya anamilhohi, nansho khaawo ntu aalhamme ahikhalhe Nanaamani, ntu o Usiriya.”
42004028	Attu onkhaye yaari inupa yo unlhapelha Nlhuku veewilhe aya chiicho, nkayaarushiya.
42004029	Nkayeemelhacha, nkayankhweremiha uchereshere iwani ni unkusha mpaka vachereshere mwaako wiira ankakhelhe vathi wuuthi mwaako,
42004030	nansho nkaavira variyari aya ni urwaa.
42004031	Paahi Yesu nkaarwa Ukapenaumu, iwani yaari Ugalilaya, nkeettuchiha attu Nihuku no Wiittuwa.
42004032	Attu onkhaye yaari ashangaka chettuchiha awe, ukhalhawaya olhumacha wo ikuru.
42004033	Nkaakhalha ntu o mashoka o unanara wi inupa yo unlhapelha Nlhuku mmo, akhuwelha chinene,
42004034	“Niuttekenlheni hii, uwe Yesu o Nazareti? Uwilhe unoomolha? Kihochuwelha chinre awo, uwe phi karumiya ntakatifu a Nlhuku!”
42004035	Yesu nkoomolha nshoka no unanara nno, “Mmaalhe munkhume ulha ntu ulha!” Nshoka nkanammulhusha ntu ulhe vathi, nkanaathama wo hinrakalhiha.
42004036	Attu onkhaye nkayoomiya uwanoni olhumachaka ashineneru, “Ilha phi ishiyani vano? Wo machiri ni ikuru yolha ntu ulha nolhehera wiira mashoka o unanara, athamache, ni ayo anoothamacha!”
42004037	Mwaha wa Yesu nkawaawanelha kila vakittu velhaponi vawo.
42004038	Yesu nkaathama wi inupa yo unlhapelha Nlhuku nkaakelha unupani wa Nasimoni. Wowo ahokohi aya Nasimoni yaari areta iruttu, Yesu nkaahimeriya.
42004039	Nkaarwa vaathalhelhiye aya ni weemelha vachereshere ikori ni woomolha ureta waathame apwiyawe ayo. Ureta nkawaalhama, nkayaachokholha waaterekhelha.
42004040	Uchechilho, attu yaari ni manyampwana aya yaawereia nkayaawiihacha areta ayo wa Yesu, ni uyo nkeesheracha miono chawe kila mmoka nkayaalhamacha.
42004041	Mashoka o unanara ni ayo nkaayathamacha attu enchi, olhumachaka, “Uweva phi Mwaana a Nlhuku!” Yesu nkoomolha mashoka o unanara wiira ahihokolhiache tho ni ayo khayoolhumanche tho, ukhalhawaya ahochuwelha wiira aari phi Kuristo Moopolhi.
42004042	Waashelhe waya Yesu ahothama vawani vawo, nkaarwa vakittu vaari awe yeekha. Attu khayaachokholha umwaavia, vaamwonne aya, nkayanchiichiha wiira hithame uwannyaya.
42004043	Nansho nkeerelhacha, “Kihophwanelhiya uhimiacha Malhove Orera o Imwene ya Nlhuku iwani chikina, ukhalhawaya Nlhuku kirumme wiira kipange yoyo ntheko uyo.”
42004044	Paahi etu nkaavira eettuchihachaka attu mu inupa cho unlhapelha Nlhuku ilhapo yonkhaye yo Uyudea.
42005001	Nihuku nimoka Yesu aari neemenlhe vachengweni nttiya no Genesareti, attu vaathothokanacha aya uwa uwiiwelhelhani nlhove na Nlhuku.
42005002	Nkoona ikalhava pilhi vachereshere nttiya, ashinene yaari anakhuruwilhe alhokihachaka ittavi chaya.
42005003	Yesu nkaawelha ikalhava imoka i Nasimoni, nkaalhepelha anene ayo wiira athame vachengweni vawo achusheriheke miholho vakani. Nkaakhalha nkalhavani mmo ni weettuchiha milhoko cha attu.
42005004	Amalhiheke weettuchiha attu, nkeerelha Nasimoni, “Nchusheriheke ikalhava inyu mpaka variyari nttiya, mwarieke ittavi chinyu chiyo mwavare ihopa.”
42005005	Nasimoni nkayaakhulha, “Thithi, nihoshelhelhiha wo uhipatta ittu. Nansho wo nlhove ninyu, kinokoriaa ittavi vano.”
42005006	Arieke ittavi mmaashini, nkayaarulha ihopa chinchi, mpaka ittavi waatameria upaphuwa.
42005007	Nkayeehana ashikhunanaya yaari ikalhava ikina, awe aakaviha. Nkayaawacha, nkayaacharihacha ihopa ikalhava pilhi chonkhaye chaatameriaka utitimira mmaashini.
42005008	Nasimoni Peturo voonne aya ikhumelhenlhe, nkayankhoromelha Yesu amwiirelhaka, “Nthame vawannnyaka va, Thithi! Ki ntu o uwonya mii!”
42005009	Napeturo anene vamoka ni ashikhunanaya nkayoomachiya uwanoni wo woona ihopa chinchi thoko chechiyo chaavarilhe aya chiyo.
42005010	Yaari chiicho ata u Nayakhobo ni Nayohana ashaana a Nazebedayo, akavihi nanaya Nasimoni. Yesu nkeerelha, “Nhoovache mwaatti, uchokholha lhelho va nnookhalha o woopolha attu.”
42005011	Nkayaapurulha ikalhava mpaka uchengweni, nkayaahiya kila ittu ni unttwara Yesu.
42005012	Nkayaakhalha wiira Yesu vaari awe iwani imoka ntu mmoka aawereiya makutulha ahomwoona, nkaawa wa Yesu. Nkeewulhusha makukhu ni unlhepelha Yesu, “Thithi, mwattunaka, nnowooria ukilhamiha!”
42005013	Yesu nkookolha moono awe ni ummara ntu o makutulha uyo nkaamwiirelha, “Kihothanana, nlhameke etu!”
42005014	Nkanlhehera ntu uyo wiira, “Nhirwee uhimiecheshani wa attu, nansho nrweeke mweechoniheke wa opochera ishaani, mwakumiheke isadaka inyu mwiittukurie wiira nholhama thoko chilheheriye aya ni ashinna Musa.”
42005015	Nansho mwaha waapannge awe Yesu nkawaawanelha kila vakittu. Attu enchi nkayaathukumana uumwiiwelhelhani ni ulhamihiya mareta aya.
42005016	Nansho nkaathama ni urwaa vakittu vo yekha awe, nkaakhalha wowo anlhapelhaka Nlhuku.
42005017	Nihuku nimoka Yesu aari eettuchihaka, Amafarisayo akina ni owiittuchiha Malhehero yaakhumme iwani cho Ugalilaya ni Uyudea ni Uyerusalemu, yaakhalhanche eewelhelhaka. Machiri a Athithi aari vamoka ni uyo wiira aalhamihe areta.
42005018	Nkayaawa attu yankushilhe vankorini ntu o uririyacha iruttu, nkayaalhikacha unkelhiha mpaani mwaari awe Yesu.
42005019	Nansho attu chenre aya wo uchara, khayoonrie ukelha mpaani. Paahi etu, nkayankusha mpaka vachulhu nchaara, nkayaakhunulha nivatho wiira anvirihe ni ikori awe mpaka vaari awe Yesu.
42005020	Yesu vonne awe yoyo nrima aya uyo, nkaamwirelha ntu o ririyacha moono uyo, “Uhohiyereriya uwonya wao, mpwana aka.”
42005021	Owiittuchiha Malhehero ni Amafarisayo nkayaachokholha wiikoha ashineneru, “Ana phi mpani yolha nonlhava Nlhuku ulha! Nlhuku vekha awe phi nohiyerera uwonya!”
42005022	Yesu ahochuwelha ichuku chaya, nkeera, “Nlhatu waani wo uchukulhacha munrimani chiicho?
42005023	Vaalhuwilhe vayi ana, wiira, ‘Uwonya winyu uhohiyereriya,’ ama wiira, ‘Munkweke nrweeke?’
42005024	Kinowoonihani etu wiira, Mwaana a Ntu hanaa ikuru velhaponi va yo uhiyerera uwonya wa attu.” Paahi etu nkaamwiirelha ntu o moono wo uririyacha ulhe, “Kinoohimeriani wiira, munkweke, mwiirieke nkori inyu nhokolhieke uwani!”
42005025	Vavawo vavawo ntu ulhe nkeemelha attu yoonaka, nkaakusha nkori waarupelha awe, nkaahokolhia uwannyawe, anthimichaka Nlhuku.
42005026	Attu onkhaye nkayaahalha malhaku mwaari! Aari yoovaka, nkayanthimicha Nlhuku yiiraka, “Nihoona chittu cho ushangiha lhelho!”
42005027	Yamalhekeru, Yesu nkaakhuma vathe nkaamwona ntu aalhiviha ikhodi eehaniya Lawi, nakhanlhe vanupani vaalhiviha awe ikhodi. Yesu nkaamwiirelha, “Nkittware.”
42005028	Nalawi nkayeemelha, nkayaahiya kila ittu ni unttwara Yesu.
42005029	Yamalheke Nalawi nkayanterekhelha Yesu yolhia yo uchechilho, ni alheto yaalhalheiye yaari attu olhiviha ikhodi enchi aakhanlhe unlhiana Yesu vamoka ni attu akina.
42005030	Amafarisayo akina ni owiittuchiha Malhehero nkayaachukulha, nkayaakoha owiittucha a Yesu yeeraka, “Chani woonaka mwaatti nnolhia ni uwuria vamoka ni attu o ulhiviha ikhodi ni attu o uwonya?”
42005031	Yesu nkaakhulha, “Attu arii akumi khanaavia abwana mganga, ihikhalhe areta phi naavia.
42005032	Akiwiilhe u weehanani attu anopanga chittu cho urera wiira akhorome, nansho attu o uwonya.”
42005033	Attu akina nkayaamwiirelha Yesu, “Owiittucha a Nayohana anoottuka venchi ni ulhapelha, ni owiittucha a Amafarisayo anopanga chiicho, nansho owiittucha inyu anolhia ni uwuria.”
42005034	Yesu nkaakhulha, “Chani attu alhalheiye u arusini ahophwanelhiya uttuka abwana arusi anari vavawo? Mena!
42005035	Nansho nihuku ninoowa abwana arusi vanowa aya uthamihiya, vavawo attu phi nowa aya aattuka.”
42005036	Yesu nkaahimeria tho nna nlhikaaniho nna, “Khaawo ntu neesha imbaati yo naanano vachulhu ikuwo yoothalha. Eeraka chiicho, noothepiha ikuwo iyo waahuwa, ni imbaati iyo khinaathana ni ikuwo yo khalhayi.
42005037	Chiicho khaawo ntu nohelha idivai yoochasha ntumpa wo nrapalha wo wuulhuvalha, ukhalhawaya idivai yoochasha iyo inoopwesha ntumpa uyo ni urihiaa.
42005038	Nansho, idivai yoochasha inohelhiya mu nrupa nkumi!
42005039	Khaawo ntu nothanana uwuria idivai ihinachasha amalhihaka uwuria idivai yoochasha. Attu aneera, ‘Ittu yo khalhayi phi nlhoka chinene.’ ”
42006001	Yesu aari etakachaka mmamatani Nihuku no Wiittuwa. Owiittucha awe nkayonthacha machashi o meelhe, nkayaatikitta ni ukhuura imbeyu chaya.
42006002	Amafarisayo akina nkayaakoha, “Nlhatu waani upanga ittu ichiichihiye ni Malhehero wiira ihipangiye Nihuku no Wiittuwa?”
42006003	Yesu nkaakhulha, “Ana khannashoma yaapannge aya Adaudi ni ashikhunanaya vaawolhiye aya ithalha?
42006004	Ahokelha Inupa ya Nlhuku, nkayaalha mikatte chaakumihiye isadaka wa Nlhuku, nkayaalhia, ni waakawelha ashikhunanaya. Mikatte chaachiichihiye ulhiya ni attu akina yaakhihale opochera ishaani vekha aya.”
42006005	Yesu nkaamalhiha eeraka, “Mwaana a Ntu phi Mwanene Nihuku no Wiittuwa.”
42006006	Nihuku no Wiittuwa nikina, Yesu ahorwaa wi inupa yo unlhapelha Nlhuku ni wettuchiha attu. Ahokhalha mwommo ntu o moono wo uririyacha.
42006007	Owiittuchiha Malhehero akina ni Amafarisayo nkayaavia nlhatu wo mwootheria wiira hotteka, paahi etu nkayammweha paranda yoone yakhalhaka nonlhamiha ntu uyo Nihuku no Wiittuwa.
42006008	Nansho Yesu ahochuwelha ichuku chaya nkaamwirelha ntu ulhe, “Munkweke mmweeke. Mweemelhe uholho unouno.” Nkeemelha nkaawa uholho.
42006009	Paahi Yesu nkeerelha, “Kinoukohani mwaatti, Ikekhia ihu inaacha Nihuku no Wiittuwa inonilhehera nipangekeni lhelho? Upanga ittu yo urera ama yo uhilhoka? Woopolha ukumi wa ntu ama wiiva?”
42006010	Nkaaweha attu onkhaye yaari vavawo, nkaamwirelha ntu o moono wo uririyacha ulhe, “Wookolheke moono awo uyo.” Nkookolha, nkawaalhama nkawaakhalha nkumi tho.
42006011	Nansho attu yanvenga Yesu nkayaathunalhacha, nkayaakhalha ashineneru yaaviaka nlhatu wo umwiiriha Yesu.
42006012	Yesu nkaarwa umwaakoni ulhepelhani, nkaashelhelhiha wowo anlhapelhaka Nlhuku.
42006013	Waashelhe waya, nkeehanacha owiittucha awe ni waathanlha khumi ni elhi, ehanne awe akarumiya,
42006014	Nasimoni aavanhe awe nchina Napeturo ni ahima aya Naandorea ni Nayakhobo ni Nayohana ni Nafilipo ni Nabatolomayo
42006015	Namatayo ni Natomaso ni Nayakhobo ashaana a Alufayo ni Nasimoni eehaniya nnenchi
42006016	Nayuda mwaamwanaa Nayakhobo ni Yuda Isikariote, anthuminhe Yesu.
42006017	Vaakhuruwilhe awe umwaakoni ni akarumiya awe, nkeemelha ni waaphwanya owiittuchiha awe enchi anathothokanne vamoka. Yayo yaari attu yaakhumme ilhapo cho Uyudea ni Uyerusalemu ni iwani cho umbwaani cho Utiro ni Usidoni,
42006018	aawachilhe umwiiwelhelhani ni uwa uulhamihiyani mareta aya. Attu yaahuvihiya ni mashoka o unanara ni ayo ahowaacha uulhamihiyani.
42006019	Attu onkhaye yaari athananaka inakhalhaka uvara mwiinjiro wawe, ukhalhawaya machiri aari ankhumaka ni waalhamiha attu onkhaye.
42006020	Yesu nkaaweha owiittucha awe nkeera, “Nhoreeriya mwaatti nnohuvelha unchuwelha Nlhuku va, umwene wa Nlhuku phi wawinyu!
42006021	Nhoreeriya mwaatti nnowolhiya ithalha va, ukhalhawaya nnoowa mwaawonihiya! Nhoreeriya mwaatti nnonlha vano, ukhalhawaya nnoowa mwaathiaa ni uteelhiya!”
42006022	“Nhoreeriya mwaatti vanopangelhiya inyu ichimwa ni attu, okhotakani, oruwanakani ni uheulhacha nchina ninyu wiira nhopanga ittu yo uhilhoka wo nlhatu wo Mwaana a Ntu!
42006023	Nteelhiyeke vanohalha aya ukhumelhelha yayo, ntapelhelheke wo ushangarara, ukhalhawaya wo ikekhiaye nhoshungeriya nttuvo nulhupalhe wiirimu. Kwaani ata manyaapwiiya aya aapannge chiicho, waapangelha anamilhohi a Nlhuku.
42006024	Nansho nhothapana mwaatti attu o nhakhu va, ukhalhawaya nhomalha upuha!
42006025	Nhothapana mwaatti nnorupalha vano va, ukhalhawaya nnoowa mwaawolhiya ithalha! Nhothapana mwaatti nnothiaa vano va, ukhalhawaya nnoowa mwonlha ni uthuthelha!”
42006026	“Nhothapana mwaatti vanototopelhiya inyu ni attu, ukhalhawaya manyaapwiiya aya ahaapangelha chiicho anamilhohi o woothacha.”
42006027	“Nansho kinouhimeriani mwaatti nnokiiwava, mwaattuneke attu anoupangelhani ichimwa,
42006028	mwaalhapelhelheke ibarakha anoulhavani, mwaalhapelhelheke attu anoupangelhani ichimwa.
42006029	Ntu owaatakani nrama ninyu nimoka, munhiyereke owatekeni nikina no nayelhi nno, ntu othurulhakani nikoti ninyu, munhiyereke ni mwiinjiro winyu.
42006030	Ntu noovekelhani mummaheke, ntu akushaka nhakhu inyu nhintware wiira ohokolhoshereni.
42006031	Chineera inyu wo uthanana wiira mpangelhiye ni attu, mwaapangelheke ni ayo chiicho.”
42006032	“Mwaattunaka attu anouttunani vekha aya, nnohalha chani upochera nnema? Ata attu o uwonya anaattuna attu anaattuna aya!
42006033	Mwapangaka moombone wa attu anoupangelhani moombone, chani nnohalha upatta chani ibarakha? Ata attu o uwonya aneera chiicho wa attu anaapangelha moombone!
42006034	Vavawo mwaashimihaka attu nnokhulhuvelha wiira anouhokolhosherani, nnohalha upatta chani ibarakha? Ata attu o uwonya anaashimiha attu anaahokolhoshera!
42006035	Mena! Mwaattuneke amalhaponi inyu ni waapangelha moombone, mwaashimiheke nhikhulhuvelhaka uhokolhosheriya. Vavawo nnoowa mwaapatta nttuvo mwinchi, ni ukhalha ashaana a Nlhuku Mulhupalhe Chinene. Ukhalhawaya ri o uwiiha mpuha wa attu ahichuwenlhe ushukuru ni o unanara mirima.
42006036	Nkhalheke attu o kiriri thoko Athumwaninyu chiri aya o ikiriri.”
42006037	“Nhaahukumulhe attu akina, Nlhuku khanowa ohukumulhani, nhaakuphulhache attu akina, ni inyu nhiwe mwaakuphulhachiya, mwaahiyerereke attu akina, Nlhuku ohiyererekeni ni inyu.
42006038	Mwaavaheke attu akina, Nlhuku nouvahani ni inyu. Chiicho etu nnoowa mwaapochera wo winchiva chinene, nikaviho mmathathani mwinyu. Maphimelho inyu wa attu, phi maphimelho nnohalha inyu uphimelhiya ni Nlhuku.”
42006039	Yesu nkaahimeria nna nlhikaaniho nna, “Ntu ohoona khanooria unholhelha ntu ohoona nanawe, eeraka chiicho, onkhaye elhi ayo anootumbuchira munlhikitini.
42006040	Khaawo owiittucha naapwaha owiittuchiha awe, nansho owiittucha amalhaka wiittucha phi nolhikaana awe ni owittuchiha awe.”
42006041	“Nlhatuni etu no woona ikokholha nnithoni mwa nhima inyu uno nhoonaka nipattu niri nnithoni mwinyu mwaanene?
42006042	Nnohalha wiira chani wa nhima inyu, ‘Nhima aka nkankani kuuthamihe ikokholha nnithoni mwao,’ nansho nhithamihaka nipattu niri nnithoni mwinyu mwaanene? Mwa anafiki inyu! Nthamiheke thoko nipattu nnithoni mwinyu, vavawo phi nohalha inyu wooria uthamiha ikokholha nnithoni mwa munninyu.”
42006043	“Mwiri wo ukonda khunemma pufia, mena mwiri wo uhikonda khunemma maphepu oombone.
42006044	Mwiri uriwoothe unchuwania wo maphepu unemma aya, khavanooria urukulha ittini munrokani ama urukulha izabibu va mwiri wo miiwa.
42006045	Ntu o nrima woombone nopanga mitheko choombone chiri munrimani mwawe, ntu o uhilhoka nopanga chittu cho unanara chiri munrimani mwawe. Malhaku anoolhumacha chittu chichanre munrimani.”
42006046	“Nlhatuni no ukiihana mii, ‘Thithi, Thithi,’ uno nhipangaka thoko chineera aka wo ulheherani?
42006047	Ntu nokiweelha ni wiiwelhelha malhove aka ni uvarechesha Kinouhimeriani chiri awe.
42006048	Nokhalha thoko ntu, notheka inupa awe, athipaka chinene ni utheka nsingi vamwalhani. Mwoolhoko nkawaapaphulha maashi ni ukhita inupa iyo nansho kayaatikhinyelhe, ukhalhawaya yaaholhipihiya vaathekiya aya.
42006049	Nansho ntu riyoothe neewa malhove aka wo uhivarechesha, nokhalha thoko ntu notheka inupa awe wo uhithipa nsingi vathi, maashi atikhinyeke inupa iyo, yahowulhuwa phiyaru wo nkhito urrrr!”
42007001	Yesu amalhiheke waahimeria attu yayo malhove onkhaye ayo, nkaarwa iwani yo Ukapenaumu.
42007002	Nholhelhi o manyaasikari o Urumi ahaana namitheko anttuna aya chinene, yoyo aari nreta chinene amwaatameriaka nookhwa.

42007004	Nkayaarwaa wa Yesu ni ummenda, ampepechaka wiira, “Yolha ntu ulha hophwanelhiya wiira mwankavihe.
42007005	Noottuna ilhapo ihu, tho honikaviha utheka inupa yo unlhapelha Nlhuku.”

42007008	Mii kimwanene, ki ntu o ipilhi wa attu akina, kihanaa ikuru yo wemelhelha manyaasikari. Kamwiirelhaka mmoka, ‘Nrweeke!’ Khurwaaka, nkina kamwiirelhaka, ‘Nkaawa va!’ Khuwaaka, kaarumaka anamitheko aka, ‘Mpangeke ilha!’ Khupangaka.”
42007009	Yesu nkaashanga veewilhe awe nna nlhove nna, nkaarukunuwa ni weerelha attu anttwara ayo, “Kinohimia wiira, akinapacha woona nrima thoko ulha, ata mwiilhaponi mu Israeli mwonkhaye!”
42007010	Anamitheko nkayaahokolhiacha waarumiye aya ni umphwanya karumiya nreta ulhe nalhamme.

42007013	Athithi vonne aya anankhwelhi ayo, nrima waya nkawaakelhiya ihuzuni yo woonelha ikiriri anankhwelhi ayo, nkeerelha, “Nhunlhe.”
42007014	Nkaachushera, nkaapaapelha ikori yaatheshelhiye ntembo uyo, attu aawelhe ayo nkayeemelhacha. Yesu nkeera, “Mmirawo! Kinowiirelha wiira, wunkweke!”
42007015	Mmirawo aakhwilhe uyo nkaakhalha ni uchokholha wulhumacha, Yesu nkanhokolhosha wa anumwane.
42007016	Attu onkhaye nkayoovacha chinene, nkayanthimicha Nlhuku, yiiraka, “Namilhohi a Nlhuku mulhupalhe honikhumelhelha! Nlhuku howa uwoopolhani attu awe!”
42007017	Yoyo mwaha waapannge awe Yesu uyo, nkawaawanelha ilhapo yo Uyudea yonkhaye ni ilhapo chaatamana aya.

42007020	Paahi vaaphilhe aya wa Yesu, nkayeera, “Nayohana Obatiiza ahoniruma nuukoheni wiira inyuva phi alhe aaromonlhe aya wiira haawo nowa ama nimmweherereke ntu nkina?”
42007021	Yeyo ikatema iyo Yesu aari aavahaka attu enchi nnema wo ulhamihiya mareta aya, ikwerere ni mashoka o unanara ni waattukulha miitho attu ohoona.
42007022	Nkaakhulha akarumiya a Nayohana wiira, “Nhokolhieke mwaahimerieke Nayohana chittu chonne inyu, attu ohoona anowoona, attu oheeta anoweeta, attu o makutulha anoolhamihiya, attu ohiiwa anowiiwa, attu akhwilhe anoohihimushiya ni attu anokwana anoohimeriya Malhove Orera.
42007023	Ahoreeriya attu ahiri ni nipampa ni mii!”
42007024	Owiittucha yaarumiye ni Nayohana vaathamanche aya, Yesu ahochokholha waahimeria attu mwaha unaacha Nayohana, “Vaarwelhe inyu u Nayohana uthakoni ulhe, mwaanyihera wiira nnokowoonani? Nthalhe utikhinyiyaka ni iphioo?
42007025	Mwaanyihera anoonieke chani? Thoko ntu warenlhe ikuwo chorera? Attu anowara chittu cho nthimicho ni ukhalha apuhaka yayo anokhalhacha uttato!
42007026	Nkihimerieke etu, mwaakenlhe woonani? Woona anamilhohi a Nlhuku? Eiyo, nansho nkamwoona chaathempe anamilhohi a Nlhuku.
42007027	Ukhalhawaya Nayohana phi alhe ahimiye ni Malhove Matakatifu wiira, ‘Nlhuku heera, Kinonruma karumiya aka oholhelheni akooroshe iphiro inyu.’ ”

42007029	Attu onkhaye nkayaamwiwa, attu aalhiviha ikhodi nkayaarumelhelhacha ni utotopelha mitheko choombone cha Nlhuku, akhalhaka phi attu yaapochenre ubatiizo u Nayohana.
42007030	Nansho Amafarisayo ni owiittuchiha Malhehero a ashinna Musa ahokhotacha unrumelhelha Nlhuku, ni ukhota ubatiiziya ni Nayohana.
42007031	Yesu nkeera tho, “Vano etu, kinohalha ulhikaaniha ni ittu yaani ilha iyari ilha? Attu aya ari thoko chani?
42007032	Ari thoko ashimirawo aakhalhanche mmapuwani nnopangiya maronda ni wiichiirelha ashineneru, ‘Nahowopelhani ikoma nansho khamwenne! Naheepa ichipo cho nunlhiho nansho khamwonlhilhe!’
42007033	Nayohana Obatiiza yahowa, ahottuka, khaawunrie idivai, mwaatti nkamweera, ‘Mmwooneke, ri ni nshoka no unanara!’
42007034	Mwaana a Ntu nkaawa, nkaalhia ni uwuria, ni mwaattiva nkamweera, ‘Nkamwooneni yolha ntu ulha! Ntu o menyekha ni uhapalhiya, mpwana aya attu anolhiviha ikhodi ni attu o uwonya!’
42007035	Irusho cha Nlhuku, inakhalhaka chiicho, chinohimiecheshiya wiira cho ikekhia ni attu anrumelhelha.”
42007036	Afarisayo yahonlhalhia Yesu wiira alhie yolhia vamoka ni ayo, nkarwaa uwannyaya nkaakhalha ulhia yolhia.
42007037	Yeyo iwani iyo ahokhalha opani amoka aapangacha chittu cho uhilhokalhoka. Nkayeewa wiira Yesu aari alhiaka yolhia wa Afarisayo, nkayaakusha ichupa yo malhuku o alabasta yaachanre makhura o unukhelha
42007038	nkayeemelha amwaatameriaka Yesu uno onlhaka, nkayaammorihelha miithori chaya, vamietoni. Nkayaapoholha ni ikharari mmuruni, nkayaanukhanukha, nkayanhikahika makhura o unukhelha ayo.
42007039	Afarisayo ayo vonne aya, nkayeera munrimani mwaya, “Ulha ntu ulha akaari namilhohi, anochuwelha chiri aya alha opani anommarakacha alha, aanachuwelha chiri aya ntu o uwonya!”

42007042	Attu ayo voochenlhe aya ulhiva, aheehanacha ni waahiyerera milhatu chaya onkhaye. Paahi etu, wa yayo attu elhi ayo, phuuyi nohalha waattuna chinene attu aashiminhe nchurukhu alhe?”

42007044	Nkaarukunuwelha opani alhe nkeerelha Nasimoni, “Nnoowona alha opani alha? Vaawilhe aka unupani winyu, khamwaakivanhe maashi o ukhucha mieto chaka, nansho alha opani alha ahokikhuchiha inyaa ni miithori aya nkayaapoholha ni ikharari chaya.
42007045	Khankipochenre rata ni ukibuusu, nansho alha ikatema yonkhaye ari vaa vamoka ni mii.
42007046	Khankivanhe makhura o wiihika mmuruni, nansho alha ahokootiha makhura o unukhelha mmietoni.
42007047	Kinouhimeriani wiira, uttuna woninhe aya uhaapanga ahiyereriye uwonya waya wonkhaye. Nansho nohiyereriya makani, yoyo nottuna vakani.”
42007048	Yesu nkeerelha opani alhe, “Nhohiyereriya uwonya winyu.”
