42007050	Nansho Yesu nkeerelha opani alhe, “Nrima inyu uhowoopolhani, nrweeke wo mpuha.”
42008001	Athameke vavawo, Yesu ahorwaa nkwaha wo mmawani ni ittoko ahimiachaka Malhove Orera o Imwene ya Nlhuku. Akarumiya awe khumi ni elhi yaari anttukanaka.
42008002	Tho, akina yaari manyopani oomolhelhiye mashoka o unanara ni Yesu ni ulhamihiya mareta aya. Yayo phi anganya Amariamu eehaniya Magidalena, omolhelhiye mashoka saba,
42008003	Nayoana mahanu a Nakuuza attu aapanga ntheko upuwani u Naherode, Asusaana ni manyopani enchi akina aakumiha nhakhu waya unkavihera Yesu ni owiittucha awe.
42008004	Milhoko cha attu nkachaarwa wa Yesu chikhumaka iwani imoka baada ye ikina. Vaari aya anachanre, Yesu nkaahimeria nna nlhikaaniho nna,
42008005	“Ahokhalha ntu mmoka aarweelhe uwaalhani imbeyu cho meelhe. Vaalha awe aari amichaka, nkachaakhalha chaamonre vaphironi, nkachaanyikalhachiya na attu, ni ashinuni o wiirimu nkayaalhiacha.
42008006	Chikina chaamorenlhe vamwalhani, vaamenlhe aya nkachaanyalha, ukhalhawaya ittaya khayaari ni maashi.
42008007	Imbeyu chikhwawe chaamorenlhe vaari ittaya yoombone, chahomelha ni utiyelhelhiya ni miiwa.
42008008	Chikina chaamorenlhe vachaayirani chinene, minyepu nkachonnuwa ni uyara meelhe, kila nchashi imbeyu imia imoka.” Yesu nkaamalhiha eeraka, “Ri ni maaru eeweke!”
42008009	Owiittucha awe nkayankoha Yesu maana o yayo malhikaaniho ayo,
42008010	ni uyo nkaakhulha, “Irusho cho uchuwelha chittu cho Imwene ya Nlhuku nvahiye mwaattiva, nansho attu akina yayo anohalha uchuwelha wo malhikaaniho, vano anooweha nansho khanoona, anowiiwa nansho khanowa aachuwelha.
42008011	“Maana o nlhikaaniho nno phi wiira, imbeyu phi nlhove na Nlhuku.
42008012	Imbeyu chaamonre vaphironi chinooniha attu aneewa, nansho Nakare noowa ni ukusha nttenga uyo mmamirimani mwaya wo waachiichiha wiira ahirumelhelhe ni woopolhiya.
42008013	Imbeyu chaamonre vamwalhani chinooniha attu aneewa nttenga ni upochera ateelhiyaka munrimani. Nansho khachinkhalha ni mithithaari nhina mwaya, anorumelhelha wo ikatema ikani, ni ulhikachiya wawaakaru anowulhuwa.
42008014	Imbeyu chaamonre vamiiwani chinokhalha phi attu onkhaye aneewa, nansho nipampa ni nikakata ninowaakelha ni waatiyelhelha wiira ahiyare.
42008015	Imbeyu chaamorenlhe vachaayirani chinooniha attu aneewa nttenga ni upochera wo nrima worera, ni ayo khuvilhelhaka mpaka vanoyara aya maphepu oombone.
42008016	“Attu khanoparihelha ikhandiri ni ukhuneelha ittutu ama weesha nkhwikwichiri. Nansho anothomia vachulhu ikiango, wiira attu yoone nthuko aya uyo amwalheelhiye.
42008017	“Ittu iriyoothe ivithiye inowa yaawiihiya voonene, ni ittu iriyoothe ikhuneelhiye inowa yaapatakulhiya ni uwiihiya voonene.
42008018	“Nhiittialhe, mmweheke rata chittu chineewa inyu chiyo, ukhalhawaya attu ari ni ittu anowunchereriya, nansho attu ahirina ittu, ata ikani anaanyihera aya wiira ahanaa iyo inookushiya.”
42008019	Vavawo anumwanawe Yesu vamoka ni ashihima awe nkayaawa, nansho ahoochelha umwaatameria wo nlhatu no uchara attu.
42008020	Ntu mmoka nkaamwirelha Yesu, “Anumwaninyu ni ashihima inyu arii vathe vawo anothanana uwoonani.”
42008021	Yesu nkeera, “Anumwanaka ni ashilhoko aka ari phi attu onkhaye aneewelhelha malhove a Nlhuku ni uvarechesha.”
42008022	Nihuku nimoka Yesu ahowelha nkalhavani owiittucha awe nkayanttwara, nkeerelha, “Nngwee nilhapuwe nttiya nirwee ukhopelhelhe.” Paahi etu nkwaha nkawaachokholha.
42008023	Mphironi, Yesu ahowolhiya ikhove nkaarupa. Vahipinche, iphioo yo machiri nkayaawuka munttiyani, ikalhava nkayaachokholha uchara maashi, ni attu onkhaye yaari ntatakoni.
42008024	Owiittucha nkayanrwelha ummushani, yeeraka, “Owiittuchiha, Owiittuchiha! Niri ntatakoni!” Yesu nkonkwa ni umaalhiha iphioo ni iyo nkayaamaalha, nttiya nkanaakhalha shiriri.
42008025	Nkaakoha owiittucha, “Uri vayi nrima inyu?” Nansho yaari anoomiye uwanoni yoovachaka, yeerelhanaka ashineneru, “Phi ntu ani yolha? Nochachera iphioo ni mawimbi wiira chimaalhe, ni chiyo chinomwiiwelhelha!”
42008026	Yesu ni owiittucha awe nkayaaphiya iwani yo Ugerasi, inowehana ni nttiya no Ugalilaya.
42008027	Vaakhuruwa awe umbwaani, nkankumaana ntu mmoka o mashoka o unanara. Wo iyaakha chinchi, yoyo ntu uyo aari eetaka wo uhiwara ikuwo hikhalhaka uwani, alhokelhaka umahiyeni.
42008028	Vaamwonne awe Yesu, nkaakhuwelha, eewulhushaka vamietoni vawe, ni ukhuwelhacha, “Yesu, Mwaana a Nlhuku Mulhupalhe Chinene! Unothanani uwannyaka? Kinoulhepelha wiira, uhikoomolhe!”
42008029	olhumacha chiicho ukhalhawaya Yesu ahoolhumacha nlhove no ulhehera uthama nshoka nno. Ni nenno nshoka nno naari nimmaraka ikatema chinchi, ata vaattukiya awe mittondoro wiira heetakache aari akwatulhachaka, attawihiyaka ni nshoka no unanara nno wiithuphini.
42008030	Yesu nkankoha, “Nchina ninyu apani?” Nkaakhulha, “Nchina naka ‘Nlhoko,’ ” ukhalhawaya mashoka enchi aari anankenlhe.
42008031	Mashoka nkayanlhepelha Yesu wiira, hilhehere wiira oomolhelhiye unaminepa unohalha aya utwarushiya.
42008032	Vavawo vakittu vawo vaari vahuwiyaka ikulhuwe, chilhiachaka umwakoni. Paahi mashoka nkayanlhepelha Yesu wiira aahiye akelhe nkulhuweni, ni uyo nkaahiyerera.
42008033	Mashoka nkayankhuma ntu ulhe ni ukhelha nkulhuweni. Mphingo wonkhaye wo ikulhuwe nkawaattawelha vathi uhito ni ukelha chititimiraka mmaashini.
42008034	Attu yaahuwacha ikulhuwe ayo nkayaattawacha, vonne aya ittu ikhumelhenlhe, ni urwaa uwanelhihani mwaha uyo mmawani ni mmamatani mwonkhaye.
42008035	Attu nkayaawa yoone chikhumelhenlhe. Vaaphilhe aya wa Yesu, nkayamphwanya ntu aakumihiye mashoka nakhanlhe vamietoni va Yesu, nawanre ikuwo ni irusho chinankhanlhe rata mmuruni, attu onkhaye nkayoovacha.
42008036	Alhe yonne, nkayaahimiachera akhunanaya chinre awe wo ulhamihiya mashoka wa ntu ulhe.
42008037	Attu o iwani yo Ugerasi ayo nkayoovacha chinene. Nkayanlhepelha Yesu wiira athame. Paahi etu nkaawelha ikalhava nkaathama.
42008038	Ntu aalhamihiye mashoka ulhe ahonlhepelha Yesu wiira, “Ni mii nkittukane.” Nansho Yesu nkankhotelha, amwiirelhaka,
42008039	“Nhokolhieke uwani mwahimieke chipangelhiye inyu ni Nlhuku.” Ntu uyo nkaavira mmawani ahimiachaka chinre awe wo upangelhiya ni Yesu.
42008040	Yesu vaahokolhelhe awe ukhopelhelhe nttiya, attu yahompochera, ukhalhawaya yaari ammwehereraka.
42008041	Paahi ntu eehaniya Yairo nkaawa, aari nholhelhi neemelhelha inupa yo unlhapelha Nlhuku. Nkeewulhusha makukhu ammekelhaka Yesu wiira arwee uwannyawe,
42008042	ukhalhawaya mwaamwanaya o vekhawe, mwamwalhi o malhipa o iyaakha khumi ni pilhi aari nnookhwani. Yesu vaari awe arwaaka, attu yaari anthothokelhaka uno ni uno.
42008043	Mmoka aya aari opani amoka aawereiya ireta yo ukhuma iphome, nchorochoro wo iyaakha khumi ni pilhi, amalhihaka nhakhu aya uvira mmireteni, nansho ahilhamaka.
42008044	Nkayanttwara Yesu utulhi, nkayaavara ikuwo awe, iphome nkayaamaalha vavawo vavawo.
42008045	Yesu nkaakoha, “Apani akivanre?” Kila ntu nkaakhota, ni Napeturo nkayeera, “Owiittuchiha, attu ahourukureriani uno ni uno!”
42008046	Nansho Yesu nkeera, “Hawo ntu kivanre, kihochuwelha ukhalhawaya machiri ahokikhuma.”
42008047	Opani alhe vonne aya wiira khanooria wiivitha, nkayeewiha uno athukhumelhaka ni wiiwulhusha vamietoni va Yesu. Nkayeehimiacha vaattuni vawo, ahimiachaka nlhatu waani wo uvara mwiinjiro ni chinre aya wo ulhama ikwerere aya.
42008048	Yesu nkeera, “Mwaamwanaka, nrima ao uhoolhamiha. Urweeke wo mpuha.”
42008049	Yesu voolhumacha awe chiicho, karumiya aya o weemelhelha inupa yo unlhapelha Nlhuku nkaawa, nkeerelha, “Mwamwalhi inyu hokhwa, nhaahuvihe tho Owiittuchiha ayo.”
42008050	Nansho Yesu nkeewa, nkeerelha Nayairo, “Nhoove, mpisheke nrima, noolhama.”
42008051	Vaaphilhe aya vanupani, nkaachiichiha ntu unkelhana mpaani ahikhalhe Napeturo ni Nayohana ni Nayakhobo ni manyanaangoro o mwalhi uyo.
42008052	Kila ntu vavawo aari onlhaka umunlhelha mwalhi uyo. Yesu nkeera, “Umaalhiye uhuunlhiye. Mwalhi ulha kanakhwa, howiraka urupa!”
42008053	Attu onkhaye nkayanthiacha, ukhalhawaya yaari achuwelhaka wiira hokhwa.
42008054	Nansho Yesu nkammara moono nkeera, “Mwalhi, wunkweke!”
42008055	Nrima awe nkawanhokolhelha, nkonkwa, Yesu nkaalhehera wiira avahiye yolhia.
42008056	Manyanaangoro awe yaari anashannge, nansho Yesu nkaalhehera wiira ahinhimerie ntu riyoothe mwaha ukhumelhenlhe.
42009001	Yesu nkeehana owiittucha khumi ni elhi alhe, nkaavaha machiri ni ikuru yo woomolha mashoka o unanara ni waalhamiha areta.
42009002	Paahi nkaaruma yayo khumi ni elhi ayo avire ahimiachaka Imwene ya Nlhuku, ni waalhamiha areta onkhaye.
42009003	Nkeerelhacha, “Nhikushe ittu iriyoothe munkwahani, nhiwie ikopo mena nrupa mena mashurupu mena nchurukhu, ni mena mmoka inyu hikushe mwiinjiro wo nayelhi.
42009004	Inupa iriyoothe inohalha inyu upocheriya iyo, mwakhalheke vavawo mpaka vanohalha inyu uthama vawo.
42009005	Vahinopocheriya uhimiechesha winyu, mwathameke yeyo iwani iyo ni ukukutta ntukurukhu nnyaani wo waamuka.”
42009006	Owiittucha nkayaathamacha nkayaarwa mmawani, ahimiachaka Malhove Orera o Imwene ya Nlhuku ni waalhamiha attu awereiya.
42009007	Naherode Amwene o Ugalilaya veewilhe aya chittu chaapangiaa, nkayoova, ukhalhawaya attu akina yeera wiira Nayohana Obatiiza ahohihimmwa.
42009008	Attu akina eera wiira Naeliya ahoonia, akina yiiraka anamilhohi o khalhayi ahohihimmwa.
42009009	Naherode nkayeera, “Nayohana kihaahitha, nansho ulha ntu kinomwiiwaaka ulha phi mpani?” Nkayaathanana umwoona Yesu.
42009010	Akarumiya yahokolhieke, nkayanhimeria Yesu kila ittu yaapannge aya. Nkaakushacha nkayaarwa iwani yo Ubethsaida.
42009011	Attu vanchuwenlhe aya, nkayanttwara. Nkaapochera, nkoolhumacha mwaha wo Malhove Orera o Imwene ya Nlhuku, ni waalhamiha mareta yaarina aya.
42009012	Nchuwa veelha aya, akarumiya khumi ni elhi nkayanrweelha ni unhimeria wiira, “Mwaahiyeke attu ayo ahokolhiacheke uwannyaya ni uvira yaaviaka yolhia mmawani ni mmamatani, yaavie yolhia ni mapuro o urupa, ukhalhawaya vari ihu va vauthakoni.”
42009013	Nansho Yesu nkeera, “Mwaavaheke yolhia mwaattiva.” Nkayaakhulha, “Ittu nirina ihu iri mikatte nthanu ni ihopa pilhi. Chani nirweeke nathumeke yolhia yo waavaha attu onkhaye alha?”
42009014	Attu yaari vavawo aari alhopwana maelufu nthanu. Yesu nkeerelha owiittucha awe, “Mwaakhalhiheke attu vathi milhoko cha attu makhumi nthanu kila nimoka.”
42009015	Owiittucha yamalheke waakhalhiha attu mmapuroni,
42009016	Yesu nkaakusha mikatte nthanu ni ihopa pilhi, nkaaweha wiirimu, nkalhapelhelha ibarakha, nkaamianihacha, nkaavaha owiittucha yaakawelhe attu.
42009017	Attu onkhaye nkayaalhia, nkayaawonacha, ni owiittucha nkayaarokottacha mahalhahalha aahanlhe, nkayaachariha ni ukusha makaya khumi ni melhi.
42009018	Nihuku nimoka Yesu aari alhapelhaka vekha awe, owiittucha nkayaawacha, nkaakohacha, “Ana attu aneera mii phi mpani?”
42009019	Nkayaakhulhacha yiiraka, “Akina aneera, Nayohana Obatiiza, akina aneera Naeliya, ni akina aneera inyuva mmoka a anamilhohi o khalhayi hihimmwe.”
42009020	Nkaakoha, “Ni inyu mwaatti chani, nneera mii phi mpani?” Napeturo nkayaakhulha, “Inyuva phi Kuristo Moopolhi thanlhiye ni Nlhuku.”
42009021	Paahi Yesu nkaachiichiha wiira ahinhimiachere ntu riyoothe yoyo mwaha uyo.
42009022	Nkaahimeria tho, “Mwaana a Ntu nowa utwarushiya ni ukhotiya ni ashulhupalhe ni opochera ishaani olhupalhe ni owiittuchiha Malhehero. Noowa eeviya nansho nihuku no neraru nowa uhihimmwa.”
42009023	Nkeerelha attu onkhaye, “Ntu riyoothe nothanana ukittwara eeruneke mwanene, akusheke nsalaaba awe kila nihuku akittwareke,
42009024	Ukhalhawaya ntu riyoothe nothanana woopolha ukumi awe, noopoteriha, nansho ntu riyoothe noriha ukumi awe wo nlhatu waka nowa woopolha.
42009025	Ntu nohalha upattani wo upatta mpuha wonkhaye wo velhaponi va, nansho apoterihaka ukumi awe mwanene? Mena khiiwo!
42009026	Ntu oonaka ishoni wo nlhatu naka ni meettuchiho aka, Mwaana a Ntu ni uyo nowa umwoonelha ishoni vanohalha awe uwa wo nthimicho wa Athithi ni minepa chitakatifu.
42009027	Kinoohimeriani ikekhia wiira, ahawo akina vaa ahinowa aakhwa ahinaya woona Imwene ya Nlhuku.”
42009028	Yavireke ijuma imoka toka voolhumanche awe yayo malhove ayo, Yesu nkaakusha Napeturo ni Nayohana ni Nayakhobo nkayaarwaa umwaakoni ulhapelhani.
42009029	Vaari aya alhapelhachaka, ikhove awe nkayaarukunuwa, ni ikuwo chawe nkachaateelha chinene.
42009030	Nkoonia attu elhi amwaarerihanaka Yesu, ni ayo yaari ashinna Musa ni Naeliya,
42009031	aakhumelhenlhe wo nthimicho, nkaamwaarerihana mwaha wo umalhiha ntheko wa Nlhuku nnookhwani ukhumelhelha Uyerusalemu.
42009032	Napeturo ni akhunanaya yaari anarumpe, yeyo ikatema nkayonkwa ni woona nthimicho wa Yesu ni attu elhi emenlhe vamoka ni uyo.
42009033	Attu elhi ayo vaathama aya wa Yesu, Napeturo nkeera, “Owiittuchiha, ihorera hii ukhalha vaa! Ninootheka etu mahema mararu, nimoka nawinyu nikina na ashinna Musa ni nikina ni Naeliya.” We ikekhiaye khayaari achuwelhaka inoolhumacha aya.
42009034	Napeturo voolhumacha aya, nihute nkanaakhuruwa ni waakhuneelha, vaawa aya owiittucha alhe yaari yoovaka chinene.
42009035	Nlhove nkaneewiya ukhuma wiirimu neeraka, “Ulha phi Mwaamwanaka, kinonttuna aka, mmwiiwelhelheke yoyo!”
42009036	Nlhove vaamaanlhe aya, Yesu aari vekha awe. Owiittucha nkayaamaalha wo unhihimeria ntu riyoothe yoyo mwaha uyo.
42009037	Waashelhe waya Yesu ni owiittucha araru ahokhuruwa umwaakoni, ni nlhoko mwinchi wa attu nkawankumaana Yesu.
42009038	Vavawo, ntu mmoka nkaakhuwelha, “Owiittuchiha! Kinoulhepelhani chonte mummwehe mwanaka, mwanaka o yekha awe!
42009039	Nshoka ninonkelhakelha, khummulhushaka venchi, khukumaka niphoru mmwano, khunhuvihachaka chinene wo uhinhiya!
42009040	Kahaalhepelha owiittucha inyu wiira oomolhe nshoka nno, nansho khayonrie.”
42009041	Yesu nkaakhulha, “Mwaatti iyari ihiri ni nrima, iwonnye va! Kinohalha ulhokelha ni uvilhelhani mpaka iyaakhani?” Nkeerelha athumwanawe mwaana ayo, “Mummwiiheke mwaamwaninyu uyo vaa.”
42009042	Mwaana vaawihiya awe, nshoka no unanara nkanammulhusha vathi ni unhelha ichilhichilhi. Yesu nkaachachera nshoka nno, mwaana nkaalhama, nkanhokolhosha wa athumwanawe.
42009043	Attu onkhaye nkayoomiya uwanoni woona ikuru chulhupalhe cha Nlhuku. Attu yaari ashangaka chittu chonkhaye chaapangiye ni Yesu, venre awe wo owiittucha awe,
42009044	“Mwiiwelhelheke alha kinohalha aka uhimeriani! Mwaana a Ntu nokelha uhelhiya mmathathani mwa attu.”
42009045	Nansho owiittucha khayaachuwenlhe yaahimia awe, ukhalhawaya yaari inavithiye uwannyaya. Nkayoova unkoha maana aya.
42009046	Nkawaachokholha ukohaniya owiittucha ashineneru wiira phi mpani ri mulhupalhe aya.
42009047	Yesu nkaachuwelha choopuwelha aya munrimani, paahi etu nkankusha mwanhima, nkaamweemesha vaari aya,
42009048	nkeera, “Ntu riyoothe nompochera mwanhima thoko ulha wo nchina naka nokipochera mii, ni ntu nokipochera mii, naapochera akirumilhe. Ukhalhawaya ri mwankani waapwaha onkhaye munlhokoni mwinyu, yoyo phi mulhupalhe inyu.”
42009049	Nayohana nkayoolhumacha, “Owiittuchiha, nahomwoona ntu oomolhaka mashoka wo nchina ninyu, nkananchiichiha, ukhalhawaya khari nyu ninonttukana ihu vamoka.”
42009050	Yesu nkeerelha, “Nhichiichihe, ukhalhawaya ntu riyoothe hinoovengani yoyo ri vamoka ni inyu.”
42009051	Ikatema vaatamenrie aya ukushiya Yesu wiirimu, nkoona mbaya arwee Uyerusalemu.
42009052	Nkaaruma akarumiya anholhelhe, arwee Usamariya akooroshe vakittu vanohalha awe uphiyelha.
42009053	Nansho anenchi o Usamariya ahokhota umpochera ukhalhawaya aari alhukamaka Uyerusalemu.
42009054	Paahi etu owiittucha Nayakhobo ni Nayohana vonne aya chiicho, nkayeera, “Thithi, chani niihaniheke mooro wo wiirimu naamalhihe yalha?”
42009055	Yesu nkaarukunuwa ni waachachera.
42009056	Paahi Yesu nkaathama mwanene vamoka ni owiittucha awe nkayaarwaa iwani ikina.
42009057	Vaari aya munkwahani, ntu mmoka nkaamwirelha Yesu, “Kinouttwarani uriwoothe unohalha inyu urwaa.”
42009058	Yesu nkaamwaakhulha, “Anancheto ahana milhiwi ni ashinuni o uchulhu urimu ahanaa iphuuru chaya nansho Mwaana a Ntu kharina nipuro no waathalhelha muru awe.”
42009059	Nkaamwirelha ntu nkhwawe, “Nkittware.” Nansho ntu ulhe nkeera, “Thithi, nkihiye thoko kirwee kaavithe athumwanaka.”
42009060	Yesu nkaakhulha, nkeerelha, “Mwaahiyeke attu akhwilhe yaavitheke attu aya khwilhe. Inyu nrweeke mwahimiacheke Imwene ya Nlhuku.”
42009061	Ntu nkina nkeera, “Thithi kinouttwarani, nansho nkihiye thoko kalhehe uwani.”
42009062	Yesu nkeera, “Ntu riyoothe nolhima uno awehaka utulhi, yoyo khanooria ittu nhina Imwene ya Nlhuku.”
42010001	Yamalheke yayo, Athithi nkayaathanlha akina makhumi saba ni elhi, nkaaruma elhielhi arwee aholhelhe kila iwani ni kila vakittu vaathanana awe urwaa.
42010002	Nkeerelhacha, “Nlhaalha uri mwinchi, nansho anamitheko o ukhungura ari vakani. Nlhepelheke etu anene nlhaalha yaawihe anamitheko oowa ukhungurani cholhia chaya.
42010003	Nrweeke etu! Kinourumani mwaattiva thoko ikhondoro umiichini.
42010004	Nhikushe nchako wo nchurukhu mena nrupa mena iratu, nhinkohache ntu riyoothe mphironi.
42010005	Vanophiya inyu vawani, nchokholheke wo wiira, ‘Mpuha ukhalhe ni inyu,’
42010006	Akhalhaka haawo ntu noopocherani mwommo, nhiyeke mpuha inyu vavawo, aahikhalheke, nhokolhosheke mpuha inyu.
42010007	Mwakhalheke vavawo, mwalhieke ni uwuria ittu iriyoothe nnohalha inyu uvahiya, ukhalhawaya namitheko hophwanelhiya malhivo. Nhikelhe mwaakukuriacha uno ni uno.
42010008	Mwaphiyaka vawani mpocheriyaka, nlhieke yolhia nterekhelhiye inyu iyo,
42010009	mwaalhamiheke areta ni waahimeria attu o wowo wiira, ‘Imwene ya Nlhuku ihaatameria.’
42010010	Nansho mwaphiyaka vawani vahinopocheriya inyu, nthameke, ni vanovira inyu mmaphironi mwaya mweereke,
42010011	‘Ata ntukurukhu no vawani winyu ninivanre nnyani nno, ninookukutta vano wooniha wiira nihouhiyerani mwaashinene! Nansho nchuwelheke wiira, Imwene ya Nlhuku ihaatameria.’
42010012	Kinouhimeriani ikekhiaye wiira, Nihuku no uhukumulhiya attu nno, inowa ukhalha ittu yo waalhuwa chinene wo iwani yo Usodoma uvilhelha ntwarusho upwaha yeyo iwani iyo!”
42010013	“Nhothapana inyu iwani yo Ukorazini! Nhothapana iwani yo Ubethsaida! Ukhalhawaya cho ushangiha chipangiye uwaninyu chikaapangiye Utiro ni Usidoni, attu yammwara majuniya ni wuupuruwa vaatuurani wooniha wiira ahokhoroma uhiya uwonya waya!
42010014	Nansho nihuku no ihukumu nno, inowa ukhalha ittu yo waalhuwa wo iwani cho Utiro ni Usidoni wooria uvilhelha ntwarusho naya upwahani mwaattiva.
42010015	Ni inyu Nakapenaumu! Chani nnothanana wiiwelhiha mwaanene wiirimu? Nnoowa mwaawulhusheriya unaminepa!”
42010016	Yesu nkeerelha owiittucha awe, “Ntu riyoothe nowiiwelhelhani, hokiiwelhelha mii, ntu riyoothe nookhottani nokikhota mii, ni ntu nokikhota mii naakhota akirumme.”
42010017	Makhumi saba ni elhi aarumiye alhe nkayaahokolhia, yaari anateelhiye chinene yeeraka, “Thithi, ata mashoka ahoniiwa vaaromonlhe ihu nchina ninyu!”
42010018	Yesu nkaakhulha, “Kahomwoona Nakare awulhuwaka thoko uverunya ukhuma wiirimu.
42010019	Mwiiweke etu! Kihohuvahani ikuru, yo unyikalha inwaa ni makharang'andha ni ikuru yo unnyikalha mmalhaponi inyu ulhe, ihikhalhaka ittu cho uhilhoka
42010020	Nansho nhiteelhiye ukhalhawaya nshoka nihowiiwani, nansho nteelhiyeke ukhalhawaya machina inyu aholhepiya wiirimu.”
42010021	Yeyo ikatema iyo, Yesu ahoteelhiya wo ikuru yo Iphumu ya Nlhuku nkeera, “Thithi, Athithi o wiirimu ni o velhaponi! Kinoushukuruni ukhalhawaya nhaavitha attu o irusho ulha mwaha ulha, nkamwaapatakulhelha akani. Aye, Thithi, phinre aya wo uchivelhani.”
42010022	Nkeera tho, “Athithi ahokivaha chittu chonkhaye. Khaawo nchuwenlhe Mwaana ahikhalhe Athithi ni khaawo aachuwenlhe Athithi ihikhalhe Mwaana ni attu athanlhiye ni Mwaana wiira aapatakulhelhe.”
42010023	Yesu nkaarukunuwelha owiittucha awe nkaahimeria wo nivitho, “Nhoreeriya mwaatti ukhalhawaya miitho inyu ahoona chi chittu chinoona inyu chi!
42010024	Kinouhimeriani wiira, anamilhohi a Nlhuku ni mamwene enchi yahothanana alha anoona inyu alha, ahoone ni wiiwa, nansho khayoonne, ahottuna wiiwa thoko mwaattiva nansho khayeewilhe.”
42010025	Owiittuchiha Malhehero rata nkayaawa ni unkoha Yesu wo unlhikacha. “Owittuchiha, kipangekeni kipatte ukumi wo uhimalha?”
42010026	Yesu nkaakhulha, “Malhehero alhepiye chani? Nnoshomani?”
42010027	Yoyo ntu uyo nkaakhulha, “Munttuneke Nlhuku inyu wo nrima inyu wonkhaye ni nnepa inyu wonkhaye ni machiri inyu onkhaye ni irusho chinyu chonkhaye ni waattuna amwaatamana inyu thoko chineettuna inyu mwaanene.”
42010028	Yesu nkeerelha, “Nhaakhulha rata. Mpangeke etu ni ukhalha thoko chiicho.”
42010029	Nansho ochuwelha Malhehero rata ayo nkayaathanana wiichooniha wiira aari ntu o nrima woombone, paahi ahonkoha Yesu, “Amwaatamana aka phi apani?”
42010030	Yesu nkaakhulha, “Ntu mmoka aari alhukamaka Uyeriko akhumaka Uyerusalemu. Nkaavariya ni attu o uvara makhuche, nkayanrulha ikuwo, nkayanthurulha nhakhu awe nkayaamwata chinene, nkaahiya nakomweelhe.
42010031	Opochera ishaani amoka nkayaavira vavawo, nansho vaamwonne aya khayanlhohilhe, nkayaavira uchereshere.
42010032	Chiichammo, Nlawi mmoka nkaaphiya vavawo, nkaamwona nkaavira uchereshere.
42010033	Nansho Nsamariya mmoka eeta munkwahani ahophiya vavawo, vaamwonne awe ahomwonelha ikiriri.
42010034	Nkaamwaatameria, nkanhapiha makhwata, nkanhika makhura ni idivai ni unttukelha. Amalheke nkammwelhiha vachulhu iphuta awe, nkanrweha inupa ya alheto ammwerehe.
42010035	Washeeke, nkaakumiha nchurukhu wo malhivo o mahuku melhi ummaha mwanene inupa ni umwiirelha, ‘Mummwereheke ntu ulha, ni ittu inohalha wunchereria kinoowa kaalhiva vanohalha aka uhokolhia.’ ”
42010036	Paahi Yesu nkaakoha, “Wo irusho chinyu inyuva, wo yayo attu araru ayo, phi mpani aari namwaatamana e ikekhiaye a ntu aatakachiye ni attu o uvara makhuche ulhe?”
42010037	Ochuwelha Malhehero rata alhe nkayaakhulha, “Aari ntu amwonenlhe ikiriri ulhe.” Yesu nkeera, “Ni inyu etu nrweeke, mwapangeke thoko chiicho.”
42010038	Yesu ni owiittucha awe vaari aya munkwahani, yahophiya iwani yaapocherie awe uwani wa opani amoka eehaniya Namatha.
42010039	Yayo yaari ni arokoraya eehaniya Amariamu, aakhanlhe vathi vamietoni va Athithi ni wiiwelhelha meettuchiho aya.
42010040	Namatha nkayaathunalha woona wiira aapanga vekha aya ntheko wo waaterekhelha alheto, nkayaarwaa ni wiira, “Thithi, woonaka khannoona wiira arokoraka ayo ahokihiyera ntheko vekha aka? Mweerelheke aweeke aakikaviha!”
42010041	Athithi nkayaakhulha, “Namatha, Namatha! Nnothemwani.
42010042	Ittu imoka tu phi renre. Amariamu ahothanlha ittu yoombone ihinooria uthurulhiya ni ntu riyoothe.”
42011001	Nihuku nimoka Yesu aari alhapelhaka vo vekha awe. Amalhiheke, owiittucha awe mmoka nkaamwirelha, “Thithi, nniittuchiheke ni hii ulhepelha, thoko chinre aya Nayohana wo weettuchiha owiittucha aya.”
42011002	Yesu nkeerelha, “Vanolhapelha inyu mwiireke, ‘Athithi nri wiirimu, Nchina ninyu nithimichiye, imwene inyu iwe.
42011003	Nnivaheke yolhia ihu kila nihuku.
42011004	Nnihiyerereke uwonya wihu, thoko nineera ihu wo waahiyerera anittekenlhe. Nnoopolhe muulhikachiyani.’ ”
42011005	Yesu nkeerelhacha tho owiittucha awe, “Ikhalhe wiira mmoka inyu norwaa wa ampwana awe uhiyu variyari ni uhimia wiira, ‘Mpwana, nkaashimihe mikatte miraru,
42011006	alheto ahokiphwanya ampwana aka ari munkwahani, ni mii akirina ittu yo waavaha!’
42011007	Ni ayo anari mpaani nkayaakhulha, ‘Nthame uwo nhikihuvihe mii! Kihottia nlhako, mii ni achishaana aka nihokelha mpaani urupani. Paahi akinonkwa kiwe kouvahani ittu iriyoothe.’
42011008	Inohalha wiiria chani etu? Kinouhimeriani ikekhia wiira khanoonkwa uwaavahani nkatte wo nlhatu no umpwana waarina aya, mena, nansho wo nlhatu no waanyakulha ni uthepa uvekelha, phi chiichammo chinohalha aya wunkwa ni waavaha ittu inovekelha aya.
42011009	“Paahi etu, Nvekelheke nnoovahiya, mwaavieke nnoopatta, nhodisheke vankhorani nnoohulhelhiya.
42011010	Ukhalhawaya ntu riyoothe novekelha noovahiya, ni ntu naavia noopatta, ni ntu nohodisha vankhorani noohulhelhiya.
42011011	Chani mwaana vanovekelha awe ihopa wa anaangoro awe, novahiya inwaa kuhiwe ihopa?
42011012	Ama novahiya nikharang'andha vanovekelha awe nnyoche?
42011013	Inakhalhaka nri attu o unanara mirima nansho nhochuwelha chittu choombone cho waavaha achishaana inyu. Chani etu, athumwaninyu o wiirimu khanouvahani chittu choombone wo upwaha, anowaavaha Iphumu ya Nlhuku attu anaavekelha!”
42011014	Nihuku nimoka Yesu aari omolhaka nshoka no unanara nantunke ntu huulhumache. Paahi etu vankhumme aya, ntu ulhe ahooria wulhumacha tho, mpaka nlhoko wa attu nkawoomiya uwanoni.
42011015	Nansho attu akina nkayeera, “Noomolha mashoka wo ikuru yo Belzebuli, nholhelhi o mashoka o unanara, phi nommaha ikuru yo woomolha.”
42011016	Attu akina yaari athananaka unria Yesu, paahi nkayamwiirelha wiira apange cho ushangiha cho wiirimu oonihe wiira Nlhuku ri vamoka ni uyo.
42011017	Nansho Yesu ahochuwelha choopuwelha aya, nkeera, “Imwene iriyoothe imianelhe yaatakanaka ineeneru yeyo khinolhokelha chinene, chiicho iwani imianelhe yaatakanaka ineneru inowulhuwa.
42011018	Paahi yakhalhaka etu imwene yo Nakare iheemianiha yaatakanaka ineeneru, inohalha ulhokelha chani? Mwaatti nneera wiira eti kinoomolha mashoka wo uvahiya ikuru ni Belzebuli.
42011019	Yakhalhaka kinoomolha mashoka wo ikuru yo Belzebuli, owiittucha inyu etu anoomolha wo ikuru ya apani? Wo yoyo nlhatu uyo etu ashaana inyu mwaashinene phi nowa uhukumulhani mwaatti.
42011020	Nansho yakhalhaka kinoomolha mashoka wo ikuru ya Nlhuku, nchuwelheke wiira Imwene ya Nlhuku ihomalha uphiya uwaninyu.
42011021	“Ntu o machiri vanolhitelhelha awe inupa awe ni ikerero, inupa ni nhakhu awe chinoolhama.
42011022	Nansho awaaka ntu o machiri chinene o mpwaha ni umwaata ni ummulhusha, yoyo nookusha ikerero chaakhulhuvelha awe chiyo ni umwaakha nhakhu.
42011023	“Ntu riyoothe hiri vamoka ni mii, yoyo nookivinga, hinokhungura vamoka ni mii yoyo phi noomwarusha.
42011024	“Nshoka no unanara vanoomolhiya aya mwiiruttuni mwa ntu, nivovira neetakachaka uhiri maashi naaviaka nipuro no wiittuwa. Naahooneke, vavawo phi neera aya, ‘Kinoohokolhia unupani waka.’
42011025	Paahi noohokolhia ni uphwanya inupa mwaari inakwechiye ni urerihiya.
42011026	Paahi tho, phi norwaa aya ni waakusha mashoka makina saba o uhilhoka umphwaha uyo, ni uwa uukhalhani vamoka ni uyo. Vanomalha aya, ntu uyo nokhalha muuhuvani chinene upwaha khalhayi.”
42011027	Yesu voolhumacha awe, opani amoka nkayeera, “Ahopuha athiyana uyanreni ni uwaamwiihani!”
42011028	Nansho Yesu nkaakhulha, “Nansho areeriye chinene, phi ayo aneewa nlhove na Nlhuku ni uvarechesha!”
42011029	Nlhoko wa attu voonchereria aya, Yesu nkeera tho, “Ilha iyari ilha iri yo uhilhoka ilha! Inovekelha woona cho ushangiha, nansho khinoonihiya yo ushangiha iriyoothe ihikhalhe i Nayona.
42011030	Chiichammo etu Nayona chenre aya wo waashangiha attu o Uninavi, phi chiichammo Mwaana a Ntu chinohalha awe waashangiha attu o ilha iyari ilha.
42011031	Nihuku no uhukumulhiya attu nno, Ahano o Usheeba anowa weemelha ni waahukumulha attu e ilha iyari ilha, ukhalhawaya ahovira toka utayi awe eewelhelha irusho chi Naselemani, ni mii kinohimia wiira vaa haawo Yesu, ntu mulhupalhe naapwaha Naselemani.
42011032	Nihuku no uhukumulhiya attu, attu o Uninavi anowa weemelha waahukumulha attu o ilha iyari ilha wiira ahowonya. Ukhalhawaya attu o Uninavi ahokhoroma veewilhe aya meettuchiho a Nayona, nansho vaa hawo mulhupalhe naapwaha Nayona!
42011033	“Khaawo ntu noparihelha ikhandiri awe ni ukhuneelha ittutu, nansho nothomia vachulhu ikiango wiira yaamwalhelhe attu anokelha mpaani.
42011034	Miitho inyu phi nthuko wo iruttu. Miitho inyu akhalhaka makumi, iruttu yonkhaye inokhalha voonene, nansho miitho awereiyaka iruttu yonkhaye inokhalha yo unanara, inokhalha mwiipiphini.
42011035	Mwiiraniheke etu, nthuko uri nhina mwinyu uhikhalhe ipiphi.
42011036	Paahi etu, iruttu inyu yonkhaye yakhalhaka voonene, wo uhikhalha mwiipiphini, iruttu inokhalha voonene thoko vanomwalhelhiya aya ni nthuko.”
42011037	Yesu amalhihekeru wulhumacha, Afarisayo amoka ahomwiirelha arwee alhie yolhia uwannyawe. Nkaarwa ulhiani yolhia, nkaakhalha ulhia.
42011038	Afarisayo ayo nkayaashanga woona wiira Yesu aari alhiaka wo uhinyawa mathatha rata.
42011039	Paahi Athithi nkayeera, “Mwaatti Amafarisayo va, nnohapiha ikahi ni iphache wo vatheru, nansho nhina ncharaka chittu cho nanrokotolhe chihinlhoka.
42011040	Nhophupuwalha inyu ayi! Nlhuku phi kooronshe vathe ni nhina chiicho.
42011041	Nansho mwaavaheke attu ahirina chittu chiri nhina, ni chikina chonkhaye chiyo chinookhalha chorera uwaninyu.
42011042	“Nhothapana inyu Mwaamafarisayo va! Ukhalhawaya nnaahukumulha ni waalhiviha attu isadaka yo nifungu no khumi ata yo mathaakhuru o uhelhiya mmathapani, nchicha ni mathaakhuru makina, nansho nhilhohaka mwaha wo uvarechesha ikekhiaye ni uttuna wa Nlhuku. Yayo yaaphwanelhiye wooniya wiira nhovarechesha rata nhilhiyalhaka makina ayo.
42011043	“Nhothapana inyu Mwaamafarisayo va! Mwaatti nnottuna ukhalha miholho mapuro o nthimicho wi inupa yo unlhapelha Nlhuku ni ukohachiya wo nthimicho vanopangiya maronda.
42011044	Nhothapana inyu! Mwaatti nri thoko mahiye o uhichuwania, attu aneeta aya vachulhu waya ahichuwelhaka.”
42011045	Owiittuchiha Malhehero a ashinna Musa amoka nkayaamwiirelha, “Owiittuchiha, venre inyu chiicho, nhoniruwana!”
42011046	Yesu nkaakhulha, “Nhothapana ni inyu Owiittuchiha Malhehero a ashinna Musa va! Nnaaria attu misigo cho ulhemelha, nansho mwaanene nhookolhaka nikokho nhaakavihaka ukusha chechiyo misigo chiyo.
42011047	Nhothapana inyu! Ukhalhawaya nnoovaka mahiye a anamilhohi a Nlhuku eevakachiye ni manyaapwiinyu.
42011048	Paahi etu nnohimiechesha ni uvarechesha mitheko cho manyaapwiiya inyu, ukhalhawaya yayo phi evilhe anamilhohi ni inyu vano nnoovaka mahiye aya.
42011049	Wo nenno nlhove nno etu, irusho cha Nlhuku chineera, ‘Kinowaarweehelha anamilhohi ni akarumiya, anokoweeva akina ni waatwarushacha akina.’
42011050	Paahi etu attu o ilha iyari ilha anowa utwarushachiya wo weeva anamilhohi a Nlhuku onkhaye toka voopiye aya ilhapo,
42011051	toka wiiviya wa Nahabilu mpaka wiiviya u Nazakariya, yeeviye variyari madhubahu ni Inupa Itakatifu. Eiyo, kinouhimeriani wiira, attu a ilha iyari ilha anowa utwarushiya wo mitheko chaya!
42011052	“Nhothapana inyu owiittuchiha Malhehero! Ukhalhawaya nhokusha mittukulho cho nlhako wo inupa yo irusho, mwaanene nhikelhaka, mwaachiichihaka attu anlhikacha ukelha wowo!”
42011053	Vaathama awe, Amafarisayo alhe ni owiittuchiha Malhehero nkayaachokholha unchopeyacha chinene wo unkohakoha chookohiya chinchi,
42011054	alhikachaka unria wiira ammare wo malhove awe.
42012001	Attu maelufu menchi vaathukhumana aya vamoka, anyikalhanachaka ashineneru, Yesu nkeerelhacha owiittucha awe thoko, “Mwiichinanelheke ni ihengedure ya Amafarisayo, yaani unafiki waya.
42012002	Kila ittu ivithiye inowa uhumbukulhiya ni kila ittu ivithiye inowa yaapatakulhiya.
42012003	Paahi etu, kila ittu yuulhumachilhe inyu mwiipiphini, inowa yeewania voonene, ni ittu yaapilhe inyu nlhako unatteiye, inowa yaahimiachiya vanchaarani.
42012004	“Kinouhimeriani, manyampwana aka, nhoove attu aneeva iruttu nansho ahooriaka ittu ikina iriyoothe.
42012005	Kinowoonihani vano etu, mpani o umwoova. Mmwooveke Nlhuku, nooria wiiva, amalhaka wiiva, hanaa ikuru yo unrihelha ntu umooroni Ujehannamu. Nkirumelhelheke mii, yoyo phi vekha awe o wooviya!
42012006	“Chani, athooche athanu khanthumihiya wo isenti pilhi? Nansho Nlhuku khanonlhiyalha ata mmoka.
42012007	Wo ikekhiaye, ata ikharari chinyu cho mmuruni chihaalhakelhiya chonkhaye. Nhoove etu, mwaatti nri o ukhulhuvelhiya chinene waapwaha athooche enchi va!
42012008	“Kinouhimeriani ikekhiaye wiira, kila ntu norumelhelha vaattuni wiira phi awaka, Mwaana a Ntu ni uyo noowa aarumelhelha wo minepa cha Nlhuku wiira phi awawe.
42012009	Nansho attu onkhaye anokikhotta vaattuni, Mwaana a Ntu nowa ni uyo nowa unkhota wo minepa cha Nlhuku.

42012011	“Vanohalha aya uweemeshani mu inupa yo unlhapelha Nlhuku ama wa aholhelhi ama wo attu o ikuru yo utawara, nhikelhiye nipampa wiira nnohalha wulhumachani wiira mwaakhulhe.
42012012	Iphumu ya Nlhuku nowa owiittuchihani yeyo ikatema iyo nlhove naani no wulhumacha.”

42012014	Yesu nkaamwaakhulha, “Mpwana, mpani kivanhe mii ntheko wo uhukumulhani ama ukawaniha nhakhu inyu mwaatti elhi va?”
42012015	Nkaathepa waahimeria attu onkhaye eeraka, “Mwiichinanelheke ni iphiro chonkhaye cho nlhulha, ukhalhawaya ukumi wa ntu khumpangiaa ni chittu chirinawe ama wo nhakhu urinawe.”
42012016	Paahi Yesu nkaahimeria nlhikaaniho nna, “Ahaawo ntu mmoka o nhakhu wo imata yaaruweria awe chinene.
42012017	Nkaakhalha oopuwelhaka mwaneneru, ‘Akirina nikhupi no uthokoreria cholhia chaka. Kiireke chani etu?’
42012018	Nkeecheerelha, ‘Kinoophomolha ichikuti chaka ni utheka nikhupi nulhupalhe chinene, ninohalha aka uthokoreria cholhia ni chittu chaka chonkhaye.
42012019	Vavawo phi nohalha aka wiira, Nhoreeriya! Nhanaa vano akhiba yo chittu chonkhaye chaathemwelha inyu iyaakha chinchi chinene. Mwiittuweke etu vano, nlhieke, mmwurieke ni ulhia mpuha ene!’
42012020	Nansho Nlhuku nkaamwirelha, ‘Nhophupuwalha inyu! Ulha uhiyu wo lhelho ulha, ukumi inyu phi noweiya aya, ni nhakhu wonkhaye nshungilhe inyu unohalha ukhalha wa apani?’ ”
42012021	Yesu nkaamalhiha eeraka, “Phiri aya chiicho wa ntu neecheshera nhakhu awe mwanene, uhikhalhaka nhakhu unomphwanelha Nlhuku.”
42012022	Yesu nkeerelha owiittucha awe, “Mwaatti kinouhimeriani wiira, nhikelhiye nipampa no mwaha wo yolhia wiira nlhame ama ikuwo cho uwara mwiiruttuni mwinyu.
42012023	Ukumi phi renre upwaha yolhia ni iruttu upwaha ikuwo.
42012024	Mwooneke anakhuku, khanaalha imbeyu ama ukhungura vanlhaalhani, kharina ichikuti mena nikhupi, Nlhuku phi naalhiha! Ni inyu mwaatti nri o ukhulhuvelhiya waapwaha ashinuni!
42012025	Mpani munlhokoni mwinyu wo ukhalha ni nipampa, nowooria wuncherera ukumi awe vakani?
42012026	Paahi etu, yakhalhaka wiira khannooria ata vakani upanga ittu thoko yeyo, nipampa ne ishiyani etu?
42012027	Mwooneke ituva chineera aya wookonda, khachirina ntheko mena khachinotiva. Nansho kinouhimeriani wiira ata Amwene Naselemani anene ayo, ni mpuha waya wonkhaye khayaawanre ikuwo yo nthimicho thoko imoka aya ituva chi.
42012028	Yakhalhaka etu Nlhuku phi nokondiha chiicho mathaakhuru o mmatani ari lhelho ahaawo, meelho ahorihiya vamooroni, chani khanoria uwarihani mwaatti wo upwaha? Mwaatti chani woonaka mirima chinyu chiri chikani!
42012029	“Paahi etu nhikelhiye nipampa, nhuvihiyaka ni chittu cho ulhia ni uwuria.
42012030	Ukhalhawaya chechiyo chittu chonkhaye chiyo chinohuvelhiya velhaponi va ni attu ahinchuwenlhe Nlhuku. Athumwaninyu o wiirimu ahochuwelha chittu chonkhaye nnothanana inyu chiyo.
42012031	Nansho mwaatti nchenjeukelheke thoko Imwene ya Nlhuku, ni inyu nnoowa mwaavahiya ni wuncherereriya.”
42012032	“Nhoove, inyu mwaatti nri nlhoko mwankani wa owiittucha aka, Athumwaninyu o wiirimu ahochivelhiya uuvahani mwaatti Imwene.
42012033	Nthumiheke nhakhu inyu ni waavaha nchurukhu uyo amashikini. Nkoorosheke mirupa chihinthaalha, ni wiishungera nhakhu wiirimu uhinowukuwa aya. Wowo, attu o wiiya khaneeiya mena nrenje khunolhia.
42012034	Vanohalha ukhalha nhakhu inyu, nrima inyu unohalha ukhalha vavawo.
42012035	“Nhiittialhe, nkhaalheke rata, ni ikhandiri chinyu chikhalheke tayari,
42012036	thoko anamitheko anaaweherera anene ntheko ahokolhie ukhuma u arusini, awe aahulhelha vanohalha aya wiihana vankhorani.
42012037	Ahoreeriya yayo anamitheko ayo, anohalha uphwanyiya ni anene ntheko ashelhelhihaka! Kinouhimeriani wo ikekhiaye wiira, anowa urulha nikoti naya, ni waakhalhiha wiira aaterekhelhache.
42012038	Areeriye chani yayo anamitheko ayo anohalha uphwanyiya ashelhelhihaka inakhalhaka uhiyu veriyari ama mapikoosha!
42012039	Nchuwelheke wiira, anene inupa akaachuwenlhe ikatema o wiiya vanowa aya, khaarupa, anshelhelhiha alhitelhelhaka inupa aya ihiphomolhiye.
42012040	Ni inyu mwaatti chiicho, nhittialhe, ukhalhawaya Mwaana a Ntu nowaa ikatema ihinaanyihera inyu.”
42012041	Napeturo nkayeera, “Thithi, nna nlhikaaniho nna nawihu vekha ama ni attu akina chiicho?”
42012042	Athithi nkayaakhulha, “Paahi etu, phi karumiya ani nokhulhuvelhiya o irusho? Phi yoyo novahiya ipilhi, weemelhelha ni waalhiha anamitheko nanawe waayakaru.
42012043	Horeeriya yoyo karumiya uyo vanophwanyiya awe ni anene ntheko apangaka chiicho vanohokolhia aya uwani!
42012044	Ikekhiaye nowa ummaha ntheko mulhupalhe wo weemelhelha nhakhu aya wonkhaye.
42012045	Nansho, karumiya uyo echiirelhaka munrimani mwaneneru wiira anene ntheko khanohokolhia chitema, nkaachokholha waatakacha anamitheko akhunanawe, ashilhopwana ni ashithiyana alhiaka ni uhapalhiya,
42012046	anene ntheko phi nohokolhia aya chitema nihuku nihinaanyihera awe ni ikatema ihichuwenlhe awe. Anene ntheko anowa untwarusha ni unkakhelha wa attu ahinonrumelhelha Nlhuku.
42012047	“Karumiya nochuwelha mathananelho a anene ntheko, nansho hiicheshaka rata, nowaatiya chinene.
42012048	Nansho karumiya nopanga wo uhichuwelha nowa utwarushiya vakani. Vahiye chinchi nowa ukohiya chinchi, vahiye chinchi chinene nowa ukohiya chinchi chinene.
42012049	“Kiwilhe uparihelha mooro velhaponi, ukaari unapharenlhee!
42012050	Kihanaa ubatiizo wo utwarushiya ukiphwanenlhe, kinthemwa chani wiira utimire!
42012051	Nnaanyihera kiwanne mpuha velhaponi va? Mena, akiwanne mpuha, kiwanne umwalhaana.
42012052	Uchokholha vano nna, iwani ya attu athanu inomwalhaana, attu araru wa attu elhi ni elhi wa araru.
42012053	Manyanaangoro ashilhopwana avenganaka ni achishaana aya ashilhopwana, ni ashaana ashilhopwana aavengaka ashithumwanaya, manyanaangoro athiyana aavengaka ashaana aya ashithiyana, ni ashaana ashithiyana aavengaka manyanaangoro, ahokohi aavengaka ashihokohi aya.”
42012054	Yesu nkaahimeria tho attu, “Vanoona inyu nihute nikhumaka uneelha nchuwa, mwaatti nneera, ipulha inoorupa lhelho, ni iyo khurupaka.
42012055	Vanoona inyu iphioo iwukaka uchawa, nneera, ntukutta ninoopaha lhelho, khuupahakani.
42012056	Mwa anafiki inyu! Nhochuwelha uweha vathi ni wiirimu ni uhukumulha ittu yaani inohalha ukhumelhelha, nnoochelha chani etu uchuwelha maana o ikatema chi?
42012057	“Chani woonaka khannooria wiihukumulha ittu yorera yo upanga?
42012058	Ukhalhawaya ntu munttekenlhe inyu orwehakani umilhatuni, iri mbaya umwiiwanana nnari mphironi nhinaphiya, huurweeheni wa aholhelhi anohukumulha milhatu, ni inyu nkamwaattukiya wa attu anaatuka attu, nhelhiyaka njeerani.
42012059	Ikekhiaye khannowa mwaakhuma wowo mpaka nhomalha ulhiva isenti yo umalhihera nlhatu winyu.”

42013009	Mwaahiino wemmaka aye, waahimmeke, vavawo etu mmweeke mwaakakha.’ ”
42013010	Nihuku no Wiittuwa nimoka Yesu aari eettuchihaka wi inupa yo unlhapelha Nlhuku.
42013011	Vavawo ahokhalha nthiyana mmoka awereiya mashoka o unanara iyaakha choomalhaka khumi ni nane, iruttu aya yaari inaremanre ahookokwaka.

42013015	Athithi nkayaakhulha, “Mwa anafiki inyu! Mpani mmoka inyu hinonthaphulha mwannama awe ama iphuta awe nhiilhini wiira awurihe maashi Nihuku no Wiittuwa?
42013016	Vano etu vaa hawo Mwaana a Aburahimu aremarihiye ni Nakare iyaakha khumi ni nane. Chani khireenre wiira ahulhelhiye Nihuku no Wiittuwa?”
42013017	Nlhove naakhunlhe awe, nkanaahelha ishoni amalhaponi awe, nansho attu akina onkhaye yaari anateelhiye wo woona chittu cho nthimicho chaapangelhe.
42013018	Yesu nkaakoha, “Imwene ya Nlhuku inolhikaana ni? Kilhikaaniheke ni ishiyani?
42013019	Inolhikaana thoko choo. Ntu aawelhe imbeyu ikaani chinene yo iharadali nkaalha umatani wawe. Nnyepu nkawonnuwa ukhalha mwiri mulhupalhe, ashinuni o uchulhu wiirimu nkayaathekacha iphuuru chaya mmarittani mwaya mmo.”
42013020	Yesu nkaakoha tho, “Kilhikaanihekeni ni Imwene ya Nlhuku?
42013021	Thoko, opani amoka aawelhe ihengedure nkoothuwaniha iphepa madebe melhi ni ntikha nkayaarurummwa.”
42013022	Yesu nkaarwa miholho nkwaha awe wo Uyerusalemu aviraka mmawani ni nttokoni mwonkhaye, eettuchihaka attu.
42013023	Ntu mmoka nkankoha eeraka, “Thithi, chani attu vakani phi nohalha ulhama?” Yesu nkaakhulha,

43002006	Ayahudi ahanaa malhemalhelho o ukhucha. Wo yoyo nlhatu uyo etu, chahokhalha vavawo miapu cho malhuku nthanu ni mmoka. Ni kila mwaapu mmoka waahelhiya maashi wo umalhaka madumu makani makhumi melhi ama makhumi mararu.

43002009	maashi yaathathuwilhe vano ukhalha idivai, ni ayo nkayaalhawiha. Nansho khayaachuwenlhe wiira ikhumme uyi. Nansho akarumiya alhe yaari achuwelhaka ukhumelhenlhe aya. Nankawa nkeehana abwana arusi,

43002011	Yesu aapannge yeyo yo ushangiha yo uchokholha iyo Ukaana ilhapo yo Ugalilaya, wowo nkooniha nthimicho wawe, ni owiittucha awe nkayanrumelhelha.

43002013	Isikuukuu yo Pasaka ya Ayahudi yaari inaatamenrie, paahi etu Yesu nkarwaa Uyerusalemu.
43002014	Wowo, u Inupa ya Nlhuku nkaaphwanya attu athumihaka ing'ope, ikhondoro, ni ikhunda, ni attu o wakakaniha nchurukhu anari anakhanlhanche mmamezani mwaya aakakhanihaka nchurukhu.
43002015	Nkaakorosha ikopo yo nttondoro, nkoomolhacha ashinama onkhaye vathe, ikhondoro vamoka ni ing'ope, nkaapitikulhacha imeza chaya, ni umwarushacha nchurukhu u Inupa ya Nlhuku mmo,
43002016	nkeerelha alhe aathumiha ikhunda alhe wiira, “Nthamihache chilha chittu chilha vaa! Nhipange inupa ya Athumwanaka ukhalha nipuro no upangelha maronda!”
43002017	Owiittucha awe nkoopuwelha iholhepiya nhina Malhove Matakatifu wiira, “Uttuna waka inupa inyu Apwiiya Nlhuku unokiiva, ukipahaka thoko mooro.”
43002018	Aholhelhi a Ayahudi nkayaamwakhulha Yesu wo unkoha, “Nnaapangeke cho ushangiha chaani wooniha wiira nhanaa ikuru yo upangacha yoyo mwaha uyo?”
43002019	Yesu nkaakhulha, “Nkaphomolhani ilha inupa ya Nlhuku ilha, ni mii kinotheka tho wo mahuku mararu.”
43002020	Vavawo Ayahudi nkayeera, “Ilha inupa ya Nlhuku ilha, yaathekiye wo umalhaka iyaakha makhumi ncheshe ni sita, chani, inyuva nnottuna utheka chani wo mahuku mararu?”
43002021	Nansho inupa yaarerihelha awe Yesu yaari iruttu awe.
43002022	Paahi etu vaahihimushiye awe ukhuma nnookhwani, owiittucha awe ahoopuwelha wiira aholhohera yayo, nkayaarumelhelha Malhove Matakatifu, yaahimianche awe Yesu.
43002023	Yesu vaari awe Uyerusalemu wo isikuukuu yo Pasaka, attu enchi yahorumelhelha nchina nawe yooneke cho ushangiha cheera awe wo uhimiechesha.
43002024	Nansho Yesu khaari ni nrima ni ayo ukhalhawaya ahaachuwelhacha onkhaye.
43002025	Khaarina nlhatu wo uhimiechesha uriyoothe, ukhalhawaya ahochuwelha rata chene chittu chonkhaye chiri munrimani mwaya.
43003001	Ahaawo nholhelhi mmoka Ayahudi, o mphingo wa Amafarisayo, eehaniya Nanikodemo.
43003002	Nihuku nimoka Nanikodemo nkayaanrwelha Yesu uhiyu, ni umwiirelha, “Rabi, nihochuwelha wiira inyuva phi Owiittuchiha nrumiye ni Nlhuku. Khaawo ntu nooria upanga cho ushangiha chinopangacha inyu Nlhuku ahikhalheke vamoka ni uyo.”
43003003	Yesu nkaakhulha, “Ikekheene kinouhimeriani, ntu khanooria woona Umwene wa Nlhuku ahiyarieke tho.”
43003004	Nanikodemo nkayaakoha, “Ntu nkumi noorieke chani ukelha munthunkwani mwa anumwanawe, ni uyariya wo nayelhi?”
43003005	Yesu nkaakhulha, “Ikekheene kinouhimeriani, ntu ahiyarieke wo maashi ni wo Iphumu ya Nlhuku, ata veeriye chani khanooria ukelha Imwene ya Nlhuku.
43003006	Ntu noyaria wo iruttu wa athumwanawe ni anumwanawe, nansho noyaria munnepani wo Iphumu ya Nlhuku.
43003007	Nhishange ukhalhawaya kihouhimeriani wiira ihophwanelhiya mwaattiva onkhaye vaa uyaria wo nayelhi.
43003008	Iphioo inowuka ni ukelha unothanana aya, nnowiiwa vanowuka aya, nansho khannochuwelha unokhumelhelha aya mena unokelhelha aya. Phiri aya thoko ntu yarelhe wo Iphumu ya Nlhuku.”
43003009	Nanikodemo nkayankoha Yesu, “Yoyo mwaha uyo unoorieke chani?”
43003010	Yesu nkaakhulha, “Chani, inyuva ngati phi owiittuchiha attu o Uisraeli nhichuwelhe yoyo mwaha uyo?
43003011	Ikekheene kinouhimeriani, hiyaano ninohimiacha ichuwenlhe ihu ni uhimiechesha yonne ihu, nansho mwaattiva khannorumelhelha nttenga wihu.
43003012	Akhalhaka kihouhimeriani mwaha wo velhaponi ni inyu khannokirumelhelha, nnorieke chani urumelhelha koohimeriakani mwaha wo wiirimu?
43003013	Khaawo ntu aapanche urwaa uchulhu wiirimu ahikhalhe Mwaana a Ntu, aakhuruwilhe ukhuma wiirimu.”
43003014	Thoko ashinna Musa vaatheshilhe aya nchulhu inwaa yo shaba vamwirini uthakoni ulhe, ni uyo Mwaana a Ntu nootheshiya nchulhu chiichammo,
43003015	wiira kila ntu nonrumelhelha akhalhe ni ukumi wo uhimalha.
43003016	Nlhuku ahaattuna attu o velhaponi chinene, wo chiichammo etu, nkankhumiha Mwaana awe o yekha, riyoothe nonrumelhelha hipotere, nansho akhalhe ni ukumi wo uhimalha.
43003017	Nlhuku khaanrumme Mwaana awe velhaponi awe aahukumulha attu, nansho oopolhe.
43003018	“Attu onkhaye anonrumelhelha Mwaana khanohukumulhiya, ahinonrumelhelha ahomalha uhukumulhiya, ukhalhawaya kharumelhenlhe nchina no Mwaana a Nlhuku o yekha awe.
43003019	Ni ihukumu ene phi ilha, nthuko uhowa velhaponi, nansho attu anothanana ipiphi ahittunaka nthuko, ukhalhawaya chittu chinopangacha aya chiri cho uhilhoka.
43003020	Attu anopanga cho uhilhoka unowarusha nthuko ni ayo khanowa voonene, ukhalhawaya khanottuniha cho uhilhoka chaya chimwalhelhiye.
43003021	Nansho anovarechesha ikeekhene anoowa unthukoni, mitheko chaya chiwe chooniya chipangiaka wo unthimicha Nlhuku.”
43003022	Yamalhekeru, Yesu nkarwaa ilhapo yo Uyudea vamoka ni owiittucha awe, nkakhalhana wowo vamoka, ni attu aawa nkaabatiiziya.
43003023	Nayohana chiicho aari aabatiizaka attu Uainoni, iwani yaatameria Usalimu, ukhalhawaya wowo ahokhalha maashi menchi. Attu nkayanrweelha, ni ayo nkaabatiizacha.
43003024	Yeyo ikatema iyo Nayohana aari ahinaya uttukiya.
43003025	Owiittucha akina a Nayohana nkayaakhulhana ni Nyahudi mmoka wo mwaha wo malhemalhelho o khucha ikatema yo unthimicha Nlhuku.
43003026	Paahi etu, owiittucha ayo nkayaarwelha Nayohana ni weerelha, “Owiittuchiha, nnomuupuwelha yolhe ntu arina inyu vamoka ukhopelhelhe wo mwoolhoko wo Uyorodani ni inyuva nkamwanhimiechesha ulhe? Vano ni uyo nobatiiza, ni attu onkhaye anonrweelha!”
43003027	Nayohana nkayaakhulha, “Ntu khanoria ukhalha ni ittu aahivahiyeke ni Nlhuku o wiirimu.
43003028	Ni inyu mwaashinene nnoworia uhimiechesha wiira kahohimia, ‘Miyaano kakihena Kuristo, nansho kirumiye wiira kinholhelhe!’
43003029	A bibi arusi phi awaya abwana arusi, nansho anlhoko aya abwana arusi, aneemelha ni wiiwelhelha, anoshangarara chinene vaneewa aya abwana arusi yuulhumachaka. Phi chiicho ni mii ushangarara waka vanotimirihiya aya.
43003030	Yoyo phi phwanenlhe athepe ukhalha ochuwania chinene, ni miyaano kiwukuwe.”
43003031	Nowa ukhuma uchulhu phi mulhupalhe waapwaha onkhaye. Nokhuma velhaponi phi o ilhapo, olhumachaka mwaha wo velhaponi, nansho nowa ukhuma wiirimu phi mulhupalhe waapwaha onkhaye.
43003032	Yoyo yonne awe ni wiiwa ayo, phi o uhimiechesha, nansho khaawo ntu nottuna nttenga awe.
43003033	Nansho ntu riyoothe nottuna nttenga awe nohimiechesha wiira Nlhuku phi nohimiechesha ikeekhene.
43003034	Ulhe rumiye ni Nlhuku nohimiacha malhove a Nlhuku, ukhalhawaya Nlhuku nommaha yoyo ntu uyo Iphumu ya Nlhuku wo uhikhalha maphimelho.
43003035	Athithi anonttuna Mwaana ni ummaha ikuru chonkhaye mmathathani mwawe.
43003036	Attu anonrumelhelha Mwaana ahanaa ukumi wo uhimalha, attu ahinomwiiwelhelha Mwaana khanokhalha ni ukumi wo uhimalha, nansho anohalha muurushiyani mwa Nlhuku.
43004001	Amafarisayo nkayeewa wiira Yesu nowaapatta owiittucha enchi ni wabatiiza waapwaha Nayohana.
43004002	Yesu mwanene khambatinze ntu, nansho owiittucha awe phi abatiiza attu.
43004003	Paahi etu Yesu veewilhe awe mwaha wolhumachiya, nkaathama Uyudea nkaahokolhia Ugalilaya.
43004004	Vaari awe munkwahani mmo, nkaavirelha iwani yo Usamariya.
43004005	Wowo Usamariya uwo nkaaphiya Usukari, iwani yaatamenrie imata i Nayakhobo yaavanhe aya anaya, Nayusufu.
43004006	Ilhushi i Nayakhobo yaari vavawo. Yeyo ikatema iyo yaari uthana variyari, ni Yesu aari noochelhe wo nkwaha, nkeettuwa vachereshere ilhushi.
43004007	Nthiyana mmoka Nsamariya nkaawa urikani maashi, Yesu nkaamwiirelha, “Nkivahe maashi kiwurie.”
43004008	Yeyo ikatema iyo, owiittucha awe yaari anakelhanche umawani uuthumani yolhia.
43004009	Nansho yoyo nthiyana uyo nkaamwiirelha Yesu, “Inyuva mwa Ayahudi, miyaano ki Nsamariya, nnooria chani ukivekelha mii maashi o wuria?” Olhumacha chiicho ukhalhawaya Ayahudi khayaari yaathanaka ni Asamariya.
43004010	Yesu nkaakhulha, ikaari nchuwelhaka izawadi ya Nlhuku inothanana awe uuvahani, ni unchuwelha mpani nowiirelhani, “ ‘Nkivahe maashi kiurie’ mwaanonvekelha ni uyo anouvahani maashi anowiiha ukumi.”
43004011	Yoyo nthiyana uyo nkeera, “Pwiiya, inyuva khanrina indowo yo urikelha maashi ni ilhushi ene inarekamme. Nnaapatteke vayi maashi ari ni ukumi?
43004012	Athumwanihu Nayakhobo ni achishaana aya ni mihuwo chaya yaawuriacha vava.” Chani etu woonaka nneepanga ukhalha olhupalhe waapwaha yayo Nayakhobo ayo?
43004013	Yesu nkaakhulha, “Onkhaye anowuria alha maashi alha anowolhiya nttona tho,
43004014	nansho ntu nohalha uwuria maashi anohalha aka ummaha mii, khanowolhiya nttona tho. Wo ikekhiaye, maashi anohalha aka ummaha, anowa ukhalha nrapo ninothekhuma maashi anowiiha ukumi. Ukumi wo mahuku o uhimalha.”
43004015	Yoyo nthiyana uyo nkeera, “Pwiiya, nkakivaheni yayo maashi ayo! Kihoone nttona tho, mena kihiwe tho uurikani maashi vaa.”
43004016	Yesu nkeera, “Nrwee mweehane owannyu mwaawane vaa.”
43004017	Nthiyana uyo nkaakhulha “Miyaano khakirina alhopwana,” Yesu nkeera, “Nhohimia ikekhiaye wiira khanrina alhopwana.
43004018	Ukhalhawaya mwahothelhiya ni manyaalhopwana athanu, ni ayo nnaakhalhana inyu vano ayo kahena owaninyu. Vavawo nhohimia ikekhiaye.”
43004019	Nthiyana uyo nkaamwiirelha Yesu, “Pwiiya, kinoona wiira inyuva phi anamilhohi.
43004020	Manyaapwiiya ihu yanthimicha Nlhuku vachulhu ulha mwaako ulha, nansho mwaattiva Ayahudi va nnoniirelha wiira nipuro no nthimicha Nlhuku phi Uyerusalemu ulhe.”
43004021	Yesu nkaamwiirelha, “Maanyi nkirumelhelheke etu, mahuku anowa vahinowa inyu waathimicha Athithi vachulhu ulha mwaako ulha, mena Uyerusalemu.
43004022	Mwaattiva Asamariya va nnonthimicha ulhe nhinonchuwelha inyu. Nansho hii Ayahudi va ninonchuwelha ninonthimicha ihu, ukhalhawaya woopolhiya unchokholhelha wa Ayahudi.
43004023	Nansho mahuku anoowa ni ayo ahomalha uphiya, wo ikuru yo Iphumu ya Nlhuku, attu anowa waathimicha Athithi wo ikeekhene, ni waathimicha wo iphiro ye ikeekhene inothanana aya.
43004024	Nlhuku phi Iphumu. Chiichammo etu, attu anonthimicha anthananiya anthimicheke wo Iphumu ya Nlhuku ni ikeekhene thoko chiri awe.”
43004025	Nthiyana uyo nkaahimia, “Kihochuwelha wiira Kuristo Moopolhi noowa. Vanohalha awe uwa, nonichuwelhiha chittu chonkhaye.”
43004026	Yesu nkaakhulha, “Mii kinoolhumacha ni inyuva va, phi Yoyo.”
43004027	Yeyo ikatema iyo owiittucha awe Yesu nkayaahokolhiacha, nkayaashangacha chinene umwoona aarerihaka ni nthiyana. Nansho khaawo ntu ankonhe nthiyana ulhe, “Nnothananani?” Ama unkoha Yesu, “Nnaarerihani ni alha?”
43004028	Paahi etu nthiyana uyo nkaahiya mwaapu awe, nkaarwa umawani u waahimeriani attu,
43004029	“Nkawaani mmwe mwaamona ntu kihimenrie mwaha kipangilhe aka wonkhaye. Chani khinooria wiira yoyo phi Kuristo Moopolhi?”
43004030	Attu nkayaathamacha mmawani nkayaarwaa uumwonani Yesu.
43004031	Yeyo ikatema iyo owiittucha awe yaari ampepechaka amwirelhaka, “Owiittuchiha, nlhieke yolhia!”
43004032	Nansho Yesu nkeerelha, “Miyaano kihanaa yolhia nhinochuwelha inyu mwaattiva.”
43004033	Owiittucha awe nkayaakohanacha ashineneru, “Chani hawo ntu ammwinhenre yolhia?”
43004034	Yesu nkeerelhacha, “Yolhia yaangu iri phi uvara mitheko chaya alhe akirumme ni utimiriha chinothanana aya.
43004035	Mwaattiva nneera, ‘Chihohalha mieri micheshe, nlhaalha uphiye.’ Nansho miyaano kinouhimeriani wiira, mmweheke mmamatani chinre aya, cholhia chihaaya wo ukhunguriya!
43004036	Ntu o ukhungura noolhiviya mahalha awe, athokoreriaka cholhia wo nlhatu no ukumi wo mahuku o uhimalha. Chiichammo etu ntu naalha ni ntu nokhungura anowa aashangarara vamoka.
43004037	Wo yoyo nlhatu uyo etu nna nulhumo nna phi ikeekhene, ‘Mmoka phi naalha ni nkina nokhungura.’
43004038	Miyaano kuurummeni wiira mwakhungure cholhia mmamatani mwahaalhimme inyu, akina phi alhimme, nansho mwaattiva nnopuha wo ntukutta naya.”
43004039	Attu enchi o Usamariya yahonrumelhelha Yesu wo malhove aahimiechesha awe yoyo nthiyana uyo wiira, “Hokihimeria mwaha wonkhaye waapanga aka.”
43004040	Attu o Usamariya nkayanrwelha Yesu, nkayanlhepelha wiira akhalhe vavawo. Nkaalhokelha wowo wo mahuku melhi.
43004041	Attu enchi akina nkayaarumelhelha nttenga wa Yesu,
43004042	nkayerelha athiyana alhe wiira, “Vano hii ninorumelhelha kuhiwe wo nlhatu no malhove inyu. Nansho niheewa naashinene, ni uchuwelha wiira we ikeekhene yolha ntu ulha phi Moopolhi o ilhapo.”
43004043	Avireke mahuku melhi, Yesu nkaathama wowo, nkaarwa Ugalilaya.
43004044	Yesu aarwaa mwanene ukhalhawaya ahohimiechesha wiira, “Namilhohi khanothimichiya uwannyawe.”
43004045	Aphiyeke Ugalilaya, attu yahompochera, ukhalhawaya ni ayo yaari Uyerusalemu uwo unlhiani Pasaka. Nkayoona chittu chonkhaye chaapanganche awe ikatema yo Pasaka iyo.
43004046	Yesu nkaahokolhia tho Ukaana ilhapo yo Ugalilaya waathathunshe awe maashi ukhalha idivai. Wowo ahaawo nholhelhi mmoka upuwani u Naherode, aari ni mwaana mmirawo nreta iwani yo Ukapenaumu.
43004047	Yoyo veewilhe awe wiira Yesu howa Ugalilaya ukhuma Uyudea, nkanrwelha ni unlhepelha wiira anttukane Ukapernaumu anlhamihe mwaana awe mmirawo aari nreta chinene.
43004048	Yesu nkaamwirelha, “Khaawo ntu nohalha urumelhelha aahoneke ithikineha ni cho ushangiha.”
43004049	Yoyo nholhelhi uyo nkaakhulha, “Thithi, shontee, nngwee mwaana aka hinakhwa.”
43004050	Yesu nkaamwirelha, “Nrweeke etu, mwaana inyu noolhama!” Yoyo ntu uyo nkaarumelhelha malhove a Yesu nkaarwa.
43004051	Vaari awe mphironi ahokolhiaka uwani, akarumiya awe nkayaawa ni unhimeria wiira, “Mwammirawo inyu nreta uyo holhama!”
43004052	Nkaakoherera ikatema ureta vanhiilhe aya mwaana, ni ayo nkayaakhulha, “Nchana uthana, ureta phi nhiyalhe aya.”
43004053	Paahi etu athumwane mwaana ayo nkayoopuwelha wiira, yaari yelhe ikatema yaahimiye ni Yesu ilhe venre awe, “Mwaana inyu noolhama.” Vavawo etu yayo vamoka ni alhoko aya onkhaye, nkayanrumelhelha Yesu.
43004054	Ilha yaari yo ushangiha yo nayelhi yaapannge awe Yesu vaari awe akhumaka Uyudea alhukamaka Ugalilaya.
43005001	Umalha wo yayo, Yesu nkaarwa Uyerusalemu wo isikuukuu ya Ayahudi.
43005002	Wowo Uyerusalemu uwo vanaatameria nlhako uneehaniya Nlhako wo Khondoro nihawo nthapwi nineehaniya wo Iebraniya Betizata, nthotho mwaya nikhalhaka ni ipwaro nthanu.
43005003	Areta enchi yaari akhalhachaka mmapwaroni mmo, attu ohoona, oremara ni attu oririyacha iruttu.
43005004	Yayo areta ayo yaari awehereraka wiira nnepa wo wiirimu wa Athithi ukhuruwe uwa ututuwanyihani maashi. Nreta aaholhelha ukhelha munthapwini vanotutuwanyihiya aya maashi uyo, aholhama ikwerere iriyoothe yaarina awe.
43005005	Paahi ahaawo ntu mmoka vavawo awereiya ikwerere yo uririyacha iruttu iyaakha makhumi mararu ni nane.
43005006	Yesu ahomwoona yoyo ntu uyo narumpe vavawo, nkaachuwelha wiira hokhalha vavawo wo iyaakha chinchi, nkankoha, “Chani, nnoothanana ulhama?”
43005007	Nreta uyo nkaakhulha, “Thithi, khakirina ntu o ukitumbucheriha munthapwini vanotutuwanihiya aya maashi, kila vanolhikacha aka ukelha mmaashini, ntu nkina nookiholhelha.”
43005008	Yesu nkaamwiirelha ntu o uririyacha iruttu ulhe, “Wunkweke etu, ukusheke nttato nao nno weeteke, urweeke.”
43005009	Wo uhipicha yoyo ntu uyo nkaalhama, nkaakusha nttato nawe, nkeeta. Nihuku naapangelhe aya yoyo mwaha uyo, naari Nihuku no Wiittuwa,
43005010	wo chiichammo etu aholhelhi Ayahudi nkayaamwiirelha ntu aalhamihiye ulhe, “Lhelho Nihuku no Wiittuwa, Malhehero ihu anoochiichiha wiira khavanooria ukusha nttato ninyu.”
43005011	Ntu ulhe nkaakhulha eeraka, “Yoyo ntu kilhaminhe uyo phi kiirenlhe, ‘Ukusheke nttato nao, weeteke, urweeke.’ ”
43005012	Ni ayo nkayankoha, “Phi mpani o wirenlheni nkusheke ntatto ninyu mweeteke, nrweeke?”
43005013	Nansho aalhamihiye uyo khanchuwenlhe Yesu, ukhalhawaya wo nlhatu no uchara attu chinene, Yesu ahomalha ummwia nyerere.
43005014	Miholho aya, Yesu nkamphwanya ntu anlhaminhe awe u Inupa ya Nlhuku ulhe, nkeera, “Nholhama vano, nhiwonye tho, nhiwe mwaapatta yo hilhoka chinene.”
43005015	Yoyo ntu uyo nkaarwa wa aholhelhi a Ayahudi ni waahimeria wiira Yesu phi nlhaminhe.
43005016	Paahi etu Ayahudi nkayaachokholhacha umvenga Yesu, wo nlhatu no nlhamiha ntu Nihuku no Wiittuwa.
43005017	Yesu nkaakhulha eeraka, “Athumwanaka arii munthekoni, phi chiichammo ni mii kihophwanelhiya upanga mitheko.”
43005018	Nenno nlhove nno etu, nkanaathepiha aholhelhi a Ayahudi waavia iphiro yo mwiiva Yesu, kuhena wo nlhatu nohithimicha Malhehero yo Nihuku no Wiittuwa. Nansho ukhalhawaya aahowulhumacha wiira Nlhuku phi Athumwanawe, ni wilhikaaniha ni Nlhuku.
43005019	Yesu nkaakhulha Ayahudi eeraka, “Ikekheene kinouhimeriani, Mwaana khanooria upanga ittu mwanene, nopanga ilhe noona awe Athumwanawe apangaka. Inopanga aya Athumwanawe, Mwaana phi nopanga awe chiicho.
43005020	Ukhalhawaya Athithi anonttuna Mwaana, ni umwooniha chittu chonkhaye chinopanga aya anene, amwoonihaka chittu chulhupalhe upwaha chii cho nlhamiha ntu chii, ni inyu nnowa ushanga chinene.
43005021	Thoko Athithi chinaahihimusha aya attu akhwilhe ni waavaha ukumi, phi chiichammo etu Mwaana ni uyo nowaavaha ukumi anaattuna awe.
43005022	Athithi khanonhukumulha ntu riyoothe. Mwaana phi vahiye ikuru yonkhaye yo waahukumulha attu,
43005023	yiireke wiira attu onkhaye anthimicheke Mwaana thoko chinaathimicha aya Athithi. Ntu hinonthimicha Mwaana khanaathimicha Athithi anrumme.
43005024	“Ikekhiaye kinouhimeriani, aneewa malhove aka ni waarumelhelha akirumme, anoopatta ukumi wo uhimalha. Yayo khanohukumulhiya, nansho ahomalha uvira nnookhwani ni ukelha mu ukumini mwo uhimalha.
43005025	Ikekhiaye kinouhimeriani, mahuku anowa, ni ayo ahomalha uwa, akhwilhe vanowa aya wiiwacha nlhove na Mwaana a Nlhuku, ni ayo anottuna wiiwa ayo anokhalha akumi.
43005026	Thoko Athithi chiri aya machokholhelho o ukumi, phi chiichammo etu chinvahe aya Mwaana ukhalha machokholhelho o ukumi.
43005027	Tho ahommaha Mwaana ikuru yo uhukumulha, ukhalhawaya yoyo phi Mwaana a Ntu.
43005028	Nhuumiye uwanoni, mahuku anowa onkhaye ari mmahiyeni vanowa aya wiiwacha nlhove nawe
43005029	ni uhihimmwa mmahiyeni. Alhe apangilhe chorera anohihimmwa ni ukhalha akumi, ni alhe aapannge cho uhilhoka anowa uhihimmwa ni uhukumulhiya.
43005030	“Miyaano khakinooria upanga ittu wo ikuru aka kimwanene, Kinohukumulha thoko chineeraka wo uhimeriya ni Athithi, ni iyo ihukumu aka phi yo ikekhiaye, ukhalhawaya akinolhikacha upanga ittu kinothanana aka, nansho chinothanana aya akirumme.
43005031	“Keehimiecheshaka mii kimwanene, uhimiechesha waka khunooria urumelhelhiya wiira we ikeekhene.
43005032	Nansho hawo nkina nokihimiechesha mii, ni miyaano kihochuwelha wiira chonkhaye chinohimia awe akiromolhaka phi ikeekhene.
43005033	Mwahaaruma attu urweeha nttenga wo ukikoherera u Nayohana, ni ayo ahohimiechesha ikeekhene.
43005034	Uhimiechesha wa attu kuhii unokhulhuvelha aka, nansho kinohimiacha alha malhove alha wiira mwoopolhiye.
43005035	Nayohana yaari thoko nthuko waamwalhelha nkwee, ni inyu mwaatti wo mahuku vakani nkamwaattapelhelha yoyo nthuko uyo.
43005036	Nansho miyaano kihanaa malhove kinohimiechesha aka arii molhupalhe upwaha malhove a Nayohana. Ukhalhawaya mitheko kinopanga aka, phi mitheko akivanhe aya Athithi wiira kipange, ni chechiyo phi nokihimiechesha wiira Athithi phi kirumme.
43005037	Ni ayo Athithi akirumme, phi nokihimiechesha. Mwaattiva khannapacha wiiwa nlhove naya, mena woona ikhove aya,
43005038	ni inyu khannarumelhelha nlhove naya munrimani mwinyu, ukhalhawaya nhokhota unrumelhelha nrumme aya.
43005039	Mwaattiva nnooshoma Malhove Matakatifu mwaanyiheraka wiira mwommo, nnoophwanya ukumi wo uhimalha. Nansho yayo Malhove ayo phi nokihimiechesha mii!
43005040	Inakhalhaka chiicho, mpaka nna mwaattiva khannottuna uwa uwannyaka mmwe mwaapatta ukumi uhinomalha.
43005041	“Nnikwa aka khurii upatta nthimicho unokhuma wa attu.
43005042	Nansho kihoochuwelhani mwaatti wiira, unttuna Nlhuku khuuwo mu nrimani mwinyu.
43005043	Miyaano kiwiilhe wo ikuru ya Athithi, ni inyu khannakipochera, nansho attu akina yawaaka wo ikuru chaya ashinene, nnowaapochera.
43005044	Mwaattiva nnothanana upochera nthimicho winyu mwaashineneru, nhaaviaka upatta nthimicho ukhuma wa uyo ri vekha, Nlhuku, nnoorieke chani etu ukirumelhelha?
43005045	Nhaanyihere wiira miyaano phi nowa kaahimiacha milhatu chinyu wa Athithi. Ashinna Musa, mweshenre inyu nikhulhuvelho ninyu, yayo phi nowa uhimiachani milhatu chinyu.
43005046	Yakaari mwahaarumelhelha ashinna Musa, mwaanokirumelhelha ni mii, ukhalhawaya ashinna Musa yaholhepa malhove anokaacha mii.
43005047	“Nansho yakhalhaka wiira khamwaarumelhenlhe Malhehero yaalhepiye ni ashinna Musa, nnoorieke chani urumelhelha malhove aka?”
43006001	Umalhawaya, Yesu nkaalhapuwa nttiya no Ugalilaya ama nttiya no Utiberiya.
43006002	Nlhoko mulhupalhe wa attu nkawanttwara, nlhatu no woona cho ushangiha chaari awe apangaka ni waalhamiha areta.
43006003	Yesu nkaawelha umwaakoni, nkaakhalha vamoka ni owiittucha awe.
43006004	Isikuukuu ya Ayahudi yo Pasaka yaari inaatamenrie.
43006005	Yesu apathusheke miitho, nkoona nlhoko mulhupalhe wa attu ummweelhaka. Nkaakoha Nafilipo, “Ninaathumeke vayi yolhia yowaalhiha attu alha?”
43006006	Yesu olhumanche chiicho wo waalhikacha Nafilipo, ukhalhawaya ahochuwelha mwanene chowiira.
43006007	Nafilipo nkayaakhulha, “Ninathumaka mikatte cho idinari imia pilhi chirina ihu khachimmwanelha waalhiha inakhalhaka vakani alha attu enchi alha.”
43006008	Owiittucha awe mmoka, Naandorea, nhima aya Nasimoni Peturo, nkaamwiirelha,
43006009	“Hawo vaa mmirawo mmoka rina mikatte nthanu cho shayiri ni ihopa pilhi. Nansho khachinowanelha wa attu enchi thoko alha.”
43006010	Yesu nkeera, “Mwaakalhiheke etu attu ayo vathi.” Manyashi aari menchi vavawo vakittu vawo. Paahi etu attu nkayaakhalha vathi, alhopwana vekha aya aphiyelhaka attu maelufu nthanu.
43006011	Yesu nkaakusha mikatte chilhe, nkanthimicha Nlhuku, nkaakawelha attu yaakhalhanche. Ni ihopa chiyo nkeera chiicho, kila ntu nkaapatta chaathananne awe.
43006012	Attu vaawonne aya Yesu nkeerelha owiittucha awe, “Nrokottacheke mikatte chihanlhe chiyo chihipotere.”
43006013	Nkayaakhupacha mahalhahalha aahanlhe, nkayaachariha makaya khumi ni melhi.
43006014	Attu yooneke yeyo yo ushangiha yaapangilhe awe Yesu iyo, nkayeeracha, “Wo ikekhiaye yolha phi namilhohi aaphwanelhiye uwa velhaponi!”
43006015	Yesu nkaachuwelha wiira attu yaari athananaka ummara umwene, nkaathama tho, nkaarwa umwaakoni vekha awe.
43006016	Waphiyeke uchechilho owiittucha awe nkayaakhuruwa urwaa unttiyani,
43006017	nkayaawelhacha nkalhavani, alhapuwaka urwaa Ukapenaumu. Ipiphi yaari inakenlhe, ni Yesu aari hinaapiyelha.
43006018	Nttiya nkanaachokholha ututuwana nlhatu no iphioo yaawuka wo machiri.
43006019	Owiittucha vaaphilhe aya nkwaha wo maili nthanu ama sita, nkayaamoona Yesu eetaka vachulhu maashi, aatameriaka ikalhava, nkayoovacha chinene.
43006020	Yesu nkeerelha, “Phi mii, nhoovache!”
43006021	Nkayaathanana unkusha Yesu nkalhavani, ni ikalhava yaari inaphiilhe ukhopelhelhe nttiya waalhukama aya.
43006022	Waashelhe waya nlhoko wa attu yaahanlhe ukhopelhelhe nttiya nkawaachuwelha wiira ikalhava ikina yaahanlhe wowo. Ni ayo nkayoopuwelha wiira Yesu khaawenlhe nkalhavani vamoka ni owiittucha awe, owiittucha ayo yaarwachilhe vekha aya.
43006023	Tho, ikalhava chikina ukhuma Utiberiya chahowa vavawo vakittu vawo attu vaalhilhie aya mikatte, Athithi vaamanlhe aya unthimicha Nlhuku.
43006024	Attu ayo yachuwelheke wiira Yesu ni owiittucha awe khayariwo vavawo, nkayaawelhacha nkalhavani nkayaarwaa umwaaviani Ukapenaumu.
43006025	Nkayamphwanya Yesu ukhopelhelhe nttiya nkayankoha, “Owiittuchiha, mwaawiilhe yaakhani vaa?”
43006026	Yesu nkaakhulha, “Ikekheene kinouhimeriani, khannokaavia wo nlhatu no woona yo ushangiha iyo, nansho ukhalhawaya mwaaholhia mikatte chilhe nkamwaawona.
43006027	Nhichenjeukelhe yolhia inochukumana, nchenjeukelheke yolhia ihinochukumana yo ukumi wo uhimalha. Yoyo phi Mwaana a Ntu, ukhalhawaya Athithi, Nlhuku ahonthanlha ni unhimiechesha wiira noowa uvahani yeyo yolhia iyo.”
43006028	Ni ayo nkayankohacha, “vano niireke chani etu, ni hii noorie upanga chinothanana awe Nlhuku?”
43006029	Yesu nkaakhulha, “Ntheko unothanana awe Nlhuku wiira mpange, uri unrumelhelha ntu nrumilhe aya.”
43006030	Vavawo nkayankoha, “Unohalha upanga yo ushangiha yaani noone nuurumelhelhe? Unohalha upangani?
43006031	Ashulhupalhe ihu yaholhia yolhia yaakhumme wiirimu yeehaniya imana uuthakhoni ulhe, thoko Malhove Matakatifu vaneera aya wiira, ‘Ahaalhiha nkatte waakhumme wiirimu.’ ”
43006032	Yesu nkeera, “Ikekheene kinouhimeriani, ashinna Musa kahiwe ovanheni nkatte wo wiirimu, nansho Athumwanaka phi nouvahani mwaattiva nkatte we ikeekhene unokhuma wiirimu.
43006033	Ukhalhawaya nkatte wa Nlhuku nnovahiya inyu phi uyo nokhuruwa ukhuma wiirimu ni uwiiha ukumi wa attu o velhaponi.”
43006034	Paahi nkayaamwiirelha, “Thithi, nkanivaheni yoyo nkatte uyo mahuku onkhaye.”
43006035	Yesu nkeera, “Miyaano phi yolhia inouvahani ukumi. Nokiweelha khanowolhiya ithalha tho, nokirumelhelha khanowolhiya nttona tho.
43006036	Vano etu, kahouhimeriani wiira nnookona nansho khannokirumelhelha.
43006037	Ntu riyoothe anokivaha aya Athithi nookiweelha, ni mii khakinonkhota ntu nokiweelha,
43006038	ukhalhawaya khakiwiilhe ukhuma wiirimu kiwe kaapanga chinothanana aka mii, nansho chinothanana aya Athithi akirumme.
43006039	Ni iyo anothanana aya akirumme iri wiira, kihinrihe hata mmoka akivanhe aya, nansho kiwe kanhihimusha ni ummaha ukumi wo uhimalha nihuku no umalha ilhapo.
43006040	Ittu inothanana aya Athithi phi ilha, attu onkhaye anomwona Mwaana ni unrumelhelha, akhalhe ni ukumi wo uhimalha. Ni mii kinowaahihimusha nihuku no umalha ilhapo.”
43006041	Ayahudi nkayaarushiya, nlhatu Yesu aahowiira, “Miyaano phi nkatte ukhuruwilhe ukhuma wiirimu.”
43006042	Nkayeeracha, “Ana ulha ntu ulha kahiwe Yesu, mwaana a Nayusufu? Nihaachuwelha athumwanawe ni anumwanawe. Chani, vano, neera wiira khuruwilhe ukhuma wiirimu?”
43006043	Yesu nkaakhulha, “Nkahiyani uchukulha mwaashineneru.
43006044	Khaawo ntu nowa uwannyaka aahiwihiyeke ni Athithi akirumme mii, ni mii kinonhihimusha nihuku no umalha ilhapo.
43006045	Anamilhohi aholhepa wiira, ‘Kila ntu nowiittuchihiya ni Nlhuku.’ Kila ntu neewelhelha Athithi, ni wiittucha uwannyaya yoyo nowa uwannyaka.
43006046	Kineera wiira, khaawo ntu riyoothe panche woona Athithi, yoyo khumme wa Nlhuku uyo vekha awe phi onne Athithi.
43006047	Kinouhimeriani ikekhiaye wiira, ntu norumelhelha, yoyo hanaa ukumi wo mahuku o uhimalha.
43006048	Mii phi nkatte ummwiha ukumi.
43006049	Manyaapwiiya inyu aholhia imana uthakoni, nansho yahokhwa.
43006050	Nansho nkatte unowa ukhuma wiirimu phi nolhikaana wiira ntu riyoothe nolhia khanokhwa.
43006051	Mii phi nkatte wo ukumi unowa ukhuma wiirimu. Ntu alhiaka yolha nkatte ulha yoyo khanokhwa, nookhalha nkumi mahuku o uhimalha. Ni uyo ukhalhaka iruttu aka, kinokumiha aka wiira ilhapo ihimalhe.”
43006052	Yoyo mwaha uyo nkawaawiha waakhulhaniya mwa Ayahudi ashineneru. Waari ukohaniyaka, “Noorieke chani ulha ntu ulha univaha iruttu awe nilhie?”
43006053	Yesu nkeerelha, “Ikekheene kinouhimeriani, mwaahilhieke iruttu ya Mwaana a Ntu ni uwuria iphome awe, khannopatta ukumi.
43006054	Onkhaye anolhia iruttu aka ni uwuria iphome aka ahana ukumi wo mahuku o uhimalha, ni mii kinowa kaahihimusha muukumini nihuku noomalha ilhapo.
43006055	Yakhalhaka wiira iruttu aka phi yolhia ye ikeekhene, ni iphome aka etu phi yo wuria ye ikeekhene.
43006056	Attu onkhaye anolhia iruttu aka ni uwuria iphome aka anookhalha nhina mwaka, ni mii kinookhalha nhina mwaya.
43006057	Athithi ari akumi ahokiruma mii, ni mii kinokhalha wo nlhatu waya. Wo yoyo nlhatu uyo etu, ntu nokilhia mii noolhama wo nlhatu naka mii.
43006058	Vano etu, nkatte unkhuma wiirimu, khunolhikaana ni nkatte waalhilhie aya manyaapwiiya inyu uthakoni. Aholhia nkaakhwa, nansho anolhia ulha nkatte ulha khanokhwa anookhalha akumi mahuku no uhimalha.”
43006059	Yesu olhumanche yayo vaari awe eettuchihaka mu inupa yo unlhapelha Nlhuku Ukapenaumu.
43006060	Owiittucha awe enchi veewilhe aya nkayeera, “Alha meettuchiho alha arii orikarika chinene. Apani anohalha wiiwelhelha?”
43006061	Yesu nkaachuwelha ichuku cha owiittucha wo uhihimeriya ni ntu, paahi etu nkeera, “Chani nhokelhiya nipampa?
43006062	Inottuna ukhalha chani etu vanowa inyu umoona Mwaana a Ntu arwaaka nchulhu waari awe?
43006063	Nnepa wa Nlhuku phi nowiiha ukumi, ikuru cha ntu chihikhalhaka ittu. Malhove kuulhumachilhe aka phi nommwiiha Iphumu ya Nlhuku nowiiha ukumi.
43006064	Inakhalhaka chiicho ahawo akina inyu ahinokirumelhelha.” Yesu oolhumacha chiicho ukhalhawaya ahaachuwelha ahinonrumelhelha ni ntu nohalha unthumiha.
43006065	Nkoncherera eeraka, “Yolha phi nlhatu no uhimeriani wiira khaawo ntu nohalha uwa uwannyaka aahorihiyeke ni Athithi.”
43006066	Wo yoyo nlhatu uyo etu, owiittucha enchi anttwarattwara Yesu, nkayaarukunuwa utulhi ni uhinttwara tho.

43006069	Ni hii vano nihorumelhelha ni uchuwelha wiira, inyu phi ntakatifu rumiye ni Nlhuku.”
43006070	Yesu nkaakhulha, “Kahoothanlhani mwaatti khumi ni elhi, ngati? Nansho mmoka inyu, yoyo nakare!”
43006071	Vavawo aari amwaachaka Yuda, mwaana a Nasimoni Isikariote, ukhalhawaya Yuda phi akelha unthumiha, inakhalhaka aari mmoka aya owiittucha khumi ni elhi alhe.
43007001	Umalhawaya yayo, Yesu aari munkwahani alhukamaka Ugalilaya, khaathananne weetakacha ilhapo yo Uyudea ukhalhawaya aholhelhi Ayahudi yaari athananaka umwiiva.
43007002	Nihuku no Isikuukuu ya Ayahudi yo Marapatta naari ninaatamenrie,
43007003	Yesu nkeerelhiya ni ashihima awe wiira, “Nthameke vaa nrweeke Uyudea, owiittucha inyu yooneke mitheko chinyu.
43007004	Ntu khanovitha chinopanga awe akhalhaka wiira nothanana uchuwania mwaattuni. Ukhalhawaya nnopanga cho ushangiha, mpangeke etu ilhapo yonkhaye ichuwelheke!”
43007005	Ata ashihima awe khayanrumelhenlhe.
43007006	Yesu nkeera, “Ikatema aka kinaphiya. Nansho mwaattiva va kila ikatema inouphwanelhani.
43007007	Ilhapo khiinooria uuvengani mwaattiva, nansho miyaano inookivenga ukhalhawaya mii kinohimiechesha wiira mitheko chaya chiri cho uhilhoka.
43007008	Mwaattiva nrweeke etu u sikuukuuni uwo. Miyaano khakinorwaa, ukhalhawaya ikatema aka yo ulhoka khinaphiya.”
43007009	Nkoolhumacha yayo malhove ayo, nkaahalha Ugalilaya.
43007010	Ashihima awe yamalheke urwaa u sikuukuuni, Yesu ni uyo nkaarwa, nansho khaarweelhe wo wiichooniha, aarweelhe wo wiivitha.
43007011	Aholhelhi Ayahudi yaari amwaaviaka va sikuukuuni vawo, nkayaakoha, “Ri vayi?”
43007012	Malhove menchi o waapiya nkayeewiya mwaattuni. Attu akina nkayeera, “Ntu orera nrima.” Akina nkayeera, “Mena! Nowiiraka waathwelhelhiha attu.”
43007013	Nansho khaawo ntu aalhikanche wulhumacha mwaha wawe voonene wo woova aholhelhi Ayahudi.
43007014	Isikuukuu yaari inaphiyenlhe variyari, Yesu vaarwelhe awe u Inupa ya Nlhuku ni uchokholha weettuchiha attu.
43007015	Aholhelhi Ayahudi nkayaashanga chinene ni wiira, “Ulha ntu ulha pantte vayi irusho ni uyo khanashoma?”
43007016	Yesu nkaakhulha, “Meettuchiho kineettuchiha aka kahiwe awaka, nansho awawe Nlhuku kirumme.
43007017	Ntu nopanga chinothanana awe Nlhuku, noochuwelha wiira meettuchiho aka akhumme wa Nlhuku, ama miyaano kinoolhumacha wo ikuru aka kimwanene.
43007018	Ntu noolhumacha wo ikuru awe mwanene naavia nthimicho wawe mwanene. Nansho naavia nthimicho wa ntu nrumme, yoyo ri o ikekhiaye, hinanaraka variwoothe.
43007019	Chani, ashinna Musa khayovanheni Malhehero? Nansho khaawo hata mmoka inyu novara Malhehero. Nlhatu waani nnothanana ukiiva?”
43007020	Attu nkayaamwaakhulha, “Nrii ni nshoka no unanara inyu ayi! Apani anothanana uwiivani?”
43007021	Yesu nkaakhulha, “Kahopanga yo ushangiha imoka, ni inyu onkhaye nkamwaashanga.
43007022	Ashinna Musa yaholheherani weenelha achishaana inyu, inakhalhaka wiira ashinna Musa kahena aachokhonlhe, nansho manyaapwiiya inyu phi achokhonlhe. Alha mahuku, mwaattiva nnoomwinelha unyawo mwanhima nlhopwana hata Nihuku no Wiittuwa.
43007023	Yakhalhaka etu mwanhima nowiinelhiya unyawo hata Nihuku no Wiittuwa wiira Malhehero a ashinna Musa ihiwonyiye, woonaka nnokithunalhelha wo nlhatu no nlhamiha ntu Nihuku no Wiittuwa?
43007024	Nhihukumulhe chittu wo vathe, nhukumulheke we ikekhiaye.”
43007025	Attu akina o Uyerusalemu nkayeera, “Chani, ntu naaviya wiira eeviye ulhe kahena ulha?
43007026	Mwooneke vano! Noolhumacha voonene, mena khaawo ntu nonvaanyiha! Chani, inowooria aholhelhi ahochuwelha ikeekhene wiira ulha phi Kuristo?
43007027	Nansho Kuristo vanohalha awe uwa khaawo ntu nottuna uchuwelha vakittu vanowa awe ukhumelhelha. Nansho hiyaano nihochuwelha ukhumelhenlhe awe ulha ntu ulha!”
43007028	Yesu vaari awe eettuchihaka u Inupa ya Nlhuku nkaakhuwelha eeraka, “Eti nnera wiira nnookichuwelha, ni uchuwelha ukhumme aka? Mii khakiwilhe wo ikuru aka kimwanene. Yayo akirumme miyaano ayo, phi o ikekhiaye. Mwaattiva khannaachuwelha,
43007029	nansho miyaano kinowaachuwelha ukhalhawaya kikhumme uwannyaya, ni ayo phi kirumme.”
43007030	Attu nkayaalhikacha ummara ni unttuka, nansho khaawo ntu okonlhe moono ummara ukhalhawaya isaa awe yaari ihinaphiya.
43007031	Attu enchi munlhokoni mwa attu alhe yahonrumelhelha, nkayeera, “Chani, Kuristo awaaka noowa aapanga cho ushangiha chulhupalhe chinene uthepa chipangilhe awe ulha?”
43007032	Amafarisayo nkayeewa attu yaapaka mwaha wa Yesu. Paahi amafarisayo vamoka ni opochera ishaani olhupalhe nkayaaruma manyaasikari ammare Yesu.
43007033	Yesu nkeera, “Kinoolhokelha ni inyu wo mahuku vakani, yamalhaka kinoorwaa wo ayo akirumme.
43007034	Nnookavia nansho khannokoona, ukhalhawaya mwaattiva khannooria uphiya wowo.”
43007035	Aholhelhi Ayahudi nkayeerelhana ashineneru, “Ulha ntu ulha naarweeke vayi vahinooria ihu umpatta? Naarweeke wa Ayahudi awanenlhe ilhapo ya Ayunani, ni weettuchiha Ayunani?
43007036	Iri ni maana ani vaneera awe, ‘Nnookaavia nansho khannokipatta, vanottuna aka ukhalha mwaattiva khannooria uphiya?’ ”
43007037	Nihuku noomalhelha yeyo isikuukuu iyo naari nihuku no yekha aya, Yesu nkeemelha ni wulhumacha wo nlhove nulhupalhe eeraka, “Ntu nowolhiya nttona aweeke uwannyaka,
43007038	ntu nokirumelhelha nowa aawuria. Thoko Malhove Matakatifu chinohimia aya, ‘Ntu nokirumelhelha mii, marapo o maashi anowiiha ukumi anothekhuma munrimani mwawe!’ ”
43007039	Yesu olhumanche chiicho amwaachaka Iphumu ya Nlhuku, nottuna aya umpochera alhe attu anrumelhenlhe ayo. Yeyo ikatema iyo Iphumu ya Nlhuku aari hinawa ukhalhawaya Yesu aari hinaya upochera nthimicho wawe.
43007040	Attu akina mwaattuni mmo nkayaamwiwa olhumachaka yayo malhove ayo, nkayeera, “Wo ikekhiaye ulha ntu ulha phi Namilhohi!”
43007041	Akina aya nkayeera, “Ulha phi Kuristo Moopolhi!” Nansho akina tho nkayeera, “Kuristo Moopolhi khaanooria ukhuma Ugalilaya!
43007042	Malhove Matakatifu aneera wiira, Kuristo naakhumeke iyari ya Amwene Adaudi, ni uyaria Ubethelehemu, iwani yaakhalha aya Adaudi!”
43007043	Paahi mwaha wa Yesu nkawaamwalhaaniha attu.
43007044	Attu akina athananaka unttuka, nansho khaawo ammanre.
43007045	Manyaasikari yahokolhieke, nkayaakohiya ni opochera ishaani olhupalhe ni Amafarisayo, “Chani woonaka khannammanra ni ummwiiha?”

43007047	Amafarisayo nkayaakoha, “Chani, ni inyu mwaatti chiicho nhothepiya?
43007048	Chani ahawo anakhalhaka mmoka a aholhelhi a attu, ama mmoka a Amafarisayo anrumelhenlhe?
