43007050	Mmoka a Amafarisayo aari Nanikodemo yanrweenlhe Yesu mahuku avinre alhe. Paahi, yayo nkayeerelha akhunanaya wiira,
43007051	“Wo ulhikaana ni Malhehero ihu khaninooria unhukumulha ntu nihinaaya umwiiwelhelha ni uchuwelha ttenkeni.”
43007052	Ni ayo nkayaamwakhulha, “Chani ni inyuva chiicho nnokhuma Ugalilaya? Nrweeke mwashomeke Malhove Matakatifu etu ni inyu nnokooshoma wiira, khaawo namilhohi nohalha ukhuma Ugalilaya.”
43007053	Paahi attu onkhaye nkayaahokolhiacha mmawannyaya.
43008001	Kila ntu nkaahokolhia uwannyawe, nansho Yesu nkaarwa waari Mwaako wo Mizeituni.
43008002	Wichishuru waashelhe waya nkaarwa tho u Inupa ya Nlhuku. Attu onkhaye nkayanrukureriacha, nkaakhalha ni uchokholha wettuchiha.
43008003	Owiittuchiha Malhehero a ashinna Musa ni Amafarisayo nkayammwiiha nthiyana mmoka aaphwanyeriye mu ulhuvani, nkayaamwemesha variyari aya.
43008004	Nkayaamwiirelha Yesu, “Owiittuchiha! Ulha nthiyana ulha hophwanyeriya alhuvaka.
43008005	Malhehero ihu ya ashinna Musa yahoniruma wiira nthiyana thoko ulha awonyeriye malhuku mpaka akhwe. Paahi etu inyuva nneera chani?”
43008006	olhumacha chiicho wo unria, apatte nlhatu wo umwirelha wiira hotteka. Nansho Yesu nkooroma, nkaakheria vathi ni nikokho nawe.
43008007	Yathepeke unkoha, Yesu nkennuwa nkeerelha, “Ntu riyoothe hinawonya munkwahani mwinyu, yoyo awonyeke nlhuku no upacha.”
43008008	Nkooroma tho, nkaakheria tho vathi vattayani.
43008009	Veewilhe aya chiicho, nkayaachokholha uthama mmokammoka, aholhelhaka ashulhupalhe. Yesu nkaahiya yeekha awe ni athiyana alhe aahanlhe aneemenlhe.
43008010	Yesu vennuwilhe awe nkaakoha athiyana ayo, “Ari vayi attu ayo? Khaawo hata mmoka hanlhe ohukumulheni?”
43008011	Nthiyana uyo nkaakhulha, “Thithi, khaawo inakhalhaka mmoka!” Yesu nkeera, “Mena miyaano khakinoohukumulhani. Nrweeke, nansho nhiwonye tho.”
43008012	Yesu nkoolhumacha weerelha Amafarisayo tho. “Miyaano phi nthuko wo ilhapo, ntu nokittwara mii nookhalha ni nthuko wo ukumi, khaneeta mpiiphini.”
43008013	Amafarisayo nkayaamwirelha, “Inyuva nnehimiacha mwaanene, uhimiechesha winyu kuhiwe we ikekhiaye.”
43008014	Yesu nkaakhulha, “Anakhalhaka kineehimiechesha kimwanene, uhimiechesha waka urii we ikeekhene ukhalhawaya miyaano kihochuwelha ukhumme aka ni uwo unokelha aka.
43008015	Mwaattiva nnohukumulha wo irusho cha attu, nansho miyaano khakinonhukumulha ntu.
43008016	Uhukumulha waka, urii we ikeekhene ukhalhawaya miyaano khakirii vekha aka, Athithi akirumme arii vamoka ni mii.
43008017	Iholhepiya nhina Malhehero inyu wiira uhimiechesha wa attu elhi weewananaka, inohimia aya phi ikeekhene.
43008018	Miyaano kineehimiacha kimwanene, ni ayo Athithi akirumme, anookihimiechesha chiicho.”
43008019	Vavawo nkayankoha, “Athumwaninyu ayo ari vayi?” Yesu nkaakhulha, “Mwaattiva khannokichuwelha mii mena khannaachuwelha Athumwanaka. Yakhalhaka mwaanokichuwelha mii, mwaanachuwelha ni Athumwanaka.”
43008020	Yesu olhumanche yayo malhove ayo u Inupa ya Nlhuku, nchuumbani mwo nikhupi no ushungiya nchurukhu vaari awe ettuchihaka. Mena khaawo ntu ammanre, ukhalhawaya isaa awe yaari ihinaphiya.
43008021	Yesu nkeera tho, “Kinoorwaa, ni inyu nnookaavia, nansho nnookhwa mu uwonyani winyu. Unokelha aka mii, mwaattiva khannooria urwaa.”
43008022	Aholhelhi Ayahudi nkayeera, “Chani, nowichiiva? Woonaka neera, ‘Unokelha aka mwaattiva khannooria uphiya?’ ”
43008023	Yesu nkaakhulha, “Mwaattiva nkhumme vava vathi vaa, miyaano kikhumme wiirimu uchulhu, mwaattiva o velhaponi va, miyaano kakihiwe o velhaponi va.
43008024	Phi nlhatu no uwirelhani wiira nnookhwa mu uwonyani winyu. Paahi wo ikekhiaye, mwaahirumelhelheke etu wiira ‘Miyaano phi Yoyo,’ nnookhwa mu uwonyani winyu.”
43008025	Ni ayo nkayankoha, “Inyuva phi apani?” Yesu nkaakhulha, “Kihoohimeriani ukhuma khalhayi!
43008026	Kihanaa menchi o wulhumacha ni uhukumulhani. Nansho akirumme mii ayo phi ikeekhene, ni mii kinohimiacha wa attu o velhaponi mwaha kiiwalhe aka uwannyaya.”
43008027	Khayachuwenlhe wiira Yesu olhumacha mwaha wa Athithi.
43008028	Yesu nkeerelha, “Vanottuna inyu umwiinulha Mwaana a Ntu, vavawo nnowa mwaachuwelha wiira ‘Miyaano phi Yoyo,’ ni wiira khakinopanga iriyoothe miyaano kimwanene, nansho kinoolhumacha wo ikuru ivahiye ni Athithi wiira kuulhumache.
43008029	Akirumme arii vamoka ni mii mahuku onkhaye, yayo khanakihiya vekha ukhalhawaya chinopanga aka chinowateelhiha nrima.”
43008030	Attu enchi yaamwiwilhe Yesu olhumachaka yahonrumelhelha.
43008031	Yesu nkeerelha Ayahudi anrumelhenlhe alhe wiira, “Mwarumelhelhaka meettuchiho aka, nnookhalha owiittucha aka we ikekhiaye.
43008032	Vavawo nnochuwelha ikekhiaye, ni iyo inouhiyererani.”
43008033	Ni ayo nkayaamwaakhulha, “Hiyaano phi iyari ya Aburahimu, nihipachaka ukhalha akavihi a ntu riyoothe. Wo nlhatu waani nneera, ‘Nnohiyereriya?’ ”
43008034	Yesu nkaakhulha, “Ikekheene kinouhimeriani, kila ntu nowonya phi ipotta yo uwonya.
43008035	Ipotta khirina ikuru yo lhokelha vawani, nansho mwaana hanaa ikuru yo ulhokelha mahuku onkhaye.
43008036	Mwaana ohiyererakani, nnohiyereriya wo ikekhiaye.
43008037	Kihochuwelha wiira mwaattiva phi iyari ya Aburahimu. Nansho anakhalhaka chiicho, nnothanana ukiiva ukhalhawaya khannorumelhelha meettuchiho aka.
43008038	Miyaano kinohimiacha chilhe chikoonihilhe aya Athithi, nansho mwaattiva nnopanga chilhe chihimeriye inyu ni athumwaninyu.”
43008039	Ayo nkayaamwakhulha, “Athumwanihu phi Aburahimu.” Yesu nkaakhulha, “Thoko mwaattiva mwakaari ashaana a Aburahimu, mwampanga thoko chaapanga aya.
43008040	Miyaano kihoohimeriani ikeekhene ya Nlhuku, nansho anakhalhaka chiicho, mwaattiva nnothanana ukiiva. Aburahimu khayaapannge chiicho!
43008041	Mwaattiva nnopanga mwaha thoko yoolhe waapanga aya athumwaninyu.” Ayo nkayaamwirelha, “Hiyaano kanihiwe ashaana niyariye muulhuvani! Nihanaa Athithi amoka tu, Nlhuku.”
43008042	Yesu nkeera, “Ikaari wiira Nlhuku phi Athumwaninyu, mwaanokittuna miyaano, ukhalhawaya miyaano kikhumme wa Nlhuku ni vano kirii vaa. Khakiwilhe wo ikuru aka kimwanene, nansho yayo phi kirumilhe.
43008043	Woonaka khannochuwelha yayo malhove kinoolhumacha aka ayo? Ukhalhawaya khanneewelhelha nttenga aka.
43008044	Mwaattiva phi ashaana a Nakare, nttwarattwaraka nikakata na athumwaninyu. Toka machokholhelho yayo arii owiiva ahikhalhaka mu ikekhiani, ukhalhawaya ikeekhene khiiwo nhina mwaya. Kila vanolhumacha aya, aneera wo ulhikaana ni mayareelho aya, ukhalhawaya arii owoothacha ni anaangoro o woothacha wonkhaye.
43008045	Nansho miyaano kinohimiacha ikeekhene, ukhalhaka phi nlhatu winyu wo uhikirumelhelha.
43008046	Mpani mmoka inyu nooria wooniha wiira kihowonya? Nansho yakhalhaka wiira kinoolhumacha aka iyo phi ikeekhene, woonaka khannokirumelhelha?
43008047	Ntu a Nlhuku nowiiwelhelha malhove a Nlhuku. Nansho, mwaattiva, khanhiwe a Nlhuku, phi ri aya chiichammo etu khanneewelhelha malhove awe.”
43008048	Ayahudi nkayannyoholhacha Yesu yiiraka, “Chani, khavanlhoka vaneera ihu wiira inyuva mwa Asamariya, nri ni nshoka no unanara?”
43008049	Yesu nkaakhulha, “Miyaano khakirina nshoka. Miyaano kinaathimicha Athumwanaka, nansho mwaattiva khannokithimicha.
43008050	Miyaano khakineechaviera nthimicho aka kimwanene. Nansho hawo naavia yoyo nthimicho uyo, ni uyo phi nohukumulha.
43008051	Ikekheene kinouhimeriani, ntu neewelhelha meettuchiho aka khanowa aakhwa nookhalha nkumi mahuku o uhimalha.”
43008052	Ayahudi nkayaamwakhulha, “Paahi etu nihochuwelha vano wiira nrini nshoka! Aburahimu yahokhwa, anamilhohi ni ayo yahokwa, ni inyu nneera eti, Neewelhelha meettuchiho inyu khanokhwa, nookhalha nkumi mahuku o uhimalha.
43008053	Athumwanihu Aburahimu ahokhwa, chani woonaka inyuva nneepanga olhupalhe waapwaha Aburahimu? Anamilhohi ni ayo ahokhwacha. Ana inyuva nneechoona thoko apani?”
43008054	Yesu nkaakhulha, “Keethimichaka kimwanene, nthimicho aka kuhiwe ittu. Amoka anokithimicha mii phi Athumwanaka, aneera inyu mwaattiva wiira phi Nlhuku inyu.
43008055	Mwaattiva khannaachuwelha. Nansho kikenre wiira khakinaachuwelha, kaanothacha thoko mwaattivava. Nansho kihaachuwelha ni uvara nlhove naya.
43008056	Athumwaninyu Aburahimu yahottapelhelha wiira anowoona nihuku naka no uwa, ni ayo yahoona, nkayaateelhiya.”
43008057	Ayahudi nkayankoha, “Inyuva khannaphiyelha iyaakha makhumi nthanu, ni inyu nneera wiira nhoona Aburahimu?”
43008058	Yesu nkaakhulha, “Ikekheene kinouhimeriani, Aburahimu ahinayaria, ‘Miyaano kihawo.’ ”
43008059	Vavawo nkayalhokottacha malhuku ammonyere, nansho Yesu nkaathama, nkaakhuma u Inupa ya Nlhuku.
43009001	Yesu vaari awe eetakachaka, ahomwoona ntu mmoka ohoona toka iyareelho.
43009002	Owiittucha awe nkayankoha, “Owiittuchiha, phi apani awonyilhe, ulha ntu ulha, ama manyanaangoro awe, hata ayariee hoonaka?”
43009003	Yesu nkaakhulha, “U uhoona wu, khupangeelhe nlhatu no uwonya wawe, ama uwonya wa manyanaangoro awe. Aayarelhe hoonaka Nlhuku wiira awe ooniha ikuru awe chinopanga aya ntheko.
43009004	Uhinaya wiilha, nihothananiya uthepa uvara ntheko waya akirumme, uhiyu unoowa vahinooria awe ntu uvara ntheko.
43009005	Vanolhokelha aka velhaponi, miyaano phi nthuko wo ilhapo.”
43009006	Amalheke wulhumacha yayo malhove ayo, nkaashuwa ishenye vathi, nkoothuwa ipephe, nkanhika ntu ohoona ulhe mmiithoni,
43009007	nkaamwirelha, “Urweeke wakhucheke u nttiya no Siloamu.” Maana o nenno nchina nno nikhalhaka “Rumiye”. Ntu ohoona ulhe nkaarwa, nkaakhucha, nkaahokolhia nari oonaka.
43009008	Amwaatamana awe ni attu yaamwoona alhepelhaka, nkayeera, “Chani, ulha kahena ntu aakhalha ni ulhepelha ulhe?”
43009009	Attu akina yeera, “Phi yoyo.” Nansho attu akhwawe nkayeera, “Mena kahena! Howiiraka ulhikaana ni uyo.” Nansho ntu ahoona ulhe nkeera, “Phi miyaano!”
43009010	Nkayankohacha, “Miitho inyu ayo yenre chani wo uttukulhiya?”
43009011	Nkaakhulha, “Ntu neehaniya Yesu ulhe ahoothuwa ipephe, nkaakihika mmiithoni, ni ukiirelha, ‘Nrweeke mwakhucheke uri nttiya no Siloamu.’ Nkakaarwaa, vaari aka kikhuchaka, nkakaachokholha woona.”
43009012	Nkayankoha, “Yoyo ntu uyo etu ri vayi?” Ni uyo nkaakhulha, “Akichuwenlhe mii.”
43009013	Yamalheke nkayanrweha ntu aari ohoona uyo wa Amafarisayo.
43009014	Nenno nihuku Yesu voothuwa awe ipephe ni unttukulha miitho ntu uyo nno, naari Nihuku no Wiittuwa.
43009015	Amafarisayo nkayankoha yoyo ntu uyo, enre chani wo woona. Ni uyo nkeera, “Ahookihika ipephe mmiithoni, Nkakaakhucha wiitho, ni mii vano kinowoona.”
43009016	Amafarisayo akina nkayeera, “Ntu pannge chiicho khakhumme wa Nlhuku, ukhalhawaya khavarechenshe Malhehero o Nihuku no Wiittuwa.” Nansho akina nkayeera, “Ntu o uwonya nooria chani upanga cho ushangiha thoko chilha?” Nkawaakhulhanachiya iriyari aya.
43009017	Nkayankoha tho ntu aari ohoona ulhe, “Ukhalhawaya yoyo hoottukulhani miitho, nnomwoona thoko mpani?” Ni uyo nkaakhulha, “Kinomwoona yoyo, phi namilhohi.”
43009018	Inakhalhaka chiicho, Aholhelhi a Ayahudi khayarumelhenlhe wiira yoyo ntu uyo aari ohoona khalhayi vawo nansho vano nowoona, mpaka veehanne aya manyanaangoro awe,
43009019	nkayaakoha, “Chani ulha phi mwamwaninyu? Nneera inyu aayarelhe hoonaka, vano pantte vayi woona?”
43009020	Manyanaangoro awe nkayaakhulha, “Eiyo ulha phi mwaamwanihu, aayarelhe hoonaka.
43009021	Nansho khanichuwenlhe wiira enre chani wo woona, mena khanichuwenlhe ntu nttukunlhee miitho awe. Munkoheke mwanene, honnuwa, nowooria wulhumacha mwanene!”
43009022	Manyanaangoro awe ayo yoolhumanche chiicho ukhalhawaya yaari yoovaka aholhelhi Ayahudi, aalhehenre wiira ntu riyoothe nottuna urumelhelha eeraka wiira Yesu phi Kuristo oomolhiye nnupani mwo unlhapelha Nlhuku.
43009023	Phi nlhatu etu no manyanaangoro awe ayo wiira, “Honnuwa, munkoheke mwanene.”
43009024	Nkayaamwiihana nkwaha wo nayelhi ntu aari ohoona chiyareelho uyo, nkayaamwirelha, “Mummaheke Nlhuku nthimicho wiira nnohimia ikeekhene! Hiyaano nihochuwelha wiira ntu olhaminheni uyo rii o uwonya.”
43009025	Uyo nkaakhulha, “Akhalhaka o uwonya miyaano khakichuwenlhe. Nansho ittu imoka kinochuwelha aka, kaari ohona, ni vano kinowoona.”
43009026	Nkayaathepa unkoha, “Opangenlheni chani? Ottukunlheni chani miitho inyu?”
43009027	Nkaakhulha, “Kihomalha uhimeriani, ni inyu khamwiiwelhenlhe. Nlhatu waani vano nnothanana wiiwa tho? Chani mwaattiva nnothanana ukhalha owiittucha awe?”
43009028	Nansho ayo nkayannyoholhacha yiiraka, “Inyuva phi owiittucha awe, nansho hiyaano owiittucha a ashinna Musa.
43009029	Hiyaano nihochuwelha wiira Nlhuku aholhumana ashinna Musa, nansho ulha ntu ulha khanichuwenlhe khumme vayi!”
43009030	Ni uyo nkaakhulha, “Vari vo ushangiha! Mwaattiva khanchuwenlhe khumme vayi, nansho mii hokittukulha miitho aka!
43009031	Nihochuwelha wiira Nlhuku khaneewelhelha attu o uwonya, ila neewelhelha attu anonthimicha ni upanga chinothanana awe.
43009032	Ukhuma vachokhonlhe aya ilhapo khiinewania wiira ntu honttukulha miitho ntu ayarelhe hoonaka.
43009033	Yakhalhaka yoyo ntu uyo khakhumme wa Nlhuku, khanooria upanga ittu iriyoothe.”
43009034	Nkayaamwaakhulha, “Inyuva mwaayarelhe ni ulhelhiya mu uwonyani, nnooria chani uniittuchiha hiyaano?” Nkayaamomolha nnupani mwo lhapelha.
43009035	Yesu veewilhe awe yoyo mwaha uyo, nkaamwona ntu oomolhiye nnupani mwo ulhapelha uyo nkankoha, “Chani, inyuva nnonrumelhelha Mwaana a Ntu?”
43009036	Yoyo ntu uyo nkaakhulha, “Thithi, nkihimerie yoyo phi mpani, kinrumelhelhe!”
43009037	Yesu nkaamwirelha, “Nhomwoona, ni uyo phi noolhumacha ni inyu vano.”
43009038	Paahi yoyo ntu uyo nkeera, “Thithi! Kinoorumelhelha.” Nkankhoromelha Yesu.
43009039	Yesu nkeera, “Miyaano kiwilhe velhaponi uwaahukumulhani attu, ahinoona oone, ni ayo aneechona wiira anowoona akhalhe ohoona.”
43009040	Amafarisayo akina yaari vavawo ni uyo nkayeewa yayo malhove ayo, nkayankoha, “Chani, nneera wiira ni hii nirii ohoona chiicho?”
43009041	Yesu nkaakhulha, “Mwakaari ohoona, khamwakhalha ni milhatu cho utteka, nansho nneepanga wiira ‘Hiyaano ninowoona,’ ni iyo phi nooniha wiira bado nhowonya.”
43010001	Yesu nkeera, “Ikekheene kinouhimeriani, ntu hinokelha wo uvira vanlhakoni ihilhi yo ikhondoro, apephenyaka ni uwelha wo iphiro ikina, yoyo ntu owiiya ni o uvara makhuche.
43010002	Nansho nokelha wo uvira vanlhakoni, yoyo phi nshunga o ikhondoro.
43010003	Nolhitelhelha ihilhi nonhulhelha nchelhe ni ikhondoro chinowiiwa nlhove nawe. Nowoopa nthuri wiihana ikhondoro chawe kila imoka wo nchina naya, ni uholhelha vathe.
43010004	Chamalhaka ukhuma vathe, nooholhelha uholho, ni ikhondoro chinonttwara, ukhalhawaya chihonchuwelha nshunga aya.
43010005	Ikhondoro khachinooria unttwara ntu hiri mwanene, chinonttawa ukhalhawaya khachichuwenlhe nthuri wawe.”
43010006	Yesu ahaahimeria nenno nlhikaaniho nno, nansho ayo khayachuwenlhe maana aya.
43010007	Yesu nkeera tho, “Ikekheene kinouhimeriani, Miyaano phi nlhako wo ikhondoro.
43010008	Akina ayo, onkhaye aawilhe kihinaya mii, phi owiiya ni owaakha, ni ikhondoro khacheewelhenlhe.
43010009	Miyaano phi nlhako. Ntu nokelha wo uvirelha uwannyaka nowoopolhiya, nookelha ni ukhuma, ni upatta malhiho.
43010010	Attu owiiya anowa wo nrima wo wiiya, wiiva ni utanganya. Miyaano kiwilhe wiira mwaatti mpatte ukhalha ni ukumi, ukumi wo utimira.
43010011	“Miyaano phi nshunga orera nrima, nokumiha ukumi awe wo nlhatu no wiinanelha ikhondoro chawe.
43010012	Namitheko o ulhiviya, hirii nshunga, ni ikhondoro chihikhalhaka chawawe, vanoona awe mwiichi uwaaka, noohiya ikhondoro ni uttawa, mwiichi nkawaavara ikhondoro ni umwarushacha.
43010013	Yoyo noottawa wo uhilhoha ittu, ukhalhawaya uyo rii namitheko o ulhiviya tu.
43010014	Miyaano phi nshunga orera nrima. Kinowaachuwelha arii awaka, ni ayo arii awaka anookichuwelha miyaano,
43010015	thoko Athithi vanokichuwelha aya, ni mii chinaachuwelhaka Athithi. Miyaano kinookumiha ukumi aka wo nlhatu naya.
43010016	Chihawo tho ikhondoro chikina chawaka chihiri nhiilhini mu. Kihothananiya uwiiha ni chiyo, ni chiyo chinowiiwa nlhove naka, ni ukhalha mphingo mmoka ni nshunga mmoka.
43010017	“Athithi anokittuna ukhalhawaya kinookumiha ukumi aka wiira kiwe kaapochera tho.
43010018	Khaawo ntu o ukithurulha ukumi aka, miyaano kinokumiha wo uttuna waka kimwanene. Kihanaa ikuru yo ukumiha ni yo ukusha tho. Chiichammo phi malheheriyo kirumme aya Athithi kipange.”
43010019	Uhiiwanana nkawaakhumelhelha tho munlhokoni mwa Ayahudi wo nlhatu no yayo malhove ayo.
43010020	Attu enchi yaari yiiraka, “Ri ni nshoka no unanara. Ri ni ihalhahalha! Ye ishiyani umwiiwelhelha?”
43010021	Nansho attu akina nkayeera, “Ntu o nshoka no unanara khanooria wulhumacha malhove thoko alha! Nshoka ninooria chani uttukulha miitho a attu ohona?”
43010022	Yayo mahuku ayo waari nlhaalha wo uririya, ni nihuku no wuupuwelha uttukuriya Inupa ya Nlhuku naari nittapelhelhiyaka Uyerusalemu.
43010023	Yesu aari eetakachaka u Inupa ya Nlhuku vaari nipirothi ni Naselemani.
43010024	Ayahudi nkayanrukureria ni unkoha, “Nnohalha unihiya nichukulhaka mpaka yaakhani? Nkanihimerieni ikeekhene, chani inyuva phi Kuristo Moopolhi?”
43010025	Yesu nkaakhulha, “Kihoohimeriani, nansho khannorumelhelha. Mitheko chinopanga aka miyaano wo nchina na Athumwanaka phi nokihimiechesha,
43010026	nansho mwaattiva khannorumelhelha, ukhalhawaya mwaattiva kanhena ikhondoro chaka.
43010027	Ikhondoro chaka chinowiiwa nlhove naka, ni mii kinochuwelhacha, ni chiyo chinokittwara.
43010028	Miyaano kinowaavaha attu ukumi wo mahuku o uhimalha, ni ayo khanokhwa tho. Khaawo ntu nooria ukithurulha mmathathani mwaka.
43010029	Athumwanaka akivanhe chechiyo phi olhupalhe waapwaha onkhaye, khaawo nooria waathurulha Athithi mmathathani mwaya.
43010030	Athithi ni Miyaano niri amokaaru.”
43010031	Ayahudi nkayaalhokotta malhuku tho wiira amwaate.
43010032	Yesu nkeera, “Kihopanga ntheko mwinchi kivahiye aka na Athithi mwoonaka, phi ntheko waani etu wo chechiyo unoopangani nkaate ni malhuku?”
43010033	Ayahudi nkayaamwaakhulha, “Khaninowaatani malhuku wo nlhatu no mitheko choombone, nansho wo nlhatu no unlhava Nlhuku! Ukhalhawaya nneepanga Nlhuku, uno nnari ntu thoko hii.”
43010034	Yesu nkaakhulha, “Chani, kilhepiye nhina Malhehero inyu wiira Nlhuku heera, ‘Miyaano kihohimia, mwaattiva milhuku?’
43010035	Nihochuwelha wiira chinohimiya ni Malhove Matakatifu chiri che ikeekhene mahuku onkhaye, Nlhuku eehanaka yayo attu ayo milhuku, attu arwehelhiye nttenga awe.
43010036	“Thoko chiri aka mii, Athithi ahokithanlha ni ukiruma velhaponi. Veeshiyani etu, nneera wiira kihonlhava Nlhuku wo wiipanga Mwaana a Nlhuku?
43010037	Nhikirumelhelheke etu, yakhalhaka wiira khakinopanga mitheko chilheheriyaka ni Athumwanaka.
43010038	Nansho yakhalhaka kinoopanga, ata mwaahikirumelhelheke, mena etu nrumelhelheke mitheko chiyo, wo uchuwelha wiira Athithi anookhalha nhina mwaka, ni mii kinookhalha nhina mwa Athithi.”
43010039	Nkayaamwiithelha wiira ammare tho Yesu, nansho nkaakulhupuwa mmathathani mwaya.
43010040	Yesu nkaahokolhia tho ukhopelhelhe mwoolhoko wo Yorodani, vakittu Nayohana vaari aya aabatiizaka attu, nkaakhalha wowo.
43010041	Attu enchi nkayanrwelha nkayeera, “Nayohana khayaapannge yo ushangiha iriyoothe. Nansho yoolhumanche aya Nayohana amwaachaka ulha ntu ulha onkhaye aari e ikeekhene.”
43010042	Ni attu enchi vavawo nkayanrumelhelha Yesu.
43011001	Ntu mmoka eehaniya Lazaro, nnenchi o Bethaniya, aari nreta. Ubethaniya waari ittoko yaakhalha aya Amariamu ni arokoraya Namatha.
43011002	Amariamu phi alhe yaahikilhe makhura o unukhelha Athithi mmietoni ni waapoholha ni ikharari chaya. Lazaro, mwanhima aya yayo phi ari nreta.
43011003	Paahi yayo manyarokorawe ayo nkayaarweha nttenga wa Yesu, “Thithi, ampwana inyu nnaattuna inyu areta.”
43011004	Yesu eeweke chiicho, nkeera, “Yoyo ureta uyo khunommwiiha nookhwa, nansho wo nlhatu no unthimicha Nlhuku. Anowereiya ikhalhe phi iphiro yo uthimichiya Mwaana a Nlhuku.”
43011005	Yesu ahaattuna Namatha, Amariamu arokoraya ni Nalazaro.
43011006	Veewilhe awe nttenga wiira Nalazaro areta, nkaalhokelha vavawo vaari awe vawo wo mahuku melhi tho.
43011007	Yamalheke nkeerelha owiittucha awe, “Nirweeke nihokolhieke tho Uyudea!”
43011008	Owiittucha nkayaamwaakhulha, “Owiittuchiha, mahuku vakani tu ahovira toka Ayahudi vaathanana aya uwaatani malhuku ni uwiivani, ni inyu nnothanana urwaa wowo tho?”
43011009	Yesu nkaakhulha, “Isaa cho uthana khachirii khumi ni pilhi? Paahi etu, ntu neeta uthana khanokwakwathuwa, ukhalhawaya nomwalheelhiya ni nthuko wo ilhapo.
43011010	Nansho ntu eetaka uhiyu nookwakwathuwa, ukhalhawaya khuuwo nthuko velhaponi.”
43011011	Yesu nkoolhumacha yayo malhove ayo, ni umalhiha eeraka, “Ampwana ihu Nalazaro ahorupa, nansho Miyaano kinokelha waawusha.”
43011012	Owiittucha awe nkayaamwiirelha, “Thithi, akhalhaka ahowiiraka urupa, paahi anolhama.”
43011013	Owiittucha yaanyihera wiira ahowiiraka urupa nkhoveni, nansho Yesu aari ahimiaka wiira Nalazaro ahokhwa.
43011014	Yesu nkaahimeria wo uhavitha, “Nalazaro ahokhwa,
43011015	nansho kinootelhiya wo nlhatu ninyu wiira khakaariwo wowo, wiira nrumelhelhe. Paahi etu nngwee nirweeke uwannyaya uwo.”
43011016	Natomaso (eehaniya Nivata) nkayeerelha owiittucha ashikhunanaya wiira, “Nirweeke etu ni hii vamoka ni Owiittuchiha ihu, yakhalhaka ukhwa naakhwaneke vamoka!”
43011017	Yesu vaaphiilhe awe wowo, nkaaphwanya Nalazaro anamanlhe uvithiya nnihiyeni mahuku macheshe avinre.
43011018	Ittoko yo Ubethaniya khayaari utayi ni Uyerusalemu, nkwaha wo umalhaka imaili taaru,
43011019	ni Ayahudi enchi yaari anawiilhe u Namatha ni Amariamu uunyikalhachani nookhwa a nhima aya.
43011020	Namatha veewilhe aya wiira Yesu aari awaaka, nkayaarwa uumwikamelhani, nansho Amariamu ahalhaka nnupani.
43011021	Namatha nkayaamwiirelha Yesu, “Thithi, mwakaari vaa, nhima aka kaakhwa!
43011022	Nansho kihochuwelha wiira hata vano iriyoothe inottuna inyu unlhepelha Nlhuku, nouvahani.”
43011023	Yesu nkeera, “Mwanhima inyu noohihimmwa.”
43011024	Namatha nkayaakhulha, “Kihochuwelha wiira anoohihimmwa nihuku no uhihimushiya attu, nihuku no umalhelha.”
43011025	Yesu nkeerelha, “Miyaano phi nihihimusho ni ukumi. Anokirumelhelha mii anokhalha akumi, anakhwaaka,
43011026	ni kila ntu ri nkumi nokirumelhelha, khanokhwa ngu nnokhalha nkumi mahuku o uhimalha. Chani, nnoorumelhelha yayo?”
43011027	Namatha nkayaakhulha, “Eiyo Thithi! Miyaano kinoorumelhelha wiira inyuva phi Kuristo, Mwaana a Nlhuku, nowa velhaponi.”
43011028	Namatha yamalheke wulhumacha yayo, nkayaarwaa weehanani Amariamu, arokoraya, untemerani, nkayeera, “Owiittuchiha ahowa vaa, anowihanani.”
43011029	Ni ayo yeeweke chiicho, nkayonkwa phiyaru, nkayaamwiikamelha Yesu.
43011030	Yesu aari hinaphiya vawani, nansho aari bado wowulhe Namatha waamwiikamenlhe aya.
43011031	Paahi etu Ayahudi yaakhanlhe mpaani yaavahaka nrima Amariamu, voonne aya yunkwaka ni ukhuma vathe wo uhipicha, nkayaattwara. Yaanyihera wiira anokelha unihiyeni uwunlhani.
43011032	Paahi Amariamu vaaphilhe aya vaari awe Yesu ni umwoona, ahokhoroma, nkayeera, “Thithi, thoko mwakaari vaa, nhima aka kaakhwa!”
43011033	Yesu ooneke Amariamu yunlhaka, ni Ayahudi yaawilhe vamoka ni ayo yunlhaka, nkaakelhiya ikiriri ni ihuzuni munrimani.
43011034	Yamalheke nkaakoha, “Mwaavinthe vayi?” Nkayaamwakhulha, “Thithi mmweeke mwoona.”
43011035	Yesu nkaamoriha miithori.
43011036	Paahi Ayahudi nkayeera, “Mwooneke chinre awe wo unttuna!”
43011037	Nansho attu akina aya nkayeera, “Ahaattukulha miitho attu ohoona, ngati? Chani khoonrie waachiichiha Nalazaro ahikhwe?”
43011038	Yesu aari onlhaka munrimani, nkaarwa unihiyeni, nihiye naari iphaa, ninakhuneelhiye nlhuku nulhupalhe vanlhakoni.
43011039	Yesu nkeera, “Nithamihiye nlhuku nno!” Namatha, akhwelhiye ni mwanrokoraya Lazaro ayo, nkayeera, “Thithi, vanoonukha. Mahuku macheshe vano toka vavithiye aya!”
43011040	Yesu nkeerelha, “Chani, khakoohimenrieni wiira mwarumelhelhaka nnowoona nthimicho wa Nlhuku?”
43011041	Nkayaathamiha nlhuku nne. Yesu nkaaweha nchulhu wiirimu, nkeera, “Kihopochera Thithi, ukhalhawaya inyuva nnookiwelhelha.
43011042	Kihochuwelha wiira nnookiiwelhelha mahuku onkhaye, nansho kinoolhumacha yayo wo nlhatu na alha attu arii vaa alha, wiira arumelhelhe, wiira inyuva phi kirumme.”
43011043	Yesu amalhiheke wulhumacha yayo, nkeehana wo nlhove nulhupalhe eeraka, “Nalazaro! Nkhume vathe!”
43011044	Nalazaro nkayaakhuma vathe, uno anattukiye isaanda mmietoni ni mmiononi, wiitho unakhuneelhiye. Yesu nkeera, “Mwaathaphulheke, mwaahiyeke arweeke.”
43011045	Paahi Ayahudi enchi yawaachilhe wa Amariamu yooneke cheechiyo chaapannge awe Yesu, nkayanrumelhelha.
43011046	Nansho akina aya nkayaarwaa wa Amafarisayo uwaahimeriani mwaha waapannge awe Yesu.
43011047	Wo chiichammo etu opochera ishaani olhupalhe ni Amafarisayo nkayaapanga ntemera wo Ibaraza yuulhupalhe, nkayeera, “Niireke chanii? Mwooneke chineera awe wo upanga cho ushangiha!
43011048	Nanhiyaka, kila ntu nonrumelhelha, ni aholhelhi o Urumi anoowa uphomolha Inupa ya Nlhuku ni ukusha ilhapo ihu!”
43011049	Amoka aya, yeehaniya Nakayafa, yaari opochera ishaani olhupalhe yeyo iyaakha iyo, nkeerelhacha, “Mwaattiva khannochuwelha ittu!
43011050	Chani, khannoona wiira nambaya ntu mmoka akhwe wo nlhatu ni attu, ilhapo yonkhaye ihirimeelhihiye?”
43011051	Yayo khayoolhumanche chiicho wo uttuna waya anene, nansho ukhalhawaya yaari opochera ishaani olhupalhe yeyo iyaakha iyo, yaholhohera wiira Yesu nookhwa wo nlhatu no ilhapo aya,
43011052	mena kuhena wo nlhatu na Ayahudi vekha, nansho wo waawiha vamoka ashaana a Nlhuku amwareelhe velhaponi.
43011053	Ukhuma nenno nihuku nno etu, aholhelhi Ayahudi yahopanga miruku cho uthanana umwiiva Yesu.
43011054	Wo chiichammo etu Yesu kheente tho voonene munlhokoni mwa Ayahudi, nansho nkaathama vavawo nkaarwa waatamenrie uthako, iwani ineehaniya Efuraimu. Nkaakhalha wowo vamoka ni owiittucha awe.
43011055	Nihuku na Ayahudi no Pasaka naari ninaatamenrie, ni attu enchi yahorwaa Uyerusalemu wiira ehapihe nihinaaya nihuku nno.
43011056	Attu nkayaahalha amwaaviaka Yesu, ni ayo vaathothokanne aya vamoka nnupani Inupa ya Nlhuku, nkayaakohanacha ashineneru, “Ninoona chani mwaatti? Inowooria wiira khanowa usikuukuni, ama noowa?”
43011057	Opochera ishaani olhupalhe ni Amafarisayo nkayaalhehera attu wiira ntu chuwenlhe vakittu vari awe Yesu arwee aahimiachere ni ayo yammare.
43012001	Mahuku sita nihinaaya nihuku no Pasaka, Yesu ahorwaa Ubethaniya uwannyaya Nalazaro aahihimushiye ni Yesu ukhuma nnookhwani.
43012002	Wowo ahoterekelhiya yolhia yo uchechilho, yaaterekhiye ni Namatha, Nalazaro ni ayo ahokhalha vamezani vamoka ni Yesu.
43012003	Paahi etu Amariamu nkayaawia ntikha ilita yo makhura o unukhelha chinene o uhithakanihiya aathumihiya wo nchurukhu mwinchi, nkayanhika makhura Yesu mmietoni ni umpoholha wo ikharari chaya. Nihiriri nkanaachara mpaani mwonkhaye.
43012004	Yuda Isikariote, owiittucha mmoka aya khumi ni elhi, nohalha unthumiha Yesu, nkeera,
43012005	“Wo nlhatu waani etu alha makhura alha uhithumihiya wo nchurukhu idinari imia taaru, ni uvahiya amashikini?”
43012006	olhumanche chiicho, kuhena wiira anaachukulhelha amashikini, nansho ukhalhawaya aari ntu owiiya. Eiyaka munrupani mwo ushungelha nchurukhu weetana awe.
43012007	Nansho Yesu nkeera, “Nhaahuvihe amanyi alha! Mwaahiyeke akeesheke tayari wo nihuku naka no uvithiya.
43012008	Amashikini nnowaakhalhana mahuku onkhaye, nansho khannokhalha ni mii wo mahuku onkhaye.”
43012009	Attu enchi munlhokoni mwa Ayahudi nkayeewa wiira Yesu rii Ubethaniya, paahi etu, nkayaarwaa wowo, kuhiwe nansho wo nlhatu noomwona Yesu, nansho woona Nalazaro yaahihimushiye ni Yesu ukhuma nnookhwani.
43012010	Opochera ishaani olhupalhe nkayaapanga miruku cho weeva Nalazaro,
43012011	ukhalhawaya wo nlhatu naya Ayahudi enchi yahohiya weewelhelha, nkayanrumelhelha Yesu.
43012012	Waashelhe waya, milhoko chinchi cha attu chaawilhe usikuukuni chaheewa wiira Yesu aari mphironi uwa Uyerusalemu.
43012013	Paahi etu, nkayakushacha maritta o mitende, nkayaarwaa umwiikamelhani, akhuwelhaka eeraka, “Atotopelhiye Nlhuku! Athimichiye uyo nowa wo nchina na Athithi. Athimichiye Amwene o Uisraeli.”
43012014	Yesu nkaawiiheriya mwaaphuta mmoka, nkaawelha vachulhu vawe thoko chinohimiya aya ni Malhove Matakatifu,
43012015	“Nhoove iwani yo Sayuni! Mummweheke, Mwene inyu noowa, nammwenlhe mwaaphuta!”
43012016	Owiittucha awe yaari ahichuwelhaka yoyo mwaha uyo, nansho Yesu amalheke uthimichiya, phi opuwenlhe aya wiira Malhove Matakatifu yaholhepiya, amwaachaka wiira attu yahompangelha yayo.
43012017	Attu yaari vamoka ni Yesu nihuku yeehanne awe Nalazaro ukhuma nnihiyeni, aahihimushaka ukhuma nnookhwani, yahonhimiechesha.
43012018	Nenno etu phi nlhatu no wiikamelhiya ni nlhoko mwinchi wa attu, ukhalhawaya yaheewa wiira Yesu ahopanga yeyo yo ushangiha iyo.
43012019	Paahi, Amafarisayo nkayeerelhana, “Nnowoona vano? Khaninooria upanga ittu iriyoothe! Mmweheke, ilhapo yonkhaye inonttwara!”
43012020	Ahokhalha Ayunani mumphingoni mwa attu yaarwelhe Uyerusalemu uuthimichani nihuku no Pasaka nno.
43012021	Nkayarwaa u Nafilipo, anenchi o Ubethsaida yo Galilaya, ni wiira, “Pwiiya, ninothanana umwoona Yesu.”
43012022	Nafilipo nkayaarwaa, nkayeerelha Naandorea, ni ayo oyelhi nkayaarwaa unhimeriani Yesu.
43012023	Yesu nkeera, “Isaa yo uthimichiya Mwaana a Ntu ihophiya!
43012024	Ikekheene kinouhimeriani, imbeyu yo marupi inohalha imbeyuru yaahimoreke vattayani ni ukhwa. Yakhwaaka, phi noyara aya marupi menchi.
43012025	Attu anottuna ukumi aya anoopoteriha, anovenga makhalhelho o ukumi wo velhaponi va, anoshungerera wo nlhatu wo ukumi wo mahuku o uhimalha.
43012026	Ntu nothanana ukikaviha ntheko, hothananiya ukittwara, ikhalhe wiira variyoothe variaka miyaano ni akarumiya aka anottuna ukhalha vavawo. Ntu nokikaviha, Athumwanaka anonvaha nthimicho.
43012027	“Vano nnepa aka unoohuperia, ni mii kuulhumachekeni etu? Chani kiire, ‘Thithi, nkoopolhe ilha ikatema ilha ihikiphiyelhe?’ Nansho phi nlhatu wo uwa waka, wiira kivire ilha ikatema yo uweria ilha.
43012028	Thithi, nthimicheke vano nchina ninyu.” Vavawo nlhove nkaneewaniaa ukhuma wiirimu, “Kihothimicha, ni vavawo kinoothimicha tho.”
43012029	Attu yaari aneemenlhe vavawo yaheewa nenno nlhove nno, ni attu akina aya nkaanyihera ithari nansho akina aya nkayolhumacha, “Nnepa wo wiirimu uholhumacha umuulhumana!”
43012030	Nansho Yesu nkeerelha, “Nenno nlhove nno khaniiwanelhe wo nlhatu aka miyaano, ila wo nlhatu ninyu.
43012031	Vanova phi ikatema yo uhukumulhiya ilhapo, vanova Nakare nholhelhi o ilhapo ilha noopikhulhiya.
43012032	Ni mii kennulhiyaka vachulhu ilhapo kinommwiiha kila ntu uwannyaka.”
43012033	Wo wulhumacha chiicho ahooniha naakhweke nookhwa ani.
43012034	Paahi yoyo nlhoko uyo nkawaamwaakhulha, “Hiyaano ninoohimeriya ni Malhehero ihu wiira Kuristo khaawa aakhwa nookhalha nkumi mahuku o uhimalha. Nnooria chani etu wiira, Mwaana a Ntu nowiinulhiya? Yoyo Mwaana a Ntu uyo phi mpani?”
43012035	Yesu nkaakhulha, “Nthuko bado urii ni inyu wo mahuku vakani. Mweeteke nnari ni yoyo nthuko uyo ipiphi ihuupatteni, ukhalhawaya aneeta mpiiphini khanochuwelha unokelha aya.
43012036	Paahi etu, ikatema nnari ni yoyo nthuko uyo nrumelhelheke nkhalhe attu o nthuko.” Amalheke wulhumacha yayo malhove ayo, Yesu nkaarwa vaari utayi ni ayo.
43012037	Anakhalhaka Yesu ahopangacha cho ushangiha chonkhaye chiyo yoonaka, khayaanrumelhenlhe.
43012038	Chiichammo etu malhove yoolhumanche aya anamilhohi ashinna Isaya nkayatimira, “Thithi, apani arumelhenlhe nttenga ihu? Ni ikuru ya Athithi ichuwaneelhe wa apani?”
43012039	Chiicho khayoonrie urumelhelha, ukhalhawaya ashinna Isaya yahoolhumacha tho wiira,
43012040	“Nlhuku hotiyelhelha miitho aya ahoone, hophupuwalhiha mirima chaya, ahoone wo miitho aya, ahichuwelhe wo irusho chaya, mena ahikirukunuwelhe, aneera Athithi, wiira kaalhamihe.”
43012041	Ashinna Isaya yoolhumanche yayo malhove ayo ukhalhawaya yahoona nthimicho wa Yesu, nkayaahimiacha mwaha wawe.
43012042	Hata chiicho, aholhelhi enchi Ayahudi yahonrumelhelha Yesu. Nansho wo nlhatu ni Amafarisayo, khayolhumanche mwaha wo unrumelhenlha Yesu voonene, yaari yoovaka wiira anowoomolhiya nnupani mwo unlhapelha Nlhuku.
43012043	Yaathanana uthimichiya ni attu kuhiwe utotopelhiya ni Nlhuku.
43012044	Yamalhekeru Yesu nkaawelhiha nlhove nkaahimia wiira, “Ntu nokirumelhelha, khanokirumelhelha mii tu, ila nowaarumelhelha ni ayo akirumme.
43012045	Attu anokoona miyaano anoowona akirumme.
43012046	Miyaano kiwiilhe velhaponi kikhalhe nthuko, attu onkhaye anokirumelhelha ahihalhe mwiipiphini.
43012047	Ntu neewa malhove aka nansho wo uhivarelhelha, miyaano khakinonhukumulha, ukhalhawaya khakiwilhe uhukumulhani ilhapo nansho woopolhani attu o velhaponi.
43012048	Attu ahinovarelhelha malhove aka ahana ntu mmoka owahukumulha. Nlhove nuulhumachilhe aka phinottuna waahukumulha nihuku no umalhelha!
43012049	Miyaano khakuulhumanche wo ikuru aka kimwanene, Athithi akilhehenre malheheriyo ayo phi kivanhe yo wulhumacha.
43012050	Ni mii kinoochuwelha wiira malhehero aya anoowiha ukumi wo uhimalha. Paahi etu, miyaano kinohimiacha Athithi akilheehenre aya.”
43013001	Nihuku nimoka Pasaka hinaphiya, Yesu ahochuwelha wiira isaa awe yo uthama velhaponi ni urwaa wa Athithi ihophiya. Ahaattuna chinene attu awe arii velhaponi, waattuna uhimmalha!
43013002	Paahi Yesu ni owiittucha awe yaari anakhanlhe ulhia yolhia yo uchechilho. Nakare ahomalha unkelha Yuda mwaana a Nasimoni Isikariote, ni ummaha nrima wo unthumiha Yesu.
43013003	Yesu ahochuwelha wiira Athithi yahonvaha chittu chonkhaye mmathathani mwawe. Ni wiira aakhumme wa Nlhuku, ni vano nohokolhia wa Nlhuku.
43013004	Paahi ahothama vamezani nkeesha vathotho mwiinjiro awe, nkaakusha nchako nkeettuka nnyununi.
43013005	Yamalheke nkaahelha maashi munkhatoni, nkaachokholha waakhuchiha owiittucha awe mieto ni upoholha wo nchako weettunke awe.
43013006	Paahi nkaaphiyelha Nasimoni Peturo, nansho Napeturo nkayeera, “Thithi, inyuva nkikhuchihe mii mieto chaka?”
43013007	Yesu nkaakhulha, “Khannochuwelha vano ittu kinopanga aka nansho nnochuwelha kaanyuma.”
43013008	Napeturo nkayamwiirelha Yesu, “Inyuva khannokikhuchiha mieto mahuku onkhaye, ngu!” Yesu nkaakhulha, “Kaahukuchihekeni mieto chinyu khannokhalha owiittucha aka.”
43013009	Nasimoni Peturo nkayaakhulha, “Thithi, nkikuchiheke, kuhiwena mietoru, nansho ni miono chaka ni muru ni uyo.”
43013010	Yesu nkeerelha, “Ntu rampe khanothananiya ukhucha yaahikhalheke mieto, ukhalhawaya homalha iruttu awe yonkhaye ihorera. Mwaattiva nhohapihiya, nansho kanhiwe onkhaye.”
43013011	Yesu ahonchuwelha ntu nottuna unthumiha, phi nlhatu no wiira, “Mwaattiva nhohapihiya, nansho kanhiwe onkhaye nri orera.”
43013012	Amalheke waakhuchiha mieto ni uwara tho mwiinjiro awe, ahokhalha vamezani, nkeerelha, “Chani, nhochuwelha yayo kuupangenlheakani ayo?
43013013	Mwaattiva nnokiihana Owiittuchiha ni Athithi, vavawo nhoolhumacha rata, ukhalhawaya phi mii.
43013014	Paahi yakhalhaka miyaano kirii Athithi ni Owiittuchiha inyu kihookhuchihani mwaattiva mieto, ni mwaattiva chiicho nkhuchihaneke mieto mwaashineneru.
43013015	Kihoovahani malhikaaniho, ni inyu mpangelhaneke chiicho thoko chupangenlheakani.
43013016	Kinouhimeriani wo ikekhiaye wiira, ipotta kirina ikuru yo umpwaha mwanene ntheko awe, mena akarumiya khanokhalha ni ikuru yulhupalhe waapwaha naaruma.
43013017	Paahi etu, yakhalhaka nnoochuwelha yayo, mwapangaka nnoopuha.
43013018	“Alha kinolhumachaka alha khaanowaachani mwaattiva onkhaye. Miyaano kinowaachuwelha alhe kaathanlhalhe aka. Nansho ihophwanelhiya utimire wo Malhove Matakatifu aneera, ‘Ulhe lhilhie yolhia aka hokirukunuwelha kimwanene.’
43013019	Miyaano kinouhimeriani ihinaya ukhumelhelha, vanottuna aya ukhumelhelha vawo mmwe mwaarumelhelha wiira ‘Miyaano Phi Yoyo.’
43013020	Ikekhiaye kinouhimeriani, nompochera ntu kinonruma aka nokipochera mii, ni ntu nokipochera mii, naapochera akirumilhe.”
43013021	Yesu amalheke wulhumacha, ahokelhiya ihuzuni chinene munrimani, nkeera wo uhivitha, “We ikekhiaye kinohimiechesha wiira mmoka inyu nookithumiha!”
43013022	Owiittucha nkayawehana ashineneru, ashangaka chinene wo uhichuwelha wiira nohimiani.
43013023	Owiittucha mmoka, aattuniya ni Yesu chinene, ahokhalha wo umwaatameria Yesu.
43013024	Nasimoni Peturo nkayanthoonyera ni umwiirelha, “Mwaakoheke anaacha apani?”
43013025	Owiittucha uyo nkaachushera ni umwaatameria chinene Yesu, nkankoha, “Thithi, phi apani?”
43013026	Yesu nkaakhulha, “Ntu kinohalha aka ummaha nkatte kipamphe aka nnyiponi, phi yoyo.” Paahi, nkaakusha ikipande yo nkatte, nkaapapha nnyiponi, nkammaha Yuda mwaamwana a Nasimoni Isikariote.
43013027	Yuda Isikariote amalheke upochera yeyo ikipande iyo, Nakare nkaakelha. Paahi Yesu nkaamwirelha, “Inothanana inyu upanga iyo pangakani wo uhipicha!”
43013028	Nansho khaawo anakhalhaka ntu mmoka aya aakhanlhe va yolhiani aachuwenlhe wo nlhatu waani eerelhiya chiicho.
43013029	Ukhalhawaya Yuda aari ntu o ushunga nrupa wo nchurukhu, owiittucha akina nkayaanyihera wiira Yesu aari anrumaka arwee athume chaathananiya wo nihuku no Pasaka, ama wiira arwee aavahe amashikini.
43013030	Paahi Yuda amalheke ukusha ikipande yo nkatte ilhe, nkaakhuma vathe wo uhipicha. Yeyo yaari uhiyu.
43013031	Yuda athameke, Yesu nkeera, “Vano Mwaana a Ntu hothimichiya, ni uyo Nlhuku hothimichiya nhina mwawe.
43013032	Thoko nthimicho wa Nlhuku chipatakulhiye aya nhina Mwaana a Ntu, ni uyo Nlhuku nowooniha nthimicho wo Mwaana a Ntu nhina mwawe mwanene, ni upanga chiicho wo uhipicha.
43013033	“Achishaana aka, khakinaya kirii ni inyu wo ikatema vakani tu. Nnookaavia, nansho vano kinouhimeriani alhe yaahimenrie aka aholhelhi Ayahudi, ‘Unokelha aka mii, mwaattiva khannooria urwaa!’
43013034	Kinouvahani malhehero o naanano, nttunaneke mwaashineneru, nttunaneke thoko chuuttunne akani mwaattiva.
43013035	Mwattunanaka mwaashineneru, attu onkhaye anoochuwelha wiira mwaattiva phi owiittucha aka.”
43013036	Nasimoni Peturo nkayaakoha, “Thithi nnokelha vayi?” Yesu nkaakhulha, “Unokelha aka khannooria ukittwara vano, nansho nnookittwara kaanyuma.”
43013037	Napeturo nkayaamwirelha, “Thithi, nlhatu waani kihoorie uuttwarani vanova? Kirii tayari ukumiha ukumi aka wo nlhatu winyu!”
43013038	Yesu nkaakhulha, “Chani nrii tayari ukumiha ukumi inyu wo nlhatu waka? Ikekhiaye kinouhimeriani wiira, nthupi uhinaya wiipa nnowa mwaakikhota vararu mwiiraka khankichuwenlhe mii.”
43014001	Yesu nkeerelha, “Nhichukulhe munrimani mwinyu. Munrumelhelheke Nlhuku, nkirumelhelheke ni mii.
43014002	Uwani wa Athumwanaka mapuro ari menchi, ihikaari chiicho, kanouhimeriani. Vano mii kinokelha ukoroshelhani nipuro.
43014003	Karwaaka ni ukoroshelhani nipuro, kinoohokolhia uwa ukushani uwannyaka, ni inyu nkhalhe variaka miyaano.
43014004	Ni inyu nhochuwelha iphiro yo urwaa wowo unokelha aka uwo.”
43014005	Natomaso nkayankoha, “Thithi, khaninchuwelha unokelha inyu, ninohalha uchuwelha chani etu, yeyo iphiro iyo?”
43014006	Yesu nkaakhulha, “Miyaano phi iphiro, ikeekhene ni ukumi. Khaawo ntu nooria urwaa wa Athithi aahivireke uwannyaka.
43014007	Yakhalhaka nhokichuwelha miyaano, nnowaachuwelha ni Athumwanaka chiicho. Ni toka vano, nnowaachuwelha, tho nhomalha woona.”
43014008	Nafilipo nkayaamwiirelha, “Thithi, nnooniheke Athithi, ni hii inonithosha.”
43014009	Yesu nkeerelha, “Kihokhalha ni inyu mahuku onkhaye alha, ni inyu Nafilipo bado khannakichuwelha? Akoonne mii ahoona Athithi. Nnooria chani etu wiira, ‘Nnoonihe Athithi?’
43014010	Chani Nafilipo khannorumelhelha wiira miyaano kinokhalha nhina Athithi, ni ayo Athithi anokhalha nhina mwaka? Akinoolhumacha malhove wo ikuru aka, Athithi arii nhina mwaka phi nopanga mitheko chaya.
43014011	Nhothananiya ukirumelhelha vaneera aka wiira miyaano kinokhalha nhina Athithi ni ayo Athithi anokhalha nhina mwaka. Ama etu, nrumelhelheke wo nlhatu no mitheko chinopanga aka.
43014012	Ikekhiaye kinouhimeriani, anokirumelhelha mii anoopanga mitheko chinopanga aka miyaano, eiyo, anoopanga ata moolhupalhe chinene, ukhalhawaya kinokelha wa Athithi.
43014013	Ittu iriyoothe inottuna inyu ulhepelha wo nchina naka kinoopanga, wiira nthimicho wa Athithi wooniye nhina mwawe Mwaana a Ntu.
43014014	Mwakilhepelhaka ittu iriyoothe wo nchina naka, kinouvahani.
43014015	“Mwakittunaka, nnoovara malhehero aka.
43014016	Kinowaalhepelha Athithi wiira ammwiihe Okaviha nkina, nohalha ukhalha ni inyu mwaattiva wo mahuku o uhimalha.
43014017	Yoyo phi Iphumu ya Nlhuku nohalha upatakulha ikeekhene ya Nlhuku. Attu o velhaponi khanowa ampochera ukhalhawaya khanowa aamwoona, mena unchuwelha. Nansho mwaattiva nnowa mwanchuwelha ukhalhawaya noowa aakhalha nhina mwinyu.
43014018	“Khakinoohiyani mwaattiva thoko ashaana ohiiya, kinoohokolhia tho uwaninyu.
43014019	Ihohalha vakani attu o velhaponi khanowa yaakona tho. Nansho mwaattiva nnookona, ukhalhawaya miyaano kinkumi, ni inyuva chiicho nnookhalha akumi.
43014020	Nenno nihuku nno vanohalha aya waaya nnoowa mwaachuwelha wiira miyaano kiri nhina mwa Athithi, ni inyuva nrii nhina mwaka, thoko ni mii kiriaka nhina mwinyu.
43014021	“Ntu nopochera malhehero aka ni uvara, yoyo phi nokittuna. Ntu nokittuna miyaano noottuniya ni Athumwanaka, ni mii kinowaattuna ni wiichoniha uwannyaya.”
43014022	Nayuda, kahiwe Isikariote ulhe, nkayaamwiirelha, “Thithi, vanoorieke chani inyuva wiichooniha uwanihu hii, kuhiwe wa attu o velhaponi?”
43014023	Yesu nkaakhulha, “Ntu akittunaka, noovarelhelha malhove aka. Athumwanaka anonttuna, ni hii ninoowa neesha nipuro uwannyawe.
43014024	Ntu hinokittuna khanovarelhelha malhove aka. Nlhove niiwilhe inyu nno kanihiwe nawaka, nansho na Athithi akirumme.
43014025	“Kihoohimeriani ulha mwaha ulha vano, kinari vamoka ni inyu.
43014026	Okaviha, Iphumu ya Nlhuku, nottuna urumiya ni Athithi wo nchina naka uyo, noowittuchihani kila ittu ni uwupushani chittu chonkhaye chuuhimenrieakani.
43014027	“Mpuha phi nouhiyeraakani, kinouvahani mpuha aka. Akinoovahani thoko attu o velhaponi chineera aya. Nhikhelhiye nipampa munrimani, mena nhoove.
43014028	Nheewa kuuhimeriakani, ‘Kinoorwaa, nansho kinoohokolhia tho uwaninyu.’ Yakaari mwahokittuna, mwanteelhiya woona wiira kinokelha wa Athithi, ukhalhawaya yayo phi olhupalhe ukipwaha mii.
43014029	Kihoohimeriani malhove menchi ihinaya ukhumelhelha, vanohalha aya ukhumelhelha vawo mmwe mwaarumelhelha.
43014030	Khakinoolhumacha ni inyu tho mwaha mulhupalhe, ukhalhawaya nholhelhi o velhaponi, Nakare ri muuwani. Nansho uwannyaka miyaano kharina machiri,
43014031	nansho attu o velhaponi anoothananiya uchuwelha wiira kinowaattuna Athithi, phi nlhatu noopanga kila ittu thoko Athithi chikilheherilhe aya. “Mweemelheke, nirweeke, nngwe nithame vaa.
43015001	“Miyaano phi nzabibu we ikeekhene, ni Athumwanaka phi namalhima.
43015002	Kila nritta nhina mwaka nihinemma maphepu nenno ninoothamihiya, kila nritta ninemma rata ninookhwacheriya nithepeke wimma.
43015003	Mwaattiva nhokhalha orera wo nlhatu no meettuchiho kuwiittuchinheakani.
43015004	Nkhalheke nnalhutaanne ni mii, ni mii kikhalhe nhina mwinyu. Nritta khaninooria wimma vekha aya, naahilhutaaneke ni ntepo naya. Phi chiichammo etu ni inyu mwaattiva khannooria wimma izabibu mwaahilhutaaneke ni mii nhina mwaka.
43015005	“Miyaano phi ntepo no zabibu, ni inyu mwaatti phi maritta. Nolhutaana ni mii, ni mii kalhutaanaka nhina mwawe, yoyo nowimma maphepu menchi, ukhalhawaya ntu hinokhalha ni mii khanooria upanga ittu iriyoothe.
43015006	Ntu riyoothe ahilhutaaneke ni mii noorihelhiya vathe thoko nritta ninorihiya aya vachereshere nkanooma. Maritta thoko yayo anookhupiya ni urihelhiya vamooroni avie.
43015007	Mwakhalhaka nhina mwaka ni malhove aka akhalhaka nhina mwinyu, paahi etu, nlhepelheke ittu iriyoothe nnothanana inyu, nnoovahiya.
43015008	Nthimicho wa Athithi unowoonia mwemmaka maphepu menchi, vavawo etu phi noohalha inyu ukhalha owiittucha aka.
43015009	Kinottunani mwaattiva thoko Athithi chikittunne aya mii, nhalheke nchuwelhaka wiira kinouttunani.
43015010	Mwavaraka malhehero aka nnookhalha mu uttunani mwaka, thoko ni mii chivanre aka malhehero a Athumwanaka ni ukhalha mu uttunani mwaya.
43015011	“Kihoohimeriani ulha mwaha ulha ikhalhe wiira uteelhiya waka ukhalhe nhina mwinyu, ni uteelhiya winyu utimire.
43015012	Malhehero aka phi alha, nttunaneke mwaashineneru, nttunaneke thoko chuuttunne akani mwaattiva.
43015013	Khuuwo uttuna wulhupalhe chinene umpwaha uttuna wo ntu nokumiha ukumi awe wo nlhatu no manyampwana awe.
43015014	Mwaattiva nnookhalha manyampwana aka mwapangaka kinoolheherakani alha.
43015015	Khakinowiihanani tho mwaatti akarumiya, ukhalhawaya karumiya khanochuwelha chinopanga aya anene ntheko anonruma. Nansho miyaano kinowiihanani mwaattiva manyampwana, ukhalhawaya kihouhimeriani chonkhaye chiiwilhe aka wa Athumwanaka.
43015016	Kanhiwe mwaatti mwaakithanlhe miyaano, mii phi othanlheni, nkakoorumani nrwee mwemme maphepu menchi, maphepu anolhokelha. Athithi awe yoovahani ittu iriyoothe inaalhepelha inyu wo nchina naka.
43015017	Paahi etu, malhehero aka uwaninyu phi alha, nttunaneke mwaashineneru.
43015018	“Ichimwa ya attu o velhaponi yoophwanyakani mwaattiva, muupuwelheke wiira yahokiphwanya miyaano ihinaaya uuphwanyani mwaatti.
43015019	Yakaari wiira nri attu o velhaponi, ilhapo yaanottunani mwaattiva thoko attu aya. Mwaattiva kanhiwe attu o velhaponi, nansho miyaano kihouthanlhani velhaponi va, wo yoyo nlhatu uyo etu ilhapo inoupangelhani ichimwa.
43015020	Muupuwelhacheke yohimenrieakani wiira, ‘Ipotta khachirina ikuru umpwaha mwanene ntheko naaruma.’ Yakhalhaka ahokihuviha miyaano, anouhuvihani ni mwaattiva chiicho, yakhalhaka ahovara nlhove naka, anoovara ni nlhove ninyu chiicho.
43015021	Chechiyo chonkhaye chiyo anowa opangelhani mwaattiva wo nlhatu wo urumelhelha nchina naka, ukhalhawaya khayaachuwenlhe akirumme.
43015022	Yakaari khakaawilhe ni wulhumacha, yayo khayaakhalha ni milhatu, nansho vano kharina nlhove no wiivaraanga wiira khanawonya.
43015023	“Ntu nokipangelha ichimwa miyaano, nowaapangelha ichimwa ni Athumwanaka chiicho.
43015024	Kihikaapannge uwannyaya mwaha uhinapacha upangiya ni ntu nkina khayaakhalha ni nlhatu wiira ahowonya. Nansho vano ahoona chipannge aka nkayaakipangelha ichimwa miyaano, nkayaapangelha ichimwa Athumwanaka chiicho.
43015025	Paahi etu, malhove arii nhina Malhehero aya, ahophiyelha, ‘Ahokipangelha ichimwa wo uhikhalha nlhatu!’
43015026	“Vanohalha awe uwa Okaviha kinohalha aka unruma uwaninyu uyo, Iphumu ya Nlhuku, nowa aapatakulha ikeekhene ya Nlhuku, yoyo noowa aahimiechesha ikeekhene inokaacha mii.
43015027	Ni inyu mwaattiva chiicho, nnoowa mwaakihimiechesha ukhalhawaya nri vamoka ni mii ukhuma vaachokhonlhe aya.”
43016001	Yesu nkeerelha tho “Kihouhimeriani yayo wiira nhihiye nrima nrina inyu.
43016002	Attu anowoomolhani mwaattiva mmanupani mwaya mwo unlhapelha Nlhuku. Eiyo tho, mahuku anoowa, kila ntu nothanana uwiivani mwaattiva naanyihereke wiira nonkaviha Nlhuku.
43016003	Attu anowa uupangelhani yoyo mwaha uyo ukhalhawaya khaachuwenlhe Athithi, mena khakichuwenlhe mii.
43016004	Paahi etu, kihoohimeriani yayo ikatema yo upangia waya yaphiyaka, mmwe mwoopuwelha wiira kahowaamukani. “Khakoohimenrieni ulha mwaha ulha toka khalhayi ukhalhawaya kaari vamoka ni inyu.
43016005	Nansho vano kinokelha wa ayo akirumme ayo, nansho khaawo inakhalhaka mmoka inyu nokikoha wiira nnokelha vayi.
43016006	Ukhalhawaya vano kihouhimeriani yoyo mwaha uyo, ihuzuni ihoucharani mu nrimani mwinyu.
43016007	Kinouhimeriani ikeekhene wiira, ihorera nambaya miyaano kirwee, ukhalhawaya kaahirweeke, Okaviha uyo khanowa uwaninyu. Paahi etu, karwaakaru, kinonruma uwaninyu.
43016008	Ni uyo vanottuna awe uwa, nowoopusha attu o velhaponi wiira irusho chaya chihowonya, ahottekelha ikekhia ni ihukumu ya Nlhuku.
43016009	Ahowonya wo nlhatu wo hikirumelhelha.
43016010	Ahohiya mwaha wo uvara ikekhia, ni ukhalhawaya vano kinokelha wa Athithi, khannokoona tho.
43016011	Ahotteka mwaha wo ihukumu ya Nlhuku, ukhalhawaya nholhelhi o velhaponi va, Nakare homalha uhukumulhiya.
43016012	“Kihanaa malhove menchi o uhimeriani, nansho vano, khannooria uvilhelha.
43016013	Vanohalha aya uwa Iphumu ya upatakulha ikeekhene ya Nlhuku, nouchuwelhihani ikeekhene yonkhaye. Khanowa ahimiachaka wo ikuru awe mwanene, nansho noolhumacheke inohalha awe wiiwa ni uchuwelhihani chittu chinowa.
43016014	Yoyo naakithimicheke mii, ukhalhawaya nowa uuchuwelhihani chinohalha awe wiiwa uwannyaka.
43016015	Chittu chonkhaye chirina aya Athithi phi chawaka, phi nlhatu no uhimia wiira Iphumu ya Nlhuku nouchuwelhihani chinohalha aka ummaha ovaheni.
43016016	“Ihohalha ikatema vakani mwaatti khannokona, ni ikatema vakani inowa nnookona.”
43016017	Owiittucha awe akina nkayakohana ashineneru, “Ana nohimiani vanoniirelha awe, ‘Wo ikatema vakani khannokoona, ni ikatema vakani inowa nnookona?’ Tho neera, ‘Ukhalhawaya kinokelha wa Athithi!’
43016018	Rina maana ani vaneera awe, ‘Wo ikatema vakani?’ Khanichuwenlhe inoolhumacha awe.”
43016019	Yesu ahochuwelha wiira yaathanana unkoha, paahi etu nkeerelha, “Chani, woonaka nnookohana mwaashineneru mwaha kuulhumanche aka wiira, ‘Wo ikatema vakani khannokoona, ni ikatema vakani inowa nnookona tho?’
43016020	Kinouhimeriani ikekhiaye, mwaattiva nnowunlha ni uwereiya munrimani, nansho ilhapo inootelhiya, nnookhalha ni ihuzuni nansho ihuzuni inyu inoorukunuwa ukhalha uteelhiya nrima.
43016021	Ikatema opani ari munkurini vaneethaphulha aya anowoona uweria aya ukhalhawaya ikatema yo uweria ihophiya, nansho amalhaka wiithaphulha khaanoopuwelha tho uweria uwo nlhatu no uteelhiya wiira mwaana mwankani hoyaria velhaponi.
43016022	Chiichammo phi ri aya uwaninyu mwaatti, vano nri mu wuunlhani, nansho kinowa koowoonani tho, ni mirima chinyu chinowa uteelhiya, uteelhiya uhinooria uthamihiya ni ntu.
43016023	“Nenno nihuku nno nawaaka, khannowa mwaakilhepelha ittu iriyoothe. Ikekheene kinouhimeriani, iriyoothe inottuna inyu waalhepelha Athithi wo nchina naka, anouvahani.
43016024	Mpaka nna khannavekelha ittu iriyoothe wo nchina naka. Nvekelheke nnoovahiya, ikhalhe wiira uteelhiya winyu utimire.
43016025	“Kihoohimeriani yayo wo malhikaaniho. Nansho ikatema inoowa vahinowa aka wulhumacha wo malhikaaniho, nansho kinowa wulhumacha mwaari wo uhivitha mwaha unaacha Athithi.
43016026	Nenno nihuku nno nawaaka, nnowa mwaalhapelha Athithi wo nchina naka, kuuhimeriakani wiira akinowa kaalhepelha wo ulhepelhelhani mwaattiva,
43016027	ukhalhawaya Athithi anene anouttunani mwaattiva. Anouttunani ukhalhawaya mwaattiva nhokittuna mii ni urumelhelha wiira kikhumme wa Nlhuku.
43016028	Miyaano kaakhumme wa Athithi, nkakaawa velhaponi, uno vano kinoohiya ilhapo ni uhokolhia wa Athithi.”
43016029	Paahi owiittucha awe nkayaamwiirelha, “Eiyo, vano nnoolhumacha wo uhivitha, nhuulhumachaka wo malhikaaniho.
43016030	Vano nihochuwelha wiira inyuva nnoochuwelha kila ittu, ihooriaka uukohani tho ittu iriyoothe. Yeyo phi nonirumelhelhilha wiira nkhumme wa Nlhuku.”
43016031	Yesu nkaakhulhacha, “Chani, nnoorumelhelha vano?
43016032	Ikatema inoowa, ni iyo ihomalha uphiya, mwaattiva onkhaye vanottuna inyu umwariaa kila ntu uwannyawe, ni mii kinoohiiya yeekha aka. Nansho miyaano khakirii yekhaaka, ukhalhawaya Athithi arii vamoka ni mii.
43016033	Kihoohimeriani ulha mwaha ulha wiira nkhalheke ni mpuha wo ulhutaana ni mii. Nnoowa mwaahuvihiya velhaponi, nansho mpisheke nrima! Miyaano kihokottolha ilhapo!”
43017001	Yesu amalheke wulhumacha yayo, nkaaweha nchulhu wiirimu, nkeera, “Thithi, ikatema ihophiya! Munthimicheke Mwamwaninyu ni uyo Mwaana othimichekeni.
43017002	Ukhalhawaya mwahonvaha Mwamwaninyu ikuru wa attu onkhaye, wiira aavahe ukumi wo uhimalha attu onkhaye munvanhe inyu ayo.
43017003	Ni ukumi wo uhimalha unari wiira uuchuwelhani inyuva, nrii yeekha inyu Nlhuku e ikeekhene, ni unchuwelha Yesu Kuristo, munrumme inyu.
43017004	Miyaano kihoothimichani velhaponi vaa, kihomalhiha ntheko ukivanhe inyu kipange.
43017005	Thithi! Nkivaheke nthimicho vano, nthimicho kaarina aka ilhapo ihinaaya wuupiya.
43017006	“Kihaachuwelhiha attu nchina ninyu, yayo nkivanhe inyu ukhuma velhaponi. Yaari attu awinyu, ni inyuva nkamwaakivaha. Ni ayo ahovara nlhove ninyu.
43017007	Ahochuwelha vano wiira kila ittu ikivanhe inyu ikhumme uwaninyu.
43017008	Miyaano kihaavaha nttenga ukivanhe inyu, ni ayo ahopochera, ahochuwelha wiira wo ikekhiaye kikhumme uwaninyu, ni ayo anoorumelhelha wiira inyuva nhokiruma.
43017009	“Kinaalhapelhelha yayo, mena khakinaalhepelhelha attu o velhaponi, nansho kinaalhepelhelha attu akivanhe inyu, ukhalhawaya phiri awinyu.
43017010	Attu onkhaye arina aka phi awinyu, ni awinyu phi awaka, ni nthimicho waka uhoonia wa attu akivanhe inyu.
43017011	Vano kinoowa uwaninyu, kakihiwe tho ntu o velhaponi, nansho ayo arii velhaponi. Athithi atakatifu! Wo machiri o nchina ninyu nikivanhe inyu, chonte mwaashunge rata akhalhe ittu imoka thoko hiyaano chiri ihu amoka.
43017012	Vaari aka ni ayo, miyaano kahaashunga rata wo machiri o nchina ninyu nikivahilhe inyu. Miyaano kiheenanelha, mena khaawo anakhalhaka mmoka aya kinrinhe aka, aahikhalhe ulhe ntu nohalha upotera, wiira Malhove Matakatifu atimire.
43017013	Paahi etu vano kinowa uwaninyu, ni mii kihoolhumacha ulha mwaha ulha velhaponi va, wiira attu yoorie ulhutaana ni mii muuteelhiyani waka.
43017014	“Miyaano kihaavaha nttenga inyu, ni attu o velhaponi nkayaapangelha ichimwa, ukhalhawaya yayo kaahiwe amoka aya attu o velhaponi, thoko ni mii kihiri aka ntu o velhaponi.
43017015	Khakinolhapelha wiira mwaathamihe velhaponi, nansho kinolhapelha wiira mwenanelhe ni Nakare.
43017016	Ayo kaahiwe o velhaponi, thoko ni mii kihiri aka o velhaponi.
43017017	Mwaathanlheke mwaanene wo ikeekhene, nlhove ninyu nikhalhaka phi ikeekhene.
43017018	Thoko chikirumme inyu velhaponi, ni mii chiicho kihaaruma ayo velhaponi,
43017019	ni wo yoyo nlhatu uyo, miyaano kimwanene kinowithanlha kikhalhe isadaka uwaninyu ni ayo chiicho eeshiye isadaka wo ikeekhene.
43017020	“Khakinaalhapelhelha ayo vekha aya, nansho kinaalhepelhelha ni attu anohalha ukirumelhelha mii wo nlhatu no nttenga waya.
43017021	Kinolhapelha wiira onkhaye akhalhe ittu imoka. Thithi, kinolhapelha wiira akhalhe nhina mwihu thoko inyuva chiri inyu nhina mwaka ni mii nhina mwinyu. Kinolhapelha wiira akhalhe ittu imoka, ilhapo iwe yaarumelhelha wiira inyuva mwaahokiruma.
43017022	Miyaano kihaavaha nthimicho yoolhe ukivanhe inyu, wiira akhalhe ittu imoka thoko ni hiyaano chiri ihu amoka.
43017023	Ilha ikhalhe wiira miyaano kikhalhe nhina mwaya, ni inyu Thithi nkhalhe nhina mwaka. Kinolhapelha wiira akhalhe ittu imoka, ilhapo ichuwelhe wiira inyuva mwaahokiruma, ni wiira, nnowaattuna ni ayo thoko chikittunne inyu mii.
43017024	“Thithi, kinothanana ayo akivanhe inyu ayo akhalhe vamoka ni mii varii aka, awe yoona nthimicho waka ukivanhe inyu. Ukhalhawaya mwahokittuna ilhapo ihinaya wuupiya.
43017025	Thithi orera nrima, attu o velhaponi khanoochuwelhani, nansho miyaano kinouchuwelhani. Alha ni ayo ahochuwelha wiira inyuva mwahokiruma.
43017026	Kihaahimeria nchina ninyu, ni mii kinoothepa wiira chiicho, uttuna urina inyu uwannyaka uwe waakhalha nhina mwaya, ni mii kikhalhe nhina mwaya.”
43018001	Yesu amalheke wulhumacha, nkaarwa ukhopelhelhe wo nshepa wo Keduroni, vamoka ni owiittucha awe. Vavawo vakittu vawo vaari ni imata yo miri cho mizeituni, Yesu nkaakelha mommo vamoka ni owiittucha awe.
43018002	Yuda Isikariote, anthuminhe Yesu, ahochuwelha vaari aya, ukhalhawaya mikwaha chinchi Yesu aari akumaanaka ni owiittucha awe wowo.
43018003	Paahi etu, Yuda nkaarwa attukanaka mphingo wa manyaasikari ni attu olhitelhelha Inupa ya Nlhuku aarumiye ni Opochera ishaani olhupalhe ni Amafarisayo, nkaawana umatani uwo anaweelhe ikerero, ikhandiri, ni mithuko.
43018004	Yesu, aari achuwelhaka chonkhaye chinohalha umphwanya, nkaachusherera, nkaakoha, “Nnaavia apani?”
43018005	Nkayaamwakhulha, “Yesu o Unazareti!” Yesu nkeerelha, “Phi miyaano.” Yuda, onthumiha Yesu aari neemenlhe vavawo vamoka ni ayo.
43018006	Paahi Yesu eereke, “Phi miyaano,” nkayaahokolhia utulhi, nkayaawulhuwa vathi.
43018007	Yesu nkaakoha tho, “Nnaavia apani?” Nkayaamwakhulha, “Yesu o Unazareti!”

43018009	olhumanche yayo wiira atimire malhove yeera “Attu aakivahilhe inyu Thithi khakinrinhe anakhalhaka mmoka.”
43018010	Nasimoni Peturo, nkayaatholholha mwaalho mulhupalhe waarina aya, nkayanthikilha nnyaru no wiimonono namitheko a Opochera ishaani Olhupalhe. Karumiya uyo eehaniya Maliki.
43018011	Yesu nkeerelha Napeturo, “Nhokolhoshe mwaalho inyu nnigonerani mwaya. Chani, nnothanana kihiwurerie ikikombe yo ntwarusho ikivahilhe aya Athithi?”

43018019	Opochera ishaani Olhupalhe nkayankohakoha Yesu mwaha wo owiittucha awe ni meettuchiho awe.
43018020	Yesu nkaamwakhulha, “Ikatema chonkhaye kaari kuulhumachaka ni attu voonene, meettuchiho aka kiituchihaka mu inupa cho unlhapelha Nlhuku ni wi Inupa yuulhupalhe ya Nlhuku, vakittu vanokumana aya Ayahudi onkhaye. Khakinapacha mena wiittuchiha iriyoothe wo uvitha.
43018021	Nlhatu waani vano nnokikoha miyaano? Mwaakoheke alhe yeewilhe koolhumanche aka. Yayo phi chuwenlhe kaahimenrie aka.”
43018022	Amalheke wulhumacha yayo, namitheko olhita mmoka emenlhe vavawo nkaamwata nikofi Yesu eeraka, “Chani, nenno phi nlhove nowaakhulha Opochera ishaani Olhupalhe?”
43018023	Yesu nkaakhulha, “Yakhalhaka kuulhumanche pufia, nkahimiecheshani kittenke vayi, nansho yakhalhaka kihoolhumacha rata, woonaka nnookaata?”
43018024	Anasi nkayanrweeha Yesu uno nattukiye, wa Opochera ishaani Olhupalhe Nakayafa.

43018026	Karumiya aya Opochera ishaani Olhupalhe mmoka, nlhoko awe ntu aakhapiye nnyaru ni Napeturo, nkaakoha, “Chani, miyaano khakowonneni inyuva umatani vamoka ni uyo?”

43019041	Vavawo vakittu vakhomelhelhiye awe Yesu vawo vaari ni imata, ni mommo mmatani mmo mwaari ni nihiye no naanano nihinavithiya ntu riyoothe nhina mwaya.

43021009	Yaphiyeke vachengweni nkayoonacha ihopa chinaaneelhiye vamakhalhani ni nkatte.
43021010	Yesu nkeerelhacha, “Mmwiiheke vaa vakani ihopa chimennje inyu chiyo.”
43021011	Nasimoni Peturo nkayaawelha nkalhavani, nkayaapurulhelha nttavi vachengweni ninachanre ihopa chulhupalhe imia imoka makhumi nthanu ni taru. Inakhalhaka chiicho, nttavi khanaapaphuwilhe.
43021012	Yesu nkeerelha, “Mmwaacheke vaa etu mmwe mwaalhia.” Khaawo anakhalha owiittucha mmoka onrie unkoha, “Inyuva phi apani?” Ukhalhawaya yahochuwelha wiira yaari Athithi.
43021013	Yesu nkaawa, nkaakusha nkatte, nkaavaha, nkaapanga chiichammo ni ihopa chilhe.
43021014	Ulha, waari nkwaha wo neraru Yesu waakhumelhelha owiittucha awe, ukhuma vaahihimmwe awe.
43021015	Yamalhiheke ulhia, Yesu nkaakoha Nasimoni Peturo, “Nasimoni, mwaana a Nayohana! Chani, nnookittuna mii waapwaha alha akina alha?” Ni ayo nkayaakhulha, “Eiyo, Thithi, nnochuwelha wiira miyaano kinouttunani.” Yesu nkeerelha, “Nshunge ashaana o ikhondoro chaka.”
43021016	Nkeerelha tho ninayelhi, “Nasimoni mwaana a Nayohana! Chani, nnokittuna?” Napeturo nkayaakhulha, “Eiyo, Thithi, nnoochuwelha wiira kinouttunani.” Yesu nkeerelha, “Nshunge ikhondoro chaka.”
43021017	Nkaakoha yo neraru, “Nasimoni mwaana a Nayohana! Chani, nnokittuna?” Vavawo Napeturo nkayaachukulha wo nlhatu nookohiya wo neraru, “Nnokittuna?” Nkayaakhulha yiiraka, “Thithi, inyuva nhochuwelha chonkhaye, inyuva nnoochuwelha wiira miyaano kinouttunani.” Yesu nkeerelha, “Nshunge ikhondoro chaka!
43021018	Ikekheene kinouhimeriani, vaari inyu amirawo mwaholhemalhelha wiittuka nchako ni ukelha uriwoothe waathanana inyu. Nansho vanohalha inyu wuulhuvalha, nnowookolha miono chinyu, ni ntu nkina nouttukani ni urweehani uhinothanana inyu urwaa.”
43021019	Wo wulhumacha chiicho, ahooniha iphiro yaani Napeturo anohalha aya uvira muukhwani ni unthimicha Nlhuku. Amalhiheke nkeerelha, “Nkittware.”
43021020	Vavawo Napeturo nkayarukunuwa, nkayaamwona owiittucha aattuniye ni Yesu ulhe, noottwara. Ulha phi owiittucha aakhanlhe amwaatameriaka chinene Yesu ikatema yaalhiaya yolhia yo uchechilho, ni unkoha “Thithi phi apani anohalha uthumihani?”
43021021	Napeturo vaamwonne aya yoyo attwaraka, nkayankoha Yesu, “Thithi ni alha mwaha aya uri chani?”
43021022	Yesu nkaakhulha, “Yakhalhaka wiira kinothanana alha ahalheke mpaka vanohalha aka uwa tho, irini uwaninyu? Inyu nkittwareke mii!”
43021023	Paahi etu, yoyo mwaha uyo nkawawanelha munlhokoni mwa attu anttwara na owiittucha awe wiira yoyo owiittucha uyo kanokhwa. Nansho Yesu khenre wiira yoyo owiittucha uyo khankhwa, nansho enre “Yakhalhaka wiira kinothanana alha ahalhe mpaka vanottuna aka uwa, irini uwaninyu?”
43021024	Ulha phi owiittucha nohimiechesha ni ulhepa ulha mwaha ulha. Ni hii ninoochuwelha wiira himianche awe iri ye ikekhiaye.
43021025	Chihawo chittu chikina chinchi chaapangilhe awe Yesu, yakaari chaholhepiya chonkhaye, imoka kaanyuma yo ikina, kinaanyihera wiira ilhapo khayooria ukhalha ichitabu chikaalhepiye chiyo.
44001001	Munna Nateofilo, Ikitabu yo upachera kaaholhenlhe aka ulhepa ilhe, kaalhempe yaachaka mwaha wonkhaye waapannge awe Yesu ni wiittuchiha toka vaachokhonlhe awe ntheko
44001002	mpaka nihuku naakushiye awe wiirimu. Nansho hinaya ukushiya wiirimu ahaalhehera wo ikuru yo Iphumu ya Nlhuku, akarumiya aathanlhe awe.
44001003	Wo mahuku makhumi macheshe toka vaahihimmwe awe ahaakhumelhelha wo iphiro chinchi uhimiechesha wiira hohihimmwa. Aheechooniha wa akarumiya awe, ni woopana mwaha unaacha Imwene ya Nlhuku.
44001004	Ikatema yaakumanne awe vamoka ahaalhehera wiira, “Nhithame va Yerusalemu, nansho mummweherereke Iphumu ya Nlhuku, mpochere izawadi ilhehiye ni Athithi uvahani.
44001005	Nayohana yaabatinze attu wo maashi, nansho yaviraka mahuku vakani, mwaattiva nnoowa mwaabatiiziya wo Iphumu ya Nlhuku.”
44001006	Paahi akarumiya ikatema vaakumanne aya ni Yesu, yahonkoha, “Thithi, chani ilha ikatema ilha phi naahokolhoshera inyu umwene attu o Uisraeli?”
44001007	Yesu nkeerelha, “Mwaatti kuhii ntheko inyu uchuwelha ikatema yo ukhumelhelha waya, yeyo irii mu ikuru ya Athumwanaka vekha aya.
44001008	Nansho nnoowa mwaapochera machiri o Iphumu ya Nlhuku vanohalha aya uukhuruwelhani. Ni inyu nnoowa mwaakihimiechesha Uyerusalemu ni ilhapo yonkhaye yo Uyudea ni Usamariya ni kila vakittu velhaponi.”
44001009	Amalhiheke wulhumacha yayo, ahokushiya wiirimu attu onkhaye amwoonaka, nihute nkanankhuneelha ahimwoonaka tho.
44001010	Nansho vaathepa aya uweha wiirimu, Yesu vaarwaa awe, wo uhipicha attu elhi yaawanre ikuwo cho utakatifu twetwetwe yaheemelha ni waatameria.
44001011	Nkayeera, “Attu o Ugalilaya! Chani woonaka nheemelha mmwehaka wiirimu? Ulha Yesu kushiye ukhuma uwaninyu urwaa wiirimu ulha, noowa tho thoko chimoonilhe inyu arwaaka wiirimu chiyo.”
44001012	Yamalhekeru akarumiya yahohokolhia Uyerusalemu ukhuma waari mwaako uneehaniya Mwaako wo Mizeituni waari imaili imoka, waatameriaka nkwaha wo Nihuku no Wiittuwa.
44001013	Vaaphilhe aya vawani nkayaakelha uchuumbani inupa yo nchulhu ugoroofani mwaakhalha aya. Yayo yaari Napeturo ni Nayohana vamoka ni Nayakhobo ni Naandorea ni Nafilipo ni Natomaso tho ni Nabatolomayo ni Namatayo ni nkina aari Yakhobo mwaamwanaa Naalufayo ni Nasimoni Nnenchi aakhwelha ilhapo yo Ukaanani ni Nayuda mwaana a ashinna Yakhobo.
44001014	Nkawakumaaniya akarumiya vamoka ni manyopani akina ni Amariamu anumwanawe Yesu ni ashihima awe unlhapelha Nlhuku wo nrima mmoka.
44001015	Nihuku nimoka Napeturo yaheemelha ni wulhumacha munlhokoni mwa attu aarumelhenlhe Athithi, yaaphiyelha attu imia imoka ni makhumi melhi,
44001016	nkayeera, “Ashilhoko aka munrumelhenlhe Yesu, wo woorihiya ni machiri o Iphumu ya Nlhuku, Adaudi aholhepa nlhove no waacha Nayuda nhina Malhove Matakatifu, ni nno nihokhumelhelha. Nayuda yaari akhunanihu, nansho phi yayo yaaholhenlhe attu yammanre Yesu.
44001017	Nayuda yaari amoka munkutironi mwihu, ukhalhawaya ahothanlhiya ni Yesu ulhutaana ni hii mu nthekoni wihu.”
44001018	Nayuda yahothuma imata wo nchurukhu waalhiviye aya wo uhilhoka waya. Nkayaawulhuwa wowo umatani uwo, nkayaaphwia nthunkwa ni marupo aya nkayaakhuma vathe.
44001019	Attu o Uyerusalemu veewilhe aya yoyo mwaha uyo, nkayeehana yeyo imata iyo wo nulhumo naya, Hakelidama, maana aya, “Imata yo Iphome.”
44001020	“Ukhalhawaya iholhepiya nhina ikitabu yo Izaburi, ‘Inupa awe ihiiyeke mathalha, riyoothe hikhalhe nhina mwaya.’ Tho iholhepiya, ‘Ntu nkina akusheke ntheko wo ushunga waapanga awe.’
44001021	“Paahi etu athanlhiyeke ntu mmoka o unikaviha ntheko wo uhimiechesha uhihimmwa wa Athithi Yesu.
44001022	Yoyo akhalheke ntu mmoka anttukana ihu toka nihuku Athithi Yesu vaabatiiziye aya ni Nayohana mpaka nihuku naakushiye aya wiirimu nne. Yoyo nookhalha o uhimiechesha uhihimmwa wa Yesu.”
44001023	Nkayaaromolhiya machina a attu elhi, o upacha yaari Nayusufu yeehaniya Nabarsaba tho yeehaniya Yusto. O nayelhi yaari Namatiya.
44001024	Yamalhiheke nkayanlhapelha Nlhuku, “Thithi, inyuva phi nochuwelha mirima cha attu onkhaye chiri aya! Paahi etu, nnooniheke mpani wa alha attu elhi alha munthanlhe phuuyi,
44001025	wiira akhalhe karumiya ntheko uhiilhe aya Nayuda, nkayaarwaa vakittu vaaphwanenlhe aya.”
44001026	Nkayoopa ikhura, nkaathanlhiya Namatiya yonchereriye munlhokoni mwa akarumiya khumi ni mmoka alhe.
44002001	Nihuku no Pentekote naayeke, attu anrumelhenlhe Kuristo onkhaye yaari anathothokanne vakittu vamoka.
44002002	Wo uhipicha, nkaneewania nlhove naaruma ukhuma wiirimu naaruma thoko iphioo yo machiri! Nkanaachara inupa yonkhaye mwaari aya anakumanne.
44002003	Yamalheke, nkachaakhumelhelha chittu choonelhe thoko malhimi o mooro, nkacheemianiha ni ukorweelha vachulhu kila mmoka aya.
44002004	Kila mmoka nkaachariya Iphumu ya Nlhuku, nkayaachokholha wulhumacha wo nulhumo nilheto, thoko Iphumu chaavahenre aya wulhumacha.
44002005	Ni Uyerusalemu uwo yahokhalha Ayahudi enchi yaari attu yanthimicha Nlhuku, yaakhumme kila ilhapo yo velhaponi wuuthi irimu.
44002006	Veewilhe aya nenno nlhove nno, nlhoko wa attu enchi wahokumaana. Nansho onkhaye yahothuthuwa chinene, ukhalhawaya yaari eewaka kila ntu olhumachaka wo nulhumo nawe mwanene.
44002007	Nkayaathikhina ni ushanga yeeraka, “Chani, alha onkhaye aneewa ihu yuulhumachaka alha, kahiwe anenchi o Ugalilaya alha?
44002008	Yiireelhe chani, etu, weewa yuulhumachaka wo nulhumo kila ntu niyarelhe awe?
44002009	Attu akina ihu akhumme Uparthi, akina Uamedi, akina Uelami, akina Umesopotamiya, akina Uyudea, akina Ukapadokiya, akina Uponto, akina Uasiya,
44002010	akina Ufirigiya ni Upamfiliya, akina Umisri ni ilhapo cho Ulibiya waatameriana Ukirene. Ni akina ihu nikhumme Urumi, akina Ayahudi ni akina eettuchilhe idini ya Ayahudi akhumme Ukirete ni Uarabia.,
44002011	Hiyaano onkhaye ninowiiwa nkutiro wa Ayahudi ni akina akhumme Ukirete ni Uarabiya, yuulhumachaka wo nulhumo nihu naashinene mitheko cho ushangiha chipangilhe awe Nlhuku!”
44002012	Attu onkhaye ahoshanga yoovaka chinene ashineneru akohanachaka, “Yelha maana aya phi ishiyani?”
44002013	Nansho attu akina nkayaapangelha mattepwa attu yarumelhenlhe Athithi alhe, yeeraka, “Alha manyaattu alha ahohapalhiya!”
44002014	Napeturo nkayeemelha vamoka ni akarumiya khumi ni mmoka alhe nkayaawelhiha nlhove naya ni uchokholha waahimeria attu yeeraka: “Ashilhoko aka Ayahudi ni inyu onkhaye nnokhalha va Yerusalemu va, mwiiwelhelheke kuuhimerieni ulha mwaha ulha.
44002015	Alha attu alha kahapalhiye thoko chinaanyihera inyu mwaatti, woonaka vano bado saa tatu yo wichishu?
44002016	Kuhiwe chiicho, ulha mwaha ulha phi ulhe waahimmie aya anamilhohi a Nlhuku Nayoeli.
44002017	‘Nlhuku neera, kinoopanga cho mahuku o umalhelha, Kinowaamiinelha attu onkhaye Iphumu aka. Achishaana inyu ashilhopwana ni ashithiyana anoohimiacha nttenga wa Nlhuku, Ashimirawo anowa woona chowooniya, Ni ashulhupalhe inyu anoolhoha itora.
44002018	Eiyo, ata akarumiya aka ashilhopwana ni ashithiyana, Kinowaamiinelha Iphumu aka yayo mahuku ayo, Ni ayo anoowa aahimiacha Malhove aka.
44002019	Kinoopanga ithikineha wiirimu uchulhu ni cho ushangiha vathi velhaponi. Vanowa ukhalha iphome ni mooro ni mwiishi wo ulhemelha.
44002020	Nchuwa ninookelhiya ipiphi ni mweeri unookhalha wo khwiilha thoko iphome, nihinaaya nihuku nulhupalhe no uwa wa Athithi nne.
44002021	Vavawo ntu riyoothe nohalha ulhapelha wo nchina na Athithi, nowoopolhiya.’
44002022	“Anenchi o Uisraeli, nkeewelhelhani alha malhove alha! Thoko chineera inyu wo uchuwelha, Yesu o Unazareti aari ntu o ikuru ya Nlhuku yoonihiye uwaninyu wo ithikineha ni cho ushangiha chaapannge awe iriyari inyu.
44002023	Nlhuku ahochuwelha ni ulhakelha wiira Yesu nowa uhelhiya mmathathani mwinyu ni inyu nnoowa mwaavaha attu o uwonya ankhomelhelhe eeviye munsalaabani.
44002024	Nansho Nlhuku ahonhihimusha unookhwani, nkaamoopolha nookhwa ni uweria wawe ukhalhawaya nookhwa khoonrie mena unttuka.
44002025	Ukhalhawaya Adaudi yahoolhumacha mwaha awe wiira, ‘Athithi arii mmiholho waka ikatema chonkhaye, Ahokaatama ni mii khakinowa kaahuva.
44002026	Chiichammo etu, nrima aka uhoteelhiya, malhove aka ahochara mpuha, iruttu aka yo ukhwa ilha inowa yaakhulhuvelha.
44002027	Ukhalhawaya inyuva Apwiiya Nlhuku khannokihiya unaminepa, Mena khannonhiyerera ntu inyu ntakatifu wiira onte.
44002028	Nhokooniha iphiro cho ukumi, ukhalha winyu uhokichariha mpuha!’
44002029	“Mwaattu ashilhoko aka, ihorera uhimeriani mwaha waapantte apwiiya Adaudi. Yayo yahokhwa, nkayaavithiya ni nihiye naya nirii vava vawanihuva mpaka lhelho nna.
44002030	Nansho ukhalhawaya Adaudi yaari anamilhohi a Nlhuku, yahochuwelha wiira Nlhuku ahaalheha wiira anommara nchina mmoka o iyari aya ukhalhelha ihiche yo imwene vanipuroni waya.
44002031	Adaudi yahoona chitema mwaha unohalha upangiya ni Nlhuku, chiicho etu nkayoolhumacha mwaha wo uhihimmwa wa Kuristo Moopolhi ikatema venre aya ‘Khahiiye unaminepa, iruttu awe khayontilhe unihiyeni.’
44002032	Nlhuku ahonhihimusha yoyo Yesu uyo ni hiyaano onkhaye phi o uhimiechesha yoyo mwaha uyo.
44002033	Awelhihiyeke wiirimu ni weeshiya wiimonono wa Nlhuku, ahompochera Iphumu ya Nlhuku aalhehiye ni Athithi. Ilha inoona inyu ilha ni wiiwa vano ilha, phi Iphumu ya Nlhuku niminenlhe aya.
44002034	Ukhalhawaya Adaudi anene, khayaawenlhe mpaka wiirimu, ihikhalhe yenre, ‘Athithi yaheerelha Athithi Nkhalheke wiimonono waka,
44002035	Mpaka vanohalha aka waathalha amalhaponi inyu wuuthi inyaa chinyu wiira mwaanyikalhelhe.’
44002036	“Attu onkhaye o inupa yo Israeli achuwelheke we ikekhiaye wiira uyo Yesu aakhomelhelhiye vansalaabani, phi uyo Nlhuku mpannge awe ukhalha Athithi ni Kuristo!”
44002037	Paahi etu, attu veewilhe aya yayo malhove ayo, nkayaahomiya mirima chinene, nkayaakoha Napeturo ni akarumiya akhunanaya alhe “Ashilhoko ihu, niireke chani etu?”
44002038	Napeturo nkayaakhulha nkayeera, “Nkhoromeke, nhiyeke uwonya ni kila mmoka inyu abatiiziyeke wo nchina na Yesu Kuristo, wiira nhiyereriye uwonya winyu, ni inyu nnompochera Iphumu ya Nlhuku aalheehiye ni Nlhuku.
44002039	Ukhalhawaya malhehano a Nlhuku yaari wo nlhatu ninyu ni achishaana inyu ni attu onkhaye anokhalha utayi ni wo nlhatu no kila ntu nohalha wiihaniya ni Athithi Nlhuku uwannyaya.”
44002040	Ni wo malhove makina menchi, Napeturo ahohimiechesha ni waakurumicha attu eeraka, “Mwiichopolheke ni uttwaruwa unaaweelha attu o uwonya o ilha ilhapo ilha.”
44002041	Attu enchi yahorumelhelha malhove aya, nkayaabatiiziya. Nenno nihuku nno attu yaaphiyelha maelufu mararu ahonchereria mu mphingoni mmwe.
44002042	Nkayaathepa wiittucha wa akarumiya ni ukhalha nlhoko mmoka thoko o uyaraana ni umia nkatte vamoka ni unlhapelha Nlhuku vamoka.
44002043	Ithikineha ni cho ushangiha chinchi chahopangia wo iphiro ya akarumiya ata attu onkhaye nkayaathulhuwa mmakhuvani.
44002044	Attu onkhaye yanrumelhenlhe Yesu yahothepa ukhalha ittu imoka akawanaka kila ittu yaarina aya.
44002045	Yaari athumihaka chittu chaya, nkayaakawana nchurukhu ulhikaana ni kila mmoka chaahuvelha awe.
44002046	Nkayaathepa ukumaana vamoka kila nihuku Inupa ya Nlhuku. Nansho ikatema yo umia nkatte, yaakumaana mmanupani mwaya nkayaamia nkatte vamoka ateelhachiyaka nrima.
44002047	Yahontotopelha Nlhuku, nkayaattuniya ni attu onkhaye. Kila nihuku Athithi yahoncherera attu munlhokoni mwa attu oopolhiya.
44003001	Nihuku nimoka saa tisa uthana ikatema yo unlhapelha Nlhuku, Napeturo ni Nayohana yaari arwaaka wi Inupa ya Nlhuku ulhapelhani.
44003002	Ni ntu mmoka o uheeta toka vaayariye awe ni anumwanawe, eeshiya kila nihuku Inupa ya Nlhuku va nlhako weehaniya “Nlhako wo urera,” wiira aavekelhe attu yaakelha Inupa ya Nlhuku,
44003003	voonne awe Napeturo ni Nayohana akelhaka Inupa ya Nlhuku, ahaavekelha anvahe ittu iriyoothe.
44003004	Napeturo nkayammweha wo miitho melhi, ni Nayohana chiicho, nkayaamwiirelha, “Uniweheke hii!”
44003005	Nkaaweha, akhulhuvelhaka upochera ittu uwannyaya.
44003006	Nansho Napeturo nkayaamwiirelha, “Khakirina nchurukhu mena idhahabu, nansho kinouvaha ilhe irina aka. Wo nchina na Yesu Kuristo o Unazareti, wunkweke weeteke!”
44003007	Nkammara moono wo wiimonono, nkaamweemesha. Vavawo vavawo mieto ni makutha awe nkaahelhiya machiri.
44003008	Nkeemelha, nkaachokholha weeta. Nkaakelhana vamoka Inupa ya Nlhuku eetaka ni uthuphathupha uno antotopelhaka Nlhuku.
44003009	Attu onkhaye yaari vavawo ayo yahomwoona eetaka ni untotopelha Nlhuku,
44003010	vaanchuwenlhe aya wiira aari phi ulhe aavekelha va “Nlhako Worera,” Inupa ya Nlhuku, nkayaashangacha chinene ahichuwelhaka chinkhumelhenlhe.
44003011	Ntu ulhe vaari awe aattwaraka Napeturo ni Nayohana wi Ipwaro i Naselemani, attu onkhaye yaari ashangaka chinene, nkayaattimakelha.
44003012	Paahi etu, Napeturo vonne aya attu alhe nkayeera, “Anenchi o Uisraeli, nnoshangani ulha mwaha ulha? Woonaka nnooniweha chinene thoko wiira nimwetinhe ulha ntu ulha wo machiri ihu ama wo unthimicha wihu Nlhuku?
44003013	Nlhuku a Aburahimu ni Naisaka ni Nayakhobo, Nlhuku a manyaapwiiya ihu honthimicha namitheko awe Yesu. Nansho mwaatti mwahonhelha mmiononi mwa ashulhupalhe wiira eeviye ni unkhota upuwani u Napilato, ata Napilato volhumanche aya nlhove no unhukumulha wiira ahiyereriye.
44003014	Aari ntakatifu ni orera nrima, nansho mwaattiva mwahonkhota, nkamwaavekelha wiira ntu aari owiiva ahiyereriye.
44003015	Paahi, mwaatti mwahomwiiva ulhe aari machokholhelho o ukumi, nansho Nlhuku ahonhihimusha, ni hii phi o uhimiechesha yoyo mwaha uyo.
44003016	Machiri o nchina na Yesu ni nrima wo nenno nchina nno phi nvanhe machiri ulha ntu nnomwoona inyu ni unchuwelha ulha. Nrima wo unrumelhelha Yesu phi nlhaminhe ulha ntu ulha thoko onkhaye chinoona inyu.
44003017	“Vano etu, ashilhoko aka, kihochuwelha wiira mwaattiva ni aholhelhi inyu mwaapannge yayo wo nlhatu no uhichuwelha winyu.
44003018	Nlhuku ahohimia khalhayi wo iphiro cha anamilhohi onkhaye wiira Kuristo awe hophwanelhiya uhuva, phi chiichammo etu chitimirinhe awe wo ilha iphiro ilha.
44003019	Paahi etu, nkhoromeke, nhiyeke uwonya, munhokolheelheke Nlhuku, ni uyo nouhiyererani uwonya winyu. Mweeraka chiicho,
44003020	ikatema ya Athithi yo uvahani machiri o munnepani inoowa ni ayo anonruma Yesu Kuristo anthanlhe aya.
44003021	Noolhokelha wiirimu mpaka vanohalha aya uphiya ikatema yo urehelhelhiya chittu chonkhaye, thoko Nlhuku chaahimmie awe toka machokholhelho wo iphiro ya anamilhohi awe atakatifu.
44003022	“Ukhalhawaya ashinna Musa yaheera, ‘Athithi Nlhuku inyu anouwiiherani namilhohi thoko mii ukhuma munlhokoni mwinyu mwaashinene. Ni inyu mwiiwelhelheke ittu iriyoothe inohalha awe uhimeriani.
44003023	Ntu riyoothe hinowa umwiiwelhelha yoyo namilhohi a Nlhuku uyo, attu a Nlhuku anonhiya utayi ni urimeelhihiya.’
44003024	Wo ikekhiaye, anamilhohi a Nlhuku onkhaye upachera Nasamweli ni alhe yaattwanre, yahohimiacha yolha mwaha unopangia alha mahuku alha.
44003025	Malhehano a Nlhuku, aakuminhe awe wo iphiro ya anamilhohi phi awinyu, ni inyu nri nhina yayo malhehano a Nlhuku ayo, aapannge awe ni manyaapwiiya inyu, thoko cheerenlhe aya Aburahimu, ‘Wo iphiro yo iyari inyu, attu onkhaye o velhaponi anoovahiya ibarakha.’
44003026	Paahi, Nlhuku ahonhihimusha namitheko awe ni wo upacha ahonruma uwaninyu, owiihereni ibarakha wo umpanga kila mmoka inyu arukunuwe ni uhiya uwonya.”
44004001	Napeturo ni Nayohana yaari bado olhumachaka ni attu, opochera ishaani ni nholhelhi a attu olhitelhelha Inupa ya Nlhuku vamoka ni Amasadukayo akina yahowaacha.
44004002	Nkayaathunalhacha chinene, ukhalhawaya akarumiya ayo yaari aahimiacheraka attu wiira Yesu ahohihimmwa, mwaha unohimiechesha wiira akhwilhe anohihimmwa.
44004003	Paahi etu, nkayaavara akarumiya nkayaarweha ujeerani. Nansho ukhalhawaya waari uneelhilhe nkayaalhitelhelha mpaka waashelhe waya.
44004004	Nansho attu enchi yeewilhe nttenga u Napeturo ni Nayohana yahorumelhelha. Wo waalhakelhiya manyaalhopwana yaarumelhenlhe yaari maelufu nthanu.
44004005	Waashelhe waya, aholhelhi a Ayahudi ni ashulhupalhe ni owiittuchiha Malhehero a ashinna Musa yahothukumana vamoka Uyerusalemu.
44004006	Nkayaakumaana ni ashinna Anasi Opochera ishaani Olhupalhe ni Nakayafa ni Nayohana ni Naalekizanda ni akina yaari o nihimo ni a Opochera ishaani Olhupalhe.
44004007	Nkayeemeshacha Napeturo ni Nayohana uholho, ni waakoha, “Mwaattiva mpannge ulha mwaha ulha wo machiri ani ni wo nchina na apani?”
44004008	Vavawo Napeturo anachariye Iphumu ya Nlhuku, nkayaakhulha, “Aholhelhi a attu ni ashulhupalhe!
44004009	Yakhalhaka lhelho nnoonikoha mwaha wo ntheko woombone wiireelhe wa ntu o uheeta ni iphiro chilhamme awe,
44004010	paahi, mwaattiva ni attu onkhaye o Uisraeli nchuwelheke wiira ulha ntu ulha neemelha uholho winyu lhelho, lhamme wo nchina na Yesu Kuristo o Unazareti aakhomelhelhiye vansalaabani ni inyu mwaatti. Nansho Nlhuku ahonhihimusha unookhwani.
44004011	Yesu phi ulhe Malhove Matakatifu aneera, ‘Nlhuku mwaakhotilhe inyu mwaatti atheki va wiira khaninlhoka, nihokhalha vano nlhuku nulhupalhe no nsingi no ukhulhuvelhiya.’
44004012	Noopo nopattiya wa iphiro awe vekha, velhaponi wuuthi irimu vonkhaye khaniwo nchina nikina niriyoothe nikumihiye ni Nlhuku wiira ninoopolhe.”
44004013	Ashulhupalhe o va Ipuwa ayo, ahoshanga woona Napeturo ni Nayohana yuulhumachaka rata, anakhalhaka yaari attu o uhishoma mena irusho chiriyoothe. Nkayaachuwelha wiira yaari vamoka ni Yesu.
44004014	Nansho vamoonne aya ntu aalhamihiye ni Napeturo ni Nayohana ulhe neemenlhe vamoka ni ayo khayoolhumanche ittu.
44004015	Paahi etu, nkayeerelhiya akhumache vathe. Ni ashulhupalhe o va Ipuwa ayo nkayaahalha mpaani ashineneru apangaka ntemera.
44004016	Nkayaakohanacha ashineneru, “Naapangekeni etu alha attu alha? Kila ntu nokhalha va Yerusalemu noochuwelha wiira ilha yo ushangiha yulhupalhe ilha ihopangia, ni hii khaninooria uvaanyiha yoyo mwaha uyo.
44004017	Nansho wo wiira nitiyelhelhe ulha mwaha ulha uhiiwaniee chinene mwaattuni, naamukeke wiira ahulhumache tho mwaha wo nchina na Yesu wa ntu riyoothe.”
44004018	Paahi etu, nkayeehanacha tho akarumiya mpaani, nkaalhehera wiira ahuulhumache tho voonene, mena wiittuchiha wo nchina na Yesu.
44004019	Nansho Napeturo ni Nayohana nkayaakhulha, “Yakhalhaka ihorera mmiholho wa Nlhuku uwiiwelhelhani mwaattiva upwaha chinomwiwelhelha ihu Nlhuku, nhukumulheke mwaattiva mwaashinene.
44004020	Ukhalhawaya hii khaninooria uhiya wulhumacha naachaka mwaha woonilhe ihu ni wiiwa.”
44004021	Paahi, ashulhupalhe o va Ipuwa ayo nkayaamuka ni waachachera chinene, nkayaahiyerera. Khayoonrie waatwarusha ukhalhawaya attu onkhaye yaari anthimichaka Nlhuku wo nlhatu wo yoyo mwaha uyo.
44004022	Ntu aapangelhiye cho ushangiha uyo aari o malhipa o iyaakha chaapwaha makhumi ncheshe.
44004023	Vahipinche baada yo uhiyereriya, Napeturo ni Nayohana yahohokolhia wa ashikhunanaya, nkayaahimiachera chilhe chihimiye ni opochera ishaani olhupalhe ni ashulhupalhe chilhe.
44004024	Attu onkhaye veewilhe aya yoyo mwaha uyo aholhutaana vamoka unlhapelha Nlhuku wo nrima mmoka akhuwelhaka yiiraka, “Thithi, inyuva phi inyu Muupilhe irimu ni ilhapo ni ibahari ni chittu chonkhaye chiriwo!
44004025	Wo iphiro yo Iphumu ya Nlhuku mwahoolhumacha wo iphiro ya anamitheko inyu, apwiiya Adaudi, venre aya, ‘Attu ahiri Ayahudi arushiyeni? Woonaka attu ahopanga miruku cho nshatha?
44004026	Mamwene o velhaponi yahokhalha tayari, ni aholhelhi o utawara yahokumaana vamoka, waakhota Athithi ni unkhota Kuristo hikiye makhura.’
44004027	Ukhalhawaya wo ikekhiaye phi chiichammo etu, Naherode ni Apontio Pilato ni attu o Uisraeli ni attu ahiri Ayahudi chaakumanne aya yelha iwani ilha unkhota Namitheko inyu ntakatifu Yesu, munhinke inyu makhura.
44004028	Yahopanga ittu mwaalhakenlhe inyu ukhuma khalhayi wo wooria winyu ni uttuna winyu.
44004029	Nansho vano, inyu Thithi, mwooneke chinera aya wo unoopopiha. Nnikavihereke hiyaano akarumiya inyu wiittuchiha nlhove ninyu wo uhoovaa.
44004030	Mwookolheke moono inyu mwaalhamihe attu. Mpangeke ithikineha ni cho ushangiha wo nchina na Yesu, Namitheko inyu ntakatifu.”
