45005014	Nansho toka ikatema ya Adamu mpaka mahuku a ashinna Musa, nookhwa ahaatawara attu onkhaye, ata ahiwonnye thoko chaawonyilhe aya Adamu vaahilhe aya malhehero a Nlhuku. Adamu aari phi ikhove yo Kuristo aawilhe kaanyuma.
45005015	Nansho ikiriri ya Nlhuku khinlhikaana uwonya wa Adamu. Ukhalhawaya inakhalhaka attu enchi ahokhwa wo nlhatu no uwonya wa ntu mmoka, nnema wa Nlhuku waari mulhupalhe chinene. Ni mahalha awe ahowanelha wa attu enchi ukhuma wa ntu mmoka, Yesu Kuristo.
45005016	Tho, ikiriri ya Nlhuku khinolhikaana ni iphiro cho uwonya wa ntu mmoka. Ntu mmoka vaawonnye awe Nlhuku ahohukumulha wiira, howonya. Nansho attu enchi vaathempe awe uwonya, Nlhuku ahaavaha attu mahalha awe wo waahiyerera uwonya!
45005017	Iri ikekhiaye wiira, uwonya wa ntu mmoka wahommwiiha nookhwa. Nansho we ikekhiaye tho, mwaha waapangiye ni ntu mmoka, Yesu Kuristo phi mulhupalhe chinene! Attu onkhaye anopochera ikiriri ni mahalha wo ureerihiya ni Nlhuku, phi nowa utawara muukumini wo iphiro ya ntu mmoka, Yesu Kuristo.
45005018	Paahi etu, wo iphiro yo uwonya wa ntu mmoka attu onkhaye ahohukumulhiya, chenre aya wo waapoteriha attu enchi, phiri aya wa ntu mmoka orera nrima chinaaholhelha awe attu enchi ni waavaha ukumi.
45005019	Thoko uhiiwelhelha wa ntu mmoka chenre aya wo waahelha attu mu uwonyani, phi nokhalha aya urumelhelha wa ntu mmoka chinaapanga awe attu enchi ukhalha o rera mmiholho wa Nlhuku.
45005020	Malhehero a ashinna Musa yahowiihiya, nkayaathepiha uwonya, nansho uwonya vaathempe aya, ikiriri ya Nlhuku phi athempe aya chinene.
45005021	Paahi etu uwonya chenre aya wo waakelha attu ni umwiiha nookhwa, chiicho ikiriri ya Nlhuku yahothepa wo nlhatu no ikekhia, inoniholhelha urii ukumi wo uhimalha wo iphiro ya Athithi Yesu Kuristo.
45006001	Niireke chani etu? Nithepeke uwonya ikiriri ya Nlhuku ithepeke wunchereria?
45006002	Ata mena! Nahokhwa mu ikuru yo mu uwonyani, nansho vano etu nikhalhelhekeni muuwonyani tho.
45006003	Ukhalhawaya mwaatti khannochuwelha wiira, vaabatiiziye ihu wo ulhutaana ni Kuristo Yesu, naabatiiziye wiira nilhutaaneke ni nookhwa awe.
45006004	Wo ubatiiziya wihu etu, nahovithiya vamoka ni uyo, ninkavihanaka nookhwa awe, ikhalhe wiira, Kuristo vanohalha awe uhihimmwa wo nthimicho wa Athumwanihu vawo, niwe naakhalha mu ukumi wo naanano.
45006005	Ukhalhawaya yakhalhaka ni hii niholhutaana wo ukhwa thoko chaakhwilhe awe, ninoowa etu naalhutaana wo uhihimmwa thoko chenre awe wo uhihimushiya.
45006006	Paahi etu ni hii nihochuwelha wiira ukumi ihu wo khalhayi wahokhomelhelhiya vamoka ni Kuristo munsalaabani, ikhalhe wiira uwonya wiivarenlhe mwiiruttuni mwihu utanganyiee, nihikhalhe tho anamitheko o uwonya.
45006007	Ukhalhawaya attu vanokhwa aya mu uwonyani, anowaalhakelhelhiya ikekhia ni uthaphulhiya ukhuma machiri o mu uwonyani.
45006008	Paahi etu yakhalhaka nihokhwa vamoka ni Kuristo, ninorumelhelha wiira ninowa naakhalha akumi vamoka ni uyo.
45006009	Ukhalhawaya nihochuwelha wiira Kuristo ahohihimmwa mena khanokhwa tho, nookhwa khanontawara tho.
45006010	Paahi etu, ukhalhawaya ahokhwa nkwaha mmoka, uwonya khurina machiri tho uwannyawe, ni vano nkumi mu ikuru ya Nlhuku mahuku o uhimalha.
45006011	Ni inyu mwaatti chiicho, mwiichooneke wiira nhokhwa mu ikuru yo uwonyani nansho nkhalhaka akumi mu ikuru ya Nlhuku wo iphiro ya Kuristo Yesu.
45006012	Paahi etu, uwonya uhitaware tho iruttu chinyu cho ukhwa, nkamwaatwaratwara mattunelho aya.
45006013	Mena nhihiye ata itturi inyu imoka yunanariheni ni uwulhushani mu uwonyani. Nansho mwiikumiheke mwaashinene ukhalha isadaka wa Nlhuku thoko attu ahihimushiye, ni wiikumiha mwaashinene wa Nlhuku upanga chittu choombone chinothanana awe Nlhuku.
45006014	Uwonya uhuutawareni, ukhalhawaya khannoholhelhiya ni Malhehero nansho nnoholhelhiya ni ikiriri ya Nlhuku.
45006015	Niireke chani etu? Niwonyeke, ukhalhawaya khaninotawariya ni Malhehero, nansho ninokhalha nkiririni mwa Nlhuku? Ata vakani mena!
45006016	Mwaatti nhochuwelha wiira vaneekumiha inyu mwaashinene ukhalha ipotta i naneshe, vavawo nhokhalha ipotta wa ayo nnewelhelha inyu ayo. Vanokhalha inyu ipotta yo uwonya nnokelha unookhwani, ama wiitimarikha mmiholho wa Nlhuku unoorweehani ukhalha ipotta yo upanga chinothanana awe Nlhuku.
45006017	Kinonshukuru Nlhuku chinene, ukhalhawaya khalhayi mwaari ipotta mu uwonyani, nansho vano nhorumelhelha wo nrima winyu wonkhaye ikeekhene nneettuchihiya inyu.
45006018	Mwahohiyereriya ukhuma mu uwonyani ni upangiya ipotta vano yo chittu chinothanana awe Nlhuku.
45006019	Vaa kinoolhumacha thoko chinoolhumacha aya attu akina wo nlhatu no uphupuwalha winyu. Thoko cheekuminhe inyu mwaashinene ikatema imoka ukhalha ipotta yo chittu cho uhilhoka ni uwonya, paahi etu mwiikumiheke mwaashinene vano uweha iphiro chinothanana awe Nlhuku, ni wo nlhatu wo ukhalha atakatifu.
45006020	Ikatema vaari inyu ipotta yo mu uwonyani, mwaari nnahiyereriye. Ikekhiaye yaari utayi ni inyu.
45006021	Mwaaphunreni vaapanga inyu chittu cho uhilhoka chinowuulhihani muru vano chiyo? Ukhalhawaya ittu inokhumelhelha vanomalha aya chechiyo chittu chonkhaye chiyo, phi nookhwa!
45006022	Nansho vano nhohiyereriya mu uwonyani ni ukhalha vano ipotta ya Nlhuku. Paahi etu, mahalha anopatta inyu phi ikekhiaye inoovahani utakatifu unohalha umalhelha urii ukumi wo uhimalha.
45006023	Ukhalhawaya malhivo o uwonya phi nookhwa, nansho ikiriri ya Nlhuku phi ukumi wo uhimalha mu ulhutaanani ni Athithi Yesu Kuristo.
45007001	Ashilhoko aka nnoochuwelha malhove kinohalha aka uhimeriani, ukhalhawaya mwaatti onkhaye nhochuwelha chittu chinaacha malhehero. Chechiyo chinontawara ntu ri nkumi.
45007002	Niireke wiira, opani o munthelhini, anottukiya ni malhehano o owannyaya ikatema yonkhaye vari aya akumi, nansho arimeelhaka, paahi vavawo ahohiyereriya malhehero aattuka ayo.
45007003	Paahi opani ayo avekiyaka ni alhopwana akina uno owannyaya anari akumi, aneerelhiya wiira aholhavalhava. Nansho alhopwana ayo akhwaaka, Malhehero ahaahiyerera, avekiyaka khaneerelhiya tho wiira aholhavalhava.
45007004	Phiri aya chiicho uwaninyu mwaatti, ashilhoko aka va. Mwaatti nhokhwelha Malhehero wo ulhutaana ni iruttu ya Kuristo, ni ukhalha vano attu a ntu nkina, uyo hihimmwe, wiira nimpangelhe Nlhuku moombone.
45007005	Ukhalhawaya vaari ihu nitawariyaka ni iruttu, nikakata no uwonya ninthotheriya ni Malhehero, naari ninipahaka mwiiruttuni mwihu, nimalhelhaka unookhwani.
45007006	Nansho vano, Malhehero khannittuka tho, ukhalhawaya nihokhwa wo mwaha waaneesha ipotta, wiira nivare ntheko wo ukumi wo naanano wo iphiro yo Iphumu ya Nlhuku, kuhiwe wo iphiro yo khalhayi yo Malhehero ilhepiye.
45007007	Vano niireke chani etu? Niireke wiira Malhehero phi uwonya? Ata mena! Nansho wo ikekhiaye Malhehero phi kichuwelhinhe mii uwonya phi ishiyani. Yakhalhaka malhehero khayaahimmie wiira, “Nhimirelhe ishenye chittu cha attu akina.” Khakaachuwelha umirelha ishenye phi ishiyani.
45007008	Nansho wo yayo Malhehero ayo, uwonya wahopatta iphiro yo uthotheria nikakata no uhilhoka mwiiruttuni mwaka. Ukhalhawaya Malhehero ahikhalheke, uwonya khuuwo.
45007009	Khalhayi, kaari ki ntu nkumi kihiri ni Malhehero, nansho Malhehero vaawilhe aya, uwonya wahohihimmwa,
45007010	nkakaakhwa. Malhehero yaathananiya uwiiha ukumi, uwannyaka yahommwiiha nookhwa.
45007011	Ukhalhawaya uwonya wahopatta iphiro yaavahiye aya wo malhehero, nkawaakithepia ni ukiiva.
45007012	Paahi etu, Malhehero aneneru arii matakatifu, ni malhehero tho phi matakatifu, o ikekhiaye ni oombone.
45007013	Chani etu, ittu yoombone iyo ihommwiiha nookhwa? Ata vakani kuhiwe! Yaapangelhe chiicho wiira uwonya woonie mwaari, uchuwaniee wiira phi uwonya. Nkayaavara ittu yoombone ni ummwiiha nookhwa aka. Chiichammo etu, malhehero yahooniha uwonya chiri aya wo uhilhoka.
45007014	Nihochuwelha wiira Malhehero arii o munnepani, nansho mii o mwiiruttuni, kihothumihiya ukhalha ipotta yo mu uwonyani.
45007015	Akichuwenlhe ittu kinopanga aka, ukhalhawaya akinopanga ittu kinothanana aka upanga, nansho kinopanga ittu inovenga aka.
45007016	Paahi etu kapangaka ittu kihinottuna aka upanga, vavawo etu kihorumelhelha wiira, Malhehero ari orera.
45007017	Akihiwe mii etu nopanga chiicho, nansho uwonya unkhalha nhina mwaka phi nopanga chiicho.
45007018	Kihochuwelha wiira khiiwo ittu iriyoothe yoombone inokhalha nhina mwaka, mwiiruttuni mwaka mwo uwonya. Ukhalhawaya ata kithananaka upanga chittu cho ikekhiaye, akinooria upanga chiicho.
45007019	Ukhalhawaya akinopanga ittu yoombone kinothanana aka upanga, nansho kiwonyaka kihithananaka uwonya.
45007020	Kapangaka ittu yo uhilhoka, akinopanga wo uttuna waka, nansho uwonya wo mwiiruttuni mwaka phi nopanga.
45007021	Paahi malhehero makina vano, kila vanothanana aka upanga ittu yorera, uwonya urii vavawo.
45007022	Nhina munrimani waka Malhehero a Nlhuku anokiteelhiha.
45007023	nansho koonaka wiira ihaawo iphiro ikina inopanga ntheko mwiiruttuni mwaka, Malhehero ahinaathana ni iphiro inopocheriya ni irusho chaka. Yeyo phi nokipanga ukhalha ipotta yo malhehero yo uwonya unokivaravara mwiiruttuni mwaka.
45007024	Kihohuva mii! Mpani nohalha ukoopolha mwiiruttuni nnokirweeha unookhwani?
45007025	Kinonshukuru Nlhuku nopanga chittu wo iphiro ya Athithi Yesu Kuristo. Alha vano, phi makhalhelho aka, mii kimwanene wo irusho chaka kinoovara ntheko wo malhehero a Nlhuku, nansho mwiiruttuni mwaka kinovara malhehero o uwonya.
45008001	Paahi etu, khuuwo vano uhukumulhiya uriwoothe wa attu alhutaanne ni Kuristo Yesu mu ukumini mwaya.
45008002	Ukhalhawaya wo iphiro ya Kuristo Yesu, Malhehero o Iphumu yo ukumi ahokihiyerera mii uthama malhehero o uwonya ni o nookhwa.
45008003	Nlhuku ahopanga alhe yahooriye upangiya ni Malhehero a ashinna Musa alhe wo nlhatu no iruttu ya ntu o uwonya ukhalha khayaari ni machiri. Nlhuku hopanga yayo wo unruma Mwaamwanawe o yekha, aawilhe wo iruttu thoko ya ntu o uwonya awe aahukumulha uwonya wo iruttu awe iyo.
45008004	Nlhuku aapannge ikhalhe wiira ilheheriye ni ikekhia ipangiye rata nhina mwihu hii ninotwara iphiro cho Iphumu ya Nlhuku va, nihinottwara mathananelho o iruttu cho uwonya.
45008005	Attu onkhaye anokhalha thoko chinothanana aya iruttu, anotawariya ni nikakata no mwiiruttuni. Nansho attu onkhaye anokhalha thoko chinothanana awe Iphumu ya Nlhuku, yayo anotawariya ni mathananelho o Iphumu.
45008006	Ukhalhawaya irusho cha ntu o uwonya phinommwiiha nookhwa, nansho chittu chinotawariya ni Iphumu ya Nlhuku phi nowiiha ukumi ni mpuha.
45008007	Irusho chinoholhelhiya ni iruttu phi naapanga attu ooniye uhilhoka uholho wa Nlhuku ukhalhawaya khanooria uvara malhehero a Nlhuku mena khanovarechesha.
45008008	Attu anotawariya ni mathananelho o iruttu khanonteelhiha Nlhuku.
45008009	Nansho mwaattiva Iphumu ya Nlhuku rii nhina mwinyu. Ni vano khannoholhelhiya ni iruttu nansho ni Iphumu ya Kuristo. Ntu riyoothe hiri ni Nnepa wa Kuristo, yoyo kahiwe a Kuristo.
45008010	Nansho Kuristo akhalhaka nhina mwinyu inakhalhaka iruttu chinyu chihokhwa wo nlhatu no uwonya, Iphumu ya Nlhuku phi ukumi inyu ukhalhawaya nhopanga chittu chinothanana awe Nlhuku.
45008011	Yakhalhaka Iphumu ya Nlhuku anhihimushilhe Kuristo Yesu iri vamoka ni inyu, paahi uyo nhihimunshe Yesu uyo, novaha iruttu chinyu cho ukhwa chi, ukumi wo iphiro yo Iphumu ya Nlhuku awe nokhalha vamoka ni inyu.
45008012	Paahi etu ashilhoko aka, nihanaa ntheko, nansho kuhii wo ukhalha thoko iruttu chihu cho uwonya chi chinothanana aya.
45008013	Ukhalhawaya mwattwaraka nikakata no mwiiruttuni mwo uwonya, we ikekhiaye nnookhwa. Nansho mwakhalhakaru ni Iphumu ya Nlhuku, nnowiivakacha mitheko chinyu cho uwonya chiyo, ni ukhalha akumi.
45008014	Ukhalhawaya attu onkhaye anoholhelhiya ni Iphumu ya Nlhuku, phi ashaana a Nlhuku.
45008015	Ukhalhawaya Iphumu ya Nlhuku mumpochenre inyu wa Nlhuku, khanoopangani tho ipotta ni uwoopopihani, nansho, Iphumu uyo noupangani vano ashaana a Nlhuku, ni wo yoyo Iphumu ya Nlhuku uyo ninomwiihana Nlhuku niiraka, “Aba!” Yaani “Thithi!”
45008016	Iphumu ya Nlhuku nohimiechesha minepa chihu wiira hii phi ashaana a Nlhuku.
45008017	Paahi ukhalhawaya wo ikekhiaye vano hii phi ashaana a Nlhuku, ninoopochera vamoka ni Kuristo chittu choombone chihiyeriye ihu ni Nlhuku wa attu awe. Ukhalhawaya nahuvaka vamoka ni Kuristo, ninoowa naapochera nthimicho wawe vamoka.
45008018	Ukhalhawaya kihochuwelha wiira uhuva wo vano ulha khuve ittu nalhikaanihaka ni nthimicho unowa ihu upatakulhelhiya uyo.
45008019	Chittu chuupiye chonkhaye chinooweherera woona Nlhuku vanaapatakhulha awe ashaana awe.
45008020	Ukhalhawaya chittu chuupiye chooniye wiira ninootwaruwa wo uhittuna naashineneru, nansho ukhalhawaya Nlhuku ahottuna ikhalhe chiicho. Nansho nikhulhuvelhaka wiira,
45008021	chittu chuupiye chinowa uhiyereriya nihuku nimoka ukhuma mpottani munonta ni upatta unethi wo nthimicho wa ashaana a Nlhuku.
45008022	Ukhalhawaya nihochuwelha wiira, mpaka vano nna, chittu chonkhaye chinowunlha thoko nkuri chineera aya wo uweria.
45008023	Nansho khachihiwe chittu chuupiye tu, nansho ata ni hii niri ni Iphumu ya Nlhuku rii mahalha o upachera a Nlhuku, ninowiipulhelha chiicho, niwehereraka Nlhuku awe anipanga achishaana awe, ni iruttu chihu chiwe choopolhiya.
45008024	Ukhalhawaya wo ukhulhuvelha uwo nihoopolhiya, nansho wowo ukhulhuvelha uwo khunokhalha ni maana yakhalhaka ninowoona ittu inokhulhuvelha ihu iyo. Phi mpani etu nokhulhuvelha ittu inoona awe?
45008025	Nansho vanokhulhuvelha ihu ittu ihinoona ihu, ninoweherera wo uvilhelha.
45008026	Chiichammo etu, Iphumu ya Nlhuku noonikaviha hii o uhupeeria va, ukhalhawaya khanichuwenlhe chinothananiya ihu vanolhepelha ihu. Nansho Iphumu ya Nlhuku noonilhapelhelha wa Nlhuku eepulhelhaka vahinohimiaa.
45008027	Nlhuku noona mpaka nhina mmamirimani mwihu, hochuwelha moopuwelho o Iphumu ya Nlhuku, ukhalhawaya Iphumu ya Nlhuku nowaalhapelhelha attu wa Nlhuku wo mattunelho awe Nlhuku.
45008028	Nihochuwelha wiira, wo chittu chonkhaye Nlhuku nopanga ni utimiriha rata vamoka ni attu anonttuna, ehanne awe wo uthanana wawe.
45008029	Ukhalhawaya Nlhuku ahaachuwelha yayo attu ayo toka khalhayi. Nkaathanlha wiira alhikaane ni Mwaamwanawe akhalhe o upachera munlhokoni mwa ashilhoko awe enchi.
45008030	Paahi alhe Nlhuku aathanlhe awe toka khalhayi ayo, aheehanacha, ni yayo ehananche awe ayo ahaalhakelha ikekhia. Ni ayo alhakenlhe awe ikekhia ayo ahaakawelha nthimicho awe.
45008031	Wo yayo etu, niireke chani vano? Nlhuku akhalhaka mpatta wihu mpani etu nohalha univinga?
45008032	Nlhuku khamwonenlhe ikiriri ata Mwaamwanawe o yekha, nansho ahonhiyerera wo nlhatu wihu hii onkhaye va. Yakhalhaka ahopanga chiicho khanowa etu aanivaha nnema onkhaye vamoka ni uyo?
45008033	Mpani etu nohalha waaria milhatu attu athanlhiye ni Nlhuku? Nlhuku mwanene haalhakelha ikekhia wiira, khattenke!
45008034	Mpani etu, nohalha waahukumulha? Khaawo! Ukhalhawaya Yesu Kuristo mwanene phi akhwilhe, nkaahihimmwa, vano nokhalha wiimonono wa Nlhuku. Yoyo phi nonilhapelhelha!
45008035	Mpani etu, nohalha unimwalhaaniha ni uttuna wa Kuristo? Chani, uhuva ama uvelhavelha ama uttwaruwa ama ithalha ama ushauchi ama itatako ama nookhwa?
45008036	Thoko Malhove Matakatifu chineera aya, “Wo nlhatu winyu, niri ntatakoni mwo nookhwa uthana ni uhiyu, Nipangiyaka thoko ikhondoro chinorwehiya uhithiyani.”
45008037	Nansho nhina chittu chonkhaye chiyo, nihokottolha chinene wo ukavihiya ni yoyo nonittuna uyo!
45008038	Ukhalhawaya kihochuwelha wiira khiiwo ittu inohalha unimwalhaaniha ni uttuna wawe, kahii nookhwa mena ukumi, kachihiwe minepa mena minepa o wiirimu akina, mena aholhelhi, mena ikatema yo naanano mena ikatema inowa mena attu o ikuru,
45008039	mena ilhapo yo nchulhu mena ilhapo yo vathi. Khiiwo ittu yuupiye iri ni machiri o unimwaalhaniha ni uttuna wa Nlhuku wo iphiro ya Kuristo Yesu Athithi.
45009001	Kinohimiacha aka phi ikeekhene, mii ki ntu a Kuristo akinoothacha. Nrima aka unoholhelhiya ni Iphumu ya Nlhuku phi nokihimiechesha.
45009002	Nrima aka uhokelhiya ihuzuni yo uweria uhinomalha,
45009003	ukhalhawaya wo nlhatu wo mahalha a ashilhoko aka, attu o nikosho naka, kanlhapelha wiira Nlhuku akilhave ni ukimwalhaaniha ni Kuristo.
45009004	Yayo phi attu o Uisraeli, Nlhuku aapannge awe ukhalha achishaana awe ni waavaha nthimicho awe, alhehanne awe ni waavaha Malhehero awe, ni Inupa awe yo unthimicha ni malhehano awe.
45009005	Yayo phi uchuulhu wa manyaapwiiya e Iburaniya. Ni Kuristo ayariaka unikoshoni waya. Nlhuku notawara chittu chonkhaye, atotopelhiye mahuku o uhimalha! Aye.
45009006	Kineera aka phi ilha, malhove a Nlhuku khoochenlhe utimirihiya. Ukhalhawaya kuhiwe kila ntu yarelhe mwa Aisraeli phi ntu a Nlhuku.
45009007	Mena kahii attu onkhaye anokhuma wi iyari ya Aburahimu, phi nohalha upochera malhehano. Ukhalhawaya Nlhuku ahalheeha Aburahimu wiira, “Ashichulhu inyu o malhehano anohalha ukhuma u Naisaka.”
45009008	Maana aya anokhalha wiira ayarelhe ntu kahiwe phi ashaana a Nlhuku. Nansho ashaana ayarelhe wo malhehano a Nlhuku phi nohalha wiihaniya ashaana a Aburahimu.
45009009	Ukhalhawaya malhehano a Nlhuku aneera, “Ikatema vanohalha aya uphiya kinoohokolhia, ni Asara anowa unnyara mwaana.”
45009010	Kuhiwe yayoru. Arabeka ni ayo ahaayara mavata wa athumwanaya amoka apwiiya Naisaka.
45009011	Nansho wo wooniha wiira Nlhuku noworia uthanlha, ata yayo ashaana elhi ayo ahinayariaa mena ahinachuwelha waanyulha moombone ni uwonya,
45009012	Arabeka aheerelhiya wiira, “Mwaana mulhupalhe uyo noowa aarumiya uvara ntheko ni mwankani uyo.” Paahi etu uthanlha wa Nlhuku uri wo uttuna wawe, mena kuhiwe wo ittu iriyoothe ipangiye ni ntu.
45009013	Thoko Malhove Matakatifu chineera aya, “Kahonttuna Yakhobo, nansho Esau kinonvenga.”
45009014	Niireke chani etu? Nlhuku vavawo khapannge ittu yo ulhoka? Ata mena!
45009015	Ukhalhawaya aheerelha ashinna Musa, “Kinonchukulhelha ntu riyoothe kinonthanana aka unchukulhelha, kinomoonelha ikiriri ntu riyoothe kinonttuna aka.”
45009016	Paahi etu chittu chonkhaye chinokhulhuvelha ikiriri ya Nlhuku, mena kuhii wo mitheko ama chinothanana awe ntu.
45009017	Ukhalhawaya Malhove Matakatifu aneera Nlhuku aheerelha Nafarao, “Kahouvarani umwene wiira uwaninyu ikuru aka yooniye ni nchina naka niromolhiye mwiilhaponi mwonkhaye.”
45009018	Paahi etu Nlhuku nomoonelha ikiriri ntu riyoothe nothanana awe umoonelha ikiriri, ni unhelha itiyamaru ntu nonthanana awe unhelha itiyamaru.
45009019	Vekinaka mmoka inyu nookikoha, “Yakhalhaka chiicho etu, nlhatuni etu Nlhuku noowona attu wiira ahowonya? Mpani etu nohalha uvinga chinottuna awe Nlhuku?”
45009020	Nansho phi apani inyu, mpaka nkoherere uttuna wa Nlhuku? Chani iyoopwe inowooria unkoha ntu upilhe wiira, “Nlhatuni no ukuupa thoko choo?”
45009021	Ntu owuupa miapu hanaa ikuru yo wuupa wo ulhoko urinawe miapu miilhi, mmoka wo weesheriya chittu cho maana ni nkina wo weesheriya ikokonokhwa.
45009022	Chiichammo phiri aya wa Nlhuku. Ahothanana wooniha urushiya wawe ni waahimeria attu achuwelhe ikuru awe. Ukhalhawaya ahaavilhelha chinene attu anrushilhe, yaaphwanelhiye ulhakalhihiya.
45009023	Tho ahothanana woonechesha winchiva wo nthimicho awe animinenlhe awe hii, noonenlhe ikiriri awe, hii nishungilhe awe toka khalhayi niwe naapochera nthimicho wawe.
45009024	Ukhalhawaya hii phi attu niihanne awe, nihikhumme mwa Ayahudi vekha ayaru nansho tho munlhokoni mwa attu ahiri Ayahudi.
45009025	Phi chiichammo Athithi chinohimia aya nkitabuni mwa anamilhohi Nahosea, “Attu ahiri awaka Kinoweehana ‘Attu aka’. Nikosho kahaattunne aka Kinoweehana vano, ‘Kinaattuna aka’.
45009026	Ni vakittu veerelhiya aya, ‘Mwaatti kanhiwe attu aka,’ Wowo anowiihaniya ‘ashaana a Nlhuku ri nkumi.’ ”
45009027	Chiichammo anamilhohi ashinna Isaya vanonlhelha aya attu o Israeli chineera aya, “Inakhalhaka attu o Israeli ari enchi thoko nhaava wo umbwaani, attu vakani tu phi nohalha woopolhiya,
45009028	Ukhalhawaya Athithi anootimiriha chitema ihukumu aya vachulhu ilhapo yonkhaye.”
45009029	Thoko tho ashinna Isaya chenre aya khalhayi wiira, “Yakaari Athithi o Machiri khanihiyenre ashaana akina o Uisraeli, nanlhikaana thoko attu o Usodoma, ni ukhalha thoko attu o Ugomora.”
45009030	Paahi niireke etu wiira attu ahiri Ayahudi, ahinovarechesha ikekhia, Nlhuku haalhakelha wo nrima urinaya,
45009031	uno attu o Israeli athothaka malhehero o waapanga ooniye ahopanga chittu chinothanana awe Nlhuku nansho khayaapantte ittu.
45009032	Nlhatuni etu? Ukhalhawaya khayaari akhulhuvelhaka upisha nrima nansho aakhulhuvelha mitheko chaapanga aya. Paahi etu ahowulhuwelha “Va nlhuku ninokwakwathuwa attu”.
45009033	Thoko Malhove Matakatifu chilhempe aya, “Mwooneke, kinoweemesha nlhuku Usayuni ninohalha aya ukwakwathuwa attu Kiheesha mwalha unaawulhusha attu. Nansho ntu riyoothe nohalha urumelhelha khanowa olhihiya muru.”
45010001	Ashilhoko aka, ittu kinoweherera aka wo nrima chinene iri woona ashilhoko aka Aisraeli anowoopolhiya! Phi naalhapelha aka wa Nlhuku ikatema yonkhaye!
45010002	Kinowaahimiechesha wiira anowiimananiha chinene umwaavia Nlhuku, nansho umananiha waya uhinchuwelhaka Nlhuku rata.
45010003	Ukhalhawaya khachuwenlhe iphiro Nlhuku chineeriha awe attu ukhalha oombone mmiholho wawe. Ni ayo aholhikacha wo iphiro aya ashineneru yo wiicheesha mmathathani mwa Nlhuku nkayaahiya iphiro ya Nlhuku inowaalhakelha attu ikekhia wiira arumelhelhiye.
45010004	Ukhalhawaya uwa wa Kuristo uhomalhiha Malhehero a ashinna Musa, ikhalhe wiira attu anrumelhelha aalhakelhiye ikekhia.
45010005	Wo nlhatu no uratihiya ni Nlhuku nhina Malhehero, ashinna Musa aalhempe wiira, “Ntu riyoothe novarechesha Malhehero nookhalha wo mathananelho o ikekhia.”
45010006	Nansho wo nlhatu no waalhakelhiya ikekhia wo iphiro yo upisha nrima, ashinna Musa aneera, “Nhiikohe munrimani mwinyu wiira, mpani nohalha uwelha wiirimu?” Wowo phi unkurusha Kuristo vathi.
45010007	Mena nhiire, “Mpani nohalha ukhuruwa unaminepa?” Wowo phi ummwelhiha Kuristo ukhuma unookhwani.
45010008	Malhove Matakatifu aneera, “Nttenga wa Nlhuku uri vamoka ni inyu, uri vamalhakuni winyu ni munrimani mwinyu.” Ikhalhaka phi nrima ninohimiacha ihu.
45010009	Mwahimiachaka wo malhaku inyu wiira Yesu Kuristo phi Athithi ni urumelhelha munrimani mwinyu wiira Nlhuku ahonhihimusha nnookhwani, nnowoopolhiya.
45010010	Ukhalhawaya ntu arumelhelhaka munrimani nowaalhakelhiya ikekhia ni arumelhelhaka vamalhakuni nowoopolhiya.
45010011	Malhove Matakatifu aneera, “Ntu riyoothe nonrumelhelha, khanoolhihiya muru.”
45010012	Ukhalhawaya Ayahudi khamwalhanne ni attu Ayunani, Nlhuku phi yoyo ri Athithi athumwanaya attu onkhaye, ni o rera wa attu onkhaye anonlhepelha.
45010013	Ukhalhawaya Malhove Matakatifu aneera, “Kila ntu nohalha ulhapelha avekelhaka wo nchina na Athithi, nowoopolhiya.”
45010014	Nansho etu anohalha unlhapelha chani uyo ahinonrumelhelha aya? Tho, anohalha unrumelhelha chani ahinaya aya umwiiwa? Ni ayo anohalha wiiwa chani vahiri ntu o nhimiacha?
45010015	Ni attu anohalha unhimiacha chani ahirumiye? Thoko malhove Orera chineera aya wo uhimia, “Vari voorera chinene vanowa aya attu o uhimiacha Malhove Orera!”
45010016	Nansho kahiwe onkhaye apochenre Malhove Orera. Ukhalhawaya ashinna Isaya ahopacha wiira, “Athithi, apani arumelhenlhe nttenga wihu?”
45010017	Paahi etu, upisha nrima unowa wo wiiwa nttenga, ni nttenga unowa wo uhimiachiya malhove a Kuristo.
45010018	Nansho kinookoha etu, ana khaneewa nttenga? Eiyo, aheewa thoko Malhove Matakatifu chineera aya, “Nlhove naya nihowanelha velhaponi Malhove aya ahophiya mwiilhaponi mwonkhaye.”
45010019	Kinookoha tho, attu o Uisraeli khachuwenlhe? Ashinna Musa phi achokhonlhe uhimmia, “Kinouholhani ichuku wiira, mwoonelhe ihache Attu ahiri ni nikosho Kinouhelhani ichuku yo waathunalhelha attu o nikosho no uphupuwalha.”
45010020	Tho ashinna Isaya ahominda venre aya, “Attu yahaakavia ahokoona, Kiheechooniha wa attu yahaakikoherera.”
45010021	Nansho vanaacha aya attu o Uisraeli enre, “Uthana woothe kahookolhelha miono chaka waapochera attu o uwonya, ni attu o tiyamaru.”
45011001	Paahi etu kinookoha, chani Nlhuku ahaakhota attu awe? Ata mena! Mii kimwanene ki ntu o Uisraeli, uchuulhu wa Aburahimu, kinokhuma nikosho ni Nabenyamini.
45011002	Nlhuku khaakhonte attu awe, aathanlhe awe toka khalhayi. Mwaatti nhochuwelha Malhove Matakatifu anaacha Naeliya vaachukunlhe aya wa Nlhuku wo nlhatu ni attu o Israeli,
45011003	“Thithi, aheevakacha anamilhohi inyu ni uphomolha madhubahu inyu, Mii vekha aka phi halhenlhe, ni ayo anothanana ukithurulha ukumi aka.”
45011004	Nlhuku aakhunlhe chani? Enre, “Kihaashungerera attu maelufu saba ahinonthimicha Baali, nlhuku o woothiya.”
45011005	Wo yeyo iphiro iyo phiri aya etu, ahaawo attu vakani aathanlhiye wo nlhatu no ikiriri ya Nlhuku.
45011006	Uthanlha wawe unokhuma wo ikiriri awe, ni mena kuhiwe wo mitheko chaya. Ukhalhawaya, uthanlha wawe ukaakhulhuvenlhe mitheko cha attu, ikiriri awe khayaashichira tho.
45011007	Vano chani etu? Attu o Israeli khapantte ittu yaavia aya, nansho attu aathanlhiye ni Nlhuku ahopatta. Attu akina ayo ahoomihiya mirima.
45011008	Thoko chilhepiye ni Malhove Matakatifu, “Nlhuku hoomiha nrima aya ni irusho chaya, Haavaha miitho nansho ahoonaka, Haavaha maaru nansho khaneewa mpaka nna.”
45011009	Ni ayo Adaudi aneera, “Isikuukuu chaya chikhalhe phi nriankho wo waawayiha Awulhuwe, ni utwarushiya!
45011010	Miitho aya atiyelhelhiye ahoone, Mithana chaya chikhuruthulhiye ahuve mahuku onkhaye.”
45011011	Paahi etu, kikohe, Ayahudi yahokwakwathuwa nkayaawulhuwa, nkayaamalhamalha? Ata vakani mena! Wo uwonya waya, woopolhiya uhaakhuruwelha attu ahiri Ayahudi, wiira yoonelhiye ihache ni Ayahudi.
45011012	Uwonya wa Ayahudi uhowiiha mpuha mwinchi velhaponi, ni itiamaru aya yo munrimani ihowiiha ibarakha chinchi wa attu ahiri Ayahudi. Paahi etu iri mwaini, Ayahudi wo unhokolhelha waya Nlhuku uhoowiiha ibarakha chinchi chinene.
45011013	Paahi etu vano, kinouhimeriani mwaatti nhiri Ayahudi va wiira, ukhalhawaya mii kihokhalha karumiya a attu ahiri Ayahudi, kinothimicha ntheko aka,
45011014	kinothanana waapanga attu ashikhunanaka owonelheni ihache mwaatti, wiira kiwe koopolha akina aya.
45011015	Yakhalhaka wo ukhotiya waya ilhapo yaheewanana ni Nlhuku, inowa ukhalha chani etu vanohalha aya upocheriya ni Nlhuku vawo? Attu akhwilhe anoohihimmwa!
45011016	Yakhalhaka imbamu yo upachera yo nkatte phi ikumihiye awe Nlhuku, nkatte wonkhaye unookhalha wa Nlhuku. Mithithaari chakhalhaka chitakatifu, maritta ni ayo chiicho anookhalha chiichammo.
45011017	Eiyo, maritta makina o nzeituni ahotupulhiya vaamenlhe aya nkamwaaphateelhiya maritta o nzeituni wo mwiithuphini. Mwaatti nhiri Ayahudi va, nri akavihi o maritta o nzeituni wo mwiithuphini, nrii vano mpuhaka ukumi wo munnepani wa Ayahudi.
45011018	Paahi etu, nhaapangelhe mattepwa attu akhwachiye thoko maritta! Kwaani nneefunelhani? Muupuwelheke etu, mwaatti khannokhulhuvelha mithithaari, nansho mithithaari phi noukhulhuvelhani.
45011019	Nansho nnowa mweera, “Eiyo, maritta ahotupulhiya wiira hii niphateelhiye vanipuroni waya.”
45011020	Yeyo phi ikekhiaye. Maritta aatupulhiye wo nlhatu no wuuma nrima, uno inyu mwaatti nneemelha wo nlhatu no nrima winyu. Nansho nhiifunelhe yoyo mwaha uyo, nansho nkhalheke mwoovaka.
45011021	Yakhalhaka etu Nlhuku khoonenlhe ikiriri Ayahudi, arii thoko maritta anenene, chani nnowoona wiira nowoonelhani ikiriri inyuva?
45011022	Nkoonani etu, Nlhuku chinre awe wo urera nrima ni woopiha. Ri o uchacha wa attu awulhuwilhe, ni orera nrima uwaninyu mwaatti, mwathepaka ukhalha mu urerani mwawe. Nansho mwaahilhokelheke mu urerani mwawe, ni inyu chiicho nnootupulhiya.
45011023	Ni Ayahudi chiicho, yarumelhelhaka wo nrima, anoophateelhiya tho waari aya, ukhalhawaya Nlhuku nowooria waaphateelha tho.
45011024	Inyu mwaatti ahiri Ayahudi va, nri thoko maritta o nzeituni wo mwiithuphini ukhwachiye, nkamwaaphateelhiya mmatani nhiri mwawinyu. Nansho Ayahudi phi nzeituni wo mmatani, ni khavanorika wa Nlhuku waalhutaaniha tho umwirini utupulhiye aya.
45011025	Ashilhoko aka, kihothanana nchuwelhe ithelhi ivithiye ilha, nhiwe mweechoona o irusho chinene. Itiyamaru ya Ayahudi khayaari yo ulhokelha chinene, yaari mpaka ahiri Ayahudi aathananiye vanohalha aya unhokolheelha Nlhuku.
45011026	Vavawo phi ikatema attu o Israeli onkhaye vanohalha aya woopolhiya, thoko Malhove Matakatifu chineera aya wiira, “Noopo nowa ukhuma Usayuni uthamihani uwonya wa ashaana a Nayakhobo.
45011027	Alha phi malhehano aka Vanohalha aka uthamiha uwonya waya.”
45011028	Ukhalhawaya Ayahudi ahokhota Malhove Orera, ahokhalha vano amalhaponi a Nlhuku wo nlhatu ninyu mwaatti nhiri Ayahudi va. Nansho ukhalhawaya Nlhuku ahaathanlha, arii akhalhaka ni unlhoko ni Nlhuku, wo nlhatu no manyaapwiiya aya.
45011029	Ukhalhawaya Nlhuku aathanlhaka attu, ni woonelha ikiriri khanorukunuwa.
45011030	Thoko mwaatti nhiri Ayahudi va, khalhayi mwahonkhota Nlhuku, nansho vano nhopochera ikiriri ya Nlhuku wo nlhatu no itiyamaru ya Ayahudi.
45011031	Chiichammo etu, wo nlhatu no ikiriri ipochenre inyu, Ayahudi vano khanomwiiwelhelha Nlhuku, wiira ni ayo apochere ikiriri ya Nlhuku.
45011032	Ukhalhawaya Nlhuku haattuka attu onkhaye ahiiwelhelhe, wiira oonelhe ikiriri onkhaye.
45011033	Nhakhu ni irusho ni uchuwelha wa Nlhuku uri wo winchiva chinene! Ihukumu chawe khanchinkohakohia, ni iphiro chawe khachinoria uhimiachiya!
45011034	“Mpani nochuwelha irusho cha Athithi? Mpani nooria waavaha irusho cho weettuchiha?
45011035	Ama mpani panche waavaha ittu, Wiira ahokolhosheriye?”
45011036	Ukhalhawaya chittu chonkhaye chuupiye ni uyo, ni chiyo chonkhaye chikhumme wo wooria wawe ni wo nlhatu wawe. Nthimicho ukhalhe wa Nlhuku wo mahuku o uhimalha! Aye.
45012001	Paahi etu, ashilhoko aka, ukhalhawaya Nlhuku hochara ikiriri yinchi, kinoulhepelhani etu wiira, mwiikumiheke iruttu chinyu mwaashinene ukhalha isadaka ikumi wa Nlhuku, isadaka itakatifu, inonteelhiha. Yeyo phi iphiro inyu yoombone yo unthimicha Nlhuku.
45012002	Nhittwarihe makhalhelho o velhaponi va, nansho munhiyeke Nlhuku olhokiheni wo urukunusha irusho chinyu. Vavawo phi nohalha inyu uchuwelha uttuna wa Nlhuku ni uchuwelha ittu yoombone inonteelhiha nrima itiminre.
45012003	Wo nnema kivanhe awe Nlhuku, kinouhimeriani mwaatti onkhaye wiira, nhiichoone ukhalha olhupalhe upwaha chiphavelhiye inyu. Nansho irusho chinyu chikhalheke ni maphimelho o nrima wa Nlhuku chinvanhe awe kila mmoka inyu.
45012004	Thoko iruttu chihu chiri aya ni itturi chinchi ni kila itturi ikhalhaka ni ntheko waya.
45012005	Chiichammo etu, inakhalhaka nirii enchi, nirii o iruttu imoka ilhutaanihiye ni Kuristo, ni kila ntu alhutaanaka ukhalha itturi ya nkhunanawe.
45012006	Ukhalhawaya kila ntu hanaa mahalha avahiye awe wo ikiriri ya Nlhuku. Ntu avahiyaka mahalha o uhimiacha malhove a Nlhuku, ahimiacheke etu wo ulhikaana nrima urina awe.
45012007	Ntu ri ni mahalha o uwaakaviha akina, aakaviheke rata etu. Ntu vahiye mahalha wiittuchiha, eettuchiheke rata.
45012008	Ntu vahiye mahalha o waahelha nrima attu akina, eereke chiicho. Ntu o mahalha o waakawelha akhunanawe, aakawelheke wo nrima woombone. Ntu o weemelhelha, emelhelheke wo umindelha, ni ntu riyoothe noonelha ikiriri akhunanawe, oonelheke wo mpuha.
45012009	Mwattunaka nttuneke chinene. Nhikhalhe mu iphiro iriyoothe yo uhilhoka, mpangeke chittu choombone.
45012010	Ashilhoko aka nttunaneke wo nrima woombone, ni kila mmoka anlhoheke nkhunanawe.
45012011	Nhilhamwelhamwe, vanovara inyu ntheko wa Athithi, nteelhiyeke munrimani.
45012012	Ukhulhuvelha winyu ukhalheke wo mpuha, nvilhelheke vanohuva inyu ni unlhapelha Nlhuku ikatema chonkhaye.
45012013	Mwaakawelheke ittu attu a Nlhuku vanokwana aya, mwaapochereke alheto rata.
45012014	Mwaalhapelheke ibarakha attu onkhaye anoupangelhani ichimwa, eiyo, mwaalhapelheke ibarakha, mena nhaalhave.
45012015	Nteelhiyeke vamoka ni attu anoteelhiya, munlheke ni attu anonlha.
45012016	Nkhalheke wo wiiwanana mwaashineneru. Nhiihelhelhe, nansho nchenjeukelheke chittu chikani. Nhiichoone ukhalha attu o irusho chinchi.
45012017	Nhinhukumulhe ntu opangelhakani chittu cho unanara, nhinhokolhoshere chittu cho uhilhoka. Mpangeke chittu choombone mwaattuni.
45012018	Mmananiheke wo kila inooria inyu, wiira mwaakhalhane attu onkhaye wo mpuha.
45012019	Ashilhoko aka nnottuniya, nhilhivelhihe milhatu, nansho yoyo mwaha uyo munhiyereke Nlhuku. Ukhalhawaya iholhepiya “Athithi aheera, Ulhivelhelhiha uri wawaka, kinoowa kaalhivelhelhiha.”
45012020	Tho wo uthepa, Malhove Matakatifu aneera, “Amalhaponi inyu awolhiyaka ithalha, mwaavaheke yolhia, awolhiyaka nttona mwaavaheke yo uwuria, ukhalhawaya mweeraka chiicho, nnowaavalhelha makhalha vamuruni.”
45012021	Uwonya uhuwulhusheni, nansho, mmulhusheke uwonya wo upanga moombone.
45013001	Kila ntu ewelhelheke aholhelhi chineera aya, ukhalhawaya ikuru cho utawara cho velhaponi cheeshiye ni Nlhuku. Nlhuku vekha awe phi naavaha attu machiri o utawara.
45013002	Nansho ntu riyoothe nokhota ikuru yo aholhelhi yoyo nokhota malhehero a Nlhuku, ni ntu riyoothe nopanga chiicho noohukumulhiya.
45013003	Ukhalhawaya aholhelhi anotawara khanooviya ni attu anopanga moombone, nansho anooviya ni attu awonnye. Ni inyu mwathananaka wiira nhoove attu o ikuru, mpangeke moombone, ni ayo anoutotopelhani.
45013004	Ukhalhawaya yayo phi akarumiya a Nlhuku anoupangelhani moombone. Nansho mwawonyaka, mwooveke etu, ukhalhawaya ahanaa ikuru yo utwarushani. Yayo phi anamitheko a Nlhuku akunshe ntwarusho nawe wa attu ammwonya.
45013005	Paahi etu mwaathimicheke attu o utawara, kuhiwe wo nlhatu wo woova ntwarusho na Nlhuku vekha aya, nansho tho thoko nrima chineera aya wo uthanana.
45013006	Wo yoyo nlhatu uyo etu, phi nolhiva inyu ikhodi, ukhalhawaya yayo phi aholhelhi anovara ntheko wa Nlhuku vanotimiriha aya ntheko aya.
45013007	Munlhiveke kila ntu inomphwanelha awe, ntu o upochera chittu chinothananiya mummaheke chittu chinothananiya, ntu o ulhiviha ikhodi, munlhiveke ikhodi, ni waathimicha attu onkhaye rata.
45013008	Nhikhalhe ni milhatu wa ntu riyoothe, ihikhalhe nlhatu wo uttunana mwaashineneru. Ntu riyoothe nontuna namwaatamana awe, yoyo hovarelha Malhehero,
45013009	ukhalhawaya, malheheriyo aneera, “Nhilhuve, nhiive, nhiiye, nhimirelhe ishenye ittu ya ntu” chonkhaye chi, ni makina ayo, anothukumanihiya ni nlheheriyo, “Mwaattuneke amwaatamana inyu thoko chineettuna inyu mwaanene.”
45013010	Mwaattunaka amwaatamana inyu, khannaapangelha ichimwa, waattuna, phi utimiriha Malhehero onkhaye.
45013011	Nchuwelheke wiira, ihaaya ikatema inyu yo wunkwa nkhoveni. Ikatema ihu yo woopolhiya iri vakhiviru chinene, upwaha ikatema iriyoothe yaarumelhenlhe ihu.
45013012	Uhosha, uthana uhaatameria. Nihiyeke etu chittu chonkhaye cho mwiipiphini, nipangeke chittu cho woonia voonene.
45013013	Nikhalheke rata thoko chinokhalha ihu uthana, nihimenyekhe ni uhapalhiya chittu cho uhilhoka, mena ulhuvalhuva mena waana indewo mena ihache.
45013014	Mwaawareke Athithi Yesu Kuristo, nhiwonye tho, mena upanga chittu cho uhilhoka.
45014001	Mwaapochereke attu akina ahiri ni nrima, nansho nhaahukumulhe wo nlhatu no uyeva irusho chaya.
45014002	Mirima cha attu akina chiri cho uvirikana, akina chinaaruma ulhia ittu iriyoothe, nansho attu o nrima mwankani anolhia mathaakhuru vekha ayaru.
45014003	Ntu nolhia ittu iriyoothe himpangelhe ncheche ntu hinolhia chittu chikina, ni ntu nolhia mathaakhururu hinhukumulhe ntu nolhia kila ittu, ukhalhawaya Nlhuku haattuna onkhaye.
45014004	Mwa apani inyu, ata munhukumulhe karumiya a ntu nkina? Eemelhaka ama awulhuwaka Athithi anene phi nochuwelha nlhatu wawe. Eiyo, anowa eemelha rata ukhalhawaya Athithi anowooria umweemesha.
45014005	Ntu nkina naanyihera wiira, nihawo nihuku nimpwaha mahuku makina, uno ntu nkina oonaka wiira mahuku onkhaye aholhikaana. Kila ntu etu, achuwelheke inoona awe munrimani mwawe wiira iholhoka.
45014006	Ntu noona wiira nihuku nimoka nihothepa nikina naathimicha Athithi, ni ntu nolhia ittu iriyoothe naathimicha Athithi, ukhalhawaya anopochera ukhuma wa Athithi. Ntu riyoothe hinottuna ulhia chittu chikina, yoyo chiicho nopanga wo waathimicha Athithi, ni uyo nonshukuru Nlhuku.
45014007	Ukhalhawaya khaawo ntu mmoka ihu neelhokelhiha mwaneneru, mena khaawo ntu nokhwa mwaneneru,
45014008	ukhalhawaya nalhokelhaka, Athithi anene phi no unilhokelhiha ama nakhwaaka ninkhwa wo nlhatu naya Athithi, hii onkhaye va phi awaya Athithi.
45014009	Ukhalhawaya Kuristo ahokhwa nkaahihimmwa awe aatawara attu akumi ni attu akhwilhe.
45014010	Paahi etu mwaatti, nnolhia mathaakhururu va, yeeshiyani waahukumulha attu akina, nlhatu waani etu no waaheulhacha ahima inyu? Muupuwelheke wiira hii onkhaye va, ninoowa neemelha mmiholho wa Nlhuku wiira nihukumulhiye.
45014011	Ukhalhawaya Malhove Matakatifu aneera, “Thoko chinolhokelha aka, aneera Athithi, Kila ntu noowa aakikhoromelha, Ni kila ntu noowa aahimiechesha wiira mii phi Nlhuku.”
45014012	Paahi etu kila mmoka ihu, noowa eevaraanga mwanene wa Nlhuku.
45014013	Paahi etu, nihiyeke uhukumulhana ashineneru. Nansho, nihiyeke upanga chittu cho waattekiha achihima ihu akina ama waawulhusha mu uwonyani.
45014014	Mii kilhutanne ni Athithi Yesu, uhokivaha ikekhiaye wiira, khiiwo yolhia ikelhiye nsheru, nansho ntu oonaka wiira yolhia ineshe ihokelhiya nsheru, paahi etu nsheru unkhalha wa yoyo ntu uyo.
45014015	Mwanthunalhihaka nkhunaninyu, wo nlhatu no yolhia nnolhia inyu, paahi etu uttunana khuuwo. Yolhia inolhia inyu ihimpoterihe ntu nkina, Kuristo ankhwenlhe awe!
45014016	Paahi etu nhihiyerere urera winyu unanarihiye ni mitheko cho uhilhoka.
45014017	Ukhalhawaya Imwene ya Nlhuku khiri mwaha wo mu ulhiani ni uwuriyani, nansho mwaha wo upanga chinothanana awe Nlhuku ni mpuha ni uteelhiya ummwiihiya ni Iphumu ya Nlhuku.
45014018	Attu avaraka ntheko wa Kuristo thoko chiicho, ahonteelhiha Nlhuku ni urumelhelhiya ni attu akina.
45014019	Paahi etu, wo ikatema chonkhaye, nivarechesheke meetelho anowiiha mpuha anonikaviha wiitheka ni ashineneru.
45014020	Mena nhihononache ntheko wa Nlhuku wo nlhatu no yolhia. Wo ikekhiaye cholhia chonkhaye chorera, chilhiyeke, nansho khinolhoka ntu ulhia yolhia inohalha unttekiha ntu nkina.
45014021	Ittu yorera irii nambaya uhikhuura inama, uwuria idivai mena upanga ittu iriyoothe ikina inohalha waawonyiha ahima inyu ama arokorinyu.
45014022	Paahi etu nvarechesheke nrima inyu wa Nlhuku inyu. Ahoreeriya attu onkhaye ahinehukumulha wiira ahotteka vanovarechesha aya nlhove ninoona aya wiira niholhoka!
45014023	Nansho ntu akelhiyaka nipampa no mwaha wo cholhia, Nlhuku nonhukumulha alhiaka, ukhalhawaya chinopanga awe khachinolhikaana ni upisha nrima wawe. Ni ittu iriyoothe ihinaathana ni nrima wa ntu phi uwonya.
45015001	Hii nikhomanlhe munrimani va, ninothananiya naakaviheke akhunanihu ahineemelha rata ayo, orie weemelha. Nihiilhoheke hii ashineneru.
45015002	Nansho, kila ntu anlhoheke nkhunanawe wo nrima woombone, wiira ankhomaalhihe munrimani.
45015003	Ukhalhawaya Kuristo kheelhonhe mwaneneru. Nansho, thoko Malhove Matakatifu chineera aya, “Uruwaniya winyu wonkhaye uhokiwulhuwelha mii.”
45015004	Ukhalhawaya kila ittu, ilhepiye wo nlhatu wo uniittuchiha hii, wiira wo uvilhelha ni uhelhiya nrima ni Malhove Matakatifu ayo, nipatte ittu yo ukhulhuvelha.
45015005	Nlhuku ri machokholhelho o uvilhelha ni uhelha nrima, ovaheni irusho cho ukhalha ittu imoka nttwaraka chenre awe Kuristo Yesu,
45015006	ni inyu mwaatti wo nrima mmoka ni nlhove nimoka munthimiche Nlhuku, Athumwanaya Athithi Yesu Kuristo.
45015007	Paahi etu mwaatti, mpocheraneke mwaashineneru thoko Kuristo chenre awe wo upocherani, wo unthimicha Nlhuku.
45015008	Ukhalhawaya, kinouhimeriani wiira Kuristo ahokhalha karumiya wa attu enelhiye unyawo mu ikekhiani oonihe wiira Nlhuku phi o ukhulhuvelhiya, ni malhehano aalhenhe awe manyaapwiiya ihu, anootimira,
45015009	ni wooriha attu o makosho makina anthimiche Nlhuku wo ikiriri awe thoko chihimiye ni Malhove Matakatifu, “Ni mii kinouthimichani mwa attu ahiri Ayahudi, Kinowiipa ichipo cho utotopelha nchina ninyu.”
45015010	Tho aneera wiira, “Nttapelhelheke, mwaatti ahiri Ayahudi va, vamoka ni attu a Nlhuku!”
45015011	Tho, Malhove aneera, “Mwaatotopelheke Athithi mwaatti ahiri Ayahudi va, Attu onkhaye mwaatotopelheke!”
45015012	Tho ashinna Isaya aneera, “Noowa aakhumelhelha ntu mu iyari ya Nayese, Noowa aatawara attu ahiri Ayahudi, Ni ayo anoowa ankhulhuvelha.”
45015013	Paahi etu, Nlhuku ri machokholhelho o ukhulhuvelha, ochariheni mpuha ni uteelhihani thoko chineera inyu wo unrumelhelha, ikhalhe wiira ukhulhuvelha winyu uthepe wo machiri o Iphumu ya Nlhuku.
45015014	Ashilhoko aka, mii kimwanene kinookhulhuvelha wiira, ni inyu mwaatti nhovahiya nrima woombone wonkhaye ni irusho chinchi mwooriaka wiittuchihana mwaashineneru.
45015015	Nansho kinoolhepa ilha iwarakha ilha wo uhoova, kuwuupusheni tho. Kineera chiicho wo nnema ukivanhe awe Nlhuku,
45015016	wo ukithanlha ukhalha karumiya a Yesu Kuristo wa attu ahiri Ayahudi. Kiri kivaraka ntheko thoko opochera ishaani wo uhimiacha Malhove Orera a Nlhuku, wiira attu ahiri Ayahudi akhalhe phi isadaka inopocheriya ni Nlhuku, isadaka ipangiye itakatifu wo Iphumu ya Nlhuku.
45015017	Paahi etu, wo ukhalha nhina mwawe Kuristo Yesu, kinowiititihacha vano wo ntheko kinopanga aka wo nlhatu na Nlhuku.
45015018	Kinowulhumacha wo umindelha ittu ipannge awe Kuristo Yesu, ukivaha mii wiira kaaholhelhe attu ahiri Ayahudi anrumelhelhe Nlhuku. Hopanga chiicho wo malhove ni mitheko,
45015019	wo machiri o ushangiha ni uthikineeha, ni wo machiri o Iphumu ya Nlhuku. Paahi etu, kihohimiacha rata Malhove Orera a Yesu Kuristo munkwahani mwaka ukhuma Uyerusalemu mpaka Uiluriko.
45015020	Ittu kinothanana aka mahuku onkhaye urii uhimiacha Malhove Orera a Nlhuku ilhapo chonkhaye vahinahimiachiya nchina na Kuristo, kihiwe kaatheka vachulhu nsingi wa ntu nkina.
45015021	Thoko Malhove Matakatifu chineera aya, “Attu onkhaye ahinahimeriya anoowa yoona, Ni attu onkhaye ahinapacha umwiiwa anoowa aachuwelha.”
45015022	Wo yoyo nlhatu uyo etu, kahochiichihiya venchi wiira kihiwe uwaninyu.
45015023	Nansho ukhalhawaya vano kihomalhiha ntheko aka chilha ilhapo chilha, ni ukhalhawaya wo iyaakha chinchi kaari kilhakelhaka uwa uwoonani mwaatti,
45015024	kinookhulhuvelha vano upanga chommo. Kihothanana uwoonani mwaatti, munkwahani vanorwaa aka Uhispaniya, ni inyu mmwe mwaakivaha ittu yo ukipiiha wowo, kamalhaka uukhalhanani wo mpuha wo mahuku vakani.
45015025	Nansho vano kinokelha thoko Uyerusalemu, uwaakavihani attu a Nlhuku arii wowo.
45015026	Ukhalhawaya attu o Umakedoniya ni attu o Uakaya ahoona ihorera ukumiha ittu yo waarwehelha nlhoko wa attu a Nlhuku ankwana o Uyerusalemu.
45015027	Enre chiicho ashineneru, nansho we ikekhiaye, yeyo phi nothananiya aya upanga. Ukhalhawaya yakhalhaka attu ahiri Ayahudi ahopochera ibarakha cho munnepani cha Ayahudi, ahophwanelhiya ni ayo vano waakaviha Ayahudi apatte chittu chinophavelha aya.
45015028	Vanohalha aka umalhiha yoyo ntheko uyo ni waavaha nchurukhu urweehelhiye aya uyo, kinoolhukama Uhispaniya. Phi vavawo etu, vanohalha aka uwa uwoonani vawo.
45015029	Vanohalha aka uwa, kinoowa ko uwiiherani ibarakha chinchi cha Kuristo.
45015030	Paahi etu, ashilhoko aka, kinoulhepelhelhani wa Athithi Yesu Kuristo ni wo nlhatu wo uttuna unovahiya ni Iphumu ya Nlhuku, wiira nlhutaaneke ni mii wo ukilhapelhelha wa Nlhuku.
45015031	Nkilhapelhelheke wiira koopolhiye kikhume rata wa attu ahinchuwenlhe Nlhuku o Uyudea, ni ulhapelhelha ntheko aka warumelhelhiye ni attu a Nlhuku anokhalha Uyerusalemu uwo.
45015032	Paahi chiichammo etu, Nlhuku attunaka, kinoowa nrima aka ukicharaka mpuha kiwe keettuwa vamoka ni inyu mwaatti.
45015033	Nlhuku ri machokholhelho o mpuha, akhalhe vamoka ni inyu mwaatti onkhaye. Aye.
45016001	Kinowaaruma uwaninyu arokorihu Nafoibe, anamitheko anovara ntheko unlhoko wa attu anrumelhenlhe Kuristo no Ukinkreya.
45016002	Mwaapochereke wo nchina na Athithi, thoko chineerihiya ni attu a Nlhuku. Mwaakaviheke chinohalha aya uthanana uwaninyu, ukhalhawaya ari orera nrima wa attu enchi ata uwannyaka mii.
45016003	Isalamu chaaphiyelheke Aprisila ni Naakwila, anamitheko akhunanaka munthekoni mwa Kuristo Yesu,
45016004	yayo yaheesha ukumi waya ntatakoni wo nlhatu naka mii. Ahophwanelhiya ushukuriya, ihikhalhaka uwannyakaru nansho ata wa attu o milhoko cha attu anrumelhenlhe Kuristo ahiri Ayahudi.
45016005	Isalamu tho chipocheriye ni attu anrumelhenlhe Kuristo anokumaana unupani winyu. Isalamu wa ampwana kinaattuna aka Apaineto, yaari o upacha umpochera Kuristo, ilhapo yo Uasiya.
45016006	Isalamu wa Amariamu, anopanga ntheko mulhupalhe wo nlhatu winyu.
45016007	Isalamu tho apochere Naandroniko ni Ayuniya, Ayahudi nanaka, aattukiye vamoka ni mii, anochuwania chinene munlhokoni mwa akarumiya, ampochenre Kuristo mii kihinaya.
45016008	Isalamu chaka chaaphwanye Naampliato ampwana kinaattuna aka nhina Athithi.
45016009	Isalamu tho chirwee wa ashinna Urbani, namitheko nanaka, mu unkavihani Kuristo, ni wa ampwana kinaattuna aka Nastaku.
45016010	Isalamu wa ashinna Apele, o nrima unorumelhelhiya nhina Kuristo. Isalamu wa attu onkhaye anokhalha unupani wa ashinna Aristabulo.
45016011	Isalamu wa Naherodiana, Ayahudi akhunanaka, ni wa Akuristo ari iwani ya ashinna Naarikisi yaalhutanne ni Athithi.
45016012	Isalamu wa Atrufena ni Atrufosa, manyopani anovara ntheko wa Athithi, ni wa ampwana kinaattuna aka Napersisi, aapannge ntheko mulhupalhe wo nlhatu na Athithi.
45016013	Kinoovelhelha isalamu wa ashinna Ruufo, namitheko a thanlhiye ni Athithi, tho wa anumwanaya, aakipochenre mii thoko mwaamwanaya.
45016014	Isalamu chaka chirwee wa Asunkrito ni Naflegoni ni Naheme ni Napatroba ni Nahermasi ni ashilhoko aka anrumelhenlhe Kuristo onkhaye nnaakhalhana inyu vamoka.
45016015	Isalamu wa Nafilologo ni Ayulia ni wa Nerea ni arokoraya ni wa Naolimpio ni wa attu onkhaye a Nlhuku arii vamoka ni inyu mwaatti.
45016016	Nshikurianeke kila mmoka wo wooniha nrima wo uttunana. Milhoko cha attu anrumelhenlhe Kuristo onkhaye va, anouvahani isalamu.
45016017	Ashilhoko aka, kinoulhepelhelhani wiira, mwaaweheke rata attu onkhaye anowiiha milhatu cho umwalhaana ni waawonyiha attu akina, arukunuwaka meettuchiho mwiittuchihiye inyu. Mwiichinanelheke ni attu thoko yayo!
45016018	Ukhalhawaya attu onkhaye aneera chiicho, khanovara ntheko wa Kuristo Athithi, nansho anopanga wo nlhatu no mathunkwa aya. Malhove aya o uchiva ni meettuchiho o upepecha phi nokukureeriha mirima cha attu ahimmwonya.
45016019	Kila ntu heewa chinre inyu wo weemelha rata ikhalhaka phi nlhatu unokiteelhiha mii. Kinoulhapelhelhani nkhalhe ni irusho cho upanga chittu choombone ni uhiya upanga chittu cho uhilhoka.
45016020	Ni uyo Nlhuku, rii machokholhelho o mpuha wihu, khampicha unnyikalha Nakare wuuthi inyaa chinyu. Ibarakha cha Athithi Yesu Kuristo chikhalhe vamoka ni inyu mwaatti.
45016021	Natimotheo, namitheko nanaka, nouvahani isalamu, ni Nalukiyo chiicho ni Nayasoni ni Nasosipetro Ayahudi nanaka anouvahani isalamu.
45016022	Ni mii Tertiyo, kivahiye ulhepa ilha iwarakha ilha, kinouvahani isalamu mwaatti wo nchina ni Athithi.
45016023	Nagayo, kiphiyenlhe aka uwannyaya vamoka ni nlhoko wa attu anrumelhenlhe Kuristo unokumaana unupani waya, anouvahani isalamu, ni ashinna Erasto arina ipilhi yo ushunga nhakhu wo iwani, vamoka ni onnihu Nakwarto anouvahani isalamu.
45016024	Kinoulhapelhelhani nnema wa Athithi Yesu Kuristo ukhalhe vamoka ni inyu mwaatti. Aye.
45016025	Paahi etu vano nintotopelheke Nlhuku! Yoyo phi nooria uweemeshani rata munrimani mwinyu, nhina Malhove Orera kaahimianche aka umwaacha Yesu Kuristo ni upatakulhiya ikeekhene ivithiye toka mahuku o machokholhelho.
45016026	Nansho vano, yoyo mwaha uyo, uhopatakulhiya wo iphiro yo Malhove Matakatifu alhepiye ni anamilhohi, achuwaniyaka velhaponi ni wo malheheriyo a Nlhuku o mahuku o uhimalha, ahochuwania wa attu onkhaye, wiira arumelhelhe ni uvarechesha upisha nrima.
45016027	Nlhuku vekha awe ri o irusho chonkhaye, nthimicho ukhalheke uwannyawe wo iphiro ya Yesu Kuristo mahuku onkhaye o uhimalha ni uhimalha! Aye.
46001001	Mii Paolo kiihaniye ukhalha karumiya a Kuristo Yesu wo uthanana wa Nlhuku. Mii ni munnihu Sostene,
46001002	ninoolhepa iwarakha uwiiha uwaninyu mwaatti nlhoko wa attu a Nlhuku nrii Ukorintho nhapihiye wo ulhutaana ni Kuristo Yesu, nkamweehaniya ukhalha attu a Nlhuku, vamoka ni attu onkhaye anrumelhenlhe Kuristo, Athithi, ari awihu ni hii.
46001003	Kinoulhapelhelhani nnema ni mpuha ukhuma wa Nlhuku Athumwanihu ni Athithi Yesu Kuristo.
46001004	Kinonshukuru Nlhuku mahuku onkhaye alha wo nlhatu no uttuvani mwaattiva nnema wawe wo iphiro yo Kuristo Yesu.
46001005	Ukhalhawaya wo ulhutaana ni Kuristo nhovahiya nhakhu wo chittu chonkhaye, vamoka ni uhimiacha nretelhe ni uvahiya irusho cho uchuwelha.
46001006	Ukhalhawaya nttenga unonhimiechesha Kuristo we ikekhiaye uhokhomaalhihiya nhina mwinyu,
46001007	nhiwukuwelhiyaka mahalha ariyoothe o munnepani vanoweherera inyu upatakulhiya wa Athithi Yesu Kuristo.
46001008	Yoyo noukhomaalhihani mpaka umalhelha wiira mmwe mwoonia attu o uhikhuwachiya nihuku na Athithi Yesu Kuristo nne.
46001009	Nlhuku owiihanneni mwaattiva nkhalhe nlhoko mmoka ni Mwaamwanawe Yesu Kuristo Athithi ri o ukhulhuvelhiya.
46001010	Ashilhoko aka kinoulhepelhani wo nchina na Athithi Yesu Kuristo wiira mwiiwanane chittu chinolhumacha inyu, uhiiwanana uhikhalhe nhina mwinyu. Muupuwelheke wo irusho imoka ni nrima mmoka.
46001011	Ashilhoko aka, attu akina amuchi a Nakiloe, ahohimia ikekhiaye wiira khanneewanana munlhokoni mwinyu.
46001012	Ittu kinothanana aka uhimia etu phi ilhe kiiwilhe aka uwaninyu, kila mmoka noolhumacha chawawe, mmoka neera, “Mii kinaattwara Napaolo.” Nkina, “Mii kinaattwara Naapolo.” Nkina, “Mii a Nakefa”, ni akina, “Mii a Kuristo.”
46001013	Chani, Kuristo homianihiya? Chani, Napaolo phi akhomelhelhiye vansalaabani wo nlhatu winyu? Ama chani, mwaabatiiziye wo nchina ni Napaolo?
46001014	Kinonshukuru Nlhuku wiira akambatiizilhe ntu riyoothe munlhokoni mwinyu yaahikalheru Nakurispo ni Nagayo.
46001015	Wo chiichammo etu khaawo ntu nohalha uhimia wiira batiiziye wo nchina naka.
46001016	Eiyo, kahaabatiiza attu o unupani wa Nastefana nansho uthepa yayo, akambatinze ntu nkina riyoothe.
46001017	Ukhalhawaya Kuristo khaakirumme waabatiiza attu, nansho kirumilhe uhimiacha Malhove Orera, tho, keettuchinhe wo uhikhulhuvelha irusho cho malhove a attu, ikhalhe wiira machiri o nookhwa a Kuristo vansalaabani ahirukunushiye.
46001018	Ukhalhawaya nttenga wo nookhwa a Kuristo vansalaabani phi nlhove no ukumbafu wo alhe arii mu upoterani nansho wo hii noopolhiyeva, yoyo nttenga uyo phi machiri a Nlhuku.
46001019	Ukhalhawaya Malhove Matakatifu aneera, “Kinootanganya irusho chaya attu o irusho, Kinoorihelha utayi ushoma waya attu ashomilhe.”
46001020	Ri vayi etu, ntu o irusho? Ri vayi etu, owiittuchiha Ikekhia? Ri vayi etu ovanyiha o ilha ikatema ilha? Nlhuku hopanga irusho cho mwiilhaponi ukhalha cho uhikhalha maana.
46001021	Ukhalhawaya Nlhuku wo irusho chawe, attu o velhaponi khanonchuwelha Nlhuku wo iphiro yo irusho chaya ashinene. Vatulhi waya, Nlhuku hottuna woopolha attu anonrumelhelha alhe wo nttenga unohimiacha ihu, iphiro inooniya ni attu o irusho wiira yo uhikhalha maana.
46001022	Ayahudi anovekelha woona ithikineha ni Ayunani anaavia irusho
46001023	nansho hii ninonhimiacha Kuristo aakhomelhelhiye vansalaabani. Nttenga unoonia wa Ayahudi wiira itiyelhelho, ni ukumbafu wa attu ahiri Ayahudi.
46001024	Nansho wa onkhaye eehaniye ni Nlhuku alhe, Ayahudi ni Ayunani, Kuristo phi machiri a Nlhuku ni irusho cha Nlhuku.
46001025	Ukhalhawaya inoonia ukhalha phi ukumbafu wa Nlhuku, phi irusho upwaha irusho cha ntu ni ittu inoonia uhikhalha ni machiri wa Nlhuku, phi yo machiri upwaha machiri a attu.
46001026	Ashilhoko aka, muupuwelheke vano wiira ikatema veehaniye inyu ni Nlhuku enchi inyu khamwaarina irusho cho uchuwelha chittu cho munttuni enchi khayari attu o machiri ama attu o pilhi waapwaha attu akina.
46001027	Nlhuku ahothanlha chittu choonia wiira cho ukumbafu cho mwiilhaponi wo nlhatu no woolhihacha muru attu o irusho, tho ahothanlha chittu chihiri ni machiri wiira olhihache muru attu o machiri.
46001028	Nlhuku ahothanlha chittu cho uheulhachiya cho mwiilhaponi choonia wiira phi malhove o uhikhalha maana wo nlhatu no utanganya chittu choonia ni attu wiira phi chorera ata chahaariwo.
46001029	Paahi etu, khaawo ntu nooria wiifunelha iriyoothe mmiholho mwa Nlhuku.
46001030	Nlhuku mwanene phi uyo olhutaninheni mwaattiva ni Kuristo Yesu. Nlhuku homvaha Kuristo akhalhe phi uchuwelha wihu, ni ikekhia ni utakatifu ni woopolhiya.
46001031	Paahi etu, thoko Malhove Matakatifu chinohimia aya, “Ntu neeshipa, Efunelheke etu ntheko wa Athithi.”
46002001	Ashilhoko aka, mii vaawilhe aka uwaninyu, akohimiachenreni nttenga uvithiye wa Nlhuku wo nulhumo noochiva, ama wo irusho ya ntu.
46002002	Vaariaka uwaninyu kaholhakelha uhichuwelha ittu iriyoothe yaahikhalheru unchuwelha Yesu Kuristo aakhomelhelhiye vansalaabani.
46002003	Vaari aka uwaninyu kaari ohuperiacha, koovaka ni uthukumelha chinene.
46002004	Malhove koolhumachilhe aka ni meettuchiho aka, akoolhumachilhe wo uchivelhihani ni wo irusho, nansho wo uhimiecheshiya chinene ni machiri o Iphumu ya Nlhuku.
46002005	Kaapangilhe chiicho wo nlhatu no wiira nrima winyu ukhulhuvelhe machiri a Nlhuku, mena kuhiwe irusho cha ntu.
46002006	Inakhalhaka chiicho, hii ninohimiacha nttenga wo irusho cha attu akhomanlhe munnepani nansho chechiyo irusho chiyo khachihiwe cho velhaponi va, mena kachihena cha aholhelhi anotawara ilhapo ilha ari muupoterani.
46002007	Ninouhimiacherani irusho chivithiye cha Nlhuku chaalhakenlhe awe toka machokholhelho, ilhapo ihinaya wuupiya wo nlhatu no nthimicho wihu.
46002008	Khaawo aholhelhi o utawara o velhaponi va yaachuwenlhe chilha irusho chilha. Yakaachuwenlhe, khayaakhomelhelha Athithi o nthimicho vansalaabani.
46002009	Nansho, thoko Malhove Matakatifu chinohimia aya, “Chittu chihinapacha niitho woona Mena nnyaru wiiwa, Chittu chihinapacha ntu wuupuwelha munrimani, Chechiyo phi chiyo Nlhuku cheeshenre awe attu anonttuna.”
46002010	Nansho Nlhuku ahonipatakulhelha hii wo iphiro yo Iphumu awe. Ukhalhawaya Iphumu ya Nlhuku nowaavia kila ittu ata malhove a Nlhuku avithiye nhina hinanini.
46002011	Mpani munlhokoni mwinyu nooria uchuwelha mwaha wo nhina wa ntu ihikhalhe iphumu rii nhina mwa yoyo ntu uyo? Chiichammo etu, khaawo nochuwelha mwaha wa Nlhuku yaahikhalhe Iphumu ya Nlhuku vekha aya.
46002012	Hii khanipochenre iphumu yo velhaponi, nansho nipochenre Iphumu irumiye ni Nlhuku, wiira nikhalhe nichuwelhaka nnema uvaheriye ihu ni Nlhuku ulhe.
46002013	Paahi etu hii khaninoolhumacha wo malhove aneetuchihiya wo irusho cha ntu, nansho ninoolhumacha wo malhove anettuchihiya ni Iphumu ya Nlhuku nilhamulhaka ikeekhene yo munnepani wa attu arii ni Iphumu ya Nlhuku.
46002014	Ntu riyoothe hirii ni Iphumu ya Nlhuku khanooria upochera mahalha anokhuma wa Iphumu ya Nlhuku. Attu thoko yayo khachuwenlhe mena uwannyawe yoyo ntu uyo malhove ayo anokhalha thoko ukumbafuru ukhalhawaya anochuwelhiya tu wo woorihiya ni Iphumu ya Nlhuku.
46002015	Ntu riyoothe rinaa Iphumu ya Nlhuku, wo iphiro iriyoothe, nowooria uchuwelha ushichira wo kila ittu, nansho hikhalhaka ntu nooria unhukumulha.
46002016	Malhove Matakatifu aneera, “Mpani nochuwelha irusho cha Athithi? Apani anooria weettuchiha Athithi?” Nansho inakhalhaka chiicho, hiyaano nihanaa irusho cha Kuristo.
46003001	Ashilhoko aka, miyaano akonrie wulhumacha ni inyu mwaatti thoko attu arii ni Iphumu ya Nlhuku. Koolhumanche ni inyu thoko attu o velhaponi, thoko ashinamwane nhina nrima wa Kuristo.
46003002	Koovanheni mapelhe, kuhiwe yolhia yo ulhipa, ukhalhawaya mwaari nhinaaya vo ulhia. Eiyo, ata vano nna khannoria ulhia yolhia yo ulhipa.
46003003	Ukhalhawaya bado nnokhalha thoko attu o velhaponi chinokhalha aya. Chani khuuwo woonelhana ihache ni waana indewo mwaashineneru? Yayo onkhaye ayo anooniha wiira nnokalha thoko attu o velhaponi va, wo ukhalha thoko chiri aya.
46003004	Mmoka inyu veneera awe Miyaano kinaatwara Napaolo akina Mii kinaatwara Naapolo, chani yeyo khinooniha wiira nnokalha thoko attu o velhaponi va?
46003005	Ana Naapolo phi apani? Ni Napaolo phi apani? Hiyaano anamitheko tu a Nlhuku noowihenreni mwaattiva nlhove ninorumelhelha inyu. Kila mmoka ihu novara ntheko uvahiye awe ni Athithi.
46003006	Mii kahaalha imbeyu, Naapolo nkayaahelhelha maashi, nansho Nlhuku phi melhinhe imbeyu.
46003007	Ntu aalhilhe imbeyu ni ntu michenre maashi khave ittu. Nlhuku mwanene phi melhinhe imbeyu.
46003008	Ntu aalhilhe ulhe ni ntu michenre maashi ulhe, oyelhi ayo arii ittu imokaru, inakhalhaka kila mmoka nowa upochera nttuvo nawe ulhikaana ni ntheko vanre awe.
46003009	Ukhalhawaya hii phi attu o nlhoko mmoka ninovara ntheko vamoka ni Nlhuku, mwaattiva phi imata ya Nlhuku ni mwaattiva phi inupa ya Nlhuku.
46003010	Wo ukavihereriya ni nnema ukivahilhe awe Nlhuku, kihooria wo irusho utheka nsingi, unthekiya vachulhu vaya ni ntu nkina. Paahi kila mmoka akhalheke miitho vanotheka awe vachulhu waya.
46003011	Khaawo ntu nooria utheka nsingi nkina ukhalhawaya Yesu Kuristo mwanene phi nsingi.
46003012	Vachulhu yoyo nsingi uyo ntu nowooria utheka wo malhuku o idhahabu ama malhuku anhaniya makhobilhi o nchurukhu ama wo malhuku makina o nhakhu mwinchi ama wo miri ama wo mathaakhuru ama wo manyashi.
46003013	Ata ikeriye chani, ulhoka wo ntheko wo kila mmoka unolhoha woonia nihuku na Kuristo nne vanohalha aya upatakulhiya. Ukhalhawaya, nenno nihuku nno mooro unowa upatakulha ntheko wa kila mmoka, ni yoyo mooro uyo unowa uphima ni wooniha ulhoka waya.
46003014	Yakhalhaka ntheko wa yoyo ntu thekilhe yoyo nsingi uyo unoowa waavilhelha yoyo mooro uyo, noowa aattuviya
46003015	nansho ntheko wa ntu uyo waviaka mooro, paahi, nookhwa nrima. Nansho mwanene uyo nowoopolhiya thoko howiira ukulhuphuwa ukhuma vamooroni.
46003016	Chani, khanchuwenlhe wiira mwaattiva phi Inupa ya Nlhuku ni Iphumu ya Nlhuku nokhalha nhina mwinyu?
46003017	Paahi, ntu atanganyaka Inupa ya Nlhuku, Nlhuku nontanganya ukhalhawaya Inupa ya Nlhuku phi inupa itakatifu, ni inyu mwaattiva phi Inupa ya Nlhuku.
46003018	Nhiithepiache! Ntu riyoothe munlhokoni mwinyu echoonaka ukhalha o irusho yo velhaponi, nambaya akhalhe o uhichuwelha ittu wiira apatte irusho yo ikeekhene.
46003019	Ukhalhawaya, irusho cho velhaponi va phi ukumbafu uholho wa Nlhuku. Ukhalhawaya Malhove Orera aneera, “Nlhuku nowaawayiha arii ni irusho muupenyani mwaya.”
46003020	Ni tho aneera, “Athithi ahochuwelha wiira waanyihera wa attu o irusho khunolhoka.”
46003021	Paahi, ntu hiifunelhe mitheko cha attu. Ukhalhawaya kila ittu yawinyu.
46003022	Napaolo ama Naapolo ama Nakefa ama ilhapo ama ukumi ama nookhwa ama malhove o naanano ni o kaanyuma, onkhaye awinyu.
46003023	Ni mwaattiva phi attu a Kuristo ni Kuristo phi a Nlhuku.
46004001	Ntu anooneke hii etu ukhalha phi anamitheko a Kuristo nivahiye ipilhi vachulhu malhove avithiye na Nlhuku.
46004002	Ukhulhuvelhiya phi ittu inothananiya wo ntu riyoothe vahiye ipilhi ni ukhulhuvelhiya.
46004003	Nansho uwannyaka mii, khave ittu kahukumulhiyaka ni inyu mwaatti ama uhukumulhiya ni ipuwa cha attu. Eiyo, mena mii kimwanene akineehukumulha.
46004004	Ukhalhawaya nrima aka khunokiriaa milhatu wo nlhove niriyoothe, nansho yeyo khinokaalhakelhelha ikekhia wiira akittenke. Athithi phi anokihukumulha mii.
46004005	Paahi, nhihukumulhe ikatema ihinaaya nhiyeke mpaka Athithi vanohalha aya uwa. Yayo anoowa aahumbukulha malhove eevithilhe mwiipiphini, ni wooniha mwaari mirima cha attu. Vavawo kila mmoka phi nohalha awe utotopelhiya unophwanelhiya awe ukhuma wa Nlhuku.
46004006	Ashilhoko aka, ayo onkhaye ahimianche aka waacha Naapolo ni ukaacha mii ayo phi wiilhikaaniha uwaninyu. Wo uttuna waka wiilhikaaniha mii ni Naapolo uwo, kinothanana wiira nchuwelhe maana o nna nulhumo nna “Nrumelhelheke malhove alhepiye.” Vavawo khannowa mweeshipelha ntu mmoka ni unheulhacha ntu nkina.
46004007	Ukhalhawaya apani olhikaninheni inyuva? Nrina nipampa naani? Nansho yakhalhaka nhovahiya, nlhatuni etu no uhirumelhelha thoko khanvahiye ittu?
46004008	Haya etu, nnaanyihera wiira nhopatta kila ittu! Nhokhalha attu o nhakhu! Nhokhalha mamwene wo uhikhalha hii! Eiyo, we ikekhiaye nanthanana nkhalheke attu o utawara, wiira ni hii nitaware chiicho vamoka ni inyu mwaatti.
46004009	Ukhalhawaya kinaanyihera wiira Nlhuku honipanga hii akarumiya va ukhalha attu o umalhelha, thoko attu ahukumulhiye wiiviya, ukhalhawaya nihokhalha attu othiachiya mwiilhaponi mwonkhaye, uholho wo minepa ni wa attu.
46004010	Hii nihokhalha akumbafu wo nlhatu na Kuristo, nansho mwaattiva phi o irusho mu ulhutaanani ni Kuristo! Hii phi ohuperia, mwaatti nrii omachiri. Mwaattiva nnoohelhelhiya nansho hiyaano ninoovehachiya.
46004011	Mpaka nna, hii ninoowolhiya ithalha ni nttona, khanirina ikuwo, ninowaatiya makofi ni mena khanirina mapuro.
46004012	Tho ninoohuva ni uvara ntheko wo miono chihu naashinene. Naruwaniyaka, ninowaalhapelha ibarakha nathurulhiyaka, ninoovilhelha
46004013	naruwaniyaka, ninaakhulha wo umanya. Mpaka vano nihopangiya thoko unyalha wo velhaponi ni wo kila ntu hiyaano ninoonia thoko ikokholha!
46004014	Akinolhepa alha malhove alha wo nlhatu no uwulhihachani muru mwaatti, nansho wo nlhatu no uwaamukani achishaana aka kinaattuna aka.
46004015	Ukhalhawaya ata nkalhanaka maelufu a attu o ulhelhani muukhalhani makhalhelho e Ikuristo, athumwaninyu kirii amoka tu. Ukhalhawaya muulhutaanani ni Kuristo yesu mii phi oyarilheni wo iphiro yo Malhove Orera.
46004016	Wo chiichammo etu, kinoulhapelhelhani wiira, ntwariheke meetelho aka.
46004017	Yoyo phi nlhatu wo waaruma Natimotheo uwaninyu. Yayo phi anaaka anaattuna aka o ukhulhuvelhiya muulhutaanani ni Athithi. Anowupushani iphiro inotwara aka muulhutaanani ni Kuristo Yesu iphiro ineettuchiha aka mwonkhaye kila vanokumaana aya attu anrumelhenlhe Kuristo.
46004018	Paahi etu munlhokoni mwinyu ahochokholha ukhalha attu aneefuna yaanyiheraka wiira akinowa uwaninyu tho.
46004019	Nansho Athithi akivaheraka, kinoowa uwaninyu chitema ni vavawo phi nohalha aka wiichonelha kimwanene, kuhiwena ittu inooria aya wulhumacha attu aneefuna ayo nansho ni ilhe anooria aya upanga.
46004020	Ukhalhawaya umwene wa Nlhuku kuhiwe wo malhoveru, nansho wo machiri.
46004021	Nnothananani? Kiwe uwaninyu kinaweelhe ikopo, ama kiwe ni nrima wo uttuna ama ni nrima wo wiitimarikha?
46005001	Malhove e ikekhiaye aheewania wiira uhaawo nhapo wo ishembwere unopangia munlhokoni mwinyu tho ishembwere yo uhilhoka ihinapacha upangia munlhokoni mwa attu ahiri Ayahudi. Kihohimeriya wiira eti mmoka inyu norupa ni mahanu a athumwanawe!
46005002	Ni inyu nnowiititihacha vavawo? Nhiifune nansho nchukulheke ni yoyo ntu pangilhe yeyo ittu iyo munthamiheke munlhokoni mwinyu.
46005003	Ni mii uwannyaka, ihookhalharu akirii wowo kimwanene wo iruttu, nansho munrimani kiri vamoka ni inyu mwaatti. Ata chiicho etu, ikhalhaka thoko kirii wowo, kihomalha unhukumulha yoyo ntu pangilhe ittu yo wuulhihacha muru uyo.
46005004	Ikatema inothukumana inyu vamoka wo nchina na Athithi Yesu ni mii kikhalhaka vamoka wo nrima, paahi machiri a Athithi Yesu ari vamoka vavawo,
46005005	mummaheke Nakare yoyo ntu uyo, iruttu awe itanganyiye, ikhalhe wiira nrima awe uwe woopolhiya nihuku na Athithi nne.
46005006	Wiifuna khunlhoka! Chani mwaatti khannochuwelha wiira ihengedure vakani inowooria ururumulha iphepa yonkhaye?
46005007	Mwiihapiheke chinene, nrihelheke utayi ihengedure yo khalhayi nkhalheke nibonji nihithakanihiye ihengedure thoko chinothananiya inyu ukhalha. Ukhalhawaya, Kuristo, mwaakhondoro ihu o Pasaka, homalha ukumihiya ukhalha isadaka.
46005008	Paahi, niterekheke ikaramu iyo ihikhalhaka yo nkatte uthakanihiye ihengedure yo khalhayi, ihengedure yo unanara ni uhilhoka, nansho yo nkatte wo uhithakanihiya ihengedure, nkatte wo urera nrima ni ikeekhene.
46005009	Nhina iwarakha aka kaalhempe wiira nhivaraane ni attu o ulhuva.
46005010	Ikekheene iri wiira akaacha attu onkhaye velhaponi anlhuva ama attu o ilhema ama attu owoothacha ama anlhapelha mashoka. Ukhalhawaya, waashemba attu onkhaye ayo ikaathananiye mwaattivava uthama velhaponi va!
46005011	Ittu yaalhepilhe aka phi ilha, nhivaraane ni nhima inyu Nkuristo rii ntu o ulhuva ama ntu o ilhema ama nolhapelha mashoka ama ntu o waaniha attu ama ntu o uhapalhiya ama ntu owiiya. Ntu o yayo meetelho ayo, ata yolhia nhinlhiane.
46005012	Chani, phi nlhove naka waahukumulha attu ahirii munlhokoni mwinyu?
46005013	Yayo Nlhuku phi nohalha awe waahukumulha. Ama chani mwaatti khannothananiya waahukumulha attu arii munlhokoni mwinyu? Mmwomolhelheke utayi yoyo ntu o uhilhoka uyo!
46006001	Nooria chani mmoka inyu unrweeha nlhoko awe nrumelhenlhe Kuristo nkhunanawe upuwani wa attu ahinchuwenlhe Nlhuku unhukumulhani ni uhiya unrweeha upuwani wa atakatifu a Nlhuku?
46006002	Ama chani, khanchuwenlhe wiira attu a Nlhuku phi nowa uhukumulha ilhapo? Yakhalhaka etu, ilhapo inowa uhukumulhiya ni inyu mwaatti, nlhatuni etu no uhiphwanelhiya uhukumulha ata malhove makani?
46006003	Chani, khannochuwelha wiira wo uthepa ninoowa naakhalha o uhukumulha ata minepa o wiirimu? Vamoka ni uhukumulha malhove makani o kila nihuku.
46006004	Vanokhalha inyu ni milhatu cho uhiiwanana cho malhove inyu o mahuku ene, nlhatuni etu no weehana uwa uhukumulhani attu ahinaalhoha attu anrumelhenlhe Kuristo?
46006005	Ana khannokelhiya nipampa! Niireke wiira khaawo ata ntu mmoka munlhokoni mwinyu rii ni irusho cho wooria uhukumulha malhove o uhiiwananiya a attu anrumelhenlhe Kuristo?
46006006	Nansho nholhemalhelha ntu unrweeha nhima awe umilhatuni, tho uholho wa attu ahinrumelhenlhe Kuristo wiira ahukumulhiye.
46006007	Wo ikekhiaye wowo uhukumulhana chittu cho uhilhoka mwaashineneru uwo, unowooniha wiira nhokufia chinene! Chani, khanaari nlhove norera chinene mwaatti uthurulhiya? Ama khayaarera chinene mwaatti waakhiya mihakhu chinyu?
46006008	Nansho, vatulhi waya, mwaatti phi inyu nnopanga chittu cho uhilhoka ni waakhacha, tho, yayo nnaapangelha achihima inyu!
46006009	Ama chani, khannochuwelha wiira attu o uhilhoka khanowa aahiyeriya umwene wa Nlhuku? Nhiithepiache! Attu ankhalhelha mwaha wo ulhuva ama anolhapelha mashoka ama o ishembwere ama anorupa ni alhopwana nanaya
46006010	ama owiiya ama o ilhema ama o uhapalhiya ama o waapa ama o uvara makhuche, yayo onkhaye ayo khanowa yaakelha Imwene ya Nlhuku.
46006011	Attu akina munlhokoni mwinyu mwaari thoko chiicho nansho vano nhaalhakelhiya, nkamwathanlhiya ukhalha oombone ni uratihiya ni Nlhuku wo nchina na Athithi Yesu Kuristo ni wo Iphumu ya Nlhuku.
46006012	Ntu nowooria uhimia wiira “Wo mii kila ittu inookilhoka.” Eiyo nansho kiheena kila ittu inolhoka uwannyaka. Kinoorumelhelha wiira kila ittu inorera nansho akinottuna utawariya ni ikuru iriyoothe.
46006013	Nnowooria wiira, “Yolhia irii wo nlhatu no nthunkwa ni nthunkwa nirii wo nlhatu no yolhia.” Eiyo nansho Nlhuku noowa aatanganya chonkhaye pilhi chiyo. Iruttu ya ntu kihiwe wo nlhatu wo ulhavalhava nansho wo nlhatu na Athithi ni Athithi wo nlhatu no iruttu.
46006014	Paahi, Nlhuku aahihimunshe Athithi unookhwani nonihihimusha ni hii chiicho wo machiri awe.
46006015	Chani, khannochuwelha wiira iruttu chinyu phi itturi cho iruttu ya Kuristo? Chani, kikusheke itturi cha Kuristo ni upanga ukhalha itturi cha nthiyana o ulhavalhava? Ata vakani mena!
46006016	Ukhalhawaya, thoko chinochuwelha inyu, ntu nolhutaana ni nthiyana o ulhavalhava nokhalha iruttu imoka ni uyo thoko chilhepiye aya, “Ni ayo elhi ayo anookhalha iruttu imoka.”
46006017	Nansho ntu lhutaanne ni Athithi nokhalha nrima mmoka ni ayo.
46006018	Nshembeke chinene iphiro cho muulhuvani. Uwonya ukina wonkhaye khunopangiya mwiiruttuni nansho ulhavalhava unopangiya mwiiruttuni wa ntu mwanene.
46006019	Ama chani, khanchuwenlhe wiira iruttu chinyu phi Inupa yo Iphumu ya Nlhuku rii nhina mwinyu, mwaapochenre inyu ukhuma wa Nlhuku? Mwaattiva etu, iruttu chinyu khachihiwe nhakhu inyu mwaashinene.
46006020	Mwaatti mwoopolhiye wo nhakhu mwinchi. Paahi etu, iruttu chinyu chinthimicheke Nlhuku.
46007001	Vano kinaacha malhove yaalhepilhe inyu alhe, eiyo, ihorera nlhopwana ahalhaka wo uhithelha
46007002	nansho wo nlhatu wo itatako yo ulhikachiya muulhuvani, paahi etu kila nlhopwana akhalheke ni mahanu awe mwanene ni kila nthiyana akhalheke ni owannyawe.
46007003	Nlhopwana apangeke chinophwanelhiya upanga wa mahanu awe ni nthiyana uyo apangeke chinothananiya awe upanga wa owannyawe.
46007004	Nthiyana kharina ikuru vachulhu iruttu awe, nansho owannyawe ahaana ni nlhopwana uyo chiichammo, kharina ikuru vachulhu iruttu awe nansho mahanu awe phirina.
46007005	Nhithuwane, yaahikhalhe mweewananaka mwaashineneru wiira chiicho wo nipesha nikani, mwoorie upatta nipesha noombone no unlhapelha Nlhuku. Mwamalhaka nhokolhelhaneke chitema, Nakare hiwe o ulhikachani wo nlhatu no uhichooria winyu wiichinanelha.
46007006	Nna nlhove kinohimia aka vano nna ikano, kuhiwena malhehero.
46007007	Kaanothanana wiira attu onkhaye akhalheke thoko mii chiriaka nansho kila mmoka hanaa mahalha avaheriye awe ukhuma wa Nlhuku mmoka vaheriye ilha ni ntu nkina vaheriye ilhe.
46007008	Paahi, alhe ahinathelhiya ni alhe akhwelhiye manyowannyaya kinaahimeria wiira athepeke ukhalha wo uhithelhiya ama uthelha thoko mii.
46007009	Nansho inakhalhaka chiicho, nlhopwana aahorieke wiichinanelha, paahi etu athelheke ukhalhawaya irii mbaya chinene uthelha kuliko ukelhiya itama.
46007010	Wa attu athelhanne alhe kihanaa malhehero, tho ahikhalhaka awaka, nansho ya Athithi, nthiyana himwalhaane ni owannyawe
46007011	nansho amwalhaanaka, paahi ahalheke wo uhithelhiya ama etu, eewananihiyeke ni owannyaya. Nlhopwana ni uyo himwalhaane ni mahanu awe.
46007012	Wa attu akina alhe, mii kimwanene kuhiwe Athithi, kineera choo, Yakhalhaka munnihu nrumelhenlhe Kuristo hanaa ahanu awe ahinarumelhelha, ni uyo nkaattuna ukhalha ni ayo, aakhalhaneke etu, himmwalhaane.
46007013	Vavawo tho, yakhalhaka nthiyana nrumelhenlhe Kuristo hothelhiya ni nlhopwana hinanrumelhelha Kuristo ni uyo nlhopwana uyo hottuna ukhalha ni ayo, paahi etu nthiyana uyo himwalhaane ni owannyawe ayo.
46007014	Ukhalhawaya nlhopwana hinanrumelhelha Kuristo uyo nohapihiya uhilhoka wawe wo ulhutaana ni mahanu awe ni uyo nthiyana o uhirumelhelha noteelhihiya wa Nlhuku wo unlhoko ni owannyawe. Wo iphiro ikina achishaana ayo khayaakhalha ashaana a Nlhuku nansho vano phi attu awe Nlhuku.
46007015	Nansho yakhalhaka ulhe o uhirumelhelha nothanana unhiya ntunanawe nrumelhenlhe Kuristo, paahi etu anhiyeke. Vavawo nlhoko ihu nrumelhenlhe Kuristo uyo, nlhopwana ama nthiyana nookhalha wo uhittukiya. Ukhalhawaya Nlhuku howiihanani mwaattiva mpangiye o ukhalha ni mpuha.
46007016	Inyuva amanyi munrumelhenlhe Kuristo va, nnooria chani ukhalha ni ikekhiaye wiira khannooria woopolha owannyu? Ama inyuva thithi nri Akuristo va, nnooria chani ukhalha ni ikekhiaye wiira khannooria woopolha ahanu inyu?
46007017	Nansho yakhalhaka ntu khaneenelhiya nkeehaniya ni Athithi, akhalheke thoko chiri awe wo uhinelhiya. Alha phi malhove anolhehera aka wa attu anrumelhenlhe Kuristo onkhaye.
46007018	Yakhalhaka ntu heehaniya ni Nlhuku neenelhiye unyawo, paahi hilhikache wiirukunusha wiira kheenelhiye ni vavawo yakhalhaka ntu ehaniye nari hineenelhiya, paahi etu hiinelhiye.
46007019	Ukhalhawaya wiinelhiya unyawo ama uhiinelhiya khave ittu, ittu yuulhupalhe irii uvara malhehero a Nlhuku.
46007020	Paahi, kila mmoka akhalheke thoko chaari awe ikatema yeehaniye awe ni Nlhuku.
46007021	Chani, inyuva mwaari ipotta ikatema yeehaniye inyu? Aye, nhikelhiye nipampa nansho mwapattaka nipesha no uneethi ntumiyeke.
46007022	Ukhalhawaya ntu ehaniye ni Athithi nari ipotta uyo, yoyo nookhalha neethi wa Athithi. Phi chiichammo ni uyo ehaniye nari neethi, nookhalha ipotta ya Kuristo.
46007023	Mwaatti onkhaye mwoopolhiye wo nhakhu paahi etu nhikhalhe tho ipotta cha attu.
46007024	Ashilhoko aka, kila mmoka inyu ahalheke ni Nlhuku thoko chaari awe ikatema yeehaniye awe.
46007025	Vano, wo mwaha unaacha manyaathiyana ahinaatameriya ni athupa, akirina malhehero ukhuma wa Athithi nansho kinokumiha nlhove naka mii, kivaheriye wo ikiriri cha Athithi ukhalha o ukhulhuvelhiya.
46007026	Paahi, wo nlhatu wo uhuva urii vano, kinoona yanlhoka ntu ukhalha thoko chiri awe.
46007027	Chani, nhothelha? Paahi, nhithanane umwalhaana ni mahanu inyu. Inyuva khanthenlhe? Paahi, nhithelhe.
46007028	Nansho mwathelhaka khannowonya ni mwalhi athelhiyaka khanowonya. Attu anohalha uthelhana ayo anoopatta itatako cho velhaponi va, nansho mii kaathanana wiira yayo ahuupatteni mwaattiva.
46007029	Ashilhoko aka, kineera choo, ikatema ihanlhe ihokhuviaa. Ni toka vano attu athenlhe akhalheke thoko khathenlhe,
46007030	attu anonlha akhalheke thoko khanonlha, ni attu anteelhiya akhalheke thoko khanteelhiya ni attu anothuma akhalheke thoko khaarina ittu
46007031	ni attu arii ni mitheko cho velhaponi va akhalheke thoko khaarina choopanga chinene ni ayo, ukhalhawaya ilhapo ilha, thoko chinochuwelha ihu, inoovira.
46007032	Nansho kinothanana mwaatti nhikelhiye nipampa. Ntu hinathelha naachenjeukelha Athithi iphiro chinohalha awe waateelhiha Athithi.
46007033	Nlhopwana thenlhe nochenjeukelha chittu cho velhaponi iphiro chinohalha awe waateelhiha nrima mahanu awe,
46007034	ni uyo homianiaa. Nthiyana hithelhiye ama nthiyana hinaatameriya ni nlhopwana nochenjeuka ni malhove a Athithi wiira ekumihe iruttu ni nrima awe akhalhe ntakatifu. Nansho nthiyana thelhiye nochenjeuka ni malhove o velhaponi va, iphiro chinohalha awe waateelhiha owannyawe.
46007035	Kinoohimeriani chommo wo ifaida inyu, mena kuhiwe wo wuchiichihani. Kinothanana wiira nkhalheke o ulhokalhoka, wiira mwaatumikelhe Athithi wo uhimianiaa.
46007036	Yakhalhaka nlhopwana nowoona wiira khanompangelha rata nthiyana mwalhi nvekilhe awe wo uhinthelha hoolhuvalha ni yakhalhaka itama chawe chinommulhusha, apangeke etu chinothanana awe, athelhaneke tu khanowonya.
46007037	Nansho yakhalhaka nlhopwana uyo attunaka wo uthanana mu nrimani mwawe uhithelha kharina nlhatu, ni vavawo ooriaka utawara machiri o itama chawe ni uchuwelha iphiro yo upanga, paahi, hopanga rata chinene ahinthelheke uyo ntunanawe hinaatameriya uyo.
46007038	Paahi wo malhove makina, ntu nothanana uveka ulhe nopanga yorera ni ulhe nohalha wo uhithelha nopanga morera chinene.
46007039	Nthiyana thelhiye noottukiya ni owannyawe wo ikatema yonkhaye owannyawe vanokhalha aya akumi. Nansho owannyawe akhwaaka, yayo opani ayo ahohiyereriya, attunaka anowooria uthelhiya ni ntu riyoothe, nansho akhalheke ntu arumelhenlhe Athithi.
46007040	Nansho, chinoona aka mii anooreeriya chinene akaakhanlhe chiicho thoko chiri aya. Yayo phi noonaka mii uno kaanyiheraka ni mii chiicho kihanaa Iphumu ya Nlhuku.
46008001	Vano mwaha unaacha isadaka yo cholhia chilhapelhiye mashoka. Nihochuwelha wiira hiyaano onkhaye va nihanaa irusho, nansho irusho chiyo chinowaapanga attu yeeshipe nansho uttuna phi notheka.
46008002	Ntu eeraka wiira hochuwelha ittu, wo ikekhiaye khachuwenlhe ittu iriyoothe thoko chinothananiya awe.
46008003	Ntu anttunaka Nlhuku, Nlhuku ni uyo nonchuwelha yoyo ntu uyo.
46008004	Paahi etu, mwaha unaacha isadaka yo cholhia chilhapelhiye mashoka, nihochuwelha wiira we ikekhiaye mashoka khave ittu velhaponi va ukhalhawaya nihochuwelha wiira Nlhuku ri mmoka tu.
46008005	Ata yakhalhaka wiira chihaawo chittu chineehaniya milhuku velhaponi ama wiirimu, ni ata akhalhaka thoko chihawo milhuku ni manyaathithi enchi,
46008006	nansho uwanihu hii Nlhuku rii mmoka tu, Athumwanihu Oopilhe chonkhaye rii wo nlhatu nawe hii nihawo. Tho Athithi arii amoka tu, Yesu Kuristo, rii wo iphiro awe chittu chonkhaye chahoopiya, ni hii ninolhokelha wo iphiro awe.
46008007	Nansho, kuhiwe kila ntu chuwenlhe ulha mwaha ulha. Ukhalhawaya ahawo attu akina alhemalhenlhe ulhapelha mashoka, attu arii mpaka nna vanolhia aya yeyo isadaka yo yolhia iyo anoona thoko chiholhapelhiya mashoka. Ni ukhalhawaya mirima chaya chihoochaa, anookelhiya nsheru.
46008008	Nansho yolhia khinooria unaatameriha chinene wa Nlhuku. Naahilhieke khaninowukuwelhiya ittu, nalhiaka khaninonchereriya ittu.
46008009	Nansho, mmweheke rata cholhia chinolhia inyu, ikuru ihu ilha ihaapange arii ni nrima mwankani awulhuwe mu uwonyani.
46008010	Ukhalhawaya, ntu o nrima wo uhuperia, owoonakani inyuva nrii ni irusho nlhiaka isadaka yo yolhia chiyo nnupani mwo ulhapelhiya mashoka, chani, khannonhelha nrima ni uyo wo ulhia cholhia chilhapelhiye mashoka?
46008011	Chiicho, nhima inyu o nrima mwankani uyo, Kuristo nkhwenlhe awe wo nlhatu nawe, noopotera wo nlhatu no irusho chinyu.
46008012	Yakhalhaka nnowaawonyiha achihima inyu yeyo iphiro iyo, ni urakalhiha nrima waya wo uhuperia, ni inyu nnonttekelha Kuristo ni achihima inyu.
46008013	Wo chiichammo etu, yakhalhaka yolhia inommulhusha nhima aka, akinokhuura inama tho mahuku o uhimalha, ukhalhawaya kalhiaka kinommulhusha Kuristo ni ummulhusha nhima aka mu uwonyani.
46009001	Chani, mii akihiwe neethi? Chani, mii akihiwe karumiya? Chani, mii akimwoonne Yesu, Athithi? Chani, mwaattiva kanhiwe phi mahalha o ntheko aka wo nlhatu wa Athithi?
46009002	Ata yakhalhaka wiira wa attu akina mii akihiwe karumiya, nansho uwaninyu mwaatti mii karumiya. Ni inyu mwaatti phi o himiechesha urumiya waka wo nlhatu no ulhutaana winyu na Athithi.
46009003	Nlhove naka no uwaahukumulha attu anokivinga phi nna,
46009004	Chani, hii khanirina ikuru yo ulhia ni uwuria?
46009005	Chani, khanirina ikuru yo waakusha manyaahanu ihu anrumelhenlhe Kuristo munkwahani mwihu, thoko chinopanga aya akarumiya akina ni ashilhoko aya Athithi ni Nakefa chiicho?
46009006	Ama ni mii tu ama Nabanaba ari ni ikuru yo uvara ntheko ni upatta mahalha ihu?
46009007	Chani, nsikari ani neelhivelha ntheko awe? Namalhima ani hinolhia izabibu cho mmatani mwawe? Nshunga ani hinowuria mapelhe o mihuwo chawe?
46009008	Chani, kinoolhumacha alha malhove alha wo ikuru yo munttuniru? Chani, Malhehero a ashinna Musa ni iyo khineera chiicho?
46009009	Ukhalhawaya Malhehero a ashinna Musa aholhepiya wiira, “Nhittuke iyano ing'ope vanokhungura aya cholhia.” Chani, niireke Nlhuku noochenjeuka ni ing'ope?
46009010	Chani, hii khanopuwenlhe veerilhe awe chiicho? Eiyo, alha aalhepiye wo nlhatu nihu, ukhalhawaya ulhe nolhima ni ulhe nokhungura, onkhaye oyelhi ahaana nrima wo ukhulhuvelha upatta mahalha.
46009011	Yakhalhaka etu hii nihaalha imbeyu yo munnepani munlhokoni mwinyu, chani, khavanolhoka chinene nakhunguraka ifaida ukhuma mwiiruttuni mwinyu?
46009012	Yakhalhaka akina anoweherera ukaviha winyu mwaatti, chani, hii khanirina ikuru chinene waapwaha yayo? Nansho, hiyaano khanatumiilhe wowo uphwanelhiya uwo. Utulhi waya, nihovilhelha kila ittu wiira nihitiyelhelhe Malhove Orera a Kuristo.
46009013	Chani, khanchuwenlhe wiira attu anovara ntheko u Inupa ya Nlhuku anopatta malhivo o ntheko waya ni attu anokumiha isadaka chaya umadhubahuni anoopatta ittu ukhuma yeyo isadaka iyo?
46009014	Athithi yaholhehera chiicho wiira attu anohimiacha Malhove Orera a Nlhuku apatteke ittu yo waakavihera mommo.
46009015	Nansho, mii akitumiilhe ata ittu imoka wo yayo malhove ayo. Ni mena akinolhepa wiira kipatte chechiyo chittu chiyo. Uwannyaka mii, nambaya ukhwa kuliko uchiichihiya ni ntu riyoothe wiishipa uneeshipa aka.
46009016	Yakhalhaka kinoohimiacha Malhove Orera, yoyo kuhiwe nlhatu wo wiifunelha, yoyo phi ntheko uvahiye aka. Nansho kinoothapana mii kaahihimiacheke Malhove Orera!
46009017	Yakhalhaka kahovara ulha ntheko ulha wo uttuna waka, paahi, kaanoweherera malhivo nansho wo uhittuna waka, yeyo phi ipilhi kirumelhelhiyaka ni Nlhuku wiira kivare.
46009018	Malhivo aka phi ishiyani etu? Malhivo aka phi nipesha kivahiye aka no uhimiacha Malhove Orera wo uhilhiviya, wo uhikoherera malhivo o ikuru aka yo uhimiacha Malhove Orera.
46009019	Ihookhalharu mii akipangiye ipotta yo ntu riyoothe, kiheepanga ukhalha ipotta yo kila ntu wiira kimpattelhe Kuristo attu enchi inooriacha aya.
46009020	Wo Ayahudi kaakhanlhe thoko Nyahudi wiira kaapatte Ayahudi, ihookhalharu akinotawariya ni Malhehero a ashinna Musa kiheechesha wuuthi Malhehero uwannyaya, wiira kaapatte alhe arii atawariyaka ni Malhehero a ashinna Musa.
46009021	Ni wo alhe ahinotawariya ni Malhehero a ashinna Musa alhe, kinokhalha thoko yayo, wo uhitawariya ni Malhehero, wiira kaapatte o uwonya ayo, anotawariya ni Malhehero ayo. Ilha kiheena wiira mii akinotawariya ni Malhehero a Nlhuku, ukhalhawaya kihovariya ni Malhehero a Kuristo.
