52005027	Kinoulheherani wo nchina na Athithi wiira mwaashomelheke ashilhoko ihu anrumelhenlhe Kuristo onkhaye ilha iwarakha ilha.
52005028	Nnema wa Athithi Yesu Kuristo ukhalhe vamoka ni inyu mwaatti.
53001001	Mii Paolo vamoka ni Nasila ni Natimotheo, ninoolhepa iwarakha wa nlhoko wa attu anrumelhenlhe Kuristo o Uthesalonike arii attu a Nlhuku Athumwanihu ni a Athithi Yesu Kuristo.
53001002	Ninoulhapelhelhani nnema ni mpuha ukhuma wa Nlhuku Athumwanihu ni Athithi Yesu Kuristo.
53001003	Ashilhoko ihu, ninonshukuru Nlhuku ikatema chonkhaye wo nlhatu winyu. Iri yo ulhoka hii wiira chiicho ukhalhawaya nrima inyu unoothepa ukhomaalha chinene ni uttunana winyu unowunchereria chinene.
53001004	Ata hii vano ninowiititihacha mmilhokoni mwa attu a Nlhuku anrumelhenlhe Kuristo wo nlhatu winyu mwaatti, chinothepa inyu urumelhelha ni uvilhelha uhuva ni uttwaruwa wonkhaye unopatta inyu.
53001005	Chechiyo chonkhaye chiyo phi nohimiechesha wiira uhukumulha wa Nlhuku uri we ikekhiaye ni wiira mmiholho mwaya nnoowa mwaaphwanelhiya ukelha mu Imwene aya unohuvelha inyu.
53001006	Nlhuku rii e ikekhiaye, noowa aatwarusha attu anoutwarushani mwaatti,
53001007	ni uvahani nipesha no wiittuwa mwaatti nnohuvihiya va. Ni hii ninoopangelhiya chiicho, Athithi Yesu vanohalha aya uwa ukhuma wiirimu vamoka ni minepa aya o wiirimu o machiri.
53001008	Vanowa aya anoowa waahukumulha ni nlhimi no mooro attu onkhaye anonkhota Nlhuku ni attu ahinrumelhelha Malhove Orera a Athithi Yesu.
53001009	Ulhakalhihiya waya unowa ukhalha wo mahuku o uhimalha, atiyelhelhiyaka wohoona Athithi wiitho ni uhoona nthimicho waya mulhupalhe.
53001010	Vanowa aya upochera nthimicho ukhuma wa attu aya ni nthimicho ukhuma wa attu anrumelhelha onkhaye, ni inyu chiicho nnowa ukhalha amoka aya, ukhalhawaya nhorumelhelha uhimiechesha wihu.
53001011	Paahi etu ikatema chonkhaye ninoulhapelhelhani Nlhuku owooriheni uphwanelhiya ukhalha makhalhelho mwiihaniye inyu. Ninonlhapelha Nlhuku wo ikuru awe, atimirihe nnikwa inyu wo upanga chittu choombone ni umalhiha ntheko inyu wo upisha nrima.
53001012	Ninolhapelha wiira nchina na Athithi Yesu nithimichiye munlhokoni mwinyu ni inyu mpochere nthimicho ukhuma uwannyaya, wo nnema wa Nlhuku ni wa Athithi Yesu Kuristo.
53002001	Paahi vano ashilhoko ihu ulha phi mwaha unaacha uwa wa Athithi Yesu Kuristo irii uthukumaanihiya wihu vamoka. Mwaatti ninoushontelhelhani chinene,
53002002	wiira nhikelhiye nipampa chitemachitema mena nkamwaahiya nrima inyu, mena nhithuthushiye wo nnepa, mena wo nlhove, mena wo iwarakha inaanyiheriya ukhalha yawihu, thoko valhe nihuku ni Athithi nihaaya.
53002003	Ntu riyoothe huuthepiacheni ittu iriyoothe, ukhalhawaya nenno nihuku nno khaninowa mpaka uweeke Uhiiwananiya wulhupalhe wo unvinga Nlhuku ni O uhilhoka ulhe oonie kaye, nohalha umalhelha wo utanganyiya lhakalhaka.
53002004	Yoyo noowa aavinga kila ittu attu anaalhakelha aya ni wiihana milhuku ama anothimicha aya. Noowa wiichiinulha mwanene vachulhu kila ittu ata noowa aakelha ni ukhalha wi Inupa ya Nlhuku ni wiichihana Nlhuku.
53002005	Chani khannoopuwelha wiira kahouhimeriani mwaatti yayo malhove onkhaye ayo vaari aka ni inyu?
53002006	Nansho nhochuwelha ittu inonchiichiha vano iyo. Ikatema yaayakaru, yoyo ntu o uwonya uyo noowa oonia.
53002007	Ukhalhawaya machiri evinthe o yoyo O uhilhoka uyo ari munthekoni. Nansho khanoonia mpaka nonchiichiha uyo vanohalha awe uthamihiya.
53002008	Vavawo Yoyo o uwonya uyo phi nohalha awe upatakulhiya. Nansho Athithi Yesu vanowa aya, anowa aamwiiva wo Iphumu yo iyano aya ni umwiiva ni nchakarimia no uwa waya.
53002009	Yoyo O uwonya uyo noowa aawa ni machiri a Nakare ni upanga cho ushangiha ni ithikineha cho woothacha cho kila iphiro,
53002010	ni waathepiacha wo iphiro chinchi ampotera ayo, wo nlhatu wo ukhota urumelhelha ni uhittuna ikeekhene wiira oopolhiye akhalhe o ulhoka.
53002011	Nlhuku heesha yayo wuuthi machiri o muupoterani, arumelhelhe wiira athepiachiye.
53002012	Paahi attu onkhaye ahinorumelhelha ikeekhene, attapelhelhaka mwaha wo chittu cho unanara, anoowa yaahukumulhiya.
53002013	Nansho vano hii ninshukuruku Nlhuku ikatema chonkhaye wo nlhatu winyu ashilhoko ihu nnottuniya ni Athithi. Ukhalhawaya toka varachi Nlhuku ahothanlhani wiira mwoopolhiye nkhalhe atakatifu wo machiri o Iphumu awe ni wo upishera nrima ikeekhene.
53002014	Nlhuku howiihanani mwaattiva wo Malhove Orera nihimianche ihu uwaninyu wiira mpatte vakittu munthimichoni mwa Athithi Yesu Kuristo.
53002015	Paahi etu, ashilhoko ihu mweemelheke rata, nhitikhinyiye, nvarechesheke meettuchiho mwiittuchihiye inyu ikhalhe wo malhove ama wo iwarakha chihu.
53002016	Ninowaalhapelha Athithi Yesu Kuristo anene ni Nlhuku Athumwanihu anittunne ni wo nnema waya ahonivaha mpuha wo mahuku o uhimalha ni nikhulhuvelho no ikeekhene,
53002017	ohelhekeni nrima ni ulhipihani ikatema chonkhaye wo machiri o upanga mitheko ni wulhumacha chittu choombone.
53003001	Ashilhoko ihu, vanomalhiha ihu, nnilhapelhelheke, wiira nttenga wa Athithi uthepeke uwanelha chitema ni uthimichiya thoko chiri aya uwaninyu.
53003002	Tho munlhapelheke Nlhuku wiira anoopolhe mwa attu o uhilhoka apotenre, ukhalhawaya kahii attu onkhaye anorumelhelha ulha nttenga ulha.
53003003	Nansho Athithi arii o ukhulhuvelhiya. anoulhipihani ni uwiinkelhani nhivariye ni O uhilhoka ulhe.
53003004	Ni hii ninaakhulhuvelha Athithi wo nlhatu winyu mwaatti, nichuwelhaka chiicho wiira, nnoothepa upanga ittu ilhenhe ihu ilhe.
53003005	Athithi aholhelheke mirima chinyu uuchuwelhani uttuna wa Nlhuku ni nrima wo uvilhelha ninovahiya ihu ni Kuristo.
53003006	Ashilhoko ihu, ninoulheherani wo nchina ni Athithi Yesu Kuristo wiira mwaashembeke ashilhoko inyu onkhaye o uhuva ni ahinotwara malhehero nilhehenre ihu.
53003007	Inyu mwaatti mwaashinene nhochuwelha rata iphiro inothananiya inyu unittwariha chipangilhe ihu. Ukhalhawaya vaari ihu uwaninyu, khanaakhanlhe wo ureshi,
53003008	mena khanaalhilhie ittu ya ntu riyoothe wo uhinlhiva. Nansho, uthana ni uhiyu nihuvaka nahovara ntheko wo uhoochaa wiira nihinrie nsigo ntu riyoothe.
53003009	Naapannge chiicho kuhii wiira khaniphwanelhiye uvahiya chittu ni inyu mwaatti, nansho naathanana uwiittuchihani wiira nnittwarihe.
53003010	Ukhalhawaya ata vaari ihu uwaninyu naari nilheheraka wiira, “Ntu riyoothe hinottuna uvara ntheko hilhie.”
53003011	Nineera chiicho ukhalhawaya niheewa wiira munlhokoni mwinyu ahaawo areeshi ahinottuna uvara ntheko uriyoothe, nansho athemwaka uhimiacha chittu cha attu akina.
53003012	Paahi etu wo nchina ni Athithi Yesu Kuristo ninowaalhehera ni uwaamuka yayo attu ayo wiira eetimarikheke, avareke ntheko ni upatta ittu yo waalhamiha.
53003013	Ni inyu mwaatti chiicho, ashilhoko ihu, nhoochee upanga moombone.
53003014	Ni vavawo yakhalhaka wowo haawo ntu hinorumelhelha nlhove no ilha iwarakha ilha, munhimiacheke vaattuni yoyo ntu uyo, mena nhivaraanane, olhiye muru.
53003015	Nansho nhimwaalhakelhe thoko mmalhaponi nansho mmwaamukeke mmwoonaka ukhalha nlhoko inyu.
53003016	Nlhuku mwanene nowiiha mpuha, ovaherekeni mpuha ikatema chonkhaye wo kila iphiro. Athithi akhalhe ni inyu mwaatti onkhaye.
53003017	Mii Paolo, kinouvahani isalamu chinolhepa aka wo moono aka kimwanene. Nenno phi nthonyero kinolhepa aka kila iwarakha. Chiichammo phi neera aka wo ulhepa.
53003018	Nnema wa Athithi Yesu Kuristo ukhalhe vamoka ni inyu mwaatti onkhaye.
54001001	Mii Paolo, karumiya a Kuristo Yesu wo ulheheriya ni Nlhuku Moopolhi ihu ni Kuristo Yesu nikhulhuvelho nihu.
54001002	Kinoolhepa iwarakha iwe uwaninyu Natimotheo anaaka e ikeekhene o munrimani. Kinoulhapelhelhani nnema, ikiriri, ni mpuha ukhuma wa Nlhuku Athumwanihu ni Kuristo Yesu Athithi.
54001003	Thoko chenre aka wo ulheherani vaarwaa aka Umakedoniya, mwakhalheke iwani yo Uefeso, mwaachiichihe attu aneettuchiha meettuchiho o woothachiya,
54001004	wiira ahiye chechiyo ithelhi chiyo ni uthanana uchuwelha mwaha wo uhimalha wo iyari cha manyaapwiiya chinowiiha mwaha wo uhiiwanana, mena ahivaraka ntheko wa Nlhuku thoko unochuwaniaa wo nrima.
54001005	Kinoulheherani chiicho ukurumicha mwaha wo uttunana unkhuma munrimani muteenlhee, nrima wo uthanana upanga chittu chorera ni nrima wo uhikhalha ni unafiki.
54001006	Attu akina ahohiya upanga yayo ni urukunuwelha miaha cho uhikhalha ni maana.
54001007	Anothananacha ukhalha o wiittuchiha Malhehero a Nlhuku nansho ahichuwelhaka ittu inoolhumacha aya ama inomindelha aya.
54001008	Nihochuwelha wiira, Malhehero a Nlhuku ari orera atwariyaka thoko chinothananiya aya.
54001009	Nansho nuupuwelheke wiira Malhehero a Nlhuku kheeshiye wo nlhatu ni attu orera nrima, nansho wa attu ahinvara ikekhiaye ni attu o uhilhoka ni attu ahinchuwenlhe Nlhuku ni attu o uwonya ni wa attu anopanga chittu cho unyalha ni attu ahinonthimicha Nlhuku ni attu aneevakacha manyanaangoro aya ni attu o niiviho.
54001010	Tho, Malhehero eeshiye wa attu o ulhavalhava ni wa attu o ishembwere yo uthelhana ni ashilhopwana nanaya ni attu anaathumiha attu nanaya ni attu o woothacha ni attu anolhupelha wo woothacha ni attu anovara meettuchiho ahirii e ikekhiaye.
54001011	Thoko chihimiye aya nhina Malhove Orera a Nlhuku nototopelhiye arumelhelhiye wiira kivahiye mii kihimiache waattuni.
54001012	Kinowaashukuru Athithi Kuristo Yesu akivanhe machiri munthekoni mwaka wo ukoona mii wiira kirii o ukhulhuvelhiya, nkayakithanlha wiira kaakavihe.
54001013	Inakhalhaka katashi vawo kahaaruwana ni waatwarusha ni kaari ntu o uhilhokalhoka. Nansho Nlhuku ahokoonelha ikiriri ukhalhawaya kaari kihinaya upisha nrima, kihichuwelhaka ittu kaapanga aka.
54001014	Nansho Athithi ahokivaha nnema waya mwinchi nkaakihelha nrima wo waarumelhelha ni uttuna urii wawihu muulhutaanani ni Kuristo Yesu.
54001015	Nna phi nulhumo no ukhulhuvelhiya, tho nikhalhaka no uverecheshiya chinene. Kuristo Yesu aawilhe velhaponi wiira oopolhe attu o uwonya ni mii kihoolhaka waapwaha akina onkhaye ayo,
54001016	nansho wo yoyo nlhatu uyo Nlhuku ahokoonelha ikiriri, wiira Kuristo Yesu akoonihe uvilhelha wawe wonkhaye mii ntu o uwonya chinene. Kikhalhe phi o utwarihiya ni attu onkhaye anohalha unrumelhelha apochere ukumi wo uhimalha.
54001017	Wo ayo arii Amwene o mahuku o uhimalha, ahinokhwa, ahinoonia arii Nlhuku o vekha aya ayo, nthimicho ukhalheke uwannyaya, mahuku o uhimalha ni uhimalha! Aye.
54001018	Anaaka Natimotheo, kinoulheherani alha malhove alha wo ulhikaana ni malhove a anamilhohi aahimiye khalhayi veehaniye inyu, wiira akhalhe ikerero inyu yo waatakanelha rata ikhoto yo winkelha Malhove Orera,
54001019	ni uvarelha nrima winyu wo nnikwa woombone. Attu akina khayaavarenlhe minikwa chaya, paahi etu aheeva nrima aya.
54001020	Akina aya phi Nahumenayo ni Naalekizanda, attu kinvanhe aka Nakare aatwarushe, ikhalhe phi iphiro yo weettuchiha ahinruwane Nlhuku.
54002001	Paahi etu, chihinaaya uchokholha chittu chikina, kinothanana wiira unlhepelha Nlhuku ni ulhapelha ni waalhapelha attu akina ni unshukuru Nlhuku chihimiyeke wo nlhatu na attu onkhaye.
54002002	Mwaalhapelheke mamwene ni attu avarenlhe ikuru wiira nikhalheke rata ni mpuha ni umwoova Nlhuku ni ukhalha makhalhelho ateelhihiye.
54002003	Ulha phi mwaha woombone unonteelhiha Nlhuku Moopolhi ihu,
54002004	nothanana attu onkhaye oopolhiye achuwelhe ikeekhene.
54002005	Ukhalhawaya Nlhuku rii mmoka ni tho haawo mmoka neewananiha attu ni Nlhuku, yoyo ntu uyo phi Kuristo Yesu,
54002006	ekuminhe mwanene wiira oopolhe attu onkhaye. Wowo phi waari uhimiechesha ikatema yaathananiya vaatiminre aya wiira Nlhuku nothanana wookholha attu onkhaye.
54002007	Ni mii wo yoyo nlhatu uyo etu kihothanlhiya ukhalha karumiya keettuchihe attu ahiri Ayahudi, kihimiache nttenga wo upisha nrima ni ikeekhene. Kinoolhumacha ikeekhene, mena akinoothacha!
54002008	Paahi etu, kila vanokumaana inyu unlhapelha Nlhuku, kinothanana attu onkhaye atheesheke miono chiri chitakatifu ni ulhapelha wo uhithunalha mena wo uhitukutuwacha.
54002009	Vavawo tho, kinothanana manyopani amaalheke ni wiitimarikha ni uweha ikuwo chinowara aya, awarelheke rata kuhii wo utiva ikharari uhinophwanelha mena wiipamba wo chittu cho idhahabu ama ilulu ama ikuwo cho nhakhu mwinchi,
54002010	nansho awarelheke wo mitheko choombone thoko chilheheriye aya uwarelha manyopani anomwoova Nlhuku.
54002011	Manyopani amaalheke ni wiitimarikha vaneettuchihiya aya.
54002012	Mii akinaahiyera manyopani weettuchiha manyaalhopwana ama waatawara, amaalheke.
54002013	Ukhalhawaya Adamu phi achokhonlhe wuupiya, Ahawa nkaatwara.
54002014	Mena Adamu khayaathepiachiye nansho opani phi athepiachiye, nkaawonya Malhehero a Nlhuku.
54002015	Inakhalhaka chiicho etu, opani anowoopolhiya ukumi aya wo waayara ashaana, alhokelhaka ni upisha nrima, uttunana, utakatifu ni nrima woombone.
54003001	Nna nulhumo nna phi no ukhulhuvelhiya, ntu nothanana ushunga nlhoko wa attu anrumelhenlhe Kuristo yoyo hothanana ntheko woombone.
54003002	Paahi etu, ntu noshunga nlhoko wa attu anrumelhenlhe Kuristo akhalheke ntu o uhilhaphachiya, nlhopwana ri ni opani amoka, ntu o wiitawara, ntu o wiitimarikha, ntu o meetelho oombone, ntu naapochera attu, nooria weettuchiha attu,
54003003	ntu o uhihapalhiya ama ntu o mahuchuru nansho o ntu o ikiriri, naathana mpuha, hirii ntu o uttuna nchurukhu chinene.
54003004	Ntu noshunga inupa awe rata ni waalhelha achishaana awe ukhalha attu o umanya.
54003005	Ukhalhawaya ntu aahorieke weemelhelha inupa awe rata, nohalha wooria chani ushunga nlhoko wa attu a Nlhuku?
54003006	Ntu rumelhenlhe katashi hipangiye ukhalha nholhelhi, hiwe eefuna ni uhukumulhiya thoko chenre awe Nakare.
54003007	Tho, ahimiecheshiyeke ukhalha ntu o meetelho oombone mwa attu ahinatwara nlhoko wa attu anrumelhenlhe Nlhuku, hiwe aalhaphachiya nkaawaya nriankho wa Nakare.
54003008	Akavihi o ntheko wo ukavihera nlhoko wa attu anrumelhenlhe Kuristo akhalheke attu o meetelho oombone, aneemelhelha nulhumo naya, ahinohapalhiya utheka ama o nikakata no uttuna nchurukhu chinene,
54003009	anvarechesha ikeekhene yo nrima worera ipatakulhiye.
54003010	Yayo aphimiyeke thoko, ooniyaka wiira kharina nlhatu wo ukhuwachiya, paahi etu, avareke ntheko wo ukaviha nlhoko wa attu anrumelhenlhe Kuristo uyo.
54003011	Thothoni tho, manyaahanu aya akhalheke attu o meetelho ombone, ahinaapa akhunanaya, o wiitawara ni o ukhulhuvelhiya wo chittu chonkhaye.
54003012	Namitheko okaviha nlhoko wa attu anrumelhenlhe Kuristo nothananiya akhalheke nlhopwana o opani amoka nooria weemelhelha rata inupa awe ni waalhelha rata achishaana awe.
54003013	Ukhalhawaya akavihi anovara ntheko rata anoothimichiya rata, ni ayo anowooria uhimiacha wo uhoova mwaha unaacha nrima urina aya muulhutaanani ni Kuristo Yesu.
54003014	Kinolhepa ilha iwarakha ilha uwaninyu kikhulhuvelhaka uwa uwoonani phiyaru.
54003015	Nansho kacherewihiyaka, paahi etu ilha iwarakha ilha, inouhimeriani meetelho ninothananiya ihu ukhalhana attu o iwani ya Nlhuku, irii nlhoko wa attu anonrumelhelha Nlhuku rii nkumi, rii phi nipoto ni nsingi we ikeekhene.
54003016	Khaniwo nipampa vachulhu mwaha uvithiye unaacha meetelho ihu o munrimani, Ahoonia wo iruttu yo munttuni, Ahohimiecheshiya ni Iphumu wiira ri o uvarechesha ikekhiaye Ahoonia ni minepa o wiirimu. Ahohimiachiya mwaattuni, Ahorumelhelhiya ni attu onkhaye o velhaponi, Ahokushiya uchulhu unthimichoni.
54004001	Iphumu ya Nlhuku nohimia mwaari wiira mahuku anowa attu akina anowa uhiya nrima aya, anoowa aatwara minepa cho woothacha ni uttwara meettuchiho o mashoka o unanara.
54004002	Meettuchiho thoko yayo anowanelhihiya ni anafiki, mirima chaya cho uchuwelha moombone ama chittu cho uhilhoka chuumaka thoko chipahiye ni iyuuma yo mooro.
54004003	Yayo attu ayo anowaachiichiha attu ahiveke ama ahilhie cholhia chuupilhe awe Nlhuku wiira chipocheriye wo ushukuru ni attu o nrima anochuwelha ikeekhene.
54004004	Kila ittu yuupilhe awe Nlhuku irii yorera, khiiwo yo ukhotiya nansho kila ittu ipocheriyeke wo ushukuru,
54004005	ukhalhawaya nlhove na Nlhuku ni ulhapelha phi nopanga yeyo phi nohapiha ittu iyo ipocheriye mmiholho wa Nlhuku.
54004006	Mwaahimeriaka ashilhoko ihu alha malhehero alha, nnookhalha karumiya o ukhulhuvelhiya a Kuristo Yesu, mwiilchunnuwihaka mwaanene wo malhove o munnepani o nrima ni meettuchiho o ikeekhene nnotwara inyu mwaanene.
54004007	Nansho nhiyeke wiiwelhelha ithelhi cho irusho chihiri cho munnepani chihiri ni maana. Mweettuchiheke attu ukhalha thoko chinothanana awe Nlhuku.
54004008	Wiichookolha iruttu unoolhoka nansho makhalhelho anonteelhiha Nlhuku ukhalhawaya ahonilheha upatta ukumi wo vano ni uyo unowa.
54004009	Nenno phi nulhumo ne ikekhiaye chinene ni noolhoka chinene. Ukhalhawaya anonikhulhuvelhiha ikekhiaye imphwanelhiya upocheriya.
54004010	Hii nirii muuvarani ntheko wo machiri ukhalhawaya niheesha nikhulhuvelho nihu wa Nlhuku rii nkumi rii Moopolhi a attu onkhaye, athepaka ayo anonrumelhelha Kuristo ayo.
54004011	Yayo phi malhehero anothananiya inyu weettuchiha ni waakurumicha wiira apangeke chiicho.
54004012	Ntu riyoothe huuvehacheni wo nlhatu no ukhalha winyu amirawo. Nansho nkhalheke ntu o utwariya ni attu anrumelhenlhe Kuristo wo moolhumo inyu ni meetelho inyu ni uttuna winyu ni nrima winyu ni makhalhelho orera anokhalha inyu.
54004013	Nlhokelheke nshomaka ni uhimiacha ni weettuchiha attu Malhove Matakatifu mpaka vanohalha aka uwa.
54004014	Nhihiye wooniha mahalha o Iphumu ya Nlhuku nrina inyu, mwaavahiye inyu wo malhove a anamilhohi ni wo weesheriya miono ni ashulhupalhe.
54004015	Muupuwelheke rata chonkhaye chiyo ni upanga, wiira attu onkhaye ooneke meetelho inyu orera chineera aya wo uthepa.
54004016	Mwiishungeke rata ni uweha chineera inyu wo weettuchiha attu. Nthepeke chiichammo ukhalhawaya mwapangaka chiicho, nnowiichoopolha mwaanene ni ayo anowiiwani ayo.
54005001	Nhaachacherache ashulhupalhe, nansho mwaalhoheke thoko chineera inyu wo waalhoha athumwaninyu. Mwaalhoheke ashimirawo thoko chinaalhoha inyu achihima inyu,
54005002	mwaalhoheke manyopani olhupalhe thoko chinaalhoha inyu anumwaninyu ni imialhi thoko ashirokorinyu, wo haamirelha ishenye, wo ukhalha makhalhelho orera.
54005003	Mwaalhoheke manyanankhwelhi o ikeekhene.
54005004	Nansho manyanankhwelhi ari ni iyari, ashaana ama uchuulhu, apangeke thoko Nlhuku chinothanana awe. Yeyo inokhalha phi iphiro yo waalhiva manyanaangoro ni manyaapwiiya aya inonteelhiha Nlhuku.
54005005	Anankhwelhi o ikeekhene, ahiri ni ntu o waalhelha, yayo anonkhulhuvelha Nlhuku anlhapelhaka uhiyu ni uthana wiira oopuwelhiye.
54005006	Nansho anankhwelhi anokhalha wo wiipuha, yayo anokhalha thoko ahokhwa, inakhalhaka akumi.
54005007	Mwaalhehereke attu wiira apangeke yayo, ahiwe aalhaphachiya.
54005008	Yakhalhaka ntu khanaalhoha amuchi awe, athepaka attu o uwannyawe, yoyo horuna nrima awe, ni unanara umpwaha ntu hinapisha nrima wo urumelhelha.
54005009	Nhaalhakelhe machina a anankhwelhi ariyoothe yaahikhalhe aphiyenlhe malhipa o iyaakha makhumi sita. Tho yaari opani o nlhopwana mmoka,
54005010	ni ayo ahimiecheshiye ukhalha o rera nrima, aalhenlhe achishaana aya rata, aapochenre alheto unupani waya, aavanhe maashi o ukhucha attu a Nlhuku, aakavinhe attu aahuva ni ekuminhe upanga chittu choombone.
54005011	Nhaalhakelhe machina a anankhwelhi imialhi, ukhalhawaya iruttu chaya chakelhiyaka ikhwilhu, anoothanana uthelhiya tho nkayanhiya Kuristo,
54005012	nkayeehukumulha ukhalhawaya ahohiya nrima waarumelhelha aya katashi vawo.
54005013	Anankhwelhi thoko yayo phi nochokholha weetakacha wo uhikhalha ni maana mmanupani. Wo uthepa anowiittucha waapa attu ni wiihelhahelha nkittu nhiri mwawaya, olhumachaka chittu chihaathananiya aya wulhumacha.
54005014	Paahi etu, kinoona wiira, manyanankhwelhi imialhi ahiiyeke athelhiyeke, aayareke ashaana ni ulhelha inupa chaya, ahiwe aavaha amalhaponi ihu nipesha no unulhumelha chittu cho uhilhoka.
54005015	Ukhalhawaya anankhwelhi akina ahomalha uwonya ni unttwara Nakare.
54005016	Nansho yakhalhaka opani anrumelhenlhe Kuristo ahaana alhoko aya arii anankhwelhi o ikekhiaye, yayo phi nophwanelhiya waalhelha, mena kuhiwe uhiya ntheko upangiye ni nlhoko wa attu anrumelhenlhe Kuristo, ikhalhe wiira nlhoko wa attu anrumelhenlhe Kuristo apangeke ntheko wo waalhelha manyanankhwelhi ahiri ni ittu menamena.
54005017	Ashulhupalhe anaaholhelha rata nlhoko wa attu anonrumelhelha Kuristo ahophwanelhiya uvahiya mahalha velhi, athepaka ayo amminda uhimiacha ni weettuchiha attu.
54005018	Ukhalhawaya Malhove Matakatifu aneera, “Nhinttuke mwannama uwano vanolhimihiya awe.” Ni chiichammo etu “Anamitheko ahophwanelhiya malhivo.”
54005019	Nhipochere milhatu cha ashulhupalhe anoholhelha nlhoko wa attu anrumelhenlhe Kuristo, chaahiwihiyeke ni uhimiecheshiya ni attu elhi ama araru.
54005020	Mwaamukeke vaattuni attu anowonya, attu akina ayo yooveke.
54005021	Kinoulheherani mmiholho wa Nlhuku ni wa Kuristo Yesu ni wo minepa o wiirimu chithanlhiye, wiira nvarechesheke malhehero alha, mena nhihukumulhe wo ichimwa ama ummweha wiitho ntu riyoothe wo kila nlhatu unowiiheriya inyu.
54005022	Nhaakuvihe ummaha ntu ntheko wo uholhelha nlhoko wa attu anrumelhenlhe Kuristo. Nhikavihe uwonya wa attu akina, mwiichinanelheke mwaanene nhinanarihiye.
54005023	Nhiwurie maashiru nansho mmwurieke idivai vakani wo nlhatu no nthunkwa ninyu ukhalhawaya ninouweriani venchi.
54005024	Uwonya wa attu akina unowoonia mwaari ata ahinaya uhukumulhiya. Nansho uwonya wa attu akina unowa woonia vanohalha aya uhukumulhiya.
54005025	Chiichammo etu, meetelho oombone anowoonia mwaari, ata ayo ahinoonia ayo khanooria wiivitha.
54006001	Attu onkhaye arii mpottani yaathimicheke anene ntheko aya ayo wo kila ittu, nchina na Athithi nihiwe naaruwaniya mena meettuchiho ihu.
54006002	Ipotta cha anene ntheko aarumelhenlhe Athithi, ahaanyoholhache ashinene ntheko aya wo woona ukhalha Akuristo nanaya tu. Nansho apangeke ntheko rata ukhalhawaya ayo ampatta ifaida munthekoni mwa ipotta ayo ni ayo anowaattuna. Mwiittuchiheke ni uhimiacha ulha mwaha ulha.
54006003	Ntu riyoothe neettuchiha chittu chihinlhikaana ni meettuchiho o ukhalha chinothanana awe Nlhuku ni mena hinorumelhelha malhove e ikeekhene a Athithi Yesu Kuristo,
54006004	yoyo ntu uyo hochara nikakata no wiititihacha ni mena khachuwenlhe ittu iriyoothe. Yoyo phi ntu o uttuna mwaha wo uvaanyihana ni waahimeriacha attu chittu cho uhikhalha ni maana, aanyulhachaka ihache ni indewo ni uruwanana ni wuupuwelha chittu cho uhilhoka,
54006005	ni uvaanyihana uhinomalha ukhuma wa attu o uhikhalha ni irusho, attu ahiri ni ikeekhene. Attu anaanyihera wiira uvara ntheko wa Nlhuku phi iphiro yo upatta nhakhu.
54006006	Eiyo we ikekhiaye uvara ntheko wa Nlhuku unommaha ntu nhakhu mwinchi yakhalhaka nooteelhiya wo chittu chirina awe.
54006007	Ukhalhawaya khanaawilhe ni ittu iriyoothe velhaponi va ni mena khaninokusha ittu iriyoothe nihuku nihu no uthama velhaponi va.
54006008	Paahi etu yakhalhaka nihanaa cholhia ni ikuwo, nipisheke nrima.
54006009	Nansho attu o irusho cho uthanana ukhalha ni nhakhu anoowulhuwa mu ulhikachiyani ni uwayihiya nriankho wo nikakata ninchi no uhilhoka no uhikhalha maana ninaapurulhelha uutanganyiyani lhakalhaka.
54006010	Ukhalhawaya nrima wo uthanana nchurukhu chinene phi machokholhelho o uwonya wonkhaye. Attu akina ahothanana chinene upatta nchurukhu mpaka nkayaakukuriacha, nkayaahiya nrima ni mirima chaya chihopahiya chinene wo ihuzuni.
54006011	Nansho inyuva nrii ntu a Nlhuku va, nhittware yoyo mwaha uyo. Nvarechesheke ikekhia rata ni unthimicha Nlhuku ni upisha nrima ni uttunana ni uvilhelha ni wiitimarikha.
54006012	Mwaatakaneke wo machiri ikhoto yo munrimani wiira nhilhikachiye, nvarechesheke ukumi inyu wo uhimalha mwiihanelhiye inyu mmiholho wa o uhimiechesha enchi wo unrumelhelha Kuristo.
54006013	Kinoulheherani mmiholho wa Nlhuku nokumiha ukumi wo chittu chonkhaye ni mmiholho wa Kuristo Yesu nohimiechesha ni urumelhelha ikeekhene mmiholho wa Apontio Pilato,
54006014	wiira nvarechesheke malhehero inyu, nkhalheke attu o uhikhuwachiya mpaka nihuku Athithi Yesu Kuristo vanohalha aya ukhumelhelha.
54006015	Ukhumelhelha waya unowa ukhalha ikatema vanohalha aya waaya yeeshiye ni Nlhuku o mpuha nototopelhiya, rii ntawara o vekha awe, Mwene o mamwene ni Athithi o manyaathithi.
54006016	Yoyo vekha awe phi o uhikhwa rii nokhalha munthukoni nhinaatameriya ni ntu riyoothe. Khaawo ntu pantte umwoona ama nooria umwoona. Nthimicho ni ikuru chikhalheke uwannyawe mahuku o uhimalha! Aye.
54006017	Mwaalhehereke attu o nhakhu wo velhaponi va wiira ahiifune, ahikhulhuvelhe nhakhu uhinkhulhuvelhiya. Nansho, ankhulhuvelheke Nlhuku nonivaha chittu chonkhaye wo urera wawe wiira nipuheke.
54006018	Mwaalhehereke wiira apangeke morera ni ukhalha attu o nhakhu wo upanga menchi moombone, akhalheke attu ari tayari waakawelha attu akina nhakhu aya.
54006019	Yapangaka chiichammo anowiicheeshera nikhupi ninohalha ukhalha thoko nsingi wo ulhama unowa aya ukhulhuvelha mahuku anowa. Vavawo anowa aapatta ukumi urii ukumi we ikeekhene.
54006020	Inyu Natimotheo, nshungeke rata chittu chonkhaye chivahiye inyu. Nhiihelhe malhove o uvaanyihana mwaha wo velhaponi wo uvaanyihana uhiri ni maana waachaka ittu attu ineehana aya Irusho cho ushomiya.
54006021	Ukhalhawaya attu akina aheepanga ukhalha attu o irusho cho uchuwelha thoko chechiyo. Ni wo upanga chiicho etu ahoriha nrima waya. Kinoulhepelhelhani wiira nnema wa Nlhuku ukhalheke ni inyu mwaatti onkhaye!
55001001	Mii Paolo, karumiya a Kuristo Yesu kiihaniye wo uthanana wawe Nlhuku wiira kihimiache ukumi nilhehiye ihu ulhe wo ulhutaana wihu ni Kuristo Yesu,
55001002	kinolhepa iwarakha iwe uwaninyu Natimotheo, mwaamwanaka kinonttuna aka. Kinoulhapelhelhani nnema, ikiriri ni mpuha ukhuma wa Nlhuku Athumwanihu ni wa Kuristo Yesu Athithi.
55001003	Kinonshukuru Nlhuku kinonthimicha aka wo nrima worera thoko chaapanga aya manyaapwiiya. Kinonshukuru Nlhuku kila vanowuupuwelhaakani wo uhimalha ni kila ikatema vanonlhapelha aka uthana ni uhiyu.
55001004	Vanoopuwelha aka miithori chinyu kinoothanana chinene uwoonani wiira kiteelhiye nrima.
55001005	Kinowuupuwelha nrima inyu uhirii ni unafiki, upisha nrima waarina aya apwiiya inyu Naloisi ni chiicho anumwaninyu Eunike. Ni mii kihanaa ikekhiaye wiira ni inyu nhanaa yoyo nrima uyo chiicho.
55001006	Wo yoyo nlhatu uyo etu, kinowupushani wiira nthotherieke chinene mooro wo mahalha avahiye inyu ni Nlhuku voweshenreakani miono chaka.
55001007	Ukhalhawaya Iphumu ivahiye ihu ni Nlhuku kihii yo unoopopiha, mena, nansho Iphumu yo machiri ni yo univaha nrima wo uttunana ni wiitimarikha.
55001008	Paahi etu nhoone ishoni waahimiechesha Athithi, mena nhoone ishoni wo nlhatu waka mii kittukiye wo nlhatu waya. Nansho nvilhelheke uhuva vamoka ni mii wo nlhatu wo Malhove Orera, wo machiri a Nlhuku.
55001009	Nlhuku ahonoopolha nkaaniihana nikhalhe attu awe, kuhiwe wo nlhatu wo mitheko chihu nansho wo nlhatu wo malhakelho awe ni wo nnema waya. Yoyo nnema uyo naavahiye wo iphiro ya Kuristo Yesu mahuku toka machokholhelho.
55001010	Nansho vano nihopatakulhelhiya nnema wawe wo uwa wa Moopolhi ihu Yesu Kuristo. Yoyo hontiyelhelha nookhwa ni wo iphiro yo Malhove Orera honipatakulhelha ukumi uhiri ni nookhwa.
55001011	Ni Nlhuku hokithanlha mii kikhalhe karumiya ni owiittuchiha wo nlhatu no uhimiacha Malhove Orera,
55001012	ni wo yoyo nlhatu uyo etu phi notwaruwa aka chiicho. Nansho vano akinoona ishoni ukhalhawaya kihaachuwelha kaarumelhenlhe aka ayo, tho kihanaa ikekhiaye wiira anowooria ushunga rata ilhe ikivanhe aya mpaka nenno nihuku no uwa waya nno.
55001013	Nvarechesheke rata meettuchiho e ikeekhene kuhimenrieakani, ntwariheke ni upisha nrima ni uttunana wo ulhutaana wihu ni Kuristo Yesu.
55001014	Wo machiri o Iphumu ya Nlhuku nokhalha nhina mwihu, nshungeke rata ikeekhene nvahiye inyu.
55001015	Thoko chinochuwelha inyu, attu onkhaye o ilhapo yo Uasiya ahokihiya, ata Nafigelo ni Nahemogene ni ayo ahokihiya chiicho.
55001016	Athithi aakavihereke attu o unupani u Naonesiforo, wo woonelha ikiriri, ukhalhawaya yahokiteelhiha nrima ikatema chinchi mena khayoonilhe ishoni wo nlhatu no uttukiya waka,
55001017	nansho Naonesiforo ikatema vaari aya va Rumi va, yahokaavia chinene mpaka nkayaakoona, nkayaaakihelha nrima.
55001018	Athithi aakavihereke wo ikiriri aya uholho wa Nlhuku nenno nihuku no uhukumulhiya attu nno. Ni inyu nhochuwelha rata mwaha wonkhaye ukipangenlhe aya Uefeso uwo.
55002001	Paahi etu, uwe mwaamwanaka wiilhipiheke mu nnemani ninovahiya ihu wo ulhutaana ni Kuristo Yesu.
55002002	Nkusheke meettuchiho mweewilhe inyu kiittuchihaka wa attu o uhimiechesha enchi, mweettuchiheke attu o ukhulhuvelhiya anohalha wooria weettuchiha attu akina chiicho.
55002003	Nvilhelheke uhuva vamoka ni hii, nkhalhaka thoko nsikari o ukhulhuvelhiya a Kuristo Yesu.
55002004	Nsikari vanaatakana awe ikhoto noohiya chittu chinopanga awe mahuku ene, ukhalhawaya nothanana unteelhiha nholhelhi awe.
55002005	Chiichammo ntu riyoothe nothwelha nhapo wo uttawa ni akhunanawe khanowarihiya mphumburu aahittaweke thoko chinothananiya aya.
55002006	Namalhima hunvee phi nothananiya upatta nifungu no upacha no choolhia.
55002007	Nvarelheke yayo anohimiacha aka ayo, ukhalhawaya Athithi anouvahani irusho cho uchuwelha chittu chonkhaye.
55002008	Mmuupuwelheke Yesu Kuristo o iyari ya Adaudi, aahihimushiye, thoko chinohimia aya Malhove Orera anohimiacha aka wa attu.
55002009	Ni mii wo nlhatu no uhimiacha Malhove Orera ayo kinootwarushiya ni uttukiya mittondoro thoko ntu ttekilhe. Nansho nlhove na Nlhuku khaninttukiya mittondoro.
55002010	Paahi etu kinoovilhelha kila ittu wo nlhatu no attu athanlhiye a Nlhuku, wiira ni ayo ampatte noopo nopattiya wo iphiro ya Yesu Kuristo, inowiiha nthimicho wo uhimalha.
55002011	Nna nlhove nna phi no ukhulhuvelhiya. “Nakhalhaka nahokhwa vamoka ni uyo, Ninookhalha akumi vamoka ni uyo.
55002012	Navilhelhaka, Ninootawara vamoka ni uyo. Nankhotaka, Ni uyo chiicho noonikhota.
55002013	Naahirumelhelheke, Yoyo noohalha o ukhulhuvelhiya ikatema choothe. Ukhalhawaya yoyo khaanoria wiikhota mwanene.”
55002014	Mwoopusheke attu ayo yoyo mwaha uyo uno mwaamukaka mmiholho wa Nlhuku ahiye mwaha wo uvaanyihana malhove o uhikhalha maana, anaahononacha attu aneewelhelha ayo.
55002015	Mmindeke upanga chinothanana awe Nlhuku, ukhalha namitheko hinoolhiya muru vachulhu ntheko awe, neettuchiha rata nttenga we ikeekhene.
55002016	Mwiihapusheke malhove o waakhulhana o unanara o uhikhalha maana, ukhalhawaya yayo anowaathepiha unkhalhelha Nlhuku utayi.
55002017	Meettuchiho thoko yayo anokhalha thoko nampathani. Munlhokoni mwa yayo attu ayo ahawo Nahumenayo ni Nafileto,
55002018	akufiananne ikeekhene ilhe wo uhimia wiira uhihimushiya wa attu uhomalha uwa, ata nkayaapitikusha attu akina nrima aya.
55002019	Nansho ikeekhene ya Nlhuku iheemelha chichiriki thoko nsingi wo malhuku. Vachulhu waya aholhepiya alha malhove alha, “Athithi ahaachuwelha arii awaya.” Ni “Kila neechiirelha wiira uyo a Athithi, ahiyeke uhilhoka.”
55002020	Paahi nhina inupa yuulhupalhe khachirii iyombo cho idhahabu ni cho malhuku o fedha chinolhohiya chinene vekha ayaru, nansho chihaawo chikina cho miri ni cho ulhoko, chihinolhohiya rata.
55002021	Paahi ntu ehapihaka ni wiihapusha chechiyo chittu cho uhilhoka chiyo, nookhalha ittu yo uthimichiya ukhalhawaya hotelhihiya ukhalha ittu inaachivelha Athithi ikooroshiye wo nlhatu wo ntheko woombone.
55002022	Nansho nhittware itama che imirawo ntwareke ikekhiaye ni nrima ni uttuna ni mpuha vamoka ni alhe aneehana Athithi wo nrima worera.
55002023	Nansho nshembeke waakhulhana mwaha wo uhikhalha irusho ni maana nchuwelhaka wiira yoyo phi nowiiha indewo.
55002024	Paahi etu karumiya a Athithi khanothananiya waana nansho akhalheke o umanya wa attu onkhaye, nooria wiittuchiha ni o uvilhelha,
55002025	naamuka wo wiitimarikha attu anompangelha ichimwa, ikhalhe wiira Nlhuku aavahere nipesha no ukhoroma uwonya waya ni uchuwelha ikeekhene.
55002026	Apatte tho irusho chaya ni ukhuma mu nriankhoni mwa Nakare mwaawayinhe awe wiira aapangihe chinothanana awe.
55003001	Nchuwelheke wiira mahuku o umalhelha anookhalha o uhuva.
55003002	Attu anowa ukhalha o wiittuna ashineneru, o uttuna nchurukhu chinene, o wiititihacha, o wiichoona, o unruwana Nlhuku, ahinaathimicha manyanaangoro aya, ahinoshukuru ni ahinomwoova Nlhuku.
55003003	Anowa ukhalha attu ahinttunana ni o uhittuna wiiwanana ni o waapa attu ni o umenyekha ni o uchachachacha ni o uhittuna ittu iriyoothe yoombone,
55003004	anowa ukhalha attu o uthumihana ashineneru ni attu o tiyamaru, achanre mahuchuru ni ukhalha attu o uttuna wiiphwacha kuliko unthimicha Nlhuku.
55003005	Wo vathe anowa wiipanga attu anonthimicha Nlhuku, nansho akhotaka machiri awe. Mwaashembeke yayo attu ayo.
55003006	Attu akina anookelha mmanupani mwa attu ni waakhanyereriha manyopani o mirima cho uhuperia alhemelhiye misigo cho uwonya anovariya ni uholhelhiya nikakata no uhilhoka no kila iphiro wiira yeewelhelhe,
55003007	manyopani anolhikacha kila ikatema wiittucha nansho ahoriaka mena uphiyelha chechiyo irusho cho uchuwelha ikeekhene chiyo.
55003008	Yayo phi attu anovinga ikeekhene thoko Nayane ni Nayambre chenre aya wo waakhota ashinna Musa. Yayo attu ayo kharina irusho ni o upisha nrima uhiri we ikeekhene.
55003009	Nansho khanolhokelha chinene ukhalhawaya uhikhalha ni irusho waya unowa woonia mwaari vaattuni thoko chenre aya wa Nayane ni Nayambre.
55003010	Nansho inyuva nhottwara meettuchiho aka ni meetelho aka ni chittu chinothanana aka upanga ni upisha nrima waka ni uvilhelha waka ni uttuna waka ni uweherera waka
55003011	tho ni utwarushiya waka. Mwaha waakipantte Uantiokiya ni Uikoniyo ni Ulistra. Kahovilhelha uhuva wo kila iphiro, Athithi nkayaakoopolha nhina yayo onkhaye ayo.
55003012	Wo ikekhiaye, kila ntu nothanana ukhalha amwoovaka Nlhuku wo ulhutaana Kuristo Yesu, yoyo nootwarushiya.
55003013	Nansho attu o nrima wo uhilhoka ni o thepiacha yayo anoothepa uhilhoka waya, aathepiachaka attu ni uthepiachiya ashinene.
55003014	Nansho inyuva nthepeke ukhalha thoko chiittuchihiye inyu nkamwaarumelhelha, ukhalhawaya nhochuwelha wiira mweettunche wa apani,
55003015	ni wuupuwelha wiira toka uchihima winyu nhochuwelha Malhove Matakatifu anooria uuvahani irusho ata nkamwampatta noopo wo iphiro yo unrumelhelha Kuristo Yesu.
55003016	Ukhalhawaya Malhove Matakatifu onkhaye alhepiye wo uholhelhiya ni Iphumu ni Nlhuku. Ni ayo anoolhoka wo weettuchiha attu ikeekhene ni waamuka attu, wookolha ahiye iphiro chaya cho uwonya ni waalhaka wiira avire iphiro che ikekhiaye,
55003017	ikhalhe wiira ntu a Nlhuku atimire ni ukhalha tayari oorie uvara kila ntheko uri woombone.
55004001	Kinoulheherani mmiholho wa Nlhuku ni mmiholho wa Kuristo Yesu nohalha waahukumulha attu akumi ni attu akhwilhe, wo upatakulhiya wawe ni wo Umwene awe, wiira,
55004002	mwaahimiachereke attu nttenga ni ukhalha tayari uhimiacha ikatema inolhoka ama ikatema ihinolhoka, mwaachachereke attu, mwaamukeke ni waakurumicha attu, mwaavilhelhaka chinene ni weettuchiha.
55004003	Ukhalhawaya inoowa ikatema attu vanohalha aya uhiiwelhelha meettuchiho e ikekhiaye nansho attwaraka nrima waya ashineneru ni upatta milhoko cha owiittuchiha enchi anohalha waahimeria chittu chinochiva wiiwa mmaaruni mwaya.
55004004	Anowa ukhota wiiwelhelha ikeekhene ni urukunuwelha ithelhi cho uhikhalha maana.
55004005	Nansho inyuva nkhalheke miitho wo kila iphiro, nvilhelheke vanohuva inyu, mpangeke ntheko inyu wo uhimiacha Malhove Orera, mpangeke ntheko inyu uyo rata.
55004006	Ukhalhawaya vano mii kihophiyelha ikatema aka yo uthama velhaponi ihaaya, ni iphome aka inookumihiya thoko isadaka yo idivai chinokumiiniya aya ni opochera ishaani.
55004007	Kihaatakana ikhoto rata, kihomalhiha nkwaha wonkhaye ni uvarechesha nrima.
55004008	Ittu ihalhenlhe vano phi uttuviya wo makhalhelho oombone mmiholho wa Nlhuku akhanlhe aka. Mphumburu unohalha aya ukiwariha Athithi, O uhukumulha e ikekhiaye nenno nihuku nno. Kihikhalhaka mii vekha aka nansho ni attu onkhaye attunne uweherera ukhumelhelha waya.
55004009	Mpangeke kila inooria inyu mmwe uwannyaka chitema.
55004010	Ukhalhawaya Nadema ahochivelhiya chinene chittu cho velhaponi va ahokihiya ahorwaa Uthesalonike. Nakeresike ahorwaa Ugalatiya ni Natito akenlhe Udalmatiya.
55004011	Ashinna Luka vekha aya phi hanlhe vamoka ni mii va. Vanowa inyu vawo mwaakusheke Namako, mwaawiiheke, ukhalhawaya anowa ukikaviha mitheko chaka.
55004012	Kihaaruma Natikiko Uefeso.
55004013	Vanowa inyu nkikushere mwiinjiro aka waahiyalhe aka uwannyaya Nakarpo Utroa ulhe, chiichammo tho, nkiwiihereke ikitabu chilhe, hasa chikooroshiye wo marapalha chilhe.
55004014	Ntu o uhanacha chittu neehaniya Alekizanda ulhe hokipangelha cho uhilhoka chinene, Athithi anonlhiva thoko chipangilhe awe.
55004015	Ni inyu mummweheke rata yoyo ntu uyo ukhalhawaya ahovinga chinene nttenga wihu.
55004016	Ikatema yaachokhonlhe aka wiivaraanga wo upacha khaawo ntu eemenlhe vamoka ni mii onkhaye yahokihiya. Kinonlhapelha Nlhuku wiira haalhakelhelhe wowo utteka uwo.
55004017	Nansho Athithi yaari vamoka ni mii, nkaakivaha machiri ata nkakooria uhimiacha nttenga wonkhaye, attu ahiri Ayahudi eewe. Tho, nkakoopolhiya ukhuma ihukumu yo nookhwa thoko koopolhiye ukhuma iyano yo kharamu.
55004018	Athithi anookopolha mwaha wonkhaye wo uhilhoka ni ukipiiha rata mu Imweneni waya wo wiirimu. Nthimicho ukhalhe uwannyaya mahuku o uhimalha. Aye.
55004019	Mwaavaheke isalamu chaka Aprisila ni Naakwila, vamoka ni attu o unupani wa Naonesiforo.
55004020	Ashinna Erasto ahohalha Ukorintho ni Natrofimo kihaahiya Umileto ukhalhawaya yaari areta.
55004021	Mmweeke uno chitema uhinaaya nlhaalha wo uririya. Mpochereke isalamu chi Naeubulo ni Napude ni Nalinusi ni Nakilaudiya vamoka ni manyaalhoko ihu anrumelhenlhe Kuristo akina.
55004022	Athithi akhalhe vamoka ni inyu. Ni nnema waya ukhalhe vamoka ni nrima inyu.
56001001	Mii Paolo, namitheko a Nlhuku ni karumiya a Yesu Kuristo kinoolhepa. Mii kihothanlhiya ni urumiya kirwee kaahelhe nrima attu athanlhiye ni Nlhuku ni waaholhelha attu achuwelhe ikeekhene wiira akhalhe iphiro chinothanana awe Nlhuku.
56001002	Yeyo ikeekhene iyo phi nonikhulhuvelhiha upatta ukumi wo mahuku o uhimalha, naalhehiye ihu ni Nlhuku hinoothacha toka machokholhelho ilhapo ihinaya wuupiya.
56001003	Ni ikatema yorera yaayeke ahopatakulha nttenga wawe. Nkakaarumiya wiira kivire kaahimiacha wo urumelhelhiya ni Nlhuku Moopolhi ihu.
56001004	Kinolhepa iwarakha iwe uwaninyu inyu Natito anaaka e ikekhiaye munrimani munopisha ihu. Kinoulhapelhelhani nnema ni mpuha ukhuma wa Nlhuku Athumwanihu ni Kuristo Yesu Moopolhi ihu.
56001005	Wo yoyo nlhatu uyo kahoohiyani Ukirete, wiira nrehelhelhe vakittu vawukuwilhe ni waathanlha ashulhupalhe aholhelhi o milhoko cha attu anonrumelhelha Kuristo kila iwani. Muupuwelheke thoko chenre aka wo ulheherani.
56001006	Wiira ashulhupalhe aholhelhi o nlhoko wa attu anonrumelhelha Kuristo anophwanelhiya ukhalha attu o uhikhuwachiya, akhalheke nlhopwana a nthiyana amoka ni achishaana awe akhalheke anonrumelhelha Kuristo ahikhalhe o hiiwa aamukiaka ama o tiyamaru.
56001007	Ukhalhawaya attu anoshunga nlhoko wa attu anonrumelhelha Kuristo phi o ipilhi yo weemelhelha mitheko cha Nlhuku. Paahi etu, hikhalhe ntu o ukhuwachiya ama o wiititihacha mena hikhalhe ntu o uhipicha uthunalha ama ntu o uhapalhiya ama ntu o waana indewo ama ntu o nlhulha wo uttuna nchurukhu chinene.
56001008	Nansho akhalheke ntu o waapochera alheto ni ntu o uttuna upanga chittu choombone. Akhalheke ntu o wiichaamuka, ntu e ikekhiaye, ntakatifu hinokhuwachiya ni ntu neetawara mwanene.
56001009	Akhalheke ntu novarechesha rata nttenga we ukhulhuvelhiya thoko chinre awe wo wiittuchihiya wiira oorie waahelha nrima attu wo weettuchiha meettuchiho e ikeekhene ni wookokolha attu anovaanyiha.
56001010	Ukhalhawaya ahaawo attu anovaanyiha ni waathepiacha attu akina chittu chihiri ni irusho, athepaka alhe akhumme iphiro cha attu enelhiye unyawo munrimani, Ayahudi anrumelhenlhe Kuristo alhe.
56001011	Amaalhihiyeke yayo attu ayo ukhalhawaya naahiyaka anoothepa waapitikusha nrima attu mmanupani mwonkhaye vaneettuchiha aya chittu chihinooria aya wiittuchiha. Anopangacha chiicho wiira apatte nchurukhu wo wiittuchiha chittu cho wulhiha muru.
56001012	Ata ntu mmoka mmilhokoni mwa anamilhohi aya, ahoolhumacha wiira, “Attu o Ukirete mahuku onkhaye arii attu o woothacha, ari thoko mashene, attu o ureshi ni attu o nlhulha!”
56001013	Ni uyo hohimiechesha we ikekhiaye. Ni wo yoyo nlhatu uyo etu, mwaachacheracheke chinene, upisha nrima waya ulhipeke.
56001014	Ahiyeke wiiwelhelha ithelhi cha Ayahudi mena ahiiwelhelhe malhehero yeeshiye ni attu akhonte ikeekhene.
56001015	Kila ittu iri yorera wa attu orera nansho khiiwo ittu iri yoombone wa attu o nyalha ni o nrima uhinrumelhelha. Ukhalhawaya mirima ni irusho chaya chihonanarihiya.
56001016	Yayo attu ayo aneera wiira anonchuwelha Nlhuku, nansho meetelho aya anowaakhota. Phi attu ahinolhoka mmiithoni mwa ashikhunanaya, o mirima cho itiyamaru, ahinolhoka wo mitheko chiriyoothe chorera.
56002001	Nansho inyuva mweettuchiheke attu malhove a Nlhuku arii phi e ikeekhene.
56002002	Mwaahimerieke ashulhupalhe wiira eethimicheke, akhalheke attu o weewelhelha ashikhunanaya, o irusho, o upisha nrima ni o waattuna attu ni o uvilhelha.
56002003	Ni chiichammo mweettuchiheke manyopani o wulhuvalha wiira amwooveke Nlhuku. Ahikhalhe attu o waapa akhunanaya ama ipotta cho uhapalhiya utheka. Eettuchiheke akhunanaya iphiro choombone,
56002004	wiira aalhake imialhi yaattune manyowannyaya ni achishaana aya,
56002005	yiitimarikheke ni vavawo ahikhalhe o unanara, anopangacha chittu chorera wo manyowannyaya, nlhove na Nlhuku nihiwe naaruwaniya.
56002006	Thothoni tho, mwaamukeke ashimirawo wiira ni ayo yiithimicheke.
56002007	Wo iphiro chonkhaye ni inyu mwaanene nkhalheke ntu o utwarihelhiya wo meetelho inyu oombone. Mwiilhipiheke wo malhove nnetuchiha inyu attu, mena nhipange thoko ncheche.
56002008	Malhove aneettuchiha inyu akhalheke o ikuru ahinoovanyihiya, amalhaponi inyu awe oona ishoni ahikhalhaka ni ittu yo unanara yo unihukumulha.
56002009	Ipotta ni ayo chiicho eetimarikheke wa manyaapwiiya aya aanaaruma ayo, yaatelhihaka wo mitheko chonkhaye chinopanga aya. Ahaanyihanaka,
56002010	mena wiiya nhakhu aya. Nansho, ooniheke nrima woombone ni ukhulhuvelhiya, echonihaka wo iphiro chonkhaye wiira meettuchiho a Nlhuku Moopolhi ihu phi o ikeekhene.
56002011	Ukhalhawaya nnema wa Nlhuku unommwiiha noopo uhopatakulhiya wa attu onkhaye.
56002012	Nnema wa Nlhuku unoniittuchiha hii ukhota nikakata no velhaponi va, nikhalhe wo uhihapalhiya, wo wiitimarikha ni wo uvarechesha ikekhiaye, uno ninthimichaka Nlhuku ninari bado velhaponi va,
56002013	niwehereraka nihuku no mpuha ninokhulhuvelha ihu, vanohalha aya upatakulhiya nthimicho wa Nlhuku mulhupalhe ni Moopolhi ihu, Yesu Kuristo.
56002014	Yoyo aheekumiha mwanene wo nlhatu wihu wiira anoopolhe mu uhilhokani mwonkhaye anihapihaka ukhalha atakatifu awe, attu anovarechesha upangacha chittu choombone.
56002015	Mwiittuchiheke chilha chittu chilha, nvarelhelhaka ikuru inyu uno mwaalheheraka ni waamuka attu anowiiwelhelhani. Ni vavawo hikhalhe ntu hinowiwelhelhani.
56003001	Mwoopusheke attu wiira yaathimicheke aholhelhi ni attu anotawara, yeewelhelheke ni ukhalha rata wo kila iphiro upangacha mitheko chonkhaye.
56003002	Mwaahimerieke wiira ahinruwane ntu riyoothe, nansho akhalheke attu o mpuha ni o wiiwanana. Ni wo mahuku onkhaye yooniheke nrima woombone wa kila ntu.
56003003	Ukhalhawaya khalhayi vawo hii naari attu o uhikhalha ni irusho, o tiyamaru, ni attu o uwonya. Naari ipotta cho nikakata no wiipuhiha no kila iphiro. Nikhalhaka mu uwonyani ni ihache, attu anivengaka ni hii nivenganaka naashineneru.
56003004	Nansho ikatema yo mpuha ni uttuna wa Nlhuku Moopolhi ihu vaapatakulhiye aya,
56003005	ahonoopolha, kuhiwe wo nlhatu uriyoothe wo ikekhiaye waapannge ihu hii, nansho wo ikiriri awe, ni wo iphiro yo Iphumu ya Nlhuku nonivahera wiira niyarie tho ni univaha ukumi wo naanano wo unihapiha mmaashini.
56003006	Nlhuku ahonivaha wo winchiva Iphumu awe wo iphiro ya Yesu Kuristo Moopolhi ihu,
56003007	wiira etu wo nnema wa Nlhuku naalhakelhiye ikekhiaye, niwe naapatta ukumi wo uhimalha unokhulhuvelha ihu.
56003008	Nna phi nulhumo no ukhulhuvelhiya. Kinouthananani inyuva nvarecheshe ulha mwaha ulha, wiira attu onkhaye anonrumelhelha Nlhuku akhalheke ni nrima wo upanga chittu choombone, chinaatelhiha attu mirima.
56003009	Nansho nshembeke malhove o uvaanyihana o uhikhalha ni maana anaacha manyaapwiiya, indewo ni uvaanyihana mwaha unaacha Malhehero. Ukhalhawaya yayo khanlhoka ni mena kharina maana ariyoothe.
56003010	Ntu naaniha attu yoyo mmwamukeke nkwaha wo upacha ni nkwaha wo nayelhi, aahiiweke mummwalhaaneke,
56003011	nchuwelhaka wiira ntu thoko yoyo hopotera ni uwonya. Ukhalhawaya uwonya wawe phi nonhukumulha wiira howonya.
56003012	Vanohalha aka waaruma Nartema ama Natikiko, mwaavieke iphiro yo uwa Unikopoli mmwe naakumaana, ukhalhawaya kiholhakelha uwa ukhalhani wowo nlhaalha wo uririya.
56003013	Mpangeke kila chinohalha inyu wooria, waakaviha ashinna Zeno owiittuchiha Malhehero ni Naapolo, wiira vaneeta aya munkwahani mwaya, ahiwukuwelhiye ittu iriyoothe.
56003014	Attu ihu ni ayo lazima vano eettucheke upanga mitheko choombone, wiira chaakavihere wimma maphepu ittu ni upatta yo waavaha attu anovekelha, ukumi waya ukhalhe wo urera.
56003015	Attu onkhaye anaakhalhana aka va, anouvahani isalamu. Ni isalamu chihu mwaapiihereke manyampwana anaattuna ihu anonrumelhelha Kuristo. Nnema wa Nlhuku ukhalhe vamoka ni inyu mwaatti.
57001001	Mii Paolo kittukiye wo nlhatu wo uvara ntheko wa Kuristo Yesu, vamoka ni munnihu Timotheo, kinoolhepa iwarakha iwe uwaninyu alhoko aka ni namitheko nkhunanihu Filimoni,
57001002	ni wa attu anrumelhenlhe Kuristo anokumaana unupani winyu ni arokorihu Naapiya ni wa Naakipo namitheko nanihu o waatakanelha Malhove Orera.
57001003	Kinoulhapelhelhani nnema ni mpuha ukhuma wa Nlhuku Athumwanihu ni Athithi Yesu Kuristo.
57001004	Kinonshukuru Nlhuku kila ikatema vanolhapelha aka ni uwupuwelhani inyu Nafilimoni,
57001005	ukhalhawaya kinowiiwa nrima urina inyu wo waarumelhelha Athithi Yesu ni nrima wo waattuna attu a Nlhuku.
57001006	Kinonlhapelha Nlhuku wiira nthepeke upisha nrima inyu, mwoorie uchuwelha chinene kila ibarakha irina ihu wo ukhalha nlhoko mmoka ni Kuristo.
57001007	Munna, uttuna winyu uhokiteelhiha ni ukihelha nrima chinene. Ukhalhawaya nhoteelhiha mirima cha attu a Nlhuku.
57001008	Wo yoyo nlhatu uyo etu, mii kikhalhaka munninyu wo ulhutaana ni Kuristo, kaanooria uukhanyererihani wo uhoova ittu ilheheriye inyu upanga,
57001009	nansho wo nlhatu wo uttunani, kinoulhepelhani. Kineera chiicho inakhalhaka mii Paolo ki ntu owulhuvalha, kittukiye wo nlhatu wo uvara ntheko wa Yesu Kuristo.
57001010	Paahi, kinoulhepelhani wiira munkaviheke mwaamwanaka Onesimo, aari mwaamwanaka wo ulhutaana ni Kuristo, kikhalhaka thoko athumwanawe vaari ihu mu uttukiyani.
57001011	Khalhayi vawo aari ntu o uhikhulhuvelhiya uwaninyu, nansho wo ikekhiaye vano phi o ukhulhuvelhiya kuhii uwannyaka vekha ayaru nansho ni uwaninyu chiicho.
57001012	Vano etu kinonhokolhosha tho uwaninyu waakhumme awe, ukhalhawaya vano yoyo ri thoko nrima aka.
57001013	Kahothanana wiira athepe ukhalha ni mii uttukiye aka uno, akikaviheke mitheko cho uhimiacha Malhove Orera thoko chikenre inyu munna.
57001014	Nansho akinookhanyererihani wiira nkikavihe uhuva waka. Urera nrima winyu ukhalheke wo uttuna winyu mwaanene.
57001015	Veekinaka phi nlhatu etu Onesimo aari utayi ni inyu wo mahuku vakani, wiira ahokolhiaka awe okhalhanani wowo mahuku onkhaye.
57001016	Ulha vano kahiwe ipotta tho, nansho o upwaha ipotta, vano ulha mpwana ihu. Hokiteelhiha nrima mii ni we ikekhiaye noowa uuteelhihani nrima ni inyu thoko ntu ri ipotta ni nlhoko ihu muulhutaanani ni Athithi.
57001017	Vano etu mwachuwelhaka wiira mii ki nkavihi nkhunaninyu mu ulhutaanani ni Athithi, mumpochereke etu thoko chikenre inyu wo ukipochera mii.
57001018	Yakhalhaka ahoupangelhani ittu yo uhilhoka ama ahowaashimani ittu, mii kinoulhivani.
57001019	Vaa, mii Paolo kinolhepa wo moono aka kimwanene, kinoulhivani. Nansho akinowuupushani wiira ni mii nkilhiveke ukumi inyu.
57001020	Paahi etu munna, kinoulhepelhani wiira nkipangelheke nenno nlhove nno wo nlhatu wa Athithi, nkiteelhiheke nrima thoko munninyu mu uttunanani nhina Kuristo.
57001021	Ukhalhawaya kinoukhulhuvelhani, paahi etu vanolhepa aka ilha iwarakha ilha, kihochuwelha wiira nnoopanga chilhepenlhe aka uwaninyu chiyo, tho nnoopanga wo uthepa.
57001022	Nansho vamoka ni yayo malhove ayo, nkaaverieke inupa yo uphiyelha, ukhalhawaya kiri muukhulhuvelhani wiira Nlhuku noopochera ulhapelha winyu mwaatti onkhaye ni mii kinoowa kooweetelhelhani wowo uwaninyu uwo.
57001023	Epafra ttukiye nkhunanaka wo nlhatu wo uvara ntheko wa Kuristo Yesu, nouvahani isalamu.
57001024	Chiicho anamitheko nanaka Namako ni Naaristako ni Nadema ni ashinna Luka ni ayo anouvahani isalamu.
57001025	Nnema wa Athithi Yesu Kuristo ukhalheke vamoka ni nrima inyu mwaatti onkhaye.
58001001	Khalhayi vawo Nlhuku ahoolhumacha ni manyaapwiiya ihu venchi wo iphiro chinchi ni wo iphiro ya anamilhohi awe,
58001002	nansho alha mahuku ammalhelha alha honulhumacha ni hii wo iphiro yo Mwaamwanawe, nthanlhe awe wiira chittu chonkhaye chikhalhe chawawe. Ni wo iphiro yo yoyo Nlhuku ahoopa irimu ni ilhapo ni chittu chonkhaye chiriwo.
58001003	Mwaana phi waaria wo nthimicho wa Nlhuku, alhikaanaka ni Nlhuku mwanene, avarelhaka chittu chonkhaye wo nlhove nawe no machiri. Vamalhinhe awe unihapiha uwonya wihu, hokhalha vano wiirimu wiimonono wa Nlhuku o ikuru.
58001004	Paahi etu Mwaana phiri ni ipilhi yulhupalhe waapwaha minepa o wiirimu, thoko nchina vahiye awe ni Nlhuku chiri aya nulhupalhe upwaha machina aya.
58001005	Ukhalhawaya Nlhuku khaneera mena ata wo nnepa wo wiirimu mmoka uriyoothe wiira, “Uweva phi Mwaamwanaka, Lhelho, kinoolhumacha onkhaye achuwelhe wiira, Mii phi Athumwana.” Ni vavawo khanoolhumacha wiira, “Mii kinookhalha phi Athumwanawe, Ni uyo nookhalha Mwaamwanaka.”
58001006	Ni vavawo etu Nlhuku vanonruma awe Mwaana awe o nttara velhaponi, neera, “Minepa a Nlhuku onkhaye anthimicheke yoyo.”
58001007	Nansho wo minepa o wiirimu Nlhuku enre, “Haapanga minepa awe ukhalha iphioo. Ni akarumiya awe ukhalha malhimi o mooro.”
58001008	Nansho wo Mwaamwanawe enre, “Inyu Apwiiya Nlhuku, Ihiche inyu ye Imwene, phi yo mahuku o uhimalha. Ikopo inyu phi naatawara attu inyu we ikekhiaye.
58001009	Inyuva nhottuna mitheko cho ikekhiaye, nhovenga iphiro cho uwonya. Phi wo yoyo nlhatu uyo etu, Nlhuku, Nlhuku inyu, ahoohikani makhura o ipilhi yuulhupalhe waapwaha akavihi ashikhunaninyu, nkamwaattapelhelha chinene.”
58001010	Tho aheera, “Inyu Thithi vaachokhonlhe inyu, mwahoupa ilhapo, Ni irimu ni iyo phi ntheko wo miono chinyu.
58001011	Chonkhaye chiyo chinoovira, nansho inyu nnoolhokelha mahuku o uhimalha. Chittu chonkhaye chinoothalha thoko ikuwo.
58001012	Nnoovilhikacha thoko ngolole, Chinoopitingushachiya thoko ngolole chiicho. Nansho inyuva phi yalhe alhe mahuku o uhimalha, Ulhokelha winyu khunomalha.”
58001013	Nlhuku khaamwirenlhe ata nnepa wo wiirimu awe mmoka wiira, “Ukhalheke wiimonono waka, Mpaka vanohalha aka waathalha amalhaponi inyu wuuthi inyaa chinyu, Wiira mwaanyikalhelhe.”
58001014	Chani minepa ayo phi apani? Yayo phi minepa anorumiya ni Nlhuku waakavihera alhe anohalha woopolhiya alhe.
58002001	Wo chiichammo etu nivarechesheke rata malhove niiwilhe ihu ayo, ahiwe vakani vakani aapotera.
58002002	Ukhalhawaya nttenga waahimiye wo iphiro yo minepa ulhe waahonia ukhalha we ikeekhene. Ntu riyoothe ahaatwanre ama ahaarumelhenlhe aholhiviya we ikekhiaye thoko champhwanenlhe awe.
58002003	Paahi etu ninohalha ukulhuphuwa chani naahinlhohehe noopo mulhupalhe thoko yolha? Athithi anene phi anhimianche yoyo noopo uyo ni alhe yeewilhe alhe ahonihimiechesha wiira yaari ikeekhene.
58002004	Nlhuku ni uyo ahohimiechesha wo mitheko cho ushangiha ni ithikineha chinchi ni waakawelha mahalha o Iphumu awe attu wo uthanana wawe.
58002005	Nlhuku khanaavaha minepa ikuru yo utawara ilhapo inowa inohimiacha ihu iyo.
58002006	Tho, Malhove Matakatifu ahohimiechesha vakittu wiira, “Ntu phi ishiyani mpaka mmupuwelhe, Ntu phi mpani mpaka munlhohe?
58002007	Nhonyeviha vakani apwahiyaka ni minepa, Nhommwariha mphumburu wo nthimicho wo utawara chittu chonkhaye chuupilhe inyu,
58002008	Nhommaha ikuru vachulhu chittu chonkhaye.” Vanohimiya aya wiira, Nlhuku hommaha ntu ikuru yo utawara chittu chonkhaye wo uhihalhiha ata ittu imoka. Nansho vano khaninoona wiira ntu hovahiya ikuru yo utawara chittu chonkhaye.
58002009	Nansho ninoomwona Yesu aayevihiye kuliko minepa wo ikatema ikani, vano athimichiyaka ni uwarihiya mphumburu ukhalhawaya wo nnema wa Nlhuku ahotwaruwa mpaka ukhwa wo nlhatu wa attu onkhaye.
58002010	Ukhalhawaya yahophwanelha wiira Nlhuku noopa ni ushunga kila ittu, anratihe Yesu wo iphiro yo utwarushiya, wiira aawiihe ashaana enchi u nthimichoni wa Nlhuku. Ukhalhawaya Yesu phi noopo a attu onkhaye.
58002011	Yoyo phi naahapiha attu uwonya waya. Ni uyo phiri vamoka ni ayo atakatifu ateelhihiye ayo, onkhaye ayo Athumwanaya amoka. Phi nlhatu etu khanoona ishoni weehana yayo attu ayo, ashilhoko awe,
58002012	thoko chineera awe, “Kinowaahimeria ashilhoko aka nchina ninyu. Kinowiipelhani ichipo cho utotopelhani vanothothokana aya attu anourumelhelhani.”
58002013	Uno eeraka tho, “Kinonrumelhelha Nlhuku.” Nkeera tho, “Mwooneke, Mii kirii va, vamoka ni attu akivanhe awe Nlhuku akhalhe achishaana aka.”
58002014	Paahi ukhalhawaya ashaana ahokaviha mu iphome ni iruttu, Yesu ni uyo chiicho ahokhalha thoko ayo. Ikhalhe wo ukhwa wawe ammulhushe Nakare nonvarelha nookhwa,
58002015	ni wewananiha alhe anomwoova nookhwa alhe, aari mpottani ukumi aya wonkhaye.
58002016	Ukhalhawaya we ikekhiaye khaawilhe waakaviha minepa mitheko chaya, nansho aawilhe waakaviha ashaana a Aburahimu.
58002017	Wo yeyo iphiro iyo etu aheelhikaaniha thoko chiri aya ashilhoko awe ayo, akhalhe Opochera ishaani olhupalhe aya, o ukhulhuvelhiya, o ikiriri munthekoni wa Nlhuku, wiira uwonya wa attu ulhevelhelhiye.
58002018	Ukhalhawaya ni uyo ahovilhelha utwarushiya ni ulhikachiya, vano etu nowooria waavaha machiri attu onkhaye anolhikachiya ni utwarushiya.
58003001	Paahi etu ashilhoko aka, attu a Nlhuku nnomiana mahalha o wiirimu, mmuupuwelheke chinene Yesu, Karumiya a Nlhuku ni Opochera ishaani olhupalhe mu nrimani nnotwara ihu.
58003002	Yoyo aari o ukhulhuvelhiya ni Nlhuku anthanlhe uvara ntheko awe, thoko ashinna Musa vaavara aya ntheko u Inupa ya Nlhuku, attu o Israeli.
58003003	Nansho, Yesu phi nophwanelhiya upatta nthimicho chinene waapwaha ashinna Musa ayo, thoko ntu notheka inupa vanohelhelhiya awe chinene upwaha inupa inene iyo.
58003004	Eiyo, ukhalhawaya kila inupa inothekiya ni ntu, nansho Nlhuku phi thenke chittu chonkhaye.
58003005	Ashinna Musa yaari karumiya o ukhulhuvelhiya mu inupa yonkhaye ya Nlhuku. Ni ntheko aya uyo wahohimiechesha chittu Nlhuku chinowa awe uhimia kaanyuma,
58003006	nansho Kuristo yoyo phi o ukhulhuvelhiya thoko Mwaana neemelhelha Inupa ya Nlhuku, irii phi hii va, nathepaka uvarelhelha chinene mirima chihu ni nikhulhuvelho nineefunelha ihu.
58003007	Paahi etu, thoko Iphumu ya Nlhuku chinohimia aya mu Malhove Matakatifu, “Mweewakaru nlhove na Nlhuku lhelho,
58003008	Nhilhipihe mirima chinyu thoko cheera aya manyaapwiiya inyu, Vaakhonte aya umwiiwelhelha Nlhuku, Nihuku nanlhikanche aya Nlhuku, vaari aya uthakoni nne.
58003009	Wowo manyaapwiiya inyu yahokiphima ni ukilhikacha, Inakhalhaka yahochuwelha chittu chonkhaye chaapangelha aka wo iyaakha makhumi ncheshe.
58003010	Ni mii kahaathunanelha yayo manyaattu ayo keeraka, ‘Mahuku onkhaye, yayo attu ayo anotwaracha iphiro chaya, Mena khachuwenlhe mirima chaya.’
58003011	Paahi kahorushiya, nkakaalhupelha kiiraka, ‘Khannophiya mena unipuroni waka wo wiittuwelha!’ ”
58003012	Paahi etu ashilhoko aka, mwiishungeke rata, hiwe aakhalha mmoka inyu o nrima wo uhilhoka wo uvaanyiha, nkaarukunuwa nkanhiya Nlhuku nkumi.
58003013	Nansho vanothepa inyu wiiwa nna nlhove nna, “Lhelho,” nishomiyaka nhina Malhove Matakatifu, mwaamukaneke kila nihuku. Hikhalhe ntu riyoothe munlhokoni mwinyu o uvaanyiha wo nlhatu no uthepiachiya nkaawulhuwa mu uwonyani.
58003014	Ukhalhawaya hii onkhaye vaa ninokavihana ni Kuristo Moopolhi, nashungereraka rata nrima nivarenlhe ihu toka machokholhelho.
58003015	Muupuwelheke Malhove Matakatifu vaneera aya, “Mweewakaru nlhove na Nlhuku lhelho, Nhilhipihe mirima chinyu thoko chenre aya manyaapwiiya inyu vaakhonte aya umwiiwelhelha Nlhuku.”
58003016	Ukhalhawaya phi apani yayo eewa nlhove na Nlhuku ni unkhota umwiiwelhelha ayo? Kahii phi alhe onkhaye aaholhelhiye na ashinna Musa ukhuma Umisri alhe?
58003017	Nlhuku aathunalhenlhe apani etu iyaakha makhumi ncheshe ayo? Kahii phi alhe aawonyilhe nkaakhwa ni iruttu chaya nkachaawanelha uthakoni alhe?
58003018	Thothoni, phi apani Nlhuku aalhupenlhe awe wiira khanowa mena aphiyaka u nipuroni waya wo wiittuwelha? Kahii phi alhe aakhonte unrumelhelha Nlhuku alhe?
58003019	Paahi etu ninoona wiira khayoonrie uphiya unipuroni wo wiittuwelha wo nlhatu wo ukhota waya urumelhelha.
58004001	Paahi ukhalhawaya nihaawo nlhove no ulhehiya wiira niphiye unipuro no wiittuwelha, niichinanelheke etu, hikhalhe mmoka inyu nohalha uhiphiya wowo.
58004002	Ukhalhawaya ni hii niheewa Malhove Orera thoko aahimeriye aya yayo manyaattu ayo. Nansho nlhove neewilhe aya nno khanaalhonke ittu, ukhalhawaya khayaapochenre nrima thoko attu yeewelhenlhe alhe.
58004003	Ni vano hii ninorumelhelhava, ninoopatta nenno nipuro no wiittuwelha nno. Nenno phi nipuro no wiittuwelha nilhenhe awe Nlhuku venre awe, “Paahi kahorushiya, nkakaalhupelha wiira, ‘Khanowa mena aaphiya unipuroni waka wo wiittuwelha!’ ” Inakhalhaka wiira mitheko chawe chaari chinamanlhe toka vo upiye aya ilhapo.
58004004	Ukhalhawaya Malhove Orera ahohimia vakittu wiira, Nlhuku aheettuwa nihuku no saba, nkaahiya uvara mitheko chawe chonkhaye.
58004005	Tho, Malhove Orera anohimia wiira, “Khanophiya unipuroni waka wo wiittuwelha weeshenre aka uwo.”
58004006	Wo chiichammo etu, nihaawo nipesha wa attu akina anohalha uphiya unipuroni wo wiittuwelha uwo. Ukhalhawaya, ayo yaachokhonlhe wiiwa Malhove Orera ayo vaahimiachiya aya, khayonrie uphiya wowo wo nlhatu wo uhirumelhelha waya.
58004007	Vavawo tho Nlhuku aheesha nihuku nikina nineehaniya “Lhelho” naahimiye toka khalhayi wo iphiro ya Adaudi wiira, “Mweewakaru nlhove na Nlhuku lhelho, Nhilhipihe mirima chinyu.”
58004008	Ukhalhawaya ikaari Nayoshua ahaavaha attu nipuro no wiittuwa nno, Nlhuku kholhumachera nihuku nikina tho.
58004009	Paahi etu nihaawo Nihuku no Wiittuwa nenshe awe Nlhuku wa attu awe, thoko Nlhuku cheettuwilhe awe nihuku no saba.
58004010	Ukhalhawaya kila ntu neettuwa wowo ulhenhe awe Nlhuku uwo homalhiha mitheko chawe thoko Nlhuku chenre awe wo wiittuwa munthekoni mwawe.
58004011	Paahi etu mwaatti niilhipiheke ni hii niwe naapatta nipuro no wiittuwelha nno, hikhalhe ata mmoka ihu nohalha woochelha thoko hummanyaattu aakhonte umwiiwelhelha Nlhuku alhe.
58004012	Ukhalhawaya Nlhove na Nlhuku nikumi, no machiri, no wiithia, ninohoma mpaka nhina minepa ni mirima chihu thoko uphanga wo wiithia unothikilha velhi uno ni uno ni umwalhaaniha vanokumaana itturi cho iruttu ni makhura. Tho ninowaalhuwa uchuwelha moopuwelho ni minikwa cho mirima cha attu.
58004013	Khiiwo ittu ihinochuwelhiya mmiholho wa Nlhuku. Chittu chonkhaye chihopatakulhiya chiri mwaari mmiholho wawe yoyo ninohalha ihu wiivaraanga uwannyawe uyo.
58004014	Paahi ukhalhawaya nihanaa Opochera ishaani olhupalhe kenlhe mpaka wiirimu, Yesu, Mwaana a Nlhuku, nivarelhelheke etu nrima unohimiacha ihu uyo.
58004015	Yoyo Opochera ishaani olhupalhe ihu uyo, honichuwelha uhiichooria wihu. Ukhalhawaya ni uyo mwanene uyo aholhikachiya wo kila iphiro thoko ni hii chineera ihu, nansho nkaakhalha wo uhiwonya.
58004016	Paahi etu, nichusherereke wo uhoova ihiche ye Imwene ya Nlhuku urii nnema, noonelhiye ikiriri nipatte nnema wo unikavihera vanokwana ihu.
58005001	Kila Opochera ishaani olhupalhe nothanlhiya ni Nlhuku munlhokoni mwa attu, ni uvahiya mitheko cha Nlhuku cho waakavihera attu. Ukumiha izawadi ni isadaka wo milhatu cho ulhevelhelhiya uwonya waya.
58005002	Ukhalhawaya ni uyo ntu, no uwonya thoko hii, nowooria waamukacha attu wo ikiriri attu, inakhalhaka khanchuwelha ittu, awonyaka. Ukhalhawaya ni uyo ri o uhiichooria thoko ashikhunanawe ayo.
58005003	Wo yoyo nlhatu uyo etu, ni uyo mwanene uyo noothananiya kuhiwe upochera isadaka cha attu akina vekha ayaru, nansho wo nlhatu wo uwonya unowonya awe mwanene.
58005004	Khaawo ntu neethanlha mwanene ni wiivaha ipilhi yo ukhalha Opochera ishaani olhupalhe. Nlhuku phi nonthanlha kila mmoka ni umwiihana thoko chenre aya wo wiihaniya Naharuni.
58005005	Chiicho etu, Kuristo Moopolhi kheevanhe mwanene nthimicho wo ukhalha Opochera ishaani olhupalhe, nansho Nlhuku mwanene phi nvanhe ni umwiirelha, “Uweva phi mwaamwanaka, Mii lhelho kineera, Mii phi Athumwana.”
58005006	Tho, vakittu vakina nhina Malhove Matakatifu, Nlhuku ahomwiirelha, “Uweva phi opochera ishaani o mahuku o uhimalha, Thoko chaari aya wa opochera ishaani Namelkisedeki.”
58005007	Yesu vaari awe velhaponi va ahonlha ni ukhuwelha vanlhapelha awe Nlhuku, ooria umwoopolha nnookhwani. Ni ukhalhawaya aari ntu amwoova Nlhuku, Nlhuku ahomwiiwelhelha.
58005008	Nansho inakhalhaka Yesu aari Mwaana a Nlhuku, aheettucha wiitimarikha wo uttwaruwa waatwarushiye awe.
58005009	Ni vavawo vaamalhihilhe awe ntheko waavahiye awe ni Nlhuku, ahoratihiya ni ukhalha nlhatu wo machokholhelho o noopo o mahuku o uhimalha attu onkhaye anonrumelhelha.
58005010	Paahi etu Nlhuku ahonthanlha yoyo ukhalha Opochera ishaani olhupalhe mu nkutiro u Namelkisedeki.
58005011	Ahawo malhove menchi o uhimeriani anaacha yoyo mwaha uyo, nansho ahorika uhimeriani ukhalhawaya mwaatti, attu o itiamaru.
58005012	Ukhalhawaya mwaaphwanelhiye ni inyu mwaatti vano ukhalha o weettuchiha akhunaninyu, nansho ni inyu nthananiyaka wiittuchihiya tho malhove o upacha o Malhove a Nlhuku. Vano nhohokolhia tho utulhi, mwaamweke mapelhe ni uhiya ulhia yolhia yo ulhipa.
58005013	Ukhalhawaya nolhia mapelhe yoyo bado mwaana, khanonnuwa, khanachuwelha iphiro cho upanga chittu chinothanana awe Nlhuku.
58005014	Choolhia cho ulhipalhipa chinolhiya ni attu akhomanlhe, eettuchihiye nkayaachuwelha waanyulha mwoolhoka ni mu uwonyani.
58006001	Paahi etu nihiyeke meettuchiho anaacha nttenga wa Kuristo, niweheke vano meettuchiho o ukhomalha. Nihiittuchihe tho meettuchiho o upacha o uhilhokalhoka anaacha ukhoroma ni unrumelhelha Nlhuku.
58006002	Tho, meettuchiho o iphiro iphiro cho ubatiiziya ni o weesheriya miono ni uhihimushiya attu akhwilhe ni mwaha wo ihukumu yo mahuku o uhimalha.
58006003	Nlhuku anivaheraka, ninowa naapanga yayo.
58006004	Ukhalhawaya khinooria tho waahokolhosha wiira awe akhoroma attu amwalhelhiye ni ulhawiha mahalha o wiirimu yayo ni ashikhunanaya, ni upangiya akavihi o Iphumu ya Nlhuku,
58006005	ni ulhawiha uchiva wo Nlhove na Nlhuku ni machiri o ikatema inowa,
58006006	nansho nkayaawulhuwacha mirima chaya kaanyuma, ahooriaka waahokolhosha ni ukhoroma tho. Yayo phi nokhalha aya thoko anonkhomelhelha tho Mwaana a Nlhuku vansalaabani ni umuulhihachiha muru vaattuni vahinohiya aya uwonya.
58006007	Ilhapo inorupelhiya ipulha kila iyaakha ni umelhiha minyepu chinokhulhuvelha aya anamalhima, impatta ibarakha chinokhuma wa Nlhuku.
58006008	Nansho ilhapo yamelhaka miri cho miiwa ni mahichi khirina nnema, inookholhaviya ni Nlhuku. Umalhelha waya unohalha ukhalha upahiya mooro wo mahuku o uhimalha.
58006009	Ashilhoko aka, inakhalhaka ninoolhumacha chiicho etu, ninokhulhuvelha wiira mwaatti nnoottwara iphiro yoombone, iphiro inokelha unooponi.
58006010	Nlhuku khanopanga chittu cho uhilhoka, khanolhiyalha uttuna unopanga inyu wo nchina nawe. Waalhoha ni waapochera attu anrumelhenlhe Kuristo ashikhunaninyu yaawilhe uwaninyu ama anowa alha mahuku.
58006011	Nnikwa ihu mulhupalhe uri umwoona kila mmoka inyu athepaka yoyo nrima wo uminda ni ikekhiaye uyo mpaka umalhelha waya, wiira ayo anokhulhuvelha ihu ayo atimire.
58006012	Paahi etu mwaatti nhikhalhe attu o uhuva, nansho mwaatwariheke attu o upisha nrima ni attu o uvilhelha, mmwe mwaapochera mahalha alhehilhe awe Nlhuku.
58006013	Nlhuku vaalhehilhe Aburahimu, aholhupelha wo nchina nawe upanga chilhenhe awe ukhalhawaya khaawo ri mulhupalhe nkina o umpwaha, paahi etu eromonlhe mwanene.
58006014	Enre, “We ikekhiaye kinouvahani ibarakha chinchi ni uvahani ashaana enchi.”
58006015	Aburahimu ahoweherera ni uvilhelha nkayaapochera nlhove naalhehiye aya ni Nlhuku.
58006016	Ukhalhawaya attu vanolhupelha aya, anolhupelha wo nchina na ntu ri mulhupalhe naapwaha ni ulhupelha waya uwo uhimiecheshaka malhove onkhaye.
58006017	Nlhuku wo wooniha wiira khanorukunusha nlhove nawe mpaka vanotimira aya, ahokhomelhelha yayo malhehano ayo.
58006018	Paahi etu, malhove ari melhi ahinorukunuwa, malhehano ni ulhupelha, chihinooria urukunuwa ni mena Nlhuku hoothachaka vachulhu chechiyo chittu chiyo. Ni hii nittimakenlhe uri mpuhava, nihovahiya nrima wo ukhulhuvelha nlhove nishungiye miholho.
58006019	Nenno phi nlhove ninovarelha ukumi ihu thoko iyuuma inovarelha ikalhava wiira ihiveverushiye. Nenno phi ichikurupi ihu yo ikekhiaye inoperetta nipaziya mpaka nipuro nitakatifu no wiirimu.
58006020	Yesu mwanene honiholhelha wowo akhalhaka opochera ishaani olhupalhe o mahuku o uhimalha, munkutironi mwa opochera ishaani mwa Namelkisedeki.
58007001	Namelkisedeki alha aari amwene o ilhapo yo Usalimu ni opochera ishaani a Nlhuku ri Mulhupalhe Chinene. Ikatema Aburahimu vaahokolhia aya ukhotoni waakottonlhe aya mamwene acheshe yahaakumaanana Namelkisedeki ayo, Aburahimu nkayaavahiya ibarakha ni ayo.
58007002	Aburahimu yahokumiha ni waavaha Namelkisedeki nifungu no khumi no nhakhu waya wonkhaye. Malhamulho o nchina Melkisedeki na amwene o Usalimu nno aari “Amwene o ikekhiaye.” Ni maana aya ikina ikhalhaka “Amwene o mpuha.”
58007003	Yayo Namelkisedeki ayo khanaromolhiya wiira athumwanaya ama anumwanaya ama manyaapwiiya aya yaari apani mena nihuku naya no uyaria ama akhwilhe iyaakhani. Nansho anolhikaanihiya thoko Mwaana a Nlhuku, nokhalha opochera ishaani nkumi o mahuku o uhimalha.
58007004	Phi mwooneke vavawo chenre aya wo ukhalha ntu mulhupalhe, mpaka Aburahimu yahokumiha ni waavaha nifungu no khumi no nhakhu waapante aya ukhotoni.
58007005	Ni iyari yonkhaye i Nalawi iri ni ntheko wo upochera ishaani yahovahiya malheheriyo o upochera nifungu no khumi mwa attu, yaani ashilhoko aya, anakhalhaka wiira ni ayo yaari o iyari ya Aburahimu.
58007006	Nansho Namelkisedeki khayaari o iyari ya Nalawi, nansho yahopochera nifungu no khumi wa Aburahimu ni waavaha ibarakha ayo aalhehiye nlhove no uweherera ibarakha ukhuma wa Nlhuku ayo.
58007007	Nansho khinthikineeha wiira, ntu naavaha ibarakha akina yoyo phi mulhupalhe waapwaha anovahiya ibarakha ayo.
58007008	Paahi etu opochera ishaani anopochera nifungu no khumi ayo attu, anookhwa, nansho Namelkisedeki anaachiya upochera nifungu no khumi ayo, akumi thoko Malhove Matakatifu chineera aya wo uhimiecheshiya wiira khanokhwa.
58007009	Nalawi yaari phi apwiiya aya ayo o iyari ya opochera nifungu no khumi. Eiyo, vavawo ninowooria etu wiira ata Alawi ni ayo ahokumiha nifungu no khumi wo iphiro ya Aburahimu,
58007010	ukhalhawaya inakhalhaka Nalawi aari bado ahinayaria, nansho aari mphomeni mwa apwiiya aya, Aburahimu, ikatema vaakumanne aya ni Namelkisedeki.
58007011	Ntheko wo opochera ishaani waari phi nsingi wo Ikekhia yaavahiye aya attu o Israeli yaacha mwaha wo upochera ishaani. Paahi etu, yakhalhaka ntheko wa Alawi uyo wahotimira, khawaakhalha nlhatu nkhwawe tho wo ukhumelhelha opochera ishaani nkina nottwara nkutiro wa Namelkisedeki kuhii ulhe wa Naharuni ulhe.
58007012	Ukhalhawaya ntheko wo upochera ishaani warukunuwaka, malhehero e Ikekhia o nlhatu wo upochera ishaani ni ayo arukunuweke.
58007013	Ni ayo Athithi, anaachiya mmalhoveni mu ayo, aari ntu o nikosho nikina, uhikhalhaka ata ntu mmoka o nikosho naya aavanre ntheko wo opochera ishaani vamadhubahuni vaakumihiya isadaka.
58007014	Ukhalhawaya ninoona we ikeekhene wiira, Athithi Yesu aakhumme nikosho ni Nayuda, nikosho naharomolhiye ni ashinna Musa voolhumacha aya mwaha wa opochera ishaani.
58007015	Ni nna nlhove nna vano phi no ikeekhene chinene, ukhalhawaya Opochera ishaani nkina o ulhikaana ni Namelkisedeki hokhumelhelha.
58007016	Yoyo khaavahiye ntheko wo upochera ishaani wo uttwara malheheriyo o attu o nikosho nikhumme awe, nansho wo ikuru yo ukumi wo mahuku o uhimalha.
58007017	Ukhalhawaya Malhove Matakatifu anohimiechesha wiira, “Inyuva phi Opochera ishaani o mahuku o uhimalha thoko chaari aya wa opochera ishaani Namelkisedeki.”
58007018	Paahi etu, malhehero o khalhayi alhe ahofutiya ukhalhawaya khayaari ni machiri, aari o uhilhoka ittu,
58007019	ukhalhawaya yayo Malhehero ayo khayaatimirinhe chittu chonkhaye. Nansho vano nihowiihiya nlhove no ukhulhuvelhiya chinene. Ni wo nenno nlhove nno ninowooria umwaatameria Nlhuku.
58007020	Ni uthepa vavawo, vaa nihaawo nlhove naalhupenlhe awe Nlhuku. Ukhalhawaya akina ayo vaavahiya aya ntheko wo upochera ishaani yaavahiya wo uhilhupelhiya,
58007021	nansho vano, Yesu hokhalha Opochera ishaani wo naapo na Nlhuku venre awe, “Athithi aholhupelha, ni ayo khanorukunuwa, ‘Inyuva phi opochera ishaani o mahuku o uhimalha.’ ”
58007022	Wo nenno naapo nno etu, Yesu hokhalha phi neelheva uvarelhelha malhehano ihu orera chinene.
58007023	Tho, yayo opochera ishaani ayo yaari enchi, ukhalhawaya kila mmoka nookhwa awe aayeke, ahokhwa wo uhimalhiha mitheko chaya.
58007024	Nansho ukhalhawaya Yesu phiri nkumi wo mahuku o uhimalha, ntheko wawe wo upochera ishaani uri wo mahuku o uhimalha uhirwaaka wa ntu nkina.
58007025	Ni uyo wo yoyo nlhatu uyo etu, nowooria woopolha kabisaa attu anorwaa wa Nlhuku wo iphiro awe, ukhalhawaya ri nkumi mahuku o uhimalha aalhepelhelhaka wa Nlhuku.
58007026	Ukhalhawaya hii nahonthanana opochera ishaani olhupalhe o ukhulhuvelhiya thoko yoyo ri ntakatifu, hiwonnye, hinanarihiye, enanelhiye ni iphiro cha attu o uwonya, eenulhiye uchulhu wiirimu.
58007027	Hinokhalha thoko opochera ishaani olhupalhe akina aathananiya ukumiha isadaka kila nihuku, anochokholha ukumiha isadaka cho milhatu chaya ashinene ni umalhihera wo uwonya wa attu akina. Yesu khanopanga chiicho ukhalhawaya ahomalhiha veekuminhe awe mwanene isadaka wa attu onkhaye nkwaha mmoka ithoshaka wo ikatema choothe.
58007028	Malhehero anaathanlha attu o uhuperia ukhalha opochera ishaani olhupalhe, nansho wo nlhove nilheehiye ni Nlhuku naatwanre kaanyuma baada yo Ikekhia nihommaha Mwaana timirihiye ukhalha Opochera ishaani olhupalhe wo mahuku o uhimalha.
58008001	Nlhove ninohimiacha ihu phi nna, wiira nihanaa Opochera ishaani olhupalhe o yeyo iphiro iyo, nokhalha wiimonono wo ihiche yo Nthimicho ya Nlhuku wiirimu,
58008002	novara ntheko wa Opochera ishaani Mulhupalhe va Nipuro Nitakatifu Chinene, va nihema no ikekhiaye nithekiye ni Athithi, nihithekiye ni attu.
58008003	Kila Opochera ishaani olhupalhe nothanlhiya apange ntheko wo ukumiha izawadi ni ishaani wa Nlhuku. Ni Opochera ishaani olhupalhe ihu lazima ni uyo akhalhaneke ittu yo ukumiha chiicho.
58008004	Ikaari Kuristo aari o velhaponi va, kaakhalha opochera ishaani ata vakani, ukhalhawaya ilhapo ihaana opochera ishaani anokumiha isadaka wo utwariha chilheheriye ni Malhehero a ashinna Musa.
58008005	Ntheko unopanga aya wo upochera ishaani, phi iramani yo chittu chinopangiya wiirimu. Yayo anolhikaana thoko ashinna Musa vaatameria aya utheka nihema, Nlhuku venre awe, “Mmweheke rata, mwapangeke kila ittu thoko chenre aka wo uwonihani umwaakoni ulhe.”
58008006	Nansho vano Yesu hovahiya ntheko wo ulhoka chinene upwaha wa opochera ishaani alhe, ukhalhawaya vano yoyo phi o weewananiha malhehano arenree. Uno malhove ari nhina yayo malhehano ayo emelhelhaka nlhove nirenree na Nlhuku.
58008007	Ukhalhawaya yakaari malhehano o upacha alhe khayaakhuwachiye, attu khaathananiya ukhalhana malhehano o nayelhi.
58008008	Nansho Nlhuku voonne awe attu ahotteka aamunke wo wiira, “Mahuku anoowa aneera Athithi, Vanohalha aka ulheha Malhehano o Naanano, wa attu o inupa ya Israeli ni attu o Yuda.
58008009	Yayo malhehano ayo khanowa aalhikaana ni malhehano alhehanne aka ni manyaapwiiya aya, Nihuku vaavanre aka moono ni uwoopolha ukhuma ilhapo yo Umisri. Ukhalhawaya khayaavarelhenlhe malhehano alhe, paahi ni mii akaalhohilhe, Athithi Nlhuku phi noolhumacha yayo.
58008010	Ukhalhawaya alha phi malhehano kinohalha aka upanga wa attu o inupa yo Israeli. Athithi aneera, baada yo yayo mahuku ayo, Kinowa kaavaha Malhehero aka mmamirimani mwaya, Kinowa kaahelha mmamirimani mwaya. Kinoowa kaakhalha Nlhuku aya, Ni ayo anowa ukhalha phi attu aka.
58008011	Khaawo ntu nohalha mena weettuchiha achihima we, Ama weerelha alhoko awe, Mwaachuwelheke Athithi. Ukhalhawaya attu onkhaye, ashikaani mpaka ashulhupalhe anowa aakichuwelha.
58008012	Kinoowa kaahiyerera uhilhoka waya, Mena akinowa koopuwelhaka tho uwonya waya.”
58008013	Nlhuku vaalhenhe awe Malhehano o Naanano, Malhehano o Khalhayi ayo ahothalha. Ni ittu yo khalhayi yathaalhaka, ihophiyelha vanorihiya aya.
58009001	Paahi etu ata malhehero o upacha ahaana iphiro cho uthimicha ni mapuro o unlhapelha Nlhuku cheeshiye ni attu.
58009002	Nahothekiya nihema na Nlhuku. Ichuumba aya yo upachera yeehaniya Vakittu Vatakatifu, mweeshiye ikiango yo uthomeiya ikhandiri ni imeza ni mikatte chaakumihiye isadaka wa Nlhuku.
58009003	Vatulhi nipaziya no nayelhi nnihemani mmo yahaawo ichuumba ikina yeehaniya Nipuro Nitakatifu Chinene,
58009004	mwaari imeza yo idhahabu yo ukumihiyeriya ishaani yaatutumiheriya ubani. Tho nahokhalha nsanduku no Malhehano naashiringiye idhahabu kila mpatta. Nhina nsanduku mmo mwahaawo iyoopwe yo idhahabu yaahelhiye yolhia yeehaniya mana, tho mwahaawo ntonto wa Naharuni waaphuwa mathaakhuru vachulhu ni ivibau cho malhuku chaalhepiye Malhove o Malhehano a Nlhuku.
58009005	Vachulhu nsanduku vawo ahaawo o wuupiya elhi o mapupha ooniha vari nthimicho wa Nlhuku, mapupha ayo aakhuneelha vachulhu vawo, vo woonelhiya ikiriri attu. Nansho vano kihii ikatema yo waandhandhulha chechiyo chittu chiyo.
58009006	Paahi etu chittu chiyo chamalheke weeshiya rata, opochera ishaani yahokelha kila nihuku munihema ni, va ichuumba yo upachera ilhe ni uvara ntheko waya.
58009007	Nansho opochera ishaani olhupalhe vekha aya phi aakhelha ichuumba yo nayelhi ilhe nkwaha mmoka kila iyaakha. Ni ayo aathananiya urweha mwommo iphome yo mwannama wo nlhatu wo uwonya waya ni wo milhatu cha attu aawonnye wo uhichuwelha.
58009008	Iphumu ya Nlhuku nonooniha wiira nihema no upacha nne vaari aya ninemenlhe, iphiro yo ukelha urii Nipuro Nitakatifu Chinene no wiirimu yaari bado ihinapatakulhiya.
58009009	Yayo phi malhikaanihero o ikatema yo naanano ahimiaka wiira isadaka ni ishaani chinokumihiya isadaka wa Nlhuku khachinooria waarulha attu misigo cho uwonya mmamirimani mwa attu anonthimicha Nlhuku.
58009010	Ukhalhawaya ulhia ni uwuria ni wiihapiha iruttu, chinaacha mwaha wo mwiiruttuni. Chonkhaye chiyo chinotwara iphiro cho malhehero o chittu cho vatheru. Chechiyo chinoowa chaamalha Nlhuku vanohalha awe ulhokiha chittu chonkhaye.
58009011	Nansho Kuristo wilhe ukhalha Opochera ishaani olhupalhe nowehaweha chittu choombone chipangelhe. Yoyo hokelha mu Nihema nulhupalhe no ukhulhuvelhiya chinene. Nihema nihithekiye ni attu, ukhalhawaya kanihiwe no velhaponi va.
58009012	Kuristo aakenlhe Nipuro Nitakatifu Chinene munihemani mmo nkwaha mmoka nakunshe kuhii iphome yo mwannama wiira akumihe isadaka, nansho aakunshe iphome awe mwanene nkaaniwiihera o noopolha o mahuku o uhimalha.
58009013	Ukhalhawaya isadaka yo iphome yo ipuri ni yo ing'ope vamoka ni ituura yo mwang'ope vaamicheriye aya attu ananarihiye ni milhatu chaacha iphiro cho unthimicha Nlhuku, yahaahapiha milhatu chaya.
58009014	Paahi etu, iphome ya Kuristo ihanaa machiri chinene o unihapiha! Ukhalhawaya wo machiri o Iphumu ya Nlhuku nolhokelha mahuku o uhimalha, Kuristo aheekumiha mwanene wa Nlhuku akhalhe isadaka itiminre. Ni iphome awe inoonihapiha mirima chihu cho uhilhoka chinommwiiha nookhwa, nikhalhe attu anovara ntheko wa Nlhuku ri nkumi.
58009015	Wo yoyo nlhatu uyo etu, Kuristo phi o wiiwananiha o Malhehano o Naanano, wiira onkhaye aneehaniya apochere ibarakha cho mahuku o uhimalha. Ukhalhawaya nookhwa awe hokhalha phi noopo o woopolha attu uwonya waapannge aya ikatema yo Malhehano o Khalhayi.
58009016	Malhehano o uhiyeriya anotimira wo nlhatu wo uchuwania wiira ntu aalhenhe uyo hokhwa,
58009017	anopangia kaanyuma ntu aapannge malhehano uyo nakhwilhe, kuhiwe nari nkumi.
58009018	Chiichammo etu, malhehano o upacha ayo khayooria upanga ntheko aya wo uhikhalha isadaka yo iphome.
58009019	Ukhalhawaya, ashinna Musa aachokhonlhe wo waahimeria attu kila Malhehero yaavahiye aya ni Nlhuku. Kaanyuma nkayaakusha iphome yo mwang'ope ni yo ipuri nkayaathakaniha ni maashi. Nkayaakusha machashi o hisopo ni mapururu o ukhwiilha o ikhondoro, nkayaamichamicha vachulhu ikitabu yo Malhehero ni waamichera attu onkhaye.
58009020	Ni ayo nkayeera, “Ilha phi iphome inohimiechesha malhehano alhehanne inyu ni Nlhuku, nvarechesheke.”
58009021	Wo iphiro thoko yeyo, ashinna Musa ahomichamicha tho iphome vachulhu nihema ni vachulhu chittu cho ntheko wo unlhapelha Nlhuku.
58009022	Eiyo, nhina Malhehero ayo, kharibu chittu chonkhaye chinohapihiya wo isadaka yo iphome. Paahi etu vahirii iphome uwonya khunohiyereriya.
58009023	Chechiyo chittu chiyo phi malhikaaniho o chittu chiri wiirimu chiyo, chinothananiya uhapihiya wo iphiro yo iphome iyo. Nansho milhatu cho ikeekhene cho wiirimu chiyo chinohapihiya wo isadaka iri yoombone chinene upwaha chii.
58009024	Ukhalhawaya Kuristo khaakenlhe Vakittu Vatakatifu vaathekiye ni attu, vanolhikaanihiya ni nipuro no ikeekhene no wiirimu. Nansho aakhenlhe wiirimu unenene, uneemelha awe unilhapelhelha wa Nlhuku.
58009025	Kuristo mena khaakenlhe wiirimu wiira ekumihe isadaka mwanene kila iyaakha, thoko Opochera ishaani Olhupalhe a Ayahudi chinokelha aya u Nipuro Nitakatifu kila iyaakha anakunshe iphome ihiri yawaya,
58009026	ukhalhawaya yakeerelhe chiicho, Kuristo aanotwarushiya venchi toka wuupiya ilhapo. Nansho vano, mahuku vanaatameria aya umalha, hokhumelhelha nkwaha mmoka tu, ekumihe iruttu awe mwanene akhalhe isadaka yo uhiyerera uwonya wa attu.
58009027	Paahi etu thoko chiri aya, kila ntu nokhwa nkwaha mmoka, baada yo vavawo neemelha uuhukumulhiyani ni Nlhuku.
58009028	Chiichammo etu Kuristo aheekumiha isadaka mwanene akhwe vamoka wo nlhatu wo uhiyereriya uwonya wa attu enchi. Ni uyo noohokolhia nkwaha wo nayelhi, uhikhalhaka nkwaha wo uhiyerera uwonya nansho uwaakushani alhe anommweherera chinene alhe.
58010001	Paahi etu ukhalhawaya Malhehero a ashinna Musa phi irungu yo chittu choombone chinowa ukhumelhelha, ahilhikaanaka ni chittu chinenene, chihooriaka waaratiha attu anonthimicha Nlhuku wo isadaka chinokumihiya venchi kila iyaakha.
58010002	Yakaari chiicho etu, isadaka khacheemelha ukumihiya? Chani attu anonthimicha Nlhuku ayo akaahapihiye uwonya waya wo yeyo iphiro iyo, mirima chaya khachoona wiira kharina milhatu cho ummwonya Nlhuku?
58010003	Nansho chechiyo isadaka chiyo chinokumihiya kila iyaakha wo upusha attu wiira ahowonya.
58010004	Ukhalhawaya isadaka yo iphome cho ing'ope ni iphome yo ipuri khachinooria uhapiha milhatu cho uwonya.
58010005	Phi nlhatu etu, Kuristo vaawa awe velhaponi, ahomwiirelha Nlhuku, “Inyu khamwaattunne isadaka mena ishaani ya ashinama, Nansho nhokivaha iruttu ikhalhe isadaka.
58010006	Khamwaachivelhiye isadaka cha ashinama chinopahiya mooro mena isadaka cho uthamiha milhatu cho uwonya.
58010007	Ni mii nkakeera, ‘Mii kiri vaa, kipange mattunelho ao Uwe Nlhuku, Thoko Malhove Matakatifu chilhepilhe aya ukaacha mii.’ ”
58010008	Wo upachera Kuristo enre, “Khamwaattunne mena khamwaachivelhiye isadaka mena ishaani mena isadaka cha ashinama chinopahiya mooro mena isadaka cho uhapiha milhatu cho uwonya.” olhumacha chiicho inakhalhaka isadaka chihimiye ni Malhehero a ashinna Musa, chaari chikumihiyaka.
58010009	Nkeera tho, “Mii kiri vaa, Uwe Nlhuku, kipange mattunelho ao.” Phi chiichammo etu Nlhuku ahothamiha isadaka cho upacha ni weesha isadaka yo nayelhi, isadaka ya Kuristo mwanene.
