58010010	Ukhalhawaya Yesu Kuristo ahopanga mattunelho a Nlhuku, hii vano nihohapihiya uwonya wihu wo iphiro yo ibarakha yo isadaka yo iruttu awe yaakuminhe awe nkwaha mmoka tu.
58010011	Kila opochera ishaani noovara ntheko awe kila nihuku ni ukumiha isadaka chechiyo chechiyo venchi, isadaka chihinooria inakhalhaka vakani uhapiha milhatu cho uwonya.
58010012	Nansho Kuristo ahokumiha nkwaha mmoka isadaka yo uthamiha milhatu cho uwonya, isadaka yo ukhulhuvelhiya mahuku o uhimalha, amalhiheke nkaakhalha wiimonono wa Nlhuku.
58010013	Ni toka vavawo noweherera amalhaponi awe akottolhiye awe aanyikalhelha.
58010014	Ukhalhawaya wo isadaka yeekuminhe awe nkwaha mmoka, ahaathanlha areerihiye alhe, anohapihiya milhatu chaya cho uwonya.
58010015	Ni Iphumu ya Nlhuku nohimiechesha chiicho veneera aya,
58010016	“Athithi aneera, Alha phi malhehano kinohalha aka waalhehana mahuku anowa, Kinowaahelha Malhehero aka mmamirimani mwaya, Ni ulhepa mwiirushoni mwaya.”
58010017	Ni ayo nkayoncherera wiira, “Ni mii akinoopuwelha tho uwonya waya Mena uhilhoka waya.”
58010018	Paahi etu milhatu cho uwonya vanothamihiya aya, khuuwo tho mwaha wo ukumihiya isadaka yo nlhatu wo uhiyereriya uwonya.
58010019	Haya etu ashilhoko aka, nihanaa nikhulhuvelho no ukelha uri Nipuro Nitakatifu Chinene wo iphiro yo iphome ya Yesu,
58010020	wo iphiro yo ulhoka inihulhenlhe awe, inoniholhelha urii ukumi, vari nipaziya nulhupalhe, yaani iruttu awe mwanene.
58010021	Ni ukhalhawaya nihanaa Opochera ishaani Mulhupalhe neemelhelha inupa yonkhaye ya Nlhuku,
58010022	paahi etu nimwaatamerieke Nlhuku wo nrima woombone, wo nrima wo ikekhiaye uratihiye wiira nihiye iphiro cho unanara ni wo iruttu chihapihiye wo maashi oombone.
58010023	Nithepeke etu uvarelhelha nikhulhuvelho ninorumelhelha ihu wo uhoova, ukhalhawaya Nlhuku lhehilhe ri o ukhulhuvelhiya.
58010024	Tho, nikavihaneke hii naashineneru ni wooniha nrima wo uttunana ni upanga mitheko choombone.
58010025	Nihoochee mena nihihiye mwaha wo ukumaanacha vamoka thoko chineera aya attu akina. Nithepeke uhelhana mirima uno nichuwelhaka wiira nihuku na Athithi nihaatameria.
58010026	Nichuwelheke etu wiira, nawonyaka mweni ninachuwenlhe ikeekhene, khiiwo isadaka ikina tho inohalha ukumihiya wo nlhatu wo uhiyereriya uwonya wihu.
58010027	Ittu ihanlhe vavawo iri uweherera noovaka uhukumulhiya ni upahiya mooro wo uviha unohalha waapaha attu onkhaye anonkhota Nlhuku.
58010028	Ntu riyoothe nokhota urumelhelha Malhehero a Nlhuku aavahilhe awe ashinna Musa nowiiviya wo uhoonelhiya ikiriri, yahimiecheshiyaka ni attu elhi ama araru.
58010029	Ntu nonheulhacha Mwaana a Nlhuku ni uheulhacha iphome yo Malhehano a Nlhuku inlhokihilhe ama ntu nonruwana Iphumu ya Nlhuku nonivaha mahalha o ibarakha, yoyo nootwarushiya ntwarusho wo uvirelhelha chinene.
58010030	Ukhalhawaya nihonchuwelha himilhe, “Ulhivelhelhiha phi wawaka, Mii kinoolhivelhelhiha.” Eeraka tho vakittu vakina, “Athithi anowaahukumulha attu aya.”
58010031	Iri ittu yo woopiha chinene, uvariya ni Nlhuku ri nkumi wiira o uhukumulheni!
58010032	Nansho muupuwelheke mahuku avinre vaamwalhelhiye inyu nthuko ni Nlhuku, vaatwaruwa inyu chinene, nansho mwahovilhelha ntwarusho nulhupalhe nno.
58010033	Nkwaha nkina mwahoruwaniya ni uhambulhachiya mwaattuni. Ni ikatema ikina vaakavihanne inyu ni attu aapangelhachiya thoko chiicho.
58010034	Ukhalhawaya mwahoonelha ikiriri chinene attu attukiye vamoka ni inyu, vaathurulhiye inyu mihakhu chinyu mwahorumelhelha wo nrima woombone, nchuwelhaka wiira, nhanaa nhakhu woombone chinene uhimmalha.
58010035	Paahi etu nhikhwe nrima, nnoowa mwaattuviya nttuvo nulhupalhe.
58010036	Mvilhelheke, mmwe mwaatimiriha uttuna wa Nlhuku, mmwe mwaavahiya yaalhehiye inyu.
58010037	Kwaani Malhove Matakatifu aneera, “Mahuku ahanlhe vakani chinene, Nowehereriya uwa, noowa, Ni uyo khanocherewa.”
58010038	“Nansho attu aka anovarechesha ikekhia, Yayo anookhalha akumi ukhalhawaya anokirumelhelha, Nansho yarukunuwaka, Akinowa kaateelhiya nrima.”
58010039	Paahi etu, hii kanihii attu o urukunuwacha utulhi ni upotera, nansho hii phi attu anopisha nrima, ni woopolhiya.
58011001	Paahi etu upisha nrima phi ukhalha ni ichikurupi yo ikekhiaye yo chittu chinoweherera ihu ni urumelhelha chittu chihinapatta ihu woona.
58011002	Ukhalhawaya wo upisha waya nrima ashulhupalhe ihu ahohimiecheshiya chinene ni Nlhuku.
58011003	Wo upisha nrima nihochuwelha wiira ilhapo yo upiye wo nlhove na Nlhuku ni chittu chinoona ihu chi chuupiye ukhuma wo chittu chihinoonia.
58011004	Wo upisha nrima Habilu ahommaha Nlhuku isadaka yoombone upwaha ilhe yaakuminhe awe Kaini. Paahi wo upisha nrima wawe etu ahaalhakelhiya ni Nlhuku wiira aari ntu e ikekhiaye. Ni wo upisha nrima uwo, Habilu noniittuchiha inakhalhaka ahomalha ukhwa.
58011005	Wo upisha nrima, Nahenoko khaakhwilhe aahowiraka ukushiya wiirimu wo uhooniya ni ntu, Nlhuku mwanene phi akunshe. Thoko Malhove Matakatifu chinohimiechesha aya wiira ahinaya ukushiya, aari ntu antelhihilhe Nlhuku.
58011006	Paahi etu vahiri upisha nrima khavanooria unteelhiha Nlhuku, ukhalhawaya ntu nowa wa Nlhuku nothananiya urumelhelha wiira Nlhuku haawo ni urumelhelha wiira nowaattuva attu anomwaavia wo uminda.
58011007	Wo upisha nrima, Anuhu ahomwiiwelhelha Nlhuku vaahimeriye aya mwaha unohalha ukhumelhelha kaanyuma, chittu chihinapacha aya woona. Nkayaakoorosha isafina, ikalhava yulhupalhe yo wookholha anene ayo ni inupa aya. Wo wowo upisha nrima waya uwo ilhapo yahohukumulhiya, Anuhu nkayaapochera ikekhiaye inopattiya wo upisha nrima.
58011008	Wo upisha nrima, Aburahimu ahonrumelhelha Nlhuku veehaniye aya wiira arwee ilhapo yaalhehiye aya ni Nlhuku wiira anoovahiya ukhalha yawaya. Ahohiya ilhapo aya ahichuwelhaka ukittu unokelha aya.
58011009	Wo upisha nrima, Aburahimu ahokhalha ulhetoni wi ilhapo yaalhehiye aya ni Nlhuku mwanene. Aakhanlhe wowo munihemani vamoka ni Naisaka ni Nayakhobo, yaalhehiye nanaya malhehano a Nlhuku ayo.
58011010	Ukhalhawaya Aburahimu aari awehereraka woona iwani yo nsingi wo ulhama mahuku o uhimalha, yaalhakelhiye ni uthekiya ni Nlhuku mwanene.
58011011	Wo nrima wo ukhulhuvelha Aburahimu inakhalhaka aari ntu o wuulhuvalha ni Asara ahanu aya akhalhaka o uhiyara, ahovaheriya wooria waayara ashaana ukhalhawaya ahorumelhelha wiira Nlhuku nootimiriha malhehano awe.
58011012	Paahi etu ukhuma wa ntu mmoka, Aburahimu, aari thoko ntu khwilhe, ahoyaria attu enchi ahinooriya waalhakelhiya thoko ittotwa wiirimu ama thoko nhaava wo uchereshere ibahari.
58011013	Yalha attu onkhaye alha yaakhwilhe anari attu o upisha nrima ahinaya upochera ittu yaalhehiye aya ni Nlhuku. Nansho yahoona utayi, nkayaarumelhelha wiira yaari attu o uvira velhaponi va.
58011014	Ukhalhawaya attu anoolhumacha malhove thoko alha, anowooniha wiira anaaviacha ilhapo ye ikeekhene.
58011015	Yakoopuwenlhe ilhapo yaakhumilhe aya, yaanooria uhokolhiacha.
58011016	Nansho vano anothanana ilhapo yorera chinene, ilhapo yo wiirimu. Paahi etu Nlhuku khanoona ishoni wiihaniya Nlhuku aya, ukhalhawaya heeshera iwani aya.
58011017	Wo upisha nrima Aburahimu ahorumelhelha unkumiha isadaka Isaka mwaamwanaya o vekha awe, ikatema vaalhikachiye aya ni Nlhuku. Yayo phi ayo aapochenre malhehano a Nlhuku, nansho ata inakhalhaka chiicho, ahorumelhelha unkumiha isadaka mwaamwanaya o vekha awe.
58011018	Ukhalhawaya Nlhuku ahoolhumacha wiira, “Iyari inohalha wiihaniya wo nchina ninyu, inowa ukhuma wa Isaka.”
58011019	Aburahimu ahorumelhelha wo uchuwelha wiira, Nlhuku nowooria waahihimusha attu akhwilhe. Ni wo nlhikaaniho nno etu Aburahimu ahompatta mwaamwanaya Isaka tho, thoko nokhuma unookhwani.
58011020	Wo upisha nrima, Naisaka ahaavaha ibarakha Nayakhobo ni Naesau, wo chittu chinohalha uwa kaanyuma.
58011021	Wo upisha nrima Nayakhobo vaakhwa aya ahaavaha ibarakha ashaana a Nayusufu kila mmoka. Nkayanthimicha Nlhuku yooromelhaka vachulhu ikopo aya.
58011022	Wo upisha nrima, Nayusufu vaari aya amwaatameriaka nookhwa, ahoromolha mwaha wo uthama ashaana a Israeli ukhuma Umisri, ni ulhehera mwaha wo ushungiya makhuva aya.
58011023	Wo upisha nrima, manyanaangoro a ashinna Musa yahonvitha mwaamwanaya wo mieri miraru toka vaayarelhe awe, ukhalhawaya yahomwoona wiira aari mwaana o urera chinene, khayoovilhe malhehero a Nafarao amwene o Umisri.
58011024	Wo upisha nrima, ashinna Musa vonnuwilhe aya yahokhota wiihaniya mwaana a abiti Farao.
58011025	Nkayoona mbaya uhuva vamoka ni attu a Nlhuku kuliko wiipuhiha mu uwonyani wo mahuku vakani,
58011026	yaalhakelhaka wiira uruwaniya wa Kuristo Moopolhi phi nhakhu mulhupalhe upwaha mihakhu cho Umisri, ukhalhawaya yaari akhulhuvelhaka nttuvo naya no mahuku anowa.
58011027	Wo upisha nrima ahothama Umisri ahoovaka urushiya wa amwene ukhalhawaya yaari ankhulhuvelhaka Nlhuku hinoonia uyo.
58011028	Wo upisha nrima ahonchokolhiha Pasaka ni aholheehera umichamichiya iphome vachulhu milhako wiira nnepa uneeva attu uyo uhaavare ashaana o nttara a Aisraeli.
58011029	Wo upisha nrima Aisraeli yahoviracha variyari ibahari yo Shamu thoko chinovira aya vakittu voomilhe. Attu o Umisri vaalhikanche aya waattwara, yahotitimira onkhaye mmaashini nkayaakhwacha.
58011030	Wo upisha nrima, Aisraeli ahorukureria ishiri yaarukureria iwani yo Uyeriko wo mahuku saba. Vaamanlhinhe aya urukureria, ishiri yahowulhuwa.
58011031	Wo upisha nrima Narahabu, opani o ulhavalhava alhe, aholhama khayeeviye vamoka ni attu anrunne Nlhuku alhe, wo nlhatu wo waapochera rata attu o uhotelha o mpuha, a Aisraeli alhe.
58011032	Vano mii kiirekeni etu, ukhalhawaya nipesha nna khaninokithosha uuhimeriachani mwaha wa Nagidioni ni mwaha wa Nabaraki ni mwaha wa Nasamsoni ni mwaha wa Nayefta ni mwaha wa Adaudi ni mwaha wa Nasamweli ni mwaha wa anamilhohi,
58011033	yayo phi attu yanrumelhenlhe Nlhuku wo upisha nrima nkayaatakana ikhoto ni waakottolha mamwene, nkayaatawara wo iphiro chaholhenlhe attu atware chaahimiya ni ikekhia, nkayaapochera yaalhehiye aya ni Nlhuku. Nkayaattuka iyano cha akharamu,
58011034	nkayaatipiha mioro cho uviha, nkayookokwaa wo uhithuriya uphanga wo wiithia. Vaahupenrie aya yahohelhiya machiri, nkayaalhipa vaatakana aya ikhoto, nkayaatopora mphingo wo manyaasikari wa amalhaponi.
58011035	Wo upisha nrima manyopani yanrumelhenlhe Nlhuku yahopochera mitembo cha ashilhoko aya akhwilhe chinahihimushiye nansho akina yahohuva mpaka ukhwa ahittunaka woopolhiya wiira ahihimushiye ni ukelha mu ukumi wo urera chinene,
58011036	akina yaholhikachiya wo nihambu ni waatiya mikwaju, akina ahottukiya mittondoro ni utikhelhiya ujerani.
58011037	Akina yahokhwa wo waatakachiya malhuku mpaka ukhwa ni akina yahomianihachiya velhi wo nsumeno ni akina yaheevakachiya wo uphanga. Nkayaarukureriacha uwo ni uwo anawanre marapalha o ikhondoro ni marapalha o ipuri, yaari attu amashikini, yaatwarushachiye ni upangelhiya chittu cho uhilhoka.
58011038	Yayo attu ayo yaari attu yankhulhuvenlhe Nlhuku. Nansho attu o ilhapo ilha yaari o uhilhoka chinene, ata nkayoonia khaphwanelhiye ukhalhana attu thoko yayo. Yayo attu yanrumelhenlhe Nlhuku ayo yaakukuriacha nthakhwani ni mmiakoni, akhalhachaka mmakhukuni ni nhina malhikiti o velhaponi.
58011039	Yayo attu onkhaye ayo ahohimiecheshiya ni Nlhuku wo nlhatu wo upisha nrima waya. Nansho inakhalhaka chiicho, khayaapochenre alhe yaalhehiye aya ni Nlhuku alhe,
58011040	ukhalhawaya Nlhuku ahoneeshera chittu choombone chinene. Aalhakenlhe wiira ayo aphiyelhe utimira waya anari vamoka ni hii.
58012001	Paahi ni hii ukhalhawaya nihorukureriya ni nlhoko mulhupalhe wa attu o unihimiechesha, nirihelheke utayi etu misigo chonkhaye chirina ihu ni uwonya unonikhanyerera. Vanottimakacha ihu uttimakelha mmiholho weesheriye ihu, nittimakacheke wo ukuruvalhelha.
58012002	Nimmwehechesheke Yesu wo miitho melhi, chokholhinhe ni utimiriha upisha nrima wihu. Wo nlhatu wo mpuha unohalha awe upatta ahovilhelha ukhwa vansalaabani wo uhilhoha wuulhihiya muru. Ni uyo vano hokhalha va nipuro no nthimicho, wiimonono wo ihiche yo Imwene ya Nlhuku.
58012003	Paahi etu mmuupuwelheke Yesu chenre awe wo uvilhelha upangelhiya ichimwa ni attu o uwonya, vano etu nhoochee ni ukhwa mirima chinyu.
58012004	Mwaatti khannaatakana ikhoto yo waatakana ni uwonya mpaka nkamwaariha iphome.
58012005	Tho, nholhiyalha malhove o waamukiya, Nlhuku vanoromolha awe wiira mwaatti phi achishaana awe? Vaneera awe “Mwaamwanaka, uhiheulhache vanaamukiya ao ni Athithi. Mena, uhimondhe nrima Athithi vanowookolhaaweni.
58012006	Ukhalhawaya Nlhuku Athithi anoomwaamuka ntu riyoothe nonttuna awe, Noomwookolha kila ntu norumelhelha wiira phi mwaamwanawe.”
58012007	Nvilhelheke vanookolhiya inyu, ukhalhawaya Nlhuku nowookolhani thoko achishaana awe. Mwaana ani hinookolhiya ni athumwanawe?
58012008	Nansho mwaahikavihiyeke wo wookolhiya ni Nlhuku thoko chinookolha awe achishaana awe, inyu vano kanhii achishaana awe nansho ashaana o mwiithuphini.
58012009	Wo uthepa vavawo nahaanaa manyaathumwanihu o velhaponi, attu yaanamuka, nkaneewelhelha, chani vanorika vayi weewelhelha Athumwanihu o munnepani wiira nipatte ukumi?
58012010	Manyaathumwanihu o velhaponi anaamunke wo mahuku vakani thoko choona aya wiira vaholhoka. Nansho Nlhuku nonaamuka wo unookolha wiira nikhalhe mu utakatifu awe.
58012011	Nansho vanookolhiya ihu, ninoorushiya ni uhiteelhiya nrima, nansho mmiholho uwo attu onkhaye aamukiye wo yoyo ntwarusho uyo anoottuviya nttuvo no ikekhiaye no mpuha.
58012012	Paahi etu, nlhipiheke miono chinyu chiririilhe ni ulhipiha makutha inyu aririilhe.
58012013	Nthepeke wookokolha mitalha, nnyaa niremanre nihithepe uwereehiya nansho nilhameke.
58012014	Mwiimindiheke wo kila iphiro ukhalha wo mpuha ni attu onkhaye. Nkhalhacheke makhalhelho matakatifu, ukhalhawaya khaawo ntu nohalha woona Athithi wo uhikhalha chechiyo iphiro chiyo.
58012015	Mwiishungeke chinene ntu riyoothe hiwe aawukuwelhiya nnema wa Nlhuku, hiwe aakhalha thoko mwiri wo uwawa unomelha ni wunnuwa nkawaananariha attu enchi.
58012016	Tho, hikhalhe ntu o ishembwere munlhokoni mwinyu ama ntu o unanara nrima hinomwoova Nlhuku thoko Naesau, aathuminhe ibarakha aya yo ukhalha mwaana o nttara wo nlhatu wo yolhia yo nkwaha mmoka.
58012017	Ni inyu nhochuwelha wiira kaanyuma vaathanana aya upochera ibarakha iyo ahokhotelhiya. Khayaarina tho iphiro yo ukhoroma inakhalhaka yaari onlhaka.
58012018	Mwaatti khamwaaphilhe umwaakoni Usinai thoko Aisraeli chenre aya wo uphiya, mwaako unooria uvariya, mwaako waapharelha mooro, mwaako waakhuneelhiye ni ipiphi, waaruma iphioo yo machiri,
58012019	weewania nipalhapata ni malhove. Attu veewilhe aya nlhove nno, yaholhepelha apepechaka wiira ahiiwe tho nlhove nikina,
58012020	ukhalhawaya khayoonrie uvilhelha nlhove naahimeriye aya wiira, “Ata mwannama anyikalhaka mwaako uyo, noowonyeriya malhuku, wiiviya.”
58012021	Ni yayo onkhaye ayo yaari o woopiha chinene mpaka ashinna Musa aheera, “Kinowoova chinene ni uthukumelha!”
58012022	Nansho mwaatti nhophiya umwaakoni Usayuni, iwani ya Nlhuku nkumi, Yerusalemu yo wiirimu, uri minepa maelufu menchi athukumanne wo mpuha.
58012023	Mwaattiva nhophiya unothukumana aya wo mpuha alhe aneehaniya o nttara a Nlhuku alhe, alhephiye machina aya wiirimu wa Nlhuku, naahukumulha attu onkhaye, ni minepa cha attu aalhakelhiye ikekhia ni Nlhuku.
58012024	Nhophiya wa Yesu o waathaniha o Malhehano o Naanano, o iphome awe yaamichiye, inoolhumacha malhove o urera upwaha iphome ya Habilu.
58012025	Paahi etu, mwiishungeke rata nhikhote umwiiwelhelha noolhumacha ni inyu uyo thoko ayo aakhonte umwiiwelhelha vaamuka awe velhaponi va, yayo khayaakulhuphuwilhe. Ni hii ninohalha ukulhuphuwa chani uno nihimwiiwelhelhaka yoyo nonaamuka ukhuma wiirimu uyo?
58012026	Nlhove nawe nahotikhinya ilhapo yeyo ikatema iyo, nansho vano holheha tho wiira, “Kinootikhinya ilhapo tho nkwaha mmoka, nansho kuhii ilhapo vekha ayaru, nansho ni irimu ni iyo.”
58012027	Nenna nlhove nna, “nkwaha mmoka tho”, ninowooniha mwaari wiira chittu chinotikhinyia chinowa utikhinyiya ni uthamihiya, nansho chuupiye chihinotikhinyiya chiyo chiwe chaahalha.
58012028	Paahi ukhalhawaya ninoopochera imwene ihinotikhinyia, ninshukuruku Nlhuku etu, ninthimicheke ni unteelhiha ni wiitimarikha ni umwoova.
58012029	Ukhalhawaya we ikekhiaye, “Nlhuku ihu phi mooro umpaha.”
58013001	Nthepiheke uttunana ni ashilhoko inyu.
58013002	Nhilhiyalhe waapochera alheto, ukhalhawaya wo upanga chiicho ahaawo attu akina yaapochenre minepa wo uhichuwelha.
58013003	Mwoopuwelheke attu attukiye, mwiichonaka wiira ni inyu nri muuttukiyani vamoka ni ayo. Mwoopuwelheke attu anohuva, mwiichonaka wiira ni inyu nnohuva mwiiruttuni vamoka ni ayo.
58013004	Nthelhi nithimichiyeke ni attu onkhaye, manyottato ni manyopani ahinanarihe nthelhi naya, ukhalhawaya Nlhuku noowa waahukumulha attu anopanga ishembwere ni attu o ulhavalhava.
58013005	Nhikhalhe attu o nlhulha wo uchiviya nchurukhu chinene, nthoshekeke ni chittu chirina inyu, ukhalhawaya Nlhuku mwanene heera, “Akinoulhiyalhani, mena akinouhiyani.”
58013006	Phi vavawo etu vanominda ihu niiraka, “Athithi phi naakhulhuvelha aka, Akinoova ittu. Ntu nohalha ukipanga ittu yaani?”
58013007	Mwoopuwelheke aholhelhi inyu o wiittuchihilheni nlhove na Nlhuku. Mmweheke chenre aya wo ukhalha ni ukhwa, ntwariheke meetelho aya, chenre aya wo upisha nrima.
58013008	Yesu Kuristo phi yoyoyo, nchana ni lhelho mpaka mahuku o uhimalha.
58013009	Nhikukureerihiye ni meettuchiho makina e ilheto. Nnema wa Nlhuku phi nonihelha machiri mminepani mwihu, mena kuhiwe ikano cho chittu cho muulhiyani. Ukhalhawaya attu aatwanre chechiyo mirima chiyo, khayaapantte ifaida iriyoothe.
58013010	Hii nihanaa imeza yo ukumiheriya isadaka, ni ayo anovara ntheko unihemani uwo, kharina ikuru yo ulhia chittu chinokumihiya isadaka umadhubahuni.
58013011	Opochera ishaani Olhupalhe anoorweha iphome ya ashinama u Inupa Itakatifu ukhalha isadaka yo uhiyereriya uwonya, nansho iruttu chinohalha chiyo chinopahiya vamooroni uchereshere ikambi.
58013012	Phi nlhatu etu, Yesu ni uyo ahotwarushiya nkaakhwa uchereshere iwani wo nlhatu wo waahapiha attu uwonya waya wo iphome awe mwanene.
58013013	Paahi etu nihoove, nkanngwe nintware uchereshere ikambi uri awe uwo ni hii nahambulhiye thoko chenre awe wo uhambulhiya.
58013014	Ukhalhawaya velhaponi va khanirina iwani inooria yo mahuku o uhimalha, nansho ninaavia iwani inowa iyo.
58013015	Vano etu, wo iphiro ya Yesu, nngwe nikumihe isadaka cho unthimicha Nlhuku mahuku onkhaye, yaani malhove o untotopelha kila vanorumelhelha ihu nchina nawe.
58013016	Nhilhiyalhe upanga moombone ni ukhalha nlhoko mmoka, ukhalhawaya isadaka thoko chechiyo phi nonteelhiha Nlhuku.
58013017	Mweewelhelheke aholhelhi inyu ni uvara chinolhehera aya, ukhalhawaya yayo phi noshiha uthana ni uhiyu, ushunga minepa chinyu. Ni ayo phi nohalha urweeha malhove anaacha mitheko chaya mmiholho wa Nlhuku. Mweewelhelhaka, anooteelhiya vanovara aya mitheko chaya, khanowoonani thoko nsigo. Mwaahipangeke chiicho, anoochukulhacha, khannowa mwaapatta ifaida iriyoothe.
58013018	Nnilhapelhelheke ni hii. Nihochuwelha wiira mirima chihu khachinonihimeria wiira nihotteka. Ukhalhawaya nihanaa nrima wo uthanana meetelho moombone ikatema chonkhaye.
58013019	Kinoulhapelhelhani wiira nkilhapelhelheke wa Nlhuku, akihokolhoshe uwaninyu mwaatti chitema.
58013020	Nlhuku o mpuha, aahihimushilhe Athithi Yesu Nshunga Mulhupalhe o ikhondoro, wo iphome aya yo malhehano o mahuku o uhimalha,
58013021	kinonlhapelha otimiriheni mu kila ittu yoombone inopanga inyu, wiira ntimirihe mattunelho awe ni uyo atimirihaka inonteelhiha nhina mwihu wo iphiro ya Yesu Kuristo. Nthimicho ukhalhe wa Yesu Kuristo mahuku o uhimalha. Aye.
58013022	Ashilhoko aka, kinoulhepelhani, mpochereke wo wiitimarikha alha malhove o uhelhani nrima kilhepilhe aka wo makhuvi nhina iwarakha alha.
58013023	Kinothanana nchuwelhe wiira munnihu, Natimotheo ahothaphulhiya. Aakuviaka uwa uno kinowaattukana vamoka niwe no ushikuriani.
58013024	Mwaavaheke isalamu chihu aholhelhi inyu onkhaye ni attu awe Nlhuku onkhaye. Ashilhoko ihu akhumme ilhapo yo Uitaliya anouvahani isalamu chaya.
58013025	Ninoulhapelhelhani nnema wa Nlhuku ukhalhe vamoka ni inyu mwaatti onkhaye.
59001001	Mii Yakhobo, karumiya a Nlhuku ni karumiya a Athithi Yesu Kuristo. Kinoowiiha isalamu uwaninyu mwaatti makosho khumi ni melhi amwarelhe velhaponi vonkhaye.
59001002	Ashilhoko aka, nteelhiyeke vanolhikachiya inyu wo kila iphiro,
59001003	ukhalhawaya nhochuwelha wiira nrima inyu walhikachiyaka phi nooria inyu uvilhelha.
59001004	Nansho nkhalheke ni ikekhiaye wiira uvilhelha winyu unoworihani uhikhwa nrima, wiira ntimire ni ukhomalha mpaka umalhelha nhiwukuwelhiyaka ittu.
59001005	Nansho mmoka inyu awukuwelhiyaka irusho anlhepelheke Nlhuku nommaha, ukhalhawaya Nlhuku phi naavaha attu onkhaye wo winchiva ni wo urera nrima.
59001006	Nansho alhapelheke wo nrima wo urumelhelha ni uhichukulha. Ukhalhawaya ntu o uchukulhacha ri thoko mawimbi o bahari anokakhiya ni uveverushiya ni iphioo uno ni uno.
59001007	Ntu thoko yoyo haanyihere wiira noopochera ittu iriyoothe wa Athithi.
59001008	Ukhalhawaya ntu o mirima miilhi, khanooria wiitawara mmakhalhelhoni mwawe mwonkhaye.
59001009	Nlhoko ihu nonrumelhelha Kuristo hirina ittu ateelhiyeke Nlhuku vanommwelhiha awe,
59001010	ni munnihu ntu o nhakhu nrumelhenlhe Kuristo ni uyo ateelhiyeke Nlhuku vanonkurusha awe. Ukhalhawaya attu o nhakhu anowa umora thoko ituva.
59001011	Ukhalhawaya nchuwa vanopharelha aya ni uviha ninoopaha minyepu, ituva chinoonyaalha ni umora ni urera waya wonkhaye unoomalha. Phi chiichammo etu, attu o upuha anoonyalha thoko ituva mu upuhani mwaya.
59001012	Horeeriya ntu o uvilhelha vanolhikachiya awe, ukhalhawaya avilhelhaka ulhikachiya, nowa uttukiya mphumburu wo ukumi Nlhuku alhehilhe awe attu anonttuna.
59001013	Ntu vanolhikachiyaka awe hiire, “Nlhuku phi nokilhikacha!” Ukhalhawaya Nlhuku khanolhikachiya wo uwonya mena khanonlhikacha ntu riyoothe wo uwonya.
59001014	Nansho kila ntu nolhikachiya ni uthepiachiya wo nrima awe wo uhilhoka vanopurulhiya awe ni uwaya mu uwonyani.
59001015	Nrima wo uhilhoka uyo wakhomaalhaka phi nowiiha milhatu cho uwonya ni uwonya uwo wakhomaalhaka, phi nommwiiha nookhwa.
59001016	Ashilhoko aka nhithepiachiye!
59001017	Kila izawadi yoombone inokumihiya ni kila ittu izawadi inokumihiya inatiminre inokhuma uchulhu wa Nlhuku oopilhe nchuwa ni mweeri ni ittotwa chinomwalhia wiirimu. Nlhuku hinorukunuwa mena upitikuwacha thoko mittuuchi.
59001018	Wo uttuna wawe mwanene ahoniyara hii wo nlhove nawe ne ikeekhene nikhalhe o upacha munlhokoni mwo chittu chawe chonkhaye chuupiye.
59001019	Ashilhoko aka nchuwelheke yayo. Kila ntu aalhuweke wiiwa nansho apicheke wulhumacha ni tho apicheke uthunalha.
59001020	Ukhalhawaya ntu o uthunalha khanooria ukhalha makhalhelho o upanga chittu chinothanana awe Nlhuku.
59001021	Paahi etu nhiyeke iphiro cho uhilhokalhoka ni uwonya uriwoothe. Mpochereke wo wiitimarikha nlhove naalhiye munrimani mwinyu ninooria uwoopolhani.
59001022	Paahi etu, mpangelheke mitheko malhove aneewa inyu ayo, nhikhalhe attu o wiiwelhelha nlhove vekha ayaru, ni wiithepia mwaashineneru.
59001023	Ukhalhawaya ntu neewa nlhove vekha aya hoonihaka mitheko, yoyo nolhikaana ni ntu neeweha ikhove awe vakiooni.
59001024	Ukhalhawaya vavawo nowiichoona, nansho athamaka noolhiyalha ikhove awe chiri aya.
59001025	Nansho ntu nohelhelha malhehero atiminre anoopolha attu, ntu nothepa uvarechesha, hikhalhaka ntu o wiiwelhelha ni ulhiyalha, nansho nokhalha ntu o upangelha mitheko, yoyo Nlhuku nommaha ibarakha ni ummaha mpuha wo mitheko chonkhaye chinopanga awe.
59001026	Ntu echoonaka wiira hochuwelha unthimicha Nlhuku, aahitawareke nlhimi nawe, nothepiacha nrima awe mwanene, uthimicha wawe uwo khunokhalha ittu. Ukhalhawaya khanonthimicha Nlhuku.
59001027	Iphiro yo unthimicha Nlhuku Athumwanihu iri yorera ihiri ni milhatu cho unanara mmiholho wawe phi ilha, Waalhoha ashaana akhwelhiye ni manyanaangoro aya, ni waalhoha anankhwelhi mu uhuvani mwaya ni wiichinanelha mwanene wiira hinanarihiye ni chittu cho uhilhokalhoka cho velhaponi va.
59002001	Ashilhoko aka, mwaarumelhelhaka Athithi Yesu Kuristo, Athithi o nthimicho, nhaanyaraphe attu.
59002002	Ukhalhawaya awaaka ntu nawanre ikuwo chorera ni ipete yo idhahabu nnikokhoni mwawe u inupa inyu yo unlhapelha Nlhuku, ni vavawo nkaawa ntu hirina ittu mwommo nawanre matapwata,
59002003	mwanlhohaka ntu warenlhe ulhe ni umwiirelha, Kharibu nkhalheke va varenreva ni vavawo mmwiirelhaka ntu nshikini uyo, Mweemelheke uwo ama mwiiraka nkhalheke vathi vawo,
59002004	chani vavawo khannoona wiira nhonyarapha? Chani khannochuwelha vavawo wiira khannohukumulha wo uholhelhiya ni nrima wo uhilhoka?
59002005	Ashilhoko aka, nkakiiweni! Chani Nlhuku kaathanlhe attu ahirina ittu o velhaponi va wiira akhalhe phi attu o nhakhu wo mupishani nrima anohalha upochera Imwene ilhehiye attu anonttuna.
59002006	Nansho mwaatti khannaalhoha attu ahirina ittu. Anaa attu o nhakhu kahiwe phi yayo anowoonelhani mwaatti ayo, kahii phi yayo anouhukumulhani ayo?
59002007	Ni ayo kahiwe phi ayo anoruwana nchina ninyu no nthimicho na Kuristo nneehanelhiya inyu nno?
59002008	Nansho mwavarecheshaka malhehero o Imwene ya Nlhuku ihimiye ni Malhove Matakatifu aneera, “Mwaattuneke amwatamana inyu thoko chineettuna inyu mwaanene.” Wo ikekhiaye, vavawo nnoopanga ittu yoombone.
59002009	Nansho mwaanyaraphaka nhowonya, Malhehero anouhukumulhani wiira nhotteka.
59002010	Ukhalhawaya ntu awonyaka ata nlhove nimoka nhina Malhehero a Nlhuku, howonya Ikekhia yonkhaye.
59002011	Ukhalhawaya yoyo eerilhe “Nhilhavelhave” uyo, phi yoyo enre, “Nhiive.” Paahi etu inakhalhaka khannolhavalhava nansho nheeva, nhowonya Malhehero onkhaye.
59002012	Paahi etu mulhumacheke ni waaweha attu thoko attu anohalha uhukumulhiya ni Malhehero anooria unihiyerera.
59002013	Nlhuku khanowa aamwonelha ikiriri ntu hirina ikiriri. Nansho attu o ikiriri khanoova uhukumulhiya ni Nlhuku, ukhalhawaya ikiriri ya Nlhuku inoopwaha ihukumu.
59002014	Ashilhoko aka, inoreerani ntu vaneera awe noopisha nrima nansho hoonihaka wo mitheko choombone? Chani yoyo nrima uyo unowa umoopolha?
59002015	Ikhalhe wiira haawo munnihu mmoka ama mwanrokorihu mmoka noowolhiya ithalha ama hothalhelhiya.
59002016	Vanorera chani weerelha yayo, “Nlhuku ovaherekeni! Nrweeke wo mpuha mwootteke mooro, mwalhieke nnoowona, wo uhimmaha ittu iriyoothe yo unkavihera mwiiruttuni mwawe?”
59002017	Paahi etu upisha nrima vekha aya wo uhooniha mitheko yoyo uhokhwa.
59002018	Nansho ntu nowooria wiira, “Inyu nhanaa nrima, ni mii kihanaa mitheko.” Eiyo nkooniheke etu nrima inyu uhiri ni ntheko uyo, ni mii kinowoonihani nrima wo mitheko chaka.
59002019	Inyu nnorumelhelha wiira Nlhuku ri mmoka tu. Aye! Nansho ata mashoka o unanara ni chiyo chinomoova yoyo ni unthukumelha.
59002020	Nhopwapwa inyu! Chani mwoonihiyeke wiira nrima wo uhikhalha mitheko uhokhwa?
59002021	Apwiiya Aburahimu aalhakelhelhiye chani wiira ahovarechesha ikekhia mmiholho wa Nlhuku? Wo nlhatu wo mitheko chaya vankuminhe aya isadaka yo upahiya mwaamwanaya Isaka vamadhubahuni vo ukumiheriya isadaka.
59002022	Paahi etu mwooneke vavawo wiira upisha nrima waya wahoonia wo mitheko chaya ni vavawo nrima uyo wahokhomaalhihiya.
59002023	Paahi Malhove Matakatifu yahotimira venre aya, “Aburahimu ahonrumelhelha Nlhuku. Ni wo nrima waya ahoonia wiira ahopanga chittu chinothanana awe Nlhuku.” Nkayeehaniya ampwana awe Nlhuku.
59002024	Haya etu nchuwelheke wiira ntu naalhakelhiya wiira hovarechesha ikekhia mmiholho wa Nlhuku wo mitheko chawe kuhii wo upisha nrima vekha ayaru.
59002025	Yaari thoko chiichammo wa Narahabu, nthiyana o ulhavalhava ulhe. Ahaalhakelhelhiya wiira ahovarechesha ikekhia mmiholho wa Nlhuku wo nlhatu wo mitheko chawe, vaapochenre awe akarumiya o uhotelha aakihaka wo waaviriha iphiro chikina.
59002026	Paahi etu thoko vari aya iruttu ihimmumulha ihokhwa, phiri aya chiichammo nrima uhinooniha mitheko uhokhwa.
59003001	Ashilhoko aka, nhihuvelhe ukhalha owiittuchiha enchi munlhokoni mwinyu. Nchuwelheke wiira hii owiittuchiha va ninowa uhukumulhiya wo uweria chinene waapwaha attu akina ayo.
59003002	Ukhalhawaya hii onkhaye va phi attu ninokwakwathuwa wo iphiro chinchi. Nansho ntu hinotteka wo nulhumo nawe, yoyo horeeriya wo kila ittu, nowooria utawara iruttu awe yonkhaye.
59003003	Mwooneke, wiira ninowaattuka ifarasi uwano ikipande yo yuuma ittukiye mikhoyi wiira chiniiwelhelhe noorie urukunusha iruttu chaya ni waarweha uriwoothe unothanana ihu.
59003004	Tho, mwooneke ikalhava chineera aya. Inonnuwaka chani ni weeta chikakhiyaka ni iphioo yo machiri, chinookolhelhiya iphiro wo mpondo mwankani unovara awe ntu neetiha uyo wookolha urweha unothanana awe.
59003005	Nlhimi ninno chiicho, itturi ikaani mwiiruttuni, nansho ninowiishipa wo upanga chittu chulhupalhe. Mooro chiicho, mwooneke, unakhalha vakani, unowooria upaha ithuphi yuulhupalhe chinene!
59003006	Nlhimi ninno chiicho niri thoko mooro. Itturi ikani mwiilhaponi iri mwiiruttuni mwihu, ichanre milhatu cho uwonya, inoninanariha iruttu yonkhaye ni unipaha mooro ukumi ihu wonkhaye. Ukhalhawaya unoparihelhiya ni mooro unokhuma Ujehannamu unenene.
59003007	Ntu nowooria waahuwa ashinama o kila nikosho. Nowooria waahuwa ashinama o umwiini, waahuwa ashinuni, waahuwa anaakoko ni waahuwa ashinama o mmashini.
59003008	Nansho khaawo ntu nooria uhuwa nlhimi, ukhalhawaya nlhimi niri no uwonya uhintawaria, nihochara uhapalha uneeva.
59003009	Wo nlhimi ninontotopelha Nlhuku Athumwanihu. Ni wo nlhimi nenno ninowaalhava attu yuupiye wo ikhove ya Nlhuku.
59003010	Ashilhoko aka khavanorera mmalhakuni nkhume malhove o waatotopelha attu moombone ni malhove o waalhava attu. Ashilhoko aka uwaninyu mwaatti ihikhalhe chiicho.
59003011	Chani nrapo nimoka ninowooria uthekhuma maashi o uririya ni maashi o maakha?
59003012	Ashilhoko aka, chani mwembe unowooria wimma ikokho? Ama nzabibu unowooria uyara ittini? Khavanooria! Chiichammo etu nrapo no maashi o maakha khaninthekhuma maashi o uririya.
59003013	Chani mpani ri ni irusho ni o uchuwelha munlhokoni mwinyu? Paahi etu ooniheke chechiyo wo meetelho oombone ni wo mitheko chorera chinopangia wo wiitimarikha ni wo irusho.
59003014	Nansho mwakhalhaka ni nrima uchanre ihache ni ichimwa ni wiichoona, nhilhikache ukhuneelha ikeekhene wo wiititihachera irusho chinyu.
59003015	Irusho thoko chechiyo khachinokhuma wiirimu nansho cha attu o mwiilhaponi momu, khachihii cho Iphumu ya Nlhuku, chinokhuma wa Nakare.
59003016	Ukhalhawaya varii ihache ni wiichoona, vavawo vahochara injarare ni kila mitheko cho uwonya.
59003017	Nansho irusho chinokhuma wiirimu, chiri chorera, tho chinottuna mpuha, tho cho wiitimarikha, tho cho ikiriri ni cho uwiiha mitheko choombone. Khachinanarilhe nrima mena khachiri cho nrima wo unafiki.
59003018	Attu anaalha mu ikekhiani, anokhungura chittu cho mu mumpuhani.
59004001	Anaa indewo ni uhiiwananiya munlhokoni mwinyu mmo chinokhuma vayi? Chani khachimmwiihiya ni itama inoothemwihani mwiiruttuni mwinyu iyo?
59004002	Nnoothanana upatta ittu, nansho ukhalhawaya khannopatta, paahi etu nnowiiva ni woona ihache. Phi naatakana inyu indewo nansho khannopatta ittu inothanana inyu ukhalhawaya khannonlhepelha Nlhuku.
59004003	Vanonlhepelha inyu Nlhuku vawo khannopatta ukhalhawaya nnolhepelha wo nrima wo uhilhoka. Nnolhepelha wiira mmwonihiye itama chinyu.
59004004	Inyu mwaati o ulhuva va! Khanchuwenlhe wiira uttuna chittu cho mwiilhaponi mu phi wiipanga amalhaponi a Nlhuku? Paahi etu ntu nottuna chittu cho mwiilhaponi yoyo heepanga mmalhaponi a Nlhuku.
59004005	Paahi etu nhaanyihere wiira Malhove Matakatifu anoolhumacha malhove o uhikhalha maana vaneera aya, “Nlhuku nowoona ihache chinene wo Iphumu yenshe awe mwiiruttuni mwihu.”
59004006	Nansho Nlhuku honivaha nnema mulhupalhe chinene, thoko chilhepiye aya wiira, “Nlhuku nowaavenga attu o mahuchuru, nansho nowaavaha nnema mulhupalhe attu o wiitimarikha.”
59004007	Paahi etu mmwiiwelhelheke Nlhuku. Munvingeke Nakare ni uyo nowuttawani.
59004008	Mmwaatamerieke Nlhuku ni uyo nowaatameriani. Mwiihapiheke mathatha inyu, mwaatti o uwonya va! Nkwecheke mirima chinyu, mwaatti o mirima miilhi va!
59004009	Nchukulheke, munlheke ni wiichunlhelha. Uthiaa winyu uthathuweke nunlhiho ni mpuha winyu uthathuweke ukhalha wiichunlhelha.
59004010	Nkhalheke wo wiitimarikha mmiholho wa Athithi, ni ayo anoutheeshani.
59004011	Ashilhoko aka, nhootheriane mwaashineneru. Nomwootheria ama unhukumulha nhima awe, yoyo hootheria ni uhukumulha Ikekhia ya Nlhuku. Nansho mwahukumulhaka Malhehero, paahi inyuva vavawo khannovara ikekhia, nnowiira uhukumulha.
59004012	Nlhuku vekha awe phi neemesha Ikekhia ni uhukumulha. Vekha awe phi noopolha ni wiiva. Vano inyu phi apani nnaahukumulha akhunaninyuva?
59004013	Paahi nkiiwelhelheke vano, mwaatti nneera, “Lhelho ama meelho ninoorwaa ilha iwani ilha ama ikina, nirwee nakhalheke wowo iyaakha imoka, napange maronda ni upatta ifaida.”
59004014	Mwaatti khanchuwenlhe chinohalha aya ukhalha meelho! Ukhalhawaya mwaatti nri thoko ittapwe inoonia wo ikatema ikhuvi nansho kaanyuma inoowalhawalha.
59004015	Mwaatti nnophavelhiya wiira, “Nlhuku Athithi attunaka, ninookhalha akumi ni upanga ilha ni ilha.”
59004016	Nansho mwaatti vano nnowiishipa ni wiichoona. Wowo wiititihacha wonkhaye uwo uri wo uhilhoka.
59004017	Paahi etu, ntu chuwenlhe upanga morera nansho hipangaka, yoyo howonya.
59005001	Vano etu, nkakiiweni mwaatti attu o nhakhuva! Munlheke ni wiichukulhelha wo nlhatu wo uhuva unowa uri mmiholho winyu.
59005002	Nhakhu inyu uhoonta ni ikuwo chinyu chihovariya ikutihi.
59005003	Idhahabu ni nchurukhu winyu chiholhiya nrenje. Ni nenno nrenje nno phi nohalha uhimiecheshani milhatu ni upaha iruttu chinyu thoko mooro. Nheeshungera nhakhu wo mahuku o umalhelha alha.
59005004	Nkeewani! Khamwalhivilhe anamitheko avanre mitheko mmamatani mwinyu. Nkeewelhelhani chineera aya wo wunlha chiyo! Ikutto chaya chihaaphiyelha Athithi o Ikuru!
59005005	Nhokhalha mwiilhaponi wo wiiphwacha ni wiiteelhiha chinene. Nhoneneviha mirima chinyu ni ukhalha thoko mwannama noweherera nihuku no uhithiya.
59005006	Nhonhukumulha ntu e ikekhiaye ni umwiiva ntu huwirinheni ittu.
59005007	Paahi etu ashilhoko aka, nvilhelheke mpaka nihuku no uhokolhia Athithi. Mmwooneke namalhima chinoweherera awe cholhia mmatani mwawe wiira chikhomaalhe, nooweherera avilhelhaka toka ntipashilhe mpaka umalha nlhaalha ipulha vanorupa aya velhaponi.
59005008	Ni inyu mwaatti nvilhelheke chiicho. Mweemelheke rata chinene munrimani, ukhalhawaya nihuku no uwa Athithi nihaatameria.
59005009	Ashilhoko aka, nhitukutuwache mwaashineneru, nhiwe mwaahukumulhiya. Nchuwelheke wiira, mwaanyulha uyo ri vankhorani.
59005010	Ashilhoko aka mwoopuwelheke anamilhohi oolhumacha nttenga ukhuma wa Athithi, mwooneke chera aya wo uvilhelha mu uhuvihiyani, ni inyu mwaatwariheke yayo etu.
59005011	Nineehana yayo attu o upuha ukhalhawaya ari o uvilhelha. Nheewa mwaatti uvilhelha wa ashinna Ayubu, nchuwelhaka chenre aya wo upangelhiya ni Athithi wo umalha waya. Ukhalhawaya Athithi phi o rera nrima ni o ikiriri.
59005012	Upwaha chonkhaye chiyo, ashilhoko aka, nhilhupelhe vanolheha inyu ittu! Nhilhupelhe wo uromolha irimu mena ilhapo mena ittu ikina iriyoothe. Mwiireke Eiyo, mwathananaka wiira Eiyo. Mwiireke Kihiwe vanothanana inyu wiira Kihiwe. Nhiwe mwaahukumulhiya ni Nlhuku.
59005013	Yakhalhaka haawo ntu riyoothe nohuva munlhokoni mwinyu, anlhapelheke Nlhuku. Ama yakhalhaka hawo ntu o nrima wo nopuha, yoyo eepeke ichipo cho untotopelha Nlhuku.
59005014	Chani haawo nreta munlhokoni mwinyu? Yoyo ehaneke ashulhupalhe o nlhoko wa attu anrumelhenlhe Kuristo, awe anlhapelhelha ni unhika makhura wo nchina na Athithi.
59005015	Ukhalhawaya ulhapelha wo nrima unonlhamiha nreta. Athithi anonhokolhoshera machiri tho nreta uyo, noolhama. Ni vavawo yakhalhaka howonya noohiyereriya uwonya wawe.
59005016	Paahi etu nkhoromelhaneke uwonya winyu mwaashineneru, nlhapelhelhaneke wiira nlhamihiye. Ukhalhawaya ulhapelha wo ntu nopanga moombone thoko chinothanana awe Nlhuku uhanaa machiri o upanga chittu chinchi, alhapelhaka wo ukuruvalhelha.
59005017	Naeliya yaari o makhalhelho anolhikaana thoko hii. Yayo aholhapelha wo ukuruvalhelha wiira ipulha ihirupe, ni iyo khayaarumpe velhaponi wo iyaakha taaru ni nusu.
59005018	Yamalheke nkayaalhapelha tho, irimu nkayaattukuwa ipulha nkayaarupa, ilhapo nkayaamelha cholhia.
59005019	Ashilhoko aka, ntu mmoka arukunuwaka ni uhiya ikeekhene ya Nlhuku ni ntu nkina anhokolhoshaka,
59005020	nchuwelheke wiira, ntu nonhokolhosha ntu nkina wi ikeekhene ya Nlhuku, nowoopolha ukumi wa yoyo ntu uyo unookhwani ni uhiyereriya uwonya wawe winchi.
60001001	Mii Peturo, karumiya awe Yesu Kuristo, Kinoowiiha iwarakha uwaninyu mwaatti attu nthanlhiye ni Nlhuku, mmwareelhe nkhalhaka thoko alheto ilhapo cho Uponto ni Ugalatiya ni Ukapadokiya ni Uasiya ni Ubithiniya.
60001002	Nlhuku Athithi ahoukumihani mwaatti wo uttuna wawe, nkamwaahapihiya wo Iphumu awe, mmwe mwanrumelhelha Yesu Kuristo ni uhapihiya wo iphome awe. Kinoulhapelhelhani nnema ni mpuha mwinchi.
60001003	Atotopelhiye Nlhuku, Athumwanaya Athithi Yesu Kuristo! Ukhalhawaya wo ikiriri awe yulhupalhe honiyara wo nayelhi wo unhihimusha Yesu Kuristo nnookhwani. Honivaha nikhulhuvelho no ukumi,
60001004	ninoweherera ihu upatta. Nhakhu uhinonta ama unanara ama uwalhawalha ushungiye wa attu awe. Nnema unishungenre awe Nlhuku wiirimu.
60001005	Ni inyu mwaatti nnoshungiya wo machiri a Nlhuku wo upisha nrima mpaka vanohalha inyu upatakulhelhiya noopo vanohalha aya umalha mahuku.
60001006	Nteelhiyeke wo yoyo nlhatu uyo, inakhalhaka vano, wo ikatema ikani nnokhalha nchukulhaka ni uttwaruwa wo ulhikachiya wo iphiro chinchi.
60001007	Ulhikachiya winyu uwo uri wo nlhatu wo uhimiechesha ikekhiaye yo nrima inyu, ukhalhawaya ata nlhuku no idhahabu, ninolhiya nrenje, ninolhikachiya vamooroni. Chiicho etu, mirima chinyu chinokhulhuvelhiya upwaha idhahabu, chinolhikachiya wiira chikhomaalhihiye. Umalhelha waya uwe waakhalha utotopelhiya ni uthimichiya ni uvahiya nthimicho nihuku Yesu Kuristo vanohalha awe upatakulhiya.
60001008	Mwaatti nnonttuna inakhalhaka khannapacha umwoona, munrumelhelhaka inakhalhaka khannomwoona. Paahi nnoteelhiya chinene wo nthimicho mwinchi uhinooria uhimiachiya,
60001009	ukhalhawaya nhopochera nttuvo no upisha nrima winyu, niri phi nlhatu wo woopolhiya winyu.
60001010	Wo yoyo noopo uyo etu, anamilhohi ahaaviavia ni ukohakoha chinene mwaha wo yoyo nnema wo uhiyereriya uwonya waalhohenre aya uyo, unohalha inyu uvahiya mwaatti ni Nlhuku.
60001011	Nkayaalhikacha ukoherera ikatema yaani ni iphiro chinohalha aya uwa. Yaani ikatema yaahimiye ni Iphumu ya Kuristo irii nhina mwaya vaahimmie aya ntwarusho unohalha awe upatta ni nthimicho unowa awe upatta.
60001012	Nlhuku ahaapatakulhelha anamilhohi wiira mitheko chaya khachari wo nlhatu wayaru, nansho wo nlhatu ninyu mwaatti thoko chihimiye ni Malhove Orera wo machiri o Iphumu ya Nlhuku ukhuma wiirimu. Ittu inothanana aya ata minepa o wiirimu wiiwa yoyo mwaha uyo.
60001013	Paahi etu, irusho chinyu chikhalheke tayari, nhiittialhe, nshiheke. Nkhulhuvelheke nnema uriyoothe nnohalha inyu uvahiya ikatema Yesu Kuristo vanohalha awe uwa tho.
60001014	Nkhalheke o wiiwelhelha thoko ashaana a Nlhuku, nhittwarettware tho nikakata no uhilhoka mwaarina inyu ikatema vaari inyu nhichuwelhaka ikeekhene ya Nlhuku.
60001015	Nansho meetelho inyu akhalheke matakatifu thoko Nlhuku owihanneni chiri awe.
60001016	Ukhalhawaya Malhove Matakatifu aholhepiya wiira, “Nnokhalha atakatifu ukhalhawaya ni Mii ki ntakatifu.”
60001017	Mwaatti vanonlhapelha inyu Nlhuku, nnomwiihana Thithi. Paahi etu nchuwelheke wiira yoyo phi nonhukumulha kila ntu wo uhimmweha wiitho wo mitheko chipannge awe. Paahi etu, nkhalheke rata mwiilhaponi mmwoovaka Nlhuku.
60001018	Ni inyu mwaatti nchuwelheke wiira khamwoopolhiye ukhuma mu uwonyani wo chittu chinotanganyia, wo nchurukhu mena idhahabu, wiira mwoorie ukhuma uri meetelho inyu uhinlhoka mpochenre inyu wa manyaapwiiya inyu.
60001019	Nansho mwoopolhiye wo iphome itakatifu ya Yesu Kuristo, Mwaana o Khondoro o uhiremara mena nrottelha.
60001020	Yoyo phi athanlhiye ni Nlhuku ilhapo ihanaya wuupiya, nkaapatakulhiya mahuku ammalhelha alha wo nlhatu winyu mwaatti.
60001021	Wo iphiro awe, nnonrumelhelha Nlhuku anhihimunshe ni ummaha nthimicho. Paahi etu nrima ni ukhulhuvelha winyu ukhalheke wa Nlhuku.
60001022	Ukhalhawaya vano nheehapiha nhokhalha atakatifu wo urumelhelha winyu ikeekhene, paahi etu kila mmoka anttuneke nlhoko awe wo nrima woombone wo uhikhalha unafiki ni uttunana mwaashineneru.
60001023	Ukhalhawaya wo iphiro yo nlhove nikumi na Nlhuku no mahuku o uhimalha, mwaatti nhoyaria tho, nhikhalhaka thoko nnyepu wo imbeyu inokhwa, nansho imbeyu yo ukumi.
60001024	Thoko Malhove Matakatifu chinohimia aya wiira, “Kila ntu ri thoko nthaakhuru, Nthimicho wawe wonkhaye uri thoko ituva. Ukhawalhaya mathaakhuru anoonyalha ni ituva chinoomora.
60001025	Nansho Nlhove na Athithi ninlhokelha mahuku o uhimalha.” Ni nenno nlhove nno phi Malhove Orera ahimeriye inyu.
60002001	Paahi etu nhiyeke uwonya uriwoothe ni woothacha ni unafiki ni ihache ni nulhumo no uruwana.
60002002	Nkhalheke thoko ashaana ashikaani ayarelhe naanano, chinophavelha aya mapelhe, ni inyu chiicho mphavelheke mapelhe o uhithakanihiya o Iphumu ya Nlhuku, ikhalhe wiira mwawuriaka yayo munnuwe ni woopolhiya.
60002003	Thoko Malhove Matakatifu chinohimia aya, “Nhochuwelha vano wiira, Athithi phi orera.”
60002004	Mmweeke wa Athithi, nlhuku nikumi naakhotiye na attu nansho Nlhuku nkaathanlha nenno wiira phi nlhuku no ukhulhuvelhiya.
60002005	Ni inyu mmweeke thoko malhuku makumi athanlhiye utheka inupa yo Iphumu ya Nlhuku, nkhalhaka opochera ishaani atakatifu anokumiha isadaka cho munnepani chonteelhiha Nlhuku wo iphiro ya Yesu Kuristo.
60002006	Ukhalhawaya Malhove Matakatifu aholhepiya wiira, “Mwooneke! Kinoweemesha nlhuku no ukhulhuvelhiya Usayuni, Nlhuku no nsingi no vakhoonani nithanlhiye, Ni kila ntu nonrumelhelha yoyo khanoolhiya muru.”
60002007	Paahi etu uwaninyu mwaatti nnorumelhelhava, nna nlhuku nna phi no ukhulhuvelhiya thoko Malhove Matakatifu chinohimia aya. Nansho wa attu ahinrumelhelha “Nlhuku nikhotilhe aya atheki wiira khaninlhoka Nihothathuwa vano ukhalha phi nlhuku no ukhulhuvelhiya no nsingi no ukhulhuvelhiya.”
60002008	Tho vakittu vakina Malhove Matakatifu aneera, “Nna phi nlhuku ninokwakwathuwa aya attu, Mwalha unaawulhusha attu.” Attu anokwakwathuwa ukhalhawaya khanorumelhelha nttenga, phi chiichammo cheesheriye aya toka khalhayi.
60002009	Nansho mwaatti phi iyari ithanlhiye, opochera ishaani e imwene, nikosho nitakatifu nithanlhiye uvara mitheko cha Nlhuku, wiira nhimiache mitheko chawe owiihanneni nkhume mwiipiphini nkookelhihani munthukoni mwawe mwo ushangiha.
60002010	Khalhayi mwaatti khamwaari attu a Nlhuku nansho vano phi attu awe. Yeyo ikatema iyo Nlhuku khowonenlheni ikiriri nansho vano howoonelhani ikiriri.
60002011	Ashilhoko aka, kinoulhelhani thoko alheto ama attu o uvira velhaponi va! Nshembeke nikakata no mwiiruttuni nihinaathana ni minepa chinyu.
60002012	Mwaakhalhaneke rata attu ahinchuwenlhe Nlhuku, ikhalhe wiira ata yowootheriakani wiira nhowonya, awe anthimicha Nlhuku nihuku no uwa Athithi nno, vanohalha aya woona mitheko chinyu choombone.
60002013	Mwiiwelhelheke kila ittu inolheheriya ni attu, wo nlhatu na Athithi. Mweewelhelheke amwene arii ni ikuru yuulhupalhe,
60002014	ama attu anotawara athanlhiye ni Nlhuku wiira aatwarushe attu anopanga cho uhilhoka ni waatotopelha attu anopanga moombone.
60002015	Ukhalhawaya Nlhuku nothanana wiira mwaamaalhihe attu ahichuwenlhe ittu ni akumbafu vanopanga inyu chittu choombone.
60002016	Nkhalheke thoko aneethi ni uneethi inyu uyo uhikhalhe phi iphiro yo uvitha uhilhoka winyu. Nansho nkhalheke thoko anamitheko a Nlhuku.
60002017	Mwaathimicheke attu onkhaye. Mwaattuneke ashilhoko inyu. Munthimicheke Nlhuku. Mwaathimicheke amwene.
60002018	Ni inyu ipotta va, mwaarumelhelheke rata manyaapwiiya inyu anourumani mitheko chaya. Nheewelhelhe attu o nrima woombone ama o maalha vekha ayaru nansho mweewelhelheke ni attu o mahuchuru ayo.
60002019	Ukhalhawaya wowo phi urera nrima, ntu avilhelhaka ntwarusho nihinophwanelhiya awe, wo uchuwelha wiira Nlhuku nowa ammaha ibarakha.
60002020	Ukhalhawaya nnohalha uttuviyani mwavilhelhaka ntwarusho no uwonya winyu? Nansho mwavilhelhaka vanotwarushiya inyu wo nlhatu wo upanga morera, Nlhuku nowa ovahani ibarakha wo nlhatu thoko yoyo.
60002021	Yayo phi ayo ehanelhiye inyu ukhalhawaya Kuristo ni uyo ahotwarushiya wo nlhatu winyu, nkoohiyerani nlhikaaniho, paahi etu muntwariheke.
60002022	Yoyo khaapannge ittu yo uwonya mena khoothanche vamalhakuni vawe.
60002023	Vanruwanne aya khaakhunlhe nlhove no uhilhoka. Vaatwarushiya awe khoopopinhe attu nansho ankhulhuvenlhe Nlhuku, nohukumulha chittu we ikekhiaye.
60002024	Kuristo mwanene ahokusha uwonya wihu mwiiruttuni mwawe vansalaabani, wiira nikhwe mu uwonyani, niwe naakhalha akumi mu ikekhiani. Wo waatiya wawe mwaatti nholhamihiya.
60002025	Ukhalhawaya mwaatti mwaari ikhondoro chinothwelhelha nansho vano nhonhokolhelha Nshunga ni O weemelhelha ukumi inyu.
60003001	Ni inyu manyopani mwaathimicheke manyowannyu, yakhalhaka ahaawo manyottato ahinrumelhelha Nlhove na Nlhuku, awe ni ayo aarumelhelha wo meetelho inyu wo uhahimeria nlhove,
60003002	ukhalhawaya anowa yoona meetelho inyu o uhinanara ni o uthimichiya.
60003003	Wiireeriha winyu uhikhalhe wo wiipamba irutturu, wo utiva ikharari ni uwarelha chittu cho idhahabu ni ikuwo cho nhakhu,
60003004	nansho ukhalheke wo urera wo munrimani, urera uhinolhalha, yaani nrima wo mpuha ni wiitimarikha, unkhulhuvelhiya chinene mmiholho wa Nlhuku.
60003005	Chiichammo phi enre aya wo wiireriha manyopani atakatifu o khalhayi vawo. Yaari ankhulhuvelhaka Nlhuku ni o waahelhelha manyowannyaya,
60003006	thoko chenre aya Asara. Wo waathimicha owannyaya Aburahimu, yeehana Pwiiya, ni inyu mwaatti phi achishaana aya mwapangaka moombone wo uhoova ittu iriyoothe.
60003007	Ni inyu manyottato chiicho, mwaakhalhaneke rata manyaahanu inyu, mwaalhoheke, mwoonaka thoko attu ihirina machiri thoko mwaattiva va, ni woona thoko ashikhunaninyu anohalha inyu waapocherana vamoka nnema wo ukumi ukhuma wa Nlhuku. Mwapangaka chiicho khiiwo ittu inohalha utiyelhelha ulhapelha winyu.
60003008	Wo umalhihera, kineera, mwaatti onkhaye va nkhalheke nlhoko wa attu o nrima mmoka, o woonelhana ikiriri, o uttunana mwaashineneru, o nrima woombone ni o wiitimarikha.
60003009	Nhaahokolhoshere chittu cho uhilhoka attu anoupangelhani chittu cho uhilhoka, ama uruwana thoko chinoruwaniya inyu nansho mwaalhapelheke attu ibarakha, ukhalhawaya yayo phi ehanelhiye inyu ni Nlhuku mmwe mwaapochera ibarakha.
60003010	Ukhalhawaya Malhove Matakatifu aneera, “Ntu nottuna ukumi, Ni woona mahuku o mpuha, Echinanelheke nlhimi nawe chinene, huulhumache malhove o unanara, Huulhumache malhove o woothacha.
60003011	Ahiyeke uwonya, apangeke moombone, Aavieke mpuha, aavieke chinene.
60003012	Ukhalhawaya miitho a Athithi anaaweha attu o nrima worera, Anowewelhelha vanolhapelha aya, nansho ikohi ya Athithi inaakhota attu o uwonya.”
60003013	Mpani nohalha uupangelhani ichimwa mwavarecheshaka nrima wo upanga chittu choombone?
60003014	Nansho ata mwatwarushiyaka wo nlhatu no upanga chittu chinothanana awe Nlhuku, nhoreeriya. Nhimwoove ntu riyoothe mena nhikelhiye nipampa,
60003015	nansho munthimicheke Kuristo, mmamirimani mwinyu ukhalha phi Athithi mahuku onkhaye. Mwiicheesheke tayari umwaakhulha kila ntu nohalha uukohani makhulhuvelho arii mmamirimani mwinyu,
60003016	mwaakhulhaka rata ni wo wiitimarikha. Nkhalheke ni nrima woombone, ikhalhe wiira vanoruwaniya inyu, attu anoupangelhani ichimwa wo nlhatu no meetelho inyu oombone nhina Kuristo ayo, awe olhiya muru wo malhove anoolhumacha aya.
60003017	Ukhalhawaya iri nambaya uttwaruwa wo nlhatu no upanga moombone, Nlhuku attunaka, kuliko uttwaruwa wo upanga chittu cho uhilhoka.
60003018	Ukhalhawaya Kuristo ni uyo ahokhwa nkwaha mmoka tu wo nlhatu wo uhilhoka wa attu onkhaye. Ntu oombone ahaakhwelha attu o uwonya wiira aarweehe wa Nlhuku. Eeviye iruttu nansho nkaakhalha nkumi wo wooria wo Iphumu ya Nlhuku,
60003019	ni ahorwaa waahimiachera minepa chaari mu uttukiyani.
60003020	Yayo phi alhe minepa yaakhonte unrumelhelha Nlhuku vaaweherenre awe wo waavilhelha ikatema Anuhu vaakoorosha aya isafina. Nhina yeyo ikalhava iyo, attu vakani tu, attu nane phi yookokweelhe maashi.
60003021	Yayo maashi ayo yaalhikaanihiye ni ubatiizo unowoopolhani mwaatti vano. Kuhii ubatiizo wo urapa ni uchuururia nihiro mwiiruttuni nansho wo malhehano wa Nlhuku anopangiya wo nrima woombone, wo iphiro yo uhihimmwa wa Yesu Kuristo,
60003022	aarweelhe wiirimu, vano akhalhaka wiimonono wa Nlhuku, aatawaraka minepa ni ikuru ni machiri chikhalhaka mmathathani mwawe.
60004001	Paahi ukhalhawaya Kuristo aatwaruwilhe mwiiruttuni, paahi ni inyu vano etu mwiilhipiheke wo nrima thoko yoyo ukhalhawaya ntu twaruwilhe mwiiruttuni hohiya uwonya.
60004002	Toka vano etu, nhikhalhe nnikakatani mwo uhilhoka nansho mu uttunani mwa Nlhuku ikatema yuhalhenlheni mwiilhaponi mu.
60004003	Ukhalhawaya khalhayi mwahopanga chittu chinopangiya ni attu ahinchuwenlhe Nlhuku, vaatwara inyu nikakata no uhilhoka ni ulhavalhava ni uwuria utheka ni uhapalhiya pufia ni umenyekha ni waana indewo ni ulhapelha isinyago.
60004004	Vano attu ahinchuwenlhe Nlhuku ayo anooshanga vanowoonayani mwaatti nhittimakachaka waatwara mommo nnovira aya mucharilhe chittu cho unanara chinene mmo. Phi nouruwanayani.
60004005	Nansho anowa wiivaraanga yoyo mwaha uyo wa Nlhuku khanlhe tayari waahukumulha attu akumi ni attu akhwilhe.
60004006	Phi nlhatu etu Malhove Orera ahohimiachiya wa attu akhwilhe ayo wiira awe aahukumulhiya nookhwa wo mitheko chaya cho mwiiruttuni chipangilhe aya thoko chinohukumulhiya awe kila ntu. Nansho wo Iphumu ya Nlhuku awe yaakhalha akumi thoko Nlhuku chiri awe nkumi.
60004007	Umalha wo chittu chonkhaye uhaaya, paahi etu nkhalhaneke irusho, nshelhelhiheke nlhapelhaka.
60004008	Upwaha chittu chonkhaye chiyo, nttunaneke wo nrima wonkhaye, ukhalhawaya uttunana phi nokhuneelha uwonya winchi.
60004009	Mpocheraneke mwaashineneru umanupani winyu wo uhitukutuwacha.
60004010	Kila mmoka avarelheke mahalha avahiye awe ni Nlhuku thoko karumiya o ipilhi yoombone, o nnema wo waakavihera attu akina a Nlhuku.
60004011	Ntu olhumachaka Malhove a Nlhuku olhumacheke malhove anokhuma wa Nlhuku mwanene, akavihaka ntheko akaviheke wo machiri avahiye awe ni Nlhuku, ikhalhe iphiro yo uthimichiya Nlhuku wo iphiro yo Yesu Kuristo. Nthimicho ni wooria ukhalhe ni uyo wo mahuku o uhimalha! Aye.
60004012	Ashilhoko aka, nhishange mwaha wo ulhikachiya winyu chinene mwoonaka thoko ittu ihinapacha inyu woona.
60004013	Nansho nteelhiyeke ukhalhawaya nnookaviha uttwaruwa wa Kuristo wiira mmwe mwaateelhiya chinene ikatema vanohalha awe uhokolhia wo nthimicho wawe.
60004014	Mwaruwaniyaka wo nlhatu wo urumelhelha nchina na Kuristo nhoreeriya, ukhalhawaya Iphumu yo nthimicho iri phi Iphumu ya Nlhuku rii vamoka ni inyu.
60004015	Hikhalhe ntu riyoothe munlhokoni mwinyu notwarushiya wo nlhatu wo ukhalha ntu owiiva ama ntu owiiya ama ntu otteka ama ntu noolhumacha chittu cha attu wiira aanihe.
60004016	Nansho mwatwaruwaka wo nlhatu wo unrumelhelha Kuristo, paahi etu nhuulhiye muru nansho nthepiheke unthimicha Nlhuku, ukhalhawaya nneehaniya wo nchina na Kuristo.
60004017	Ikatema yo uhukumulhiya ihaatameria, ni uhukumulhiya unochokholha wa nlhoko wa attu a Nlhuku mwanene. Yakhalhaka uhukumulhiya unochokholha uwanihu hii, paahi etu, umalha waya unohalha ukhalha chani wa attu ahinrumelhelha Malhove Orera a Nlhuku?
60004018	Thoko Malhove Matakatifu chinohimia aya, “Yakhalhaka inoorika wa attu anopanga chittu choombone mmiholho wa Nlhuku woopolhiya, Inohalha ukhalha chani etu wa attu ahinonthimicha Nlhuku ni wa attu o uwonya?”
60004019	Paahi etu, attu anotwaruwa wo uttuna wa Nlhuku, eesheke ukumi aya mmathathani mwawe Nrata aya o ukhulhuvelhiya ni uthepiha upanga mitheko choombone.
60005001	Mii owulhuvalha ni nholhelhi o nlhoko wa attu anrumelhenlhe Kuristo nkhunaninyu, ahimiechenshe Kuristo vaatwaruwilhe awe ni ntu kinohalha ukavihana munthimichoni nnohalha upatakulhiya kaanyuma. Kinoulhepelhani chinene mwaatti ashulhupalhe aholhelhi ashikhunanaka wiira,
60005002	nshungeke nlhoko wa attu a Nlhuku avahiye inyu waashunga ni weemelhelha. Mwaashungeke wo uhikhanyererihiya nansho wo uttuna winyu thoko chinottuna awe Nlhuku. Kuhii wo nlhulha wo upatta nchurukhu nansho wo nrima winyu wonkhaye.
60005003	Nhaaholhelhe wo machiri attu anaashunga inyu nansho nkhalheke malhikaaniho o utwariya ni yoyo nlhoko uyo.
60005004	Ikatema Nshunga Mulhupalhe vanohalha awe uwa vawo, inyu mwaatti nnoowa mwaattukiya mphumburu wo nthimicho uhinothaalha.
60005005	Ni inyu ashimirawo va, mweewelhelheke ashulhupalhe aholhelhi. Eiyo, mwaattiva onkhaye va mwiitimarikheke mwaashineneru ni ukavihana ukhalhawaya Malhove Matakatifu aneera, “Nlhuku nowaavinga attu o wiichoona Nansho nowaavaha nnema attu o wiitimarikha.”
60005006	Paahi etu mwiitimarikheke mmoononi mwa Nlhuku nri mwo machiri, awe otheeshani ikatema aya yaayaka.
60005007	Munhiyereke nipampa ninyu nonkhaye ukhalhawaya yoyo phi noushungani.
60005008	Nhiittialhe, nshelhelhiheke! Ukhalhawaya mmalhaponi inyu, Nakare noorukureriacha thoko kharamu noturuma alhupattaka ampatte ntu ankhuure nfiaa.
60005009	Ni inyu mwaatti nlhipeke nrima, munvingeke, nchuwelhaka wiira uttwaruwa thoko wowo phi naapatta ashilhoko inyu arii velhaponi va.
60005010	Nansho mwaatti nnotwaruwa vakani va, Nlhuku ri machokholhelho o nnema wonkhaye owiihanneni mwaatti mu nthimichoni mwawe mahuku o uhimalha nhina Kuristo Yesu, nowa olhipihani kabisaa ni uvahani ikuru ni machiri ni ukhalha nsingi wo ukhomaalha.
60005011	Machiri akhalhe uwannyawe mahuku o uhimalha! Aye.
60005012	Wo moono wa Nasuluwano, kinomwaalhakelha aka ukhalha munnaka o ukhulhuvelhiya kiholhepa iwarakha yo malhove vakani ilha wiira kuuhelheni nrima wo uhimiechesha wiira ulha phi nnema we ikeekhene wa Nlhuku. Mweemelhelheke rata yoyo nrima uyo.
60005013	Nkutiro wa attu anonrumelhelha Kuristo naninyu o va vaneehana aka Babeli va, athanlhiye vamoka ni inyu mwaatti anouvahani isalamu. Anaaka Namako chiicho anouvahani isalamu.
60005014	Nshikurianeke kila mmoka wo nrima wo uttunana. Mpuha ukhalhe ni inyu mwaatti onkhaye nri awawe Kuristo va. Aye.
61001001	Mii Simoni Peturo, namitheko ni karumiya a Yesu Kuristo. Kinoowiiha iwarakha iwe uwaninyu mwaatti mpochenre nrima wo ulhoka chinene thoko urina ihu hii urii wo nnema wo iphiro yo ikekhiaye ya Nlhuku ni Moopolhi Yesu Kuristo.
61001002	Kinoulhapelhelhani nnema ni mpuha mwinchi chinene vanonchuwelha inyu Nlhuku ni Yesu Athithi.
61001003	Wo woria wawe, Nlhuku honivaha chittu chonkhaye chinothanana ihu wiira nikhalhe ukumi wo unthimicha ni unchuwelha, yoyo niihanne wo ikiriri awe munthimichoni mwawe, ninkavihane nthimicho wo Unlhuku wawe.
61001004	Wo yoyo nlhatu uyo etu, Nlhuku honivaha malhehano molhupalhe aalhenhe awe univaha wo yeyo iphiro iyo, wiira nikhalhe akavihi o makhalhelho oombone ni ushemba nikakata no uhilhoka no velhaponi va ni ukhalha thoko chinothanana awe.
61001005	Paahi wo yoyo nlhatu uyo etu, mmananiheke wo kila iphiro ulhipiha mirima chinyu, ni vavawo nkhalheke ni nrima woombone. Ni nrima woombone irusho cho uchuwelha chittu,
61001006	ni wo irusho chinyu muncherereke nrima wo uhikhalha ni nlhulha, munrimani mwo uhikhalha ni nlhulha muncherereke nrima wo uvilhelha ni wo nrima winyu wo uvilhelha munteelhiheke Nlhuku,
61001007	wo unteelhiha winyu Nlhuku, muncherereke nrima wo waattuna attu ashilhoko inyu anrumelhenlhe Kuristo. Vachulhu yayo, muncherereke nrima wo waattuna attu onkhaye.
61001008	Ukhalhawaya mwakhalhaka ni yayo meetelho ayo wo winchiva, khannokhalha attu o ureshi ama o uhikhalha ni maphepu, nnookhalha attu o ukhulhuvelhiya mu ukumini mwinyu wo waachuwelha winyu Athithi Yesu Kuristo.
61001009	Nansho ntu hirina yayo meetelho ayo nokhalha thoko ntu ohoona, khanooria woona rata ni uyo holhiyalha wiira ahomalha uhapihiya uwonya wawe wo khalhayi.
61001010	Paahi etu, ashilhoko aka, mwiikayeke chinene ikhalhe wiira wiihaniya ni uthanlhiya winyu ni Nlhuku phi ittu yo uvarelhelha chinene mu ukumini mwinyu. Ukhalhawaya mwakhalhaka chiicho khannowulhuwa mu uwonyani mena.
61001011	Ni inyu nnoowa mwaapocheriya rata vanokelha inyu mu imwene yo mahuku o uhimalha ya Athithi ni Moopolhi ihu Yesu Kuristo.
61001012	Paahi etu, kinowuupushani mahuku onkhaye ulha mwaha ulha, inakhalhaka kihochuwelha wiira nheemelha rata vanohimiecheshiya inyu ni ikeekhene irina inyu variaka bado velhaponi va.
61001013	Kinoona wiira ihorera uwuupushani ulha mwaha ulha ni uhelhani nrima, mahuku onkhaye vari aka mapuro o ukumi wo velhaponi va,
61001014	ukhalhawaya kihochuwelha wiira mahuku aka o uhiya nipuro no velhaponi ahomalha thoko Athithi Yesu Kuristo chinre aya wo ukooniha mwaari.
61001015	Nansho etu, kinoomananiha wiira vanohalha aka ukhwa vawo, mmwe mwoopuwelha ulha mwaha ulha kila ikatema.
61001016	Ikatema vaari ihu nihimiachaka ikuru ni uwa wa Athithi Yesu Kuristo, khanaamiacha ithelhi chilhepiye ni attu o upenyapenya, naahimiacha ikuru yonne ihu naashinene.
61001017	Ukhalhawaya hii naari vavawo Nlhuku Athithi vaavaha aya nthimicho ni ikuru, veewaneelhe aya nlhove no nthimicho naakhumme wa ayo arii Apwiiya o Nthimicho ayo, veera aya, “Ulha phi Mwaamwanaka kinonttuna aka, nokichivelha!”
61001018	Tho, hii naashinene naheewa nenno nlhove nookhuma wiirimu nno vaari ihu vamoka vachulhu mwaako ntakatifu ulhe.
61001019	Thonitho, nttenga wa anamilhohi uhonihelha machiri munrimani. Mwavarecheshaka yoyo nnoopanga ittu yoombone, ukhalhawaya yoyo uri thoko nthuko unomwalhiaa mwiipiphini mpaka vanohalha aya usha ni ittotwa cho mapikoosha vanohalha aya upharelha mmamirimani mwinyu.
61001020	Ni wo uthepa vavawo, nchuwelheke wiira khaawo ntu riyoothe nooria ulhamulha malhove a anamilhohi alhepiye nhina Malhove Matakatifu thoko chinothanana awe mwanene.
61001021	Ukhalhawaya nttenga wa anamilhohi khawaawiihiye wo uttuna wa ntu, nansho attu yoolhumacha malhove aakhumme wa Nlhuku aholhelhiyaka ni Iphumu ya Nlhuku.
61002001	Nansho khalhayi tho yahokhumelhelha anamilhohi o woothacha munlhokoni mwa attu, thoko chinohalha aya ukhumelhelha munlhokoni mwinyu. Attu anohalha wiittuchiha meettuchiho o woothacha wo nivitho o niiviho ni waaruna Athithi owoponlheni ni wiihelha itatako yo wiichiiva ashineneru.
61002002	Attu enchi anowa yaatwara iphiro chaya cho wuulhiha muru chiyo ni wo wiira chiicho, iphiro ye ikeekhene inoowa yaaruwaniya.
61002003	Wo nikakata naya no upatta ittu uwaninyu nno, yayo manyaattu ayo anowa o uhimiacherani ithelhi cho woothiya. Nansho O waahukumulha heechesha tayari toka khalhayi, ni uyo O waalhakalhiha uyo ri miitho!
61002004	Ukhalhawaya Nlhuku kaahiyerenre minepa o wiirimu vaawonyilhe aya, nansho arihenlhe untwarushoni, u nlhikiti no unaminepa uttukiye aya mittondoro awehereraka nihuku naya no uhukumulhiya.
61002005	Ni mena Nlhuku khoonenlhe ikiriri attu o ilhapo yo khalhayi, nansho ahowiiha Igarika yuulhupalhe vachulhu ilhapo ya attu ahanthimicha Nlhuku, attu yookokwelhe yaari Anuhu aahimiacha nttenga wa attu wo weettuchiha upanga chittu chinothanana awe Nlhuku, ni attu akina saba.
61002006	Tho, Nlhuku ahohukumulha iwani cho Usodoma ni Ugomora wo upaha mooro lhakalhaka, apangaka ikhalhe phi ittu yo ulhikaanihiya chittu chinohalha waapatta attu ahinonthimicha Nlhuku.
61002007	Ahoopolha Nalutu, ntu anteelhihilhe Nlhuku, aachukulhelha meetelho a attu ahaalhoha uvara ikekhiaye aapanga chittu cho uhilhoka.
61002008	Ukhalhawaya Naluutu apannge chittu cho rera chanteelhihilhe Nlhuku ayo ahoona ni wiiwa chittu cho uwonya chaapanga aya attu yaakhalhana aya munlhokoni mwaya ayo, kila nihuku yaari aachukulhelhaka chinene.
61002009	Paahi etu, Athithi ahochuwelha iphiro cho woopolha mu ulhikachiyani attu anaathimicha Athithi ni iphiro cho waatwarusha attu o uhilhoka mpaka Nihuku no Uhukumulhiya waya.
61002010	Athepaka alhe anottwara nikakata no unanara no mwiiruttuni ayo ni attu anoheulhacha ikuru ya Nlhuku. Yayo o wiittuchiha o woothacha ayo arii o vaanyiha ni wiichoona, aruwanaka ni waapangelha ncheche o wuupiya o nthimicho o wiirimu.
61002011	Nansho ata minepa cho wiirimu chiri ni ikuru ni machiri o waapwaha yayo owiittuchiha o woothacha ayo, khanaahukumulha milhatu chaya mena waaruwana wa Athithi.
61002012	Yayo attu ayo anokhalha thoko ashinama o umwiini anopanga chittu wo uhikhalha ni irusho, anoyariya wiira avariye ahithiye, ukhalhawaya vanoruwana aya anoruwana chittu chihichuwenlhe aya. Yayo anoowa yeevakachiya thoko ashinama ayo,
61002013	ni ulhiviya ntwarusho wo mitheko chipannge aya. Utteka uthana mwaari phi mpuha aya, upangacha chittu chiriyoothe chinohalha utondoviha ikhwilhu chaya cho mwiiruttuni. Yayo anowuulhihani muru mwaatti vanohalha inyu waakhalhana ni waalhiana ikaramu chinyu uno ateelhiyaka wo iphiro chaya cho uhilhoka chiyo.
61002014	Miitho aya ahiwehaka ittu ikina yaahikhalhe mwaha wo ulhavalhava, attu o uwonya uhimmalha, anaaholhelhacha attu o mirima chikani uwaya munriankhoni mwo uwonya. Mirima chaya chicharaka nikakata no uttuna nhakhu. Nlhuku haalhava!
61002015	Ahohiyacha iphiro yo ulhoka, nkayaapotera ni uttwara iphiro cha Balaamu, mwaamwanaa Beori aattunne ulhiviya nchurukhu wo upanga chittu cho woothacha,
61002016	nkaachacheriya wo uwonya wawe. Iphuta khinooria wulhumacha, nansho yahoolhumacha thoko ntu, nkayatondoviha ihalhahalha ya yoyo namilhohi uyo.
61002017	Yayo owiittuchiha o woothacha ayo ari thoko marapo awelhenlhe, thoko mahute anoveverushiya ni iphioo yo machiri. Nlhuku heeshera mapuro aya ukittu wiipiphini chinene.
61002018	Anoolhumacha malhove aya o wiichoona o uhikhalha ni maana, ni wo nikakata naya no mwiiruttuni nno anowaawayiha attu anochokholha wiihaulha ukhuma wa attu o meetelho o mu uwonyani.
61002019	Anaalheha attu akina wiira eti anoohiyereriya chitema, uno ashinene akhalhaka ipotta cho mu uwonyani, ukhalhawaya ntu nokhalha ipotta ya ittu iriyoothe inontawara.
61002020	Ukhalhawaya etu, attu akulhuphuwilhe ukhuma mu uwonyani mwo velhaponi wo waachuwelha Athithi ni Moopolhi Yesu Kuristo, yawayaka mu uwonyani ni utawariya tho, makhalhelho aya anowa ukhalha o unanara upwaha chaari aya khalhayi.
61002021	Ikaari nambaya yayo manyaattu ayo ahikachuwenlhe iphiro ye ikekhiaye kuliko uchuwelha nkayaarukunuwa ni uhiya malhehero matakatifu yaavahiye aya.
61002022	Ittu yaakhumelhenlhe yayo attu ayo ihohimiechesha nulhumo nineera we ikeekhene wiira, “Mwalhapwa hohokolhelha maraphio awe mwanene.” Nlhikaaniho nikina niiraka, “Ikulhuwe irapihiye inowuupuruwa tho vamatopeni!”
61003001	Ashilhoko aka kinaattuna aka, ilha phi iwarakha yo nayelhi kinolhepa aka uwaninyu. Nhina iwarakha pilhi chilha, kinolhikacha wiira kiushe irusho chinyu wiira chuupuwelhe moopuwelho orera anowupushakani alha.
61003002	Kinothanana mwaatti muupuwelheke malhove olhumachiye khalhayi ni anamilhohi atakatifu ni malhehero a Athithi Moopolhi ihu mwaavahiye inyu ni akarumiya inyu alhe.
61003003	Wo upachera, nchuwelheke wiira mahuku o umalha ilhapo anoowacha attu o meetelho atawariye ni nikakata no uhilhoka. Yayo anoowa o upangelhani unavilhi
61003004	yiiraka wiira, “Athithi aholhehani wiira anoowa, ari vayi etu? Toka manyaapwiiya vakhwilhe aya chittu phi chechilhe, meetelho o chittu phi yalhe thoko chaari aya voopiya aya ilhapo!”
61003005	Nansho yayo attu ayo, anopanga mweni vanolhiyalha aya wiira khalhayi Nlhuku ahoolhumacha nlhove, irimu nkayoopiya ni ilhapo chiicho, chuupiyaka ukhuma wo maashi, ni wo maashi yayo.
61003006	Ni wo yayo maashi ayo, Igarika yahowa ilhapo yo khalhayi nkayaalhakalhihiya.
61003007	Ni wo nenno nlhove nno, irimu cho vano ni ilhapo chihoshungiya wo nlhatu wo ulhakalhihiya ni mooro. Chishungiyaka mpaka nihuku Nlhuku vanohalha awe waahukumulha ni waalhakalhiha attu ahinomwiiwelhelha Nlhuku.
61003008	Nansho ashilhoko aka kinaattuna aka, nhilhiyalhe ittu imoka! Wa Athithi, nihuku nimoka niri thoko iyaakha elufu imoka ni iyaakha elufu imoka iri thoko nihuku nimoka.
61003009	Athithi khanopicha utimiriha malhehano aya thoko attu akina chinaanyihera aya wiira anoopicha. Anouvilhelhani mwaatti ukhalhawaya khanottuna wiira mmoka inyu apotere, nansho attu onkhaye awe yaakhoroma.
61003010	Nihuku na Athithi ninohalha uwa thoko ntu o wiiya. Nenno nihuku nno, irimu inowa uthama wo nkhito mulhupalhe ni chittu chinenchi chinoowa chaapahiya mooro ni ulhakalhihiya, ilhapo inowa uvia lhakalhaka vamoka ni chittu chonkhaye chiri nhina mwaya thoko khachinapacha ukhalha.
61003011	Ukhalhawaya chittu chonkhaye chinoowa chaavia mooro lhakalhaka thoko chiicho etu, chani, mwaatti nnothananiya ukhalha attu o wiira chani? Meetelho inyu akhalheke matakatifu ni o umwiiwelhelha Nlhuku,
61003012	mmwehereraka nenno nihuku na Nlhuku nno wiira niwe chitema. Nihuku irimu vanohalha aya upahiya mooro ni ulhakalhihiya chittu chaya chonkhaye. Ni chittu cho mwiilhaponi chiviaka mooro ni uthulhuwacha.
61003013	Nansho hii ninoweherera inilhehilhe awe Nlhuku va, ninoweherera irimu yo naanano ni ilhapo yo naanano, nipuro na attu o ikekhiaye anonteelhiha Nlhuku.
61003014	Paahi etu ashilhoko aka, vanoweherera inyu nenno nihuku nno, mmanahiheke ukhalha attu o makhalhelho orera wo uhikhuwachiya mmiholho wa Nlhuku ni unkhalhana wo mpuha.
61003015	Mwaalhakelheke wiira uvilhelha wa Athithi phi nipesha ninyu wiira mwoopolhiye, thoko alhoko ihu Napaolo chenre aya wo ulhepa iwarakha uwaninyu wo irusho chaavahiye aya ni Nlhuku.
61003016	Chiichammo phi nolhepa aya nhina iwarakha chaya vanohimiacha aya yoyo mwaha uyo. Nhina iwarakha chaya chiyo chihaawo chittu choorikarika, attu o uhikhalha irusho ahiri ni nrima woombone chinaapoterihera aya attu. Anopanga thoko chinopanga aya mu Malhove Matakatifu makina. Paahi etu aheehelha ntatakoni ashinene.
61003017	Nansho ashilhoko aka kinaattuna aka, ukhalhawaya nhochuwelha yoyo mwaha uyo, paahi etu mwiishungeke, nhiwe mwaakhupiya mu uwonyani mwo yayo attu ayo nkamwaawulhuwa ni uhiya mirima chinyu cheemenlhe rata.
61003018	Nansho nthepeke wunnuwa munnemani ni waachuwelha Athithi ni Moopolhi ihu Yesu Kuristo. Nthimicho ukhalhe uwannyaya, vano ni mahuku o uhimalha! Aye.
62001001	Ninolhepa uwaninyu mwaatti uuchuwelhihani mwaha wo Nlhove nowiiha ukumi ari toka machokholhelho. Hii nahomwiiwa ni umwoona wo miitho ihu naashinene, eiyo, nahomwoona ni ummara wo mathatha ihu naashinene.
62001002	Ulha ukumi ulha voonelhe aya nahoona. Paahi etu vano phi nohimiechesha ihu uuhimeriani mwaha wo ukumi wo uhimalha waari wa Athithi naachuwelhihiye ihu.
62001003	Nonne ihu ni wiiwa phi ninohimia ihu wiira ni inyu nlhutane ni hii. Nikhalhe nlhoko mmoka muulhutaanani wihu ni Athumwanihu ni mwaamwanaya Yesu Kuristo.
62001004	Ninolhepa ulha mwaha ulha uwaninyu mwaatti wiira mpuha ihu utimire.
62001005	Ni ulha phi nttenga univanhe awe Yesu unohimia wiira, Nlhuku phi nthuko ni nhina mwawe khuuwo uripelha uriwoothe.
62001006	Neeraka wiira niholhutaana nlhoko mmoka uno nikhalhaka mu uripelhani, vavawo ninowoothacha wo malhove ni mitheko chihu khachirii che ikekhiaye.
62001007	Nansho nakhalhaka munthukoni thoko yoyo chiri awe munthukoni, paahi etu vavawo ninookhalha nlhoko mmoka naashineneru ni iphome ya Yesu, Mwaamwanawe, inoonihapiha uwonya wonkhaye.
62001008	Neeraka wiira khaninawonya nineethepiacha naashineneru ni ikekhiaye khiiwo nhina mwihu.
62001009	Nansho narumelhelhaka uwonya wihu, Nlhuku ri o ukhulhuvelhiya ni e ikekhiaye. Nonihiyerera uwonya wihu ni unihapiha ukhuma mu uhilhokani mwonkhaye.
62001010	Neeraka wiira khaninawonya ninompanga Nlhuku o woothacha ni nlhove nawe nihikhalhaka mmamirimani mwihu.
62002001	Achishaana aka kinaattuna aka, kinolhepa tho ulha mwaha ulha wiira nhiwonye. Nansho ntu riyoothe awonyakaru nihanaa o mmoka nonikaviha unichontelhelha wa Athithi, phi Yesu Kuristo, o ikekhiaye mmiholho wa Nlhuku.
62002002	Kuristo mwanene phi isadaka yo nlhatu wo uhiyereriya uwonya wihu, ihikhalhaka uwonya wihuru nansho ata uwonya wa attu onkhaye.
62002003	Neewelhelhaka malhehero a Nlhuku, paahi etu ninowiira nihonchuwelha.
62002004	Ntu neera honchuwelha Nlhuku nansho hiiwelhelhaka malhehero awe, paahi etu yoyo hoothacha ni ikeekhene khiiwo nhina mwawe.
62002005	Ntu riyoothe neewelhelha malhove a Nlhuku, wo ikekhiaye yoyo phi ntu nonttuna Nlhuku. Vavawo phi nohalha ihu wiira ninolhutaana ni Nlhuku.
62002006	Ntu riyoothe neera wiira holhutaana ni Nlhuku yoyo hothananiya ukhalha thoko chaakhakha awe Yesu Kuristo.
62002007	Ashilhoko aka kinaattuna aka, alha malhehero kinouhimeriakani alha kahii o naanano, phi yalhe o khalhayi alhe mweewilhe inyu toka machokholhelho. Malhehero o khalhayi ayo phi malhove mweewilhe inyu ayo.
62002008	Inakhalhaka chiicho etu malhehero kinolhepa aka vano alha o naanano. Ni ikeekhene aya iri nhina mwa Kuristo ni nhina mwinyu mwaashinene. Ukhalhawaya uripelha unoothama ni nthuko we ikeekhene uhochokholha umwalhia.
62002009	Ntu riyoothe neera wiira ri munthukoni nansho ampangelhaka ichimwa nhima awe yoyo ntu uyo ri mu uripelhani.
62002010	Ntu riyoothe nonttuna nhima awe ri munthukoni hikhalhaka ni ittu iriyoothe yo unttekiha nkhunanawe.
62002011	Nansho ntu nompangelha ichimwa nhima awe yoyo ri mu uripelhani. Khachuwenlhe unokelha awe, ukhalhawaya uripelha uhontiyelhelha wiitho.
62002012	Kinolhepa uwaninyu achishaana aka kinaattuna aka va ukhalhawaya uwonya winyu uhohiyereriya, wo isadaka yaakumihiye wo iphiro ya Kuristo Moopolhi.
62002013	Kinolhepa uwaninyu mwaatti manyaathumwanakava ukhalhawaya nhonchuwelha yoyo ri toka machokholhelho uyo. Kinolhepa uwaninyu mwaatti ashimirawova, ashilhopwana ni ashithiyana ukhalhawaya nhonkottolha Nakare. Kinolhepa uwaninyu achishaanaka va ukhalhawaya nhaachuwelha Apwiiya.
62002014	Kiholhepa uwaninyu manyaathumwanakava, Ukhalhawaya nhonchuwelha yoyo aariwo toka machokholhelho uyo. Kinolhepa uwaninyu mwaatti ashimirawova, ashilhopwana ni ashithiyana ukhalhawaya mwaatti nhanaa machiri Ni nlhove na Nlhuku niri nhina mwinyu Ni inyu nhonkottolha Nakare.
62002015	Chihuuchivelheni chittu cho mwiilhaponi mena ittu iriyoothe iri yo velhaponi. Ntu chinonchivelha chittu cho mwiilhaponi yoyo khanooria waattuna Athithi.
62002016	Ukhalhawaya chittu chonkhaye chiri cho velhaponi yaani nikakata no mwiiruttuni ni chittu chinoona aya attu nkaamirielha ishenye ni wiititihacha wo nlhatu wo ukumi. Chechiyo chonkhaye chiyo khachinokhuma wa Athithi nansho chinokhuma mwiilhaponi.
62002017	Ilhapo ni chittu chaya chonkhaye chinaachivelha attu chinoovira, nansho ntu nopanga chinottuna awe Nlhuku yoyo nookhalha nkumi mahuku o uhimalha.
62002018	Achishaana aka umalha ilhapo uhaatameria vano. Nhomalha wiiwa wiira nonvinga Kuristo ri muuwani ni attu anonvinga Kuristo enchi ahomalha uwa vano. Paahi etu nihochuwelha wiira umalha ilhapo uhaatameria.
62002019	Yayo attu ayo akhumme munlhokoni mwihu nansho khayaari awihu phi nlhatu etu ahonihiyacha. Yakaari awihu anohalha ni hii. Nansho ahothamacha nkayaarwaa yoonie wiira khayaari awihu.
62002020	Nansho nhohikiya makhura ni Iphumu ya Nlhuku ntakatifu ni inyu mwaatti onkhaye va nhochuwelha ikeekhene.
62002021	Paahi etu kinolhepa uwaninyu mwaatti kuhii wiira khanchuwenlhe ikeekhene nansho ukhalhawaya nhochuwelha. Tho ukhalhawaya nhochuwelha, khuuwo woothacha uriwoothe unkhuma nhina ikeekhene.
62002022	Mwoothacha phi mpani. Phi uyo noruna wiira Yesu kahiwe Kuristo Moopolhi thanlhiye ni Nlhuku. Ntu thoko yoyo phi nonvinga Kuristo, phi naaruna Athithi ni Mwaana.
62002023	Ukhalhawaya ntu riyoothe hinonrumelhelha Mwaana naaruna Athithi chiicho. Ni ntu nomwiiweelhelha Mwaana noweewelhelha Athithi chiicho.
62002024	Paahi etu nttenga mweewilhe inyu toka khalhayi ulhe ukhalheke mmamirimani mwinyu. Ni vavawo nttenga mweewilhe inyu toka khalhayi wakhalhaka mmamirimani mwinyu paahi etu nnoolhokelha wo ulhutaana ni Mwaana ni Athithi.
62002025	Ni malhehano anilhenhe awe Kuristo mwanene phi alha, univaha ukumi wo mahuku o uhimalha.
62002026	Kinolhepa uwaninyu mwaatti, mwaha wo uwaamukani unaacha attu anothanana uupoterihani.
62002027	Nansho uwaninyu mwaatti nhohikiya makhura ni Iphumu ya Nlhuku ukhuma wa Kuristo. Ni yoyo athepaka ukhalha nhina mwinyu khannomphavelha ntu riyoothe o wiittuchihani. Ukhalhawaya yoyo nowiittuchihani kila ittu ni meettuchiho awe ari e ikeekhene, ahoothachaka. Paahi etu nvarechesheke meettuchiho a yoyo, ni ukhalha wo ulhutaana ni Kuristo.
62002028	Vano etu achishaana aka kinaattuna aka nhalheke nhina mwawe, ikhalhe nihuku nawe no uwa thothoni nno niwe neemelha rata, nihiwe neevitha wo wuulhiya muru.
62002029	Mwachuwelhaka wiira Kuristo nopanga chittu choombone chinonteelhiha Nlhuku chinene, paahi etu nchuwelheke tho wiira, kila ntu nopanga chittu chinothanana awe Nlhuku phi mwaana a Nlhuku.
62003001	Mwooneke etu Athumwanihu chinre aya wo unittuna chinene mpaka nineehaniya ashaana a Nlhuku. We ikekhiaye phi chiichammo chiri ihu. Phi chiichammo etu attu o velhaponi chihinonichuwelha aya ukhalhawaya khanonchuwelha Nlhuku.
62003002	Ashilhoko aka kinaattuna aka, hii vano phi ashaana a Nlhuku nansho khinachuwaniaa mwaari chinohalha ihu ukhalha. Nansho nihochuwelha wiira Kuristo vanohalha awe uhokolhia ninoowa naakhalha thoko yoyo ukhalhawaya ninowa naamwoona chiri awe.
62003003	Paahi etu kila ntu nonkhulhuvelha Kuristo nowiihapiha nrima akhalhe rata thoko Kuristo mwanene chinre awe wo ukhalha makhalhelho orera chinene wo uhitteka.
62003004	Kila ntu nowonya noottekelha ikekhia ya Nlhuku, ukhalhawaya uwonya phi uhiya uvarechesha ikekhia.
62003005	Ni inyu nhochuwelha wiira Yesu Kuristo aawilhe uthamiha uwonya wihu ni wa yoyo khuuwo uwonya uriwoothe.
62003006	Paahi etu ntu nolhutaana ni Kuristo khanowonya, nansho ntu riyoothe nowonya khamwonilhe mena unchuwelha Kuristo.
62003007	Paahi etu achishaana a Nlhuku, nhipoterihiye ni ntu riyoothe. Ntu nopanga chittu choombone chinothanana awe Nlhuku, nonteelhiha Nlhuku, thoko Kuristo chinonteelhiha awe Nlhuku.
62003008	Ntu riyoothe nowonya yoyo a Nakare, ukhalhawaya Nakare howonya toka machokholhelho. Nansho Mwaana a Nlhuku aawilhe velhaponi uutanganyani mitheko cha Nakare.
62003009	Kila ntu ri mwaana a Nlhuku khanothepa uwonya, ukhalhawaya ukumi wo naanano uvahiye awe ni Nlhuku uri nhina mwawe. Tho, khanothepa uwonya ukhalhawaya yoyo phi mwaana a Nlhuku.
62003010	Nansho ntu riyoothe hinopanga chittu chinothanana awe Nlhuku ama hinonttuna nhima awe yoyo kahii mwaana a Nlhuku. Vavawo phi novirikana aya ashaana a Nlhuku ni ashaana a Nakare.
62003011	Ni nttenga mwiiwilhe inyu toka machokholhelho phi ulha, Nittunaneke naashineneru.
62003012	Nihikhalhe thoko Kaini aamwiivilhe nhima awe wo uholhelhiya ni Nakare. Aamwiivilhe wo nlhatu waani? Amwiivilhe ukhalhawaya mitheko cha Kaini chaari cho uhilhoka nansho mitheko cha nhima awe uyo chaari choombone cho unteelhiha Nlhuku.
62003013	Paahi etu ashilhoko aka nhishange attu o velhaponi yopangelhakani ichimwa.
62003014	Hii nihochuwelha wiira nihommira nookhwa nihokelha uukumini wo nlhatu no waattuna ashihima ihu. Ntu hiri ni nrima wo uttuna yoyo bado ri avariyaka nnookhwani.
62003015	Kila ntu nonvenga nhima awe yoyo ntu o niiviho. Ni inyu mwaatti nhochuwelha wiira ntu riyoothe o niiviho kharina ukumi wo uhimalha nhina mwawe.
62003016	Hii nihomalha uchuwelha nrima wo uttuna phi ishiyani ukhalhawaya Yesu Kuristo ahokumiha ukumi awe wo nlhatu wihu. Ni hii etu nikumiheke ukumi ihu wo nlhatu na ashilhoko ihu.
62003017	Paahi ntu ri ni nhakhu wo velhaponi va amwoonakaru nhima awe ahuvaka, nansho nrima awe uhimwoonelhaka ikiriri, yoyo khanooria wiira nonttuna Nlhuku.
62003018	Achishaana aka, uttuna wihu uhikhalhe wo malhoveru nansho ukhalheke uttuna wo ikeekhene ni wo wooniha mitheko.
62003019	Paahi etu wo nenno nichuwelheke wiira hii niri nhina ikekhiaye, ni hii ninomaalhiha mirima chihu nihikhalhe ni nipampa mmiholho wa Nlhuku.
62003020	Ata yakhalhaka mirima chihu chinonihukumulha wiira nihowonya, nihochuwelha wiira Nlhuku phi mulhupalhe upwaha mirima chihu. Ni yoyo phi nochuwelha kila ittu.
62003021	Ashilhoko aka mirima chihu khachinonihukumulha, paahi etu khaninowa naakhalha ni nipampa mmiholho wa Nlhuku.
62003022	Ninoowa naapochera ittu iriyoothe ninolhepelha ihu ukhuma uwaannyawe, ukhalhawaya ninowiiwelhelha malhehero awe ni upanga mitheko chinonteelhiha.
62003023	Ni malhehero awe phi alha, urumelhelha nchina no Mwaamwanawe, Yesu Kuristo, ni uttunana naashineneru thoko chinre awe wo unihehera.
62003024	Ntu neewelhelha malhehero a Nlhuku noolhutaana ni Nlhuku, ni Nlhuku nolhutaana ni uyo. Ni wo nenno ninoochuwelha wiira, Nlhuku nokhalha nhina mwihu wo iphiro yo Iphumu ya Nlhuku vahiye ihu.
62004001	Ashilhoko aka nhinrumelhelhe kila ntu neera hanaa Iphumu ya Nlhuku, nansho mphimeke rata, nchuwelhe wiira hanaa Iphumu ya Nlhuku. Ukhalhawaya anamilhohi o woothacha enchi ahokhumelhelha mwiilhaponi mu.
62004002	Chiichammo phi nohalha inyu unchuwelha ntu ri ni Iphumu ya Nlhuku. Kila ntu norumelhelha wiira Yesu Kuristo ahowa velhaponi nkaakhalha ntu, yoyo ntu uyo hanaa Iphumu ya Nlhuku.
62004003	Nansho kila ntu hinonrumelhelha Yesu Kuristo yoyo kharina Iphumu ya Nlhuku. Iphumu rina awe uyo phi iphumu nonvinga Kuristo, yeewillhe inyu wiira noowa ni vano homalha uwa mwiilhaponi mu.
62004004	Nansho achishaana aka, mwaattiva phi attu a Nlhuku, ni inyu nhomalha waakottolha anamilhohi o woothacha ayo. Ukhalhawaya yoyo Iphumu ya Nlhuku rii nhina mwinyu uyo phiri ni ikuru yuulhupalhe umpwaha Nakare ri o velhaponi uyo.
62004005	Yayo anamilhohi o woothacha ayo phi o velhaponi, anoolhumacha chittu cho velhaponi, ni ilhapo inoweewelhelha ukhalhawaya o velhaponi.
62004006	Nansho hii phi attu a Nlhuku. Ntu nonchuwelha Nlhuku nooniwelhelha. Ntu hinchuwenlhe Nlhuku khanoniiwelhelha. Paahi ninowooria uchuwelha Iphumu o ikeekhene ni iphumu yo woothacha.
62004007	Ashilhoko aka nittunaneke kila mmoka, ukhalhawaya nrima wo uttunana unokhuma wa Nlhuku. Kila ntu ri ni nrima wo uttunana phi mwaana a Nlhuku ni uyo honchuwelha Nlhuku.
62004008	Ntu hiri ni nrima wo uttunana khanchuwelhaka Nlhuku ukhalhawaya Nlhuku phi uttunana.
62004009	Nlhuku ahooniha unittuna wawe vanrumilhe awe Mwaana awe o yekha velhaponi, wiira nipatte ukumi wo iphiro awe.
62004010	Wowo phi uttunana we ikeekhene. Khanihiwe hii naachokhonlhe unttuna Nlhuku, nansho Yoyo phi anittunne hii mpaka nkanruma Mwaana awe akhalhe isadaka yo uniwaananiha wo nlhatu wo unihiyerera uwonya.
62004011	Ashilhoko aka yakhalhaka etu Nlhuku ahonittuna chinene chommo, paahi etu ni hii nihothananiya uttunana chiicho.
62004012	Khaawo ntu apantte umwoona Nlhuku ikatema iriyoothe, nansho nattunanaka ashineneru, Nlhuku nookhalha ni hii, ni uttuna wawe wonkhaye unootimira nhina mwihu.
62004013	Wo nenno nlhove nno nihochuwelha wiira ninokhalha nhina mwawe ni uyo nokhalha nhina mwihu ukhalhawaya honivaha Iphumu awe.
62004014	Ni hii nihoonechesha ni uhimiechesha wiira, Athithi ahonruma Mwaana aya akhalhe Mwoopolhi o ilhapo.
62004015	Ntu riyoothe norumelhelha ni uhimiacha mwanene wiira Yesu phi Mwaana a Nlhuku, nookhalha nhina mwawe, ni uyo nookhalha mu ulhutaanani ni Nlhuku.
62004016	Ni hii nihochuwelha ni urumelhelha wiira Nlhuku noonittuna. Nlhuku phi uttunana. Ni ntu ri ni nrima wo uttunana nokhalha nhina mwawe Nlhuku. Ni Nlhuku nokhalha nhina mwawe ntu uyo.
62004017	Nikhalheke etu wo uttunana velhaponi va, thoko Kuristo, nrima ihu wo uttunana unootimira nhina mwihu. Wiira niwe neemelha wo uhoova nihuku Nlhuku vanohalha awe waahukumulha attu onkhaye nno.
62004018	Nrima wo uttunana khunoova, nrima wo uttuna we ikeekhene unookakha woova. Paahi etu, ntu o woova khanatimira mu uttunani, yoyo noova utwarushiya.
62004019	Hii nihanaa nrima wo uttunana, ukhalhawaya Nlhuku phi chokhonlhe unittuna.
62004020	Ntu eerakaru nonttuna Nlhuku uno ampangelhaka ichimwa nhima awe yoyo hoothacha. Ukhalhawaya ntu hinonttuna mmuchi nomwoona awe, yoyo khanooria unttuna Nlhuku hinapacha awe umwoona.
62004021	Paahi etu nna phi nlheheriyo nonivaha awe Kuristo, nonttuna Nlhuku anttuneke etu nhima awe.
62005001	Kila ntu norumelhelha wiira Yesu phi Kuristo thanlhiye ni Nlhuku phi mwaana a Nlhuku. Ukhalhawaya kila ntu nonttuna naangoro, nonttuna ni mwaana yariye.
62005002	Phi chiichammo chinochuwelha ihu wiira, ninowaattuna ashaana a Nlhuku, ni unttuna Nlhuku ni uvarechesha malhehero awe.
62005003	Ukhalhawaya unttuna Nlhuku phi uvarechesha malhehero awe. Ni malhehero awe ayo kharinke,
